story:
Coolala is the outdoor and indoor solar-powered portable air conditioner. Unlike electric fans or evaporative cooling units (pour water) which can only blow hot air, Coolala is REAL air conditioning, same to what you would experience from an in-window AC unit.

For indoor usage, simply power the Coolala by plugging it into your nearest outlet using the supplied power adaptor. For outdoor usage, connect Coolala to the optional 40,000mAh or 60,000mAh power station — and for extra sunny days, a solar panel provides additional power. Even though there is no sun, Coolala can be worked by power station. Coolala has everything you need to stay cool and have fun in the sun! 

 

Coolala is the world’s first portable, solar-powered air conditioner designed to keep you feeling cool on even the hottest of summer days. It makes the outdoors even better. 

Coolala is the first solar-powered, portable AC to ever exist. The idea was born from a pretty simple insight: you’re outside, the sun is beating down on you-why not use that same sun power to cool you off? And thus, Coolala was born.

Other portable air conditioners are fraught with problems, namely that they have a short battery life or require an often-inaccessible power source.

With Coolala, you'll never have to worry about running out of battery ever again. Coolala’s solar-powered technology uses the sun to keep you cool all day and night, with a battery life of up to 8 hours when fully charged.

The Solar powered charger makes Coolala the perfect outdoor solution for hot weather. Coolala works perfectly in the United States and Canada! There are many options for powering your Coolala both indoors and outdoors.

 

Coolala is a 3,500 BTU air conditioner with 100 watts of solar energy.

Fully charged, the battery lasts up to 8 hours. Or keep it in the sun for an all-day cool that charges as you go.  

 

Coolala really packs a cool punch, because we gave it the world’s most powerful micro air compressor. It’s up to 150 square feet of cooling power in a tiny package.  

 

 

If you can’t take the cool with you, what’s the point? That’s why we made Coolala as compact and portable as possible. Weighing in at just over 7 pounds, we also included a handle and wheels to make things even easier.  

 

Hot outside? Hot inside? Coolala goes both ways. And that’s just the way we like it. So whether it’s a musty cabin, a hot workspace, or a steamy campground, Coolala’s got your comfort in check.  

  

 

You can feel good about the fact that Coolala is the best value in a portable AC unit out there.  

 

Let’s face it, no one ever knows where the flashlight is. That’s why with Coolala, you don’t need to worry about it. When it gets dark out, Coolala’s LED light helps keep the party going (or the book reading going, whichever is more your style).  

Coolala is also good for RV, boat-sailing, construction site, truck and other outdoor activities.

 

 

 

 

 

   

                                  

 

Why it works?

Coolala is a portable outdoor air-conditioner, the device lets you cool down with an honest-to-goodness air-conditioning unit anywhere you are. No, this is NOT one of those “air-conditioners” that are actually just fans with ice or water inside, but an actual device that uses the same hardware as the window-type unit you have installed at home. We use our invented micro DC compressor and condenser. Want to have air-conditioning blowing cold air your way while you chop down trees in the mountain and cut them down into logs? Yep, this will work. Want to cool down your sun-repelling tent for an afternoon nap in the middle of a scorching hot day? This will do the trick.

 

 

 

 

We provide 2 years warranty for electric parts. If the defective part can't be repaired, we replace a new part. Please note buyers bear the shipping cost to our factory. You can contact them if you have quality problem.

Our factory details:

web-sites:

www.coolalaairconditioning.com

www.facebook.com/Coolala-portable-outdoorindoor...

Email: Hello@coolalaairconditioning.com

 

 

   

With your support, we would have the opportunity to do more research on more powerful outdoor AC and smart AC.

story:
While we don't technically need electricity to survive, it's hard to imagine living without it. There seems to be few things worse than being without a power. In an emergency situation, electricity can save your life. Whether you're camping, taking a trip with your family, a backyard party on the weekend or finding yourself in an unexpected power outage, you'll want to make sure you have an alternative power source to keep you safe. Enter the Bluetti AC200 Portable Power Station, an off-grid solution to your power needs.

Moreover, a portable power station that can reduce your electricity bill.

Want to know more? Scroll down and we’ll explain.

 

 

Bluetti AC200 has completed pre-production stage. We honor our brand and also cherish our relationship with the customers and we promise guaranteed delivery as an official team!



Bluetti always strives to create a stable, clean, quiet power storage solution aimed at combatting outages, energy waste and environmental pollution.

The Bluetti AC200 is designed to act on those issues directly by replacing traditional gas generators, removing the need to maintain a noisy, high maintenance, carbon monoxide polluting machine.





Could you imagine that a single power station would meet all your charging needs? Yes, the Bluetti AC200 is more than capable. Featuring a wide range of output options including six AC outlets, dual 15W wireless chargers, one PD 60W USB-C, four USB-A ports, two 12V/3A
ports, one DC 12V/10A cigarette lighter and one 12V/25A RV port, this all-in-one power station is perfect for use at home, parties, camping, tailgating and as an emergency power back-up.



The AC output from the 2000W pure sine wave inverter provides an impressive fully capable power system. Traditional devices such as laptops, lights, CPAP, drones, TVs and protectors can be powered by the AC200 for a prolonged period of time. The AC200 is also capable of running larger load devices such as coffee machines, kettles, fridges, hairdryers, power tools, and even Tesla with ease.



With the AC200 in hand, you’ll never worry about being left in the dark from emergency situations or natural disasters such as hurricanes and wildfires. With an insane 1700Wh of energy storage, AC200 gives you the confidence in any emergency. Ensure your families are safe with AC200, by providing fresh food from a running fridge during unexpected power outages.

Additionally, the AC200 is fantastic for all larger size appliances or multiple device power needs.


*Data based on laboratory test. Actual result may vary. The maximum and total output is 2000W.
 


Versatile power inputs allow you to recharge no matter where you are.

  • Eco-friendly & Ultra-Fast Solar Recharge

Traditionally, solar panels are inefficient and slow to charge without heavy sunlight. The Bluetti AC200 overcomes these preconceptions with a max 700W solar input allowing full recharge within 3-3.5 hours. Simply place the AC200 under the sun and take a break while the solar panels collect energy quickly and efficiently.

A pre-installed solar charging optimization module (MPPT) in the AC200 functions as a maximum point tracker allows up to 40% faster charging times, especially from the solar panels.

* Solar charge times are dependent on many factors such as elevation, temperature, season and positioning to the sun

 

  • Better Care Battery Life Cycle By Wall Charge

It is vital to know that lithium-ion batteries can degrade over time if they are charged too quickly. Recharge time is set to around 5 hours by wall socket, ensuring that the AC200 is capable of lasting for at least 2500+ cycles.



Need to top up fast? No problem,  there are two ways:

- Recharge via 700W solar and 400W AC power simultaneously which takes only 2-2.5 hours

- Recharge via dual AC power (total in 800W) simultaneously which takes in 2.5-3 hours! 

 

With up to 23% high efficiency monocrystalline solar cell by SUNPOWER®, SP120 allows you to make the most use of the sun as it converts the sunlight into clean energy. Made with advanced laminated technology and the long-lasting ETFE material, our solar panel guarantees durability for over 15 years.

Foldable design with a rubber handle and weighs only 9.48 lb, making it convenient to be carried around anywhere you want. Its 4 adjustable kickstands also allow for easy installation. And you can always adjust its angle for better sunlight!

 


The Bluetti AC200 utilizes the highest quality EV-grade 3C LG battery cell to guarantee the longest life, better heat dissipation and stability for the product. It is much safer than other common unknown battery cells on the market.

Additionally the built in Battery Management System (BMS) which is one of the fundamental components of a portable power station, improves battery utilization, and extend battery service life through short circuit protection, overcurrent protection, over-voltage protection, overload protection, overheating protection and other functions.

Each station produced has undergone more than 1000+ inspection processes, including vibration, hot and cold shock, prolonged high temperature, noise, packaging drop and accessory wire bending etc.

Acquired certifications include PSE, FCC, CE, UN38.3, msds, UL and ROHS.

 


With the smart touchable LCD screen, real-time display shows current, voltage, power, temperature and charging status. Users can independently alter the output voltage, frequency, charging mode, etc.

Our unique “Bluetti ECO” mode can prevent up to 50% of wasted electricity loss. It will automatically power down when the output is lower than 50W for 4 hours, just in case you forget to turn it off. 


What makes AC200 a fantastic off-grid power solution for small RVs and campers? 

With an AC200 in hand you’ll have plenty of power for Boondocking or Dry-Camping in a compact do-it-all package. If you’ve been holding off installing an off-grid power solution then the AC200 is the perfect option for you. 

The 12V/25A RV plug rated at 25 amps for Vandwellers and DIYers. You can use this outlet to run those vehicle powered devices which require a higher current to operate.



Intelligent temperature control keeps the AC200 cool, further protecting the battery, with fans only activating at 45 degrees celsius, allowing for a quiet environment. When utilizing a CPAP machine, the AC200 remains quiet throughout the night.

 

We’ve checked out a lot of portable power stations here on 9to5Toys, but never one as powerful and versatile as the Bluetti AC200. With their Indiegogo campaign about to launch, Bluetti sent us one of their upcoming units to take a look at. With a 1700Wh capacity and continuous AC output up to 2000w, the AC200 has a lot to offer, especially for the $1199 super early backer price. Head below to check out the video.
-- By 9to5Toys

Meet the Bluetti AC200 Portable Power Station. Designed for both outdoor and indoor use, it's quiet, it's portable, it's clean and efficient, and it's packed with enough power to keep you charged up no matter where your day takes you.
-- By iMore

It's clean, it's efficient, and it's intelligent. More importantly, it packs an incredible amount of power into a small, easy-to-transport kit. In short, it's everything you could possibly want in a portable power station, with none of the drawbacks they commonly carry.
-- By Tom's guide

Many portable or emergency power generators either rely on diesel fuel or offer very little in the way of battery capacity. The AC200 has no such shortcomings. Rather than having to maintain a noisy, high-maintenance machine that belches out pollutants with abandon, you'll instead be able to rely upon solar energy.
-- By techradar




 



High attention to detail throughout the entire design process ensures the highest quality possible.










With 10 years of industry experience, Bluetti is committed to building premium portable power stations for explorers, naturalists and off-grid living.

Before Bluetti we spent 10 years heavily involved in the new energy industry. As such, we are the first manufacturer to launch portable energy storage solutions with rich industry experience and a strong R&D and production background.

Bluetti is a segment brand focusing on portable energy storage, dedicated to providing high-performance clean energy delivery to the masses while solving the global power shortage presented in a thoughtful package.

story:
Introducing nature to where we live and work has been proven to improve overall health. Houseplants, small herbs or aquariums are options to add a natural touch to an indoor environment. They’re beautiful, but not easy to take care of. With our technology and design, fish and plants take care of each other so you can focus on other things.

 It’s easier to take care of Malawi than just an aquarium, or just a houseplant.

Plants are always watered and fertilized and the fish tank remains clean. A pump cycles water from the aquarium into the grow bed. Then the water returns to the aquarium through a drain that helps aerate the water for the fish. While the water is cycling, bacteria in the clay medium convert fish waste from the aquarium into plant food. Over time, the ecosystem becomes abundant with nutrients.

The inspiration for Malawi came from our founder’s experience working around the world, discovering innovative ways to grow food indoors by fusing nature and technology.

Choose your color


 

Options: white, silver and black. 

Choose what you grow
Plant seeds for your favorite cuisine or beverage.
Choose your look

Personalize your aquarium. 

While window light is enough for most indoor plants, we suggest supplementing your garden with extra light to grow edible herbs and greens. Malawi was designed to be lit by any lamp that compliments your interior; use the garden as a glowing source of ambient lighting which studies show is a healthier alternative to direct lighting. We’ll be providing guidance to make sure you have the right light for your needs.

 

 
 
 


Malawi is designed with quality and longevity in mind. Our grow bed is a space-grade aluminum alloy with one seam that nests comfortably on an edge-less acrylic tank. We’ve spent two years iterating Malawi’s design and ensuring that our materials are durable and long-lasting. We’ve successfully ordered, received and assembled batches of inventory for our early adopter trials, and we have worked closely with our manufacturers to ensure that our design is ready to scale.

Our indoor garden's name was inspired by one of the oldest and largest freshwater lakes in Africa near Mozambique where our founder grew up. Lakes are ecosystems just like our garden. 

Just Grow is comprised of a passionate and interdisciplinary team determined to elevate what’s possible with gardening while addressing the trends that contribute to our environmental crisis. With over a decade of combined experience in horticulture, we’re confident that Malawi integrates the latest in technology and design so that you can seamlessly adopt the latest approach to growing food indoors.

PRESS KIT

FAQs

Do you ship internationally?

Yes we do, for any orders outside of the US and Canada please email us through our contact page and we'll get in touch to find the best shipping option to your country! https://justgrow.com/contact/

How long does the set up take?

About 10-20 minutes. All you have to do is find a sturdy table for your garden, place the fish tank, place your decor and fill the tank with water.  Add the medium to the grow bed then nest your grow bed on top of the fish tank. Plugin, turn on the pump and add your first cycling mix (bacteria and water conditioner).

How frequently should the water be refilled?

As little as once a month. The amount and time period vary depending on evaporation rates, but we’ve found a gallon or two a month to be consistent with our early adopters.

Will I be able to use natural light only?

It depends on the type of plants you’d like to grow. Shade ornamental plants will do fine in lower light, but edible plants like herbs will need more powerful and direct light.

Will the Malawi smell?

No. In traditional tanks, odor is caused by waste buildup and anaerobic activity that releases gases. One of the benefits of Malawi is that water is always cycling from the aquarium and passing through the biofilter, eliminating any buildup and keeping the water aerobic which does not emit odor.

What do I do if I’m traveling and don’t have anyone to feed my fish?

We recommend purchasing an automatic feeder. This way the fish are fed whether you’re present or not!

Can I use my tap water if I have a filter?

The cycling mix we provide should be able to condition most tap water. If using tap water for refilling, we suggest leaving it out overnight to allow the chemicals to evaporate.

How many fish can I have?

This depends on the species of fish. You can have 8-12 community fish-- about 1 small fish per gallon. Some fish are territorial and will prefer less fish in the aquarium. We suggest incorporating a variety of fish; including bottom and surface feeders like dwarf plecostomus and and albino cory.

What kind of light do I need?

We recommend a minimum of 1,000 lumens of full spectrum light to grow small herbs and microgreens. But, if you want optimum plant growth that is not limited by light, we advise 1800-2200 lumens (20-30 watt LED/CFL). We also recommend using a spot light for your lamp so that all the light is pointed towards your garden.

Can you do water changes easily?

With Malawi, there is no need for water changes because the water is cleaned and cycled back. The nutrients from fish waste feed the plants and the plants clean the water allowing the fish to remain healthy.

Are you encouraging users to cycle before adding fish?

We are encouraging our users to cycle before adding fish in order to achieve a stable bacteria colony before introducing the fish - we will provide ammonia and instructions on how to cycle.

Does it come with a filter?

Malawi uses beneficial bacteria as a biofilter to keep the aquarium water clean. Bacteria establish themselves in the clay medium; they convert fish waste into plant food, and the plants filter out nutrients before the water returns back to the aquarium.

Plugin, turn on the pump and add your first cycling mix (bacteria and water conditioner).How frequently should the water be refilled?As little as once a month. The amount and time period vary depending on evaporation rates, but we’ve found a gallon or two a month to be consistent with our early adopters.Will I be able to use natural light only?It depends on the type of plants you’d like to grow. Shade ornamental plants will do fine in lower light, but edible plants like herbs will need more powerful and direct light.Will the Malawi smell?No. In traditional tanks, odor is caused by waste buildup and anaerobic activity that releases gases. One of the benefits of Malawi is that water is always cycling from the aquarium and passing through the biofilter, eliminating any buildup and keeping the water aerobic which does not emit odor.What do I do if I’m traveling and don’t have anyone to feed my fish?We recommend purchasing an automatic feeder. This way the fish are fed whether you’re present or not!Can I use my tap water if I have a filter?The cycling mix we provide should be able to condition most tap water. If using tap water for refilling, we suggest leaving it out overnight to allow the chemicals to evaporate.How many fish can I have?This depends on the species of fish. You can have 8-12 community fish-- about 1 small fish per gallon. Some fish are territorial and will prefer less fish in the aquarium. We suggest incorporating a variety of fish; including bottom and surface feeders like dwarf plecostomus and and albino cory.What kind of light do I need?We recommend a minimum of 1,000 lumens of full spectrum light to grow small herbs and microgreens. But, if you want optimum plant growth that is not limited by light, we advise 1800-2200 lumens (20-30 watt LED/CFL). We also recommend using a spot light for your lamp so that all the light is pointed towards your garden.Can you do water changes easily?With Malawi, there is no need for water changes because the water is cleaned and cycled back. The nutrients from fish waste feed the plants and the plants clean the water allowing the fish to remain healthy.Are you encouraging users to cycle before adding fish?We are encouraging our users to cycle before adding fish in order to achieve a stable bacteria colony before introducing the fish - we will provide ammonia and instructions on how to cycle.Does it come with a filter?Malawi uses beneficial bacteria as a biofilter to keep the aquarium water clean. Bacteria establish themselves in the clay medium; they convert fish waste into plant food, and the plants filter out nutrients before the water returns back to the aquarium.

story:
Premium Emergency Home Water Storage

The Barrel is pressurized which is essential to accomplish water circulation and to keep an airtight system. It turns out, there's nothing else like it for storing water – which is why we were able to patent the technology.

  • The water inside circulates with each use
  • Built with ultra high-quality components that are safe for drinking
  • All parts are lead-free* California compliant
  • Made with food-grade and recyclable plastic ♴ with UV inhibitors

And it's incredibly easy to setup.

It Is Nothing like a Rain Barrel or a 55-Gallon Container

Our Barrel is engineered to take the guesswork out of how to keep your drinking water safe. The pressurized design allows you to connect the back of the Barrel directly to your drinkable water source. You'll also connect a hose to the front of the Barrel. Every time you use your hose, water is pulled through the Barrel, automatically replenishing the water inside with new water. The Waterfull Barrel is easy to install, easy to store, and easy to access – and easy for you to take care of yourself and your family. 

A New Way to Store Water

People are unprepared for emergencies because they lead busy lives, they prioritize food instead of water, they miscalculate how much water they actually need, they forget to check and rotate their food and water every 6 months, or they simply don’t know where to start.

Hurricane Wind Tested

We pride ourselves on the durability of our barrel, so much that we subjected it to hurricane force winds.  We successfully tested and the Barrel sustained winds of 140 mph! That is enough stability to surpass a Category 3 hurricane. Rest assured, the Waterfull Barrel will be there for you when you need it most.

Rotationally Molded with Premium Plastic to Withstand Water Pressure and the Elements

To integrate our pressurized design of the Barrel and the need for food-safe parts, we use only rotational molding as our manufacturing process. Rotational molding gives Waterfull an ultra-thick construction and Category 3 hurricane stability.

Specs

  • Capacity: 30 gallons
  • Barrel dimensions: 27"d x 21"w x 32"h
  • Package dimensions: 213⁄4"d x 213⁄4"w x 321⁄2"h
  • Barrel weight (empty): 36 lbs.
  • Barrel weight (full): 300 lbs.
  • Max water pressure: 30 PSI

 

Why Is It so Difficult to Store Water?

In 2004, families stood in long lines just to receive drinking water before Hurricane Charley hit. If they were unprepared before the hurricane landed, we could only imagine how they fared afterwards. The inaccessibility to drinkable water disturbed us–it seemed like a fixable problem, one that shouldn’t even exist in the first place. 

We began to ask why it hadn’t been solved yet. We looked at rain barrels which store undrinkable water and water barrels on the market that were too big and difficult to use. We wanted something simple to use that wouldn't be an eyesore. It wasn't out there and this didn’t sit well with us. Why couldn’t residents, cities and states be better prepared with drinkable water that's easy to store? 

We decided to tackle water accessibility and preparedness ourselves–because we knew it was a problem within our power and skill set to fix. And fix it we did! The Waterfull Barrel exists because we believe everyone should have access to drinkable water. And that taking care of your loved ones isn’t just an individual responsibility, but a communal one.

The Waterfull Team

Our goal is to eventually provide Waterfull Barrels to communities around the globe. We’ve started this Indiegogo campaign asking for your help to purchase two new manufacturing molds.

The Impact

First: We’ve tested our Barrel, received feedback, and made adjustments in our design to ensure that not only a quality product is produced, but one that families everywhere can rely on. Your backing will help allow us to purchase two upgraded molds. The new molds will help us improve the Barrel in three key areas: the new design is more durable, reduces assembly time, and increases production capacity. Which means that we can make heavier-duty Barrels, make more of them, and in a shorter amount of time. 

Second: Hurricane season is coming. Since we started this project, there’s been an increase in natural disasters, especially in hurricane-prone areas. By backing us, you’re helping us reach in-need communities that much quicker, and when it comes to emergencies, timing is everything. We’ve seen the damage hurricanes can cause, especially when exacerbated by climate change, so we’re serious about getting these Barrels out.

How We Will Use Your Support

We’ve designed our product, gone through several prototypes and beta tests, and received our patent! This means we’re ready for the next step: Manufacturing. 

It is important to us that we keep the manufacturing of the Barrel as local as possible. That will allow us to manage quality control and ensure all parts are safe for drinking, which we can’t oversee overseas. Our manufacturing partner is not only in the United States but since they helped us produce our first prototypes, they’re intimately familiar with our product. This expert level of manufacturing results in a premium product but high inventory costs.

Due to the pressurized design of the Barrel and the need for food-safe parts, we could only use rotational molding as our manufacturing process which results in a higher cost.

While we've been able to cover these costs up until now in our product development stage, we need the funds to get the ball rolling on sales of our product.

Risks & Challenges

The Manufacturing Process: 
Once we purchase the new molds with your support, we will need to run some quality control tests. This can cause delays in the manufacturing process if there are kinks in our molds. If orders exceed our expectations, this can also cause delays in our manufacturing process. We will do our best to ship to our earliest backers first. We estimate this process will take about 3 months.

Other Challenges: 
Weather can also affect delivery of our product (hurricane season in particular is approaching). Additionally, should there be an impending natural disaster, we may need to send Barrels to crisis areas–which would delay either the manufacturing of your Barrel, shipping of your Barrel, or both.

 

Shipping & Fulfillment

Whether you order one or two Barrels, there will only be one UPS ground charge of $65. By shipping UPS ground, we avoid shipping freight which requires a signature upon delivery. Unfortunately, we cannot provides these rates to Alaska, Hawaii, or U.S. territories. If you live somewhere other than the lower 48 states, please contact us to see if we can arrange shipping.

 

Please Help Get the Word Out

We believe our Barrel can help save lives. So if you can't purchase one now, please share our Indiegogo campaign with your friends and family. Use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you.

story:
¿Quiénes somos?

Somos una fundación sin fines de lucro que tiene por objetivo contribuir con la mejora del desempeño ambiental de las empresas, de forma preventiva y rentable.

Buscamos contribuir a la causa global de reducir los riesgos a la salud y al ambiente, siendo las empresas un actor importante, por lo que es necesario ayudar principalmente a las micro y pequeñas empresas a reducir sus impactos ambientales de forma rentable.

Tenemos 19 años de trabajar en Guatemala, somos parte de una iniciativa global apoyada por las Naciones Unidas y localmente por el sector empresarial en alianza con el gobierno.

Hace tres años iniciamos una nueva fase, el desarrollo de herramientas web.  Vemos al internet como una plataforma para facilitar herramientas y transferir conocimiento e ideas útiles, con fácil acceso para las empresas que desean mejorar su desempeño y contribuir con el ambiente.

En mayo del 2018 lanzamos la primera herramienta, el DDA (Diagnósticos de Desempeño Ambiental”, la cual facilita formularios técnicos para que las empresas realicen auto diagnósticos ambientales.

Ahora queremos finalizar la programación y lanzamiento de nuestra segunda herramienta, el Simulador Técnico, que permitirá realizar balances de agua, de energía y emisiones para que las empresas identifiquen oportunidades de mejora ambiental y económica.

 

¿Qué necesitamos y qué obtienes?

  • Fondos para finalizar la programación del Simulador Técnico, como aporte de la fundación ya hemos desarrollado toda la estructura técnica de la herramienta.
  • Fondos para implementarla y ponerla en marcha para que esté disponible para las empresas.
  • Apoyando esta iniciativa, estarás colaborando con el desarrollo de una herramienta muy útil para las empresas, la cual tendrá versiones gratuitas útiles y otras versiones de pago que contribuirán a que se mantenga habilitada en el tiempo.
  • Si eres parte de una empresa o tienes una empresa, podrá utilizar esta herramienta para mejorar tus costos, reducir tus impactos, diferenciarte en el mercado, encontrar oportunidades de mejora y riesgos económicos ambientales.
  • Si logramos la recaudación la herramienta tendrá permanentemente una versión gratuita para cualquier empresa y desarrollaremos una versión de simulador energético de uso doméstico para que las personas puedan medir su huella de carbono y reducir su consumo energético (calculadora de carbono).

 

El impacto

Una de las principales barreras para las micro y pequeñas empresas es la disponibilidad de recursos para poder recibir asistencia técnica o invertir para tener acceso a tecnología y conocimiento.

Con esta herramienta podemos eliminar esa barrera, por lo que podemos contribuir a la mejora del ambiental logrando que cada vez más empresas se involucren en el tema de una forma positiva, atractiva, preventiva y rentable, 

Una de las ventajas de las herramientas web es el desarrollo de estadística, por lo que también podremos generar información pública que podrá ayudar a desarrollar planes de impacto nacional y conocer los beneficios ecnonómicos y ambientales a nivel nacional por la mejora del desempeño ambiental de nuestras empresas.

 

Otras formas de contribuir

En caso no puedas contribuir económicamente, solicitamos tu apoyo para difundir esta iniciativa y en caso seas parte de una empresa o eres dueño de una, utiliza nuestra herramienta DDA para contribuir en su uso, desarrollo y difusión.

Regístrate sin costo en www.desempenoambiental.net

story:
Introducing the 2nd Generation HydroIce 8 in 1 Turbo Carbon Air Cooler

Our Advanced 2nd generation all new Improved HydroIce™ 8-in-1  portable environmental control unit.  HydroIce features Ultra Air Cooling with effective Air Purification as well. Everything that you need to cool your micro-climate while cleaning out harmful impurities, dust particles, dirt and other pollutants.  It’s whisper quiet and portable making it the most effective Air Cooler.

 

 

The HydroIce™ cleans out the harmful impurities, dust particles and dirt and other pollutants that you can’t see making it not only an Air Cooler and Humidifier, but an Effective air purifier as well. If you are tired of staining your shirts with sweat even on the days that you don't hit the gym, you need to put some thought into what you are doing to control the temperature in your space. Just like you don't need a massive humidifier to get the job done, you don't need a massive central AC system either. A personal cooler is highly efficient and highly effective, cooling up to 600 square feet in just minutes, keeping the sweat off your brow all summer long. 

Instant Strong Cooling Power

Hot and Dry Air Becomes Cool, Moist Air

 

 

Air in your home dried out and leaving your skin cracked and your hair brittle? This happens, but that doesn't mean you need to just ignore it. You can humidify your space, and you don't need to lug around a giant system to do so. The humidifier in HydroIce is compact and powerful, filling your home with the refreshing moistness that leads to healthy, glowing skin and lush, bouncy hair.

 

 

Other cooling devices just use ordinary filters.  That combined with the water leads to a breeding ground of mold, dust mites, and allergens.  All that can actually be blowing right on you!

 

 

Advanced Filter Technology helps purify the air around you by cleaning the dirt, dust and pollutants out.

 

 

Getting tired of your outdated fan sounding like a blaring Generator? HydroIce's new noise-block design keeps the noise level under 49 dB even as it works hard to keep you refreshed. We have enhanced noise reduction level by 30%, so you’ll be guaranteed a quiet, soothing personal space, wherever you take it.

The Hydro Ice has Xtreme Quiet Technology and a brushless motor which makes it whisper quiet.  You can barely even hear it working.

Need we say more? With HydroIce, it's so quiet, you won't even know it's on.

 

 

 

There is always a certain way we feel everyday, and how it can impact our every-day-lives.  There are also lights that have intensity and that can also affect the way we enter a room and the way we act towards others.  With the HyrdoIce™, the unit has a mood light, making you feel comfortable, what-ever mood you're in. 7 Mood lightings to choose from to enhance your space.

 

 

Cooling down and chilling out with HydroIce™ is simple. You can control the temperature to whatever you feel comfortable with. It even adjusts to the temperature that feels just right for the space you are currently in. The Surround Temp Climate Control puts everything at your personal preference with just the touch of a button.  You are in complete control of your comfort.

 

 

The HydroIce™ has a unique optional Aromatherapy Diffuser.  Add your favorite scented oil to the tank and customize the scents to your room as you cool down to refresh your personal space. Great for seasonal allergies and sinus discomfort!

  • Lavender - This essential oil helps promote relaxation and can help heal skin irritations. It can help with stress, anxiety and calm you to prepare for sleeping.
  • Tea Tree - Tea tree oil is an essential oil that can be used for several purposes, including keeping skin, hair and nails healthy.
  • Eucalyptus - A purifying, cleansing, clarifying, and immune-boosting oil. It facilitates easy breathing, enhances feelings of relaxation, creates a refreshing feeling.
  • Peppermint - Peppermint Essential Oil can boost energy, clear the respiratory tract, stimulate circulation, alleviate feelings of nervous tension and stress, and soothe feelings of irritability.
  • Orange - Orange Essential Oil’s pleasant scent has a cheerful and uplifting yet simultaneously relaxing, calming effect. It also can stimulate the strength and resilience of the immune system.
  • Germ Fighter Blend - It is so important to keep your body on alert against attacks to your immune system. The Germ Fighter Blend will help your body in warding off seasonal threats and give you that extra protection you need. Plus, it smells great!

 

 

 

Space Conditioning

On top of that, You struggle to stay cool on those extra hot days…it effects your work, your play, your family and even your sleep. The Turbo Cool advanced nanotech design is so efficient it cools up to a full 600 square feet in just minutes.  You actually create your own microclimate to the exact comfort level you choose.

 

 

CLEAN AIR FOR YOUR FAMILY

 

 

Portability Just for You

With the new HydroIce™ by Milex, you can now take your air conditioning unit where-ever you go! Whether you are at home, the office or the park on a hot day.

 

 

SETUP - How to use the HydroIce

Just add water to your HydroIce™, select your fan speed and it instantly begins working.  The Smart system automatically sets the humidity level so you get cool air that is properly moist and satisfying. The water tank is located above the unit, add water for regular mist or essential oil with water for aroma therapy. The HydroIce can blow cool air with or without mist/aroma breeze.

The HydroIce™ combines the functionality of some of the best home sellers. This includes a portable air conditioner, a standard humidifier, an air purifier and an aroma therapy machine. These products do not have crossover functionality, but the HydroIce™ merges 8 technologies into 1!

Create your Space, your Way!

Home, Office, Garage or Patio -- Create your own micro-climate suitable to you. Add flavorful aroma, purify air, or reverse hot dry air with your HydroIce.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

In addition to making a monetary contribution to this campaign, you can show your support for what we are doing by sharing a link to this campaign on any social media platforms you use. Go ahead and post the campaign link on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media platforms you use. We appreciate all your support, both monetary and non-monetary, and we thank you for your time.

 

 

Disclaimer

These statements have not been evaluated by the food and drug administration. This product is not intended to treat, cure, or prevent any disease

The information, including but not limited to texts, graphics, images and other material contained on this website is for educational purposes only. The content is not intended in any way as a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified healthcare provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition or treatment and before undertaking a new health care regime, and never disregard professional medical advice or delay in seeking it because something you have read on this website.

Milex does not guarantee specific results for individuals who use the Hydroice due to many factors that can influence health and or weight loss.

Please consult doctor before use for:

Using pacemaker or other medical devices which are susceptible to electrical interference;

Being pregnant or at puerperium;

Individual results may vary..

*Model, design, shape and color may vary

No individual results should be considered typical or guaranteed.

Backer is Responsible for ALL VAT & Customs charges that may occur.

This happens, but that doesn't mean you need to just ignore it. You can humidify your space, and you don't need to lug around a giant system to do so. The humidifier in HydroIce is compact and powerful, filling your home with the refreshing moistness that leads to healthy, glowing skin and lush, bouncy hair.  Other cooling devices just use ordinary filters.  That combined with the water leads to a breeding ground of mold, dust mites, and allergens.  All that can actually be blowing right on you!  Advanced Filter Technology helps purify the air around you by cleaning the dirt, dust and pollutants out.  Getting tired of your outdated fan sounding like a blaring Generator? HydroIce's new noise-block design keeps the noise level under 49 dB even as it works hard to keep you refreshed. We have enhanced noise reduction level by 30%, so you’ll be guaranteed a quiet, soothing personal space, wherever you take it.The Hydro Ice has Xtreme Quiet Technology and a brushless motor which makes it whisper quiet.  You can barely even hear it working.Need we say more? With HydroIce, it's so quiet, you won't even know it's on.   There is always a certain way we feel everyday, and how it can impact our every-day-lives.  There are also lights that have intensity and that can also affect the way we enter a room and the way we act towards others.  With the HyrdoIce™, the unit has a mood light, making you feel comfortable, what-ever mood you're in. 7 Mood lightings to choose from to enhance your space.  Cooling down and chilling out with HydroIce™ is simple. You can control the temperature to whatever you feel comfortable with. It even adjusts to the temperature that feels just right for the space you are currently in. The Surround Temp Climate Control puts everything at your personal preference with just the touch of a button.  You are in complete control of your comfort.  The HydroIce™ has a unique optional Aromatherapy Diffuser.  Add your favorite scented oil to the tank and customize the scents to your room as you cool down to refresh your personal space. Great for seasonal allergies and sinus discomfort!

Lavender - This essential oil helps promote relaxation and can help heal skin irritations. It can help with stress, anxiety and calm you to prepare for sleeping.

Tea Tree - Tea tree oil is an essential oil that can be used for several purposes, including keeping skin, hair and nails healthy.

Eucalyptus - A purifying, cleansing, clarifying, and immune-boosting oil. It facilitates easy breathing, enhances feelings of relaxation, creates a refreshing feeling.

Peppermint - Peppermint Essential Oil can boost energy, clear the respiratory tract, stimulate circulation, alleviate feelings of nervous tension and stress, and soothe feelings of irritability.

Orange - Orange Essential Oil’s pleasant scent has a cheerful and uplifting yet simultaneously relaxing, calming effect. It also can stimulate the strength and resilience of the immune system.

Germ Fighter Blend - It is so important to keep your body on alert against attacks to your immune system. The Germ Fighter Blend will help your body in warding off seasonal threats and give you that extra protection you need. Plus, it smells great!
   Space ConditioningOn top of that, You struggle to stay cool on those extra hot days…it effects your work, your play, your family and even your sleep. The Turbo Cool advanced nanotech design is so efficient it cools up to a full 600 square feet in just minutes.  You actually create your own microclimate to the exact comfort level you choose.  CLEAN AIR FOR YOUR FAMILY  Portability Just for YouWith the new HydroIce™ by Milex, you can now take your air conditioning unit where-ever you go! Whether you are at home, the office or the park on a hot day.  SETUP - How to use the HydroIceJust add water to your HydroIce™, select your fan speed and it instantly begins working.  The Smart system automatically sets the humidity level so you get cool air that is properly moist and satisfying. The water tank is located above the unit, add water for regular mist or essential oil with water for aroma therapy. The HydroIce can blow cool air with or without mist/aroma breeze.The HydroIce™ combines the functionality of some of the best home sellers. This includes a portable air conditioner, a standard humidifier, an air purifier and an aroma therapy machine. These products do not have crossover functionality, but the HydroIce™ merges 8 technologies into 1!Create your Space, your Way!Home, Office, Garage or Patio -- Create your own micro-climate suitable to you. Add flavorful aroma, purify air, or reverse hot dry air with your HydroIce.         Other Ways You Can HelpIn addition to making a monetary contribution to this campaign, you can show your support for what we are doing by sharing a link to this campaign on any social media platforms you use. Go ahead and post the campaign link on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and any other social media platforms you use. We appreciate all your support, both monetary and non-monetary, and we thank you for your time.  DisclaimerThese statements have not been evaluated by the food and drug administration. This product is not intended to treat, cure, or prevent any diseaseThe information, including but not limited to texts, graphics, images and other material contained on this website is for educational purposes only. The content is not intended in any way as a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified healthcare provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition or treatment and before undertaking a new health care regime, and never disregard professional medical advice or delay in seeking it because something you have read on this website.Milex does not guarantee specific results for individuals who use the Hydroice due to many factors that can influence health and or weight loss.Please consult doctor before use for:Using pacemaker or other medical devices which are susceptible to electrical interference;Being pregnant or at puerperium;Individual results may vary..*Model, design, shape and color may varyNo individual results should be considered typical or guaranteed.Backer is Responsible for ALL VAT & Customs charges that may occur.

story:
Introduction: 

As demand for energy increases word wide our planet faces the repercussions of our energy consumption in the form of global warming and the depletion of natural resources. Oil, coal and natural gas that were once considered as abundant and unlimited resources are now recognized as exhaustible and in limited supply for humankind's long-term needs. 

Creating Dams for Hydroelectric energy destroys untold acres of land, habitat for wildlife and submerges mineral and other resources. Nuclear Energy plants still have the problem of how to safely store radioactive material for hundreds of thousands of years, and keeping radioactive plutonium from becoming material for nuclear weapons. 

All of these large scale energy methods are not available to billions of people worldwide in developing countries, and the resources necessary to produce energy from these methods will require capitol expenditures amounting to trillions of dollars. In addition, an infrastructure (for transmission) would need to be built, and consumers will still be reliant on a distribution system for their energy needs that requires them to purchase energy into perpetuity without ever expecting to have a sense of ownership. 

Alternative energy production (solar, wind, wave, hydrogen, geothermal and others) will be contributing significantly to the ever increasing worldwide demand for cheap, clean, reliable and sustainable forms of energy.  

The reality that humans must utilize sources of energy that are abundant, clean and relatively safe is inescapable. We must look at our present failures based on relying on fossil fuels, and not make the mistake of becoming dependent on even more dangerous sources of energy like nuclear fusion as our "quick fix". We are at a juncture where our choices will impact the planet and the future of billions of people around the globe. 

Though the moment is critical, it is also ripe for implementing true quantitative change in-regards to ecologically healthy design and development. The time is overdue in developing counties for oppressive outmoded systems of development to be replaced with forward thinking, organic, sustainable technologies that appreciably improve the quality of life without jeopardizing our planets health. 

The challenge/problem: 

The reliance on fossil fuels to feed our energy demands in developed countries will someday come to an end as oil supplies diminish, and prices are driven up. Developing countries have never had the luxury of cheap fuel to drive industry and development, as a consequence the standard of living and the quality of life for billions of people is dismally marginal. What has worked for developed industrial societies is not the template for developing societies.

It is time for developing societies to evaluate the outcomes of the course of actions taken by western societies, learning from their mistakes and choosing healthier alternatives. A better choice would be to find appropriate solutions that will lead to a synergistic, sustainable and more a productive future. 

Fossil fuels, coal and hydroelectric energy, the main stay of western power production will not serve developing countries for a variety of reasons. Unfortunately many alternative techniques to produce energy have limitations that prevent them from meeting the needs of many people. Wave technology requires proximity to a coastline and transmission lines with substations to deliver power. Geothermal technology requires proximity to tectonic faults/vents and also requires a network to deliver power to users. 

So far the most available solar technology is solar panels using photovoltaic technologies. Even though the price of photovoltaic technology has decreased since their appearance in the marketplace, the price of solar panels for the power delivered makes them prohibitive for the majority of people in the world (let alone the developing world). 

If developing countries were to follow the energy consummation/production examples of developed countries the existing resources would soon be depleted, energy prices would be driven even higher and the economics of supply and demand would drive the gap between those who have energy and those who don't even further. So far no solution has emerged that can cheaply provide clean, abundant energy to people that is not encumbered with an infrastructure that requires enormous capitol investments. 

How SUN-E meets the challenge/problem: 

A great percentage of the developing world, exist between the Tropic of Cancer and the Tropic of Capricorn. One of the most significant energy resources "the sun" delivers it’s energy in the form of light and heat at its strongest/intense dose at the equator between the Tropics. For people living within this zone the problem is really a matter of collecting and utilizing this abundant supply of energy that naturally exists around them. 

SUN=E is a design that collects and focuses heat from sunlight to a single point where the concentrated heat will vaporize water into steam. The steam produced will be vented to power the rotation of a generator coil (dynamo) producing an electrical current. 

While none of this is new technology, the ability to scale down solar electrical generating systems from huge sites spanning acres to a device small enough to be installed on a rooftop by one or two persons, is! 

The solar heat concentrator is a key component to the success of the SUN=E design. Similar to the shape of a satellite dish, the concave, semi parabolic concentrator uses a mirrored glass bowl, (computer designed) to focus all of the light/heat to an intense point. This intense light/heat will be focused into a chamber where a continuous, measured amount of water (based on the temperature of the point of light/heat) will be sprayed onto the point of light/heat instantly vaporizing the water into steam. The resulting steam pressure generated will be vented to perform work, turning the rotors of a generator/dynamo creating electric current. 

A SUN=E system using a concentrator dish 32 inches across will out perform existing photovoltaic systems that use up to 5 times as much space and will cost less and last longer. The inventory of sizes of SUN=E energy systems will vary from units small enough to be portable for wilderness adventurers and campers, to units capable of meeting the demands of home owners, small business and light industries. 

SUN=E on its own will not solve our planets energy production. SUN=E is an energy production device that will still require a partnership with other technologies to serve humanity, chiefly energy storage technology (batteries).   SUN=E represents a powerful major step in generating cheap, clean, renewable energy, utilizing a simple low cost design with minimal moving parts. This type of energy generator allows individuals the ability to produce usable electrical current anytime there is sunshine. 

From remote areas, to city rooftops SUN=E will improve many societies standard of living by providing a simple to use, cheap energy source. Because SUN=E is not dependent on existing electrical grids, when there are power outrages (on old overloaded grids) SUN=E will continue to function and not drain or put more load on these systems. 

SUN=E is an independent, stand alone system! An additional function inherent in the design of the SUN=E is heating water to the point of boiling or vaporization. This allows the SUN=E unit to also provide hot water, and with the proper condensation and filter systems, clean water for consumption. 

ENERGY, HOT WATER and CLEAN WATER / these are the ways SUN=E will serve humanity and improve the quality of life for billions of people worldwide. The principles that SUN=E is based upon have been researched and studied. Large scale solar utility plants have been built on these very same principles. 

SUN=E represents a new direction in solar energy and in energy production in general. SUN=E is a miniaturized energy power plant scaled down in size, yet powerful enough to provide abundant energy in the form of electrical current for home and light industrial use. 

All SUN=E requires to operate is adequate amounts of sunlight/heat, and water. Our goal in creating this energy technology is to provide cheap, clean, abundant energy for humanities needs without generating harmful toxins, pollutants and increasing our planets risk of global warming. 

We visualize a major turn in how humanity addresses energy production and consumption as we realize the limitations of our current methods. Advances in design coupled with the rising cost of energy will encourage humanity to demand products that require less energy to operate, reducing the overall consumption per household. 

Even though electrical power is the main product of the SUN=E design, for many areas of the world clean water and hot water are outcomes of the SUN=E design that will have significant impact on health and quality of life. 

The inability to clean and purify local water supplies results in disease, sickness and death for too many people world wide. The SUN=E design operates by rapidly vaporizing water into steam, resulting in the sterilization of the water. The condensed vaporized water will be free of parasites, viruses and bacteria that are the major cause of illness and disease in developing countries. 

We believe that the SUN=E design will empower people in developing countries (between the Tropics) by providing electrical energy that previously was too costly or unavailable, as well as clean water and hot water. People who purchase a SUN=E unit, will own a reliable durable energy resource that they can rely upon for generations. SUN=E will become a competitive energy device that will fill a void that currently exist for most people in developing countries that have abundant sun energy and water. 

Because SUN=E is a low tech approach to our energy production needs, the resources necessary to develop the design are relatively low as well. Instead of designing and building huge power plants that supply energy to hundreds of thousands of people, the SUN=E solution focuses on a simple design that will serve a household. By designing a small power plant that is easily manufactured and that utilizes materials that are abundant allows for a cheaper method of transforming water into steam and using that steam to generate electricity. 

The financial investment to develop this energy technology is insignificant to the financial return inherent in serving the existing need. The goal is a relatively low cost unit, affordable to a large segment of people. 

We project worldwide sales of SUN=E units will exceed hundreds of thousands each year once consumers realize what the SUN=E design will deliver. 

Proof of Science: 

The “Proof of Science” involved in the SUN=E design has been studied and verified by several experts in their respective fields, including Professor Emeritus in the field of Physics, Frank Schrabo. Frank Schrabo teaches sustainable design at San Jose State College and has a home that was one of the first homes to incorporate low tech approaches to a “GREEN” design in San Jose. His home has been a model for sustainable design for over 20 years and is open for groups to visit and tour. 

 Conclusion: 

Currently there is no one solution that will meet every energy situation. Societies will eventually choose energy technologies that will most adequately serve their energy needs. Alternative energy technologies are becoming the main focus of research by the giants in the energy industry. SUN=E is simply one technology that will have an impact, providing cheap, clean energy for people residing where there is abundant heat from sunlight. 

To give people a choice between energy supplied from a power grid, verses a system that is independent of transmission lines is a step towards allowing people to own the means by which their energy needs are met. Owning a SUN=E energy system is a much more cost effective method for providing electrical energy for the majority of people living where there is abundant heat from sunlight, than paying a monthly energy bill year after year after year. 

We strongly believe that the SUN=E design will be perceived as the most affordable solution for a large segment of people worldwide. Our main goal is to successfully design, assemble and manufacture SUN=E units for distribution in the marketplace. 

We envision serving an ever increasing portion of the energy marketplace, creating product recognition and establishing SUN=E as a standard in the sustainable energy market. 

Lowell Rojon is committed to the development and application of the SUN=E design to provide clean, affordable, sustainable energy to serve humanities energy needs, while promoting a healthy environment that we can pass on to future generations.

story:
Powerful and portable, the b-Mola GO is the first medical-grade air purifier designed for consumer usage.  Unlike traditional air purifiers, b-Mola GO utilizes the most effective NCCO patented technology (Nano Confined Catalytic Oxidation). NCCO is widely used in many hospitals and public areas to provide you with the best quality air.

 

 

 

 

b-MOLA GO has 3 filtering systems: HEPA filter, Active Oxygen Generator, and NCCO filter. The system can clean 99% of any harmful and unhealthy elements in the air. This is the same structure used in hospital air purification systems.

HEPA can clean solid pollution like dust, smoke, mites, and pollen while the Active Oxygen Generator kills bacteria and virus. Lastly, the NCCO filter catalyzes and decomposes of any odor, harmful gases, and VOC.

And the NCCO Reactor filter can last 12 years.

 

b-MOLA GO’s portable and internal battery design make it extremely mobile and convenient. Put it in your living room, bedroom, take it to your office, or even leave it in your car to have fresh air whenever you are.

 

The Smoke Purification Testing

 

We used PH smoke pellets to generate smoke. One of these small pellets can last over 40 seconds; making the smoke hard to dissipate. b-MOLA can clean the smoke instantly, which proves it has the capability to clean any solid pollutants such as smoke, dust, pollen, mites, or PM2.5.

The VOC Purification Test

 

 

We used acetone[1] to test the ability to purify VOC. After we dropped the acetone in the beaker, it started to volatilize in the box and the VOC concentration indicated a drastic increase. In the end, the data was stable around 170 ppm[2]. When b-MOLA was turned on, almost all the acetone in the box was purified; showcasing the capability of b-MOLA against VOC and other toxic gases.

[1]Acetone (propanone) is the organic compound with the formula (CH3)2CO. It is a colorless, volatile, flammable liquid that is the simplest and smallest ketone.

[2]ppm and ppb are the concentration units. ppm =  parts per million. ppb= parts per billion. 1 ppm = 1000 ppb.

 
 
The Sterilization Test
 

 

We used two Petri dishes for this testing. One of the Petri dishes was put in the open area while the other was put in a space with the b-MOLA GO. Then we turned on b-MOLA GO and timed what happened.

3 days (72 hours) later, the petri dish in the open area generated visible bacterial colonies, which means an exponential bacterial growth occurred. The petri dish with the b-MOLA GO, however, looked the same as before. It proves b-MOLA GO is effective in killing bacterias and viruses.

 

 

 

 

To eliminate the solid pollutants in the air such as pollen, dust, and smoke, b-MOLA employs a Medical Grade HEPA filter. The HEPA filter is a highly efficient shield to trap the particles in and only needs to be replaced around once a year.

Put a b-MOLA in any room or car and never worry about allergy season again. With a single HEPA filter, it can capture any allergenic pollen, PM2.5, and smoke for 6 months all the way up to 18 months; the average is 12 months. Just place it in any room or space and let b-Mola take care of the rest.

 

NCCO is short for Nano Confined Catalytic Oxidation. Instead of absorbing the chemical pollutants like traditional air purification technology, NCCO sanitizes up to 99.97% of harmful air and smells. Instantly destroy any room odor and air pollutants with b-MOLA with its patented NCCO technology.

 

 

Conventional air purifiers, such as active charcoal, can only absorb but do not decompose of the pollutants. As a result, it can only last about 3 months. Once the filter is saturated, the absorbed pollutants will be released back into the air and cause “secondary pollution,” which can be very harmful to your health. In contrast, NCCO decomposes pollutants and can last 12 years without being replaced.

NCCO is so effective and cost saving, it is used in many hospitals, banks, metro stations, and other public areas.

 

The first air purifier equipped with an active oxygen generator, the b-MOLA Go can kill 99.7% of all bacterias and viruses by adsorbing it into the HEPA filter. Unlike traditional UV-C and OZONE air purifier, active oxygen is safe and can be decomposed by NCCO filters; causing no harm to humans.

This technology has been used to protect people from infections in hospitals.

 

 

 

b-Mola GO is designed to be compact and mobile. It’s lightweight, leather carrying handle, and a robust internal battery that can last up to 8 hours of continuous use. When it does run out of power, just charge it via outlet or with a portable power bank when you’re on-the-go.

 

 

For your daily and long-term use, we built a silent fan in b-MOLA GO. The noise in silent mode is only 34 dB, get uninterrupted sleep while it runs in the background. It even has an auto power off setting to save power and make it eco-friendly.

 

 

 

 

 

Ph.D. students from HKUST (Hong Kong University of Science and Technology) invented the NCCO technology to purify the air they were taking in daily. However, seeing an opportunity for commercialization, the original b-MOLA team introduced it to a greater Hong Kong market.

It was first implemented in hospitals and medical labs to kill bacterias, viruses, and clean formalin odors in rooms and bathrooms. The effective result and saving cost made the hospital's client very satisfied. After a few years testing, more than 100 hospitals, metro station, and banks used the NCCO tech to purify the air.

 

NCCO tech in banks and metro stations.

After much positive feedback and successful experience in public industry, b-MOLA was created. NCCO technology was then implemented in landfills and now into consumer homes currently.

 

b-MOLA's lab in Hong Kong.

 

 

 

The Production Status

 

We had finished the final trial production in the factory. Now it's ready for the mass production. We will start to produce the first  batch of products in the early of this month. We plan to produce all the units in this month and ship it out at Dec.

 

Risks And Challenges

 

Before launching our project on Indiegogo, we have already conducted two pilot productions as well as send our products to friends and professional photographers for testing and reviewing. We have improved the deficiency of the product design based on their feedback and suggestions.

Apart from that, we’ve also built out a specific plan for our manufacturing process. So we have confidence in shipping the b-MOLA GO on time. If there are any changes due to materials, suppliers, or unforeseen events, we’ll ensure that we keep each of our supporters fully updated. Now, we had finalized the trial production and are ready to start the mass production, but we need your support. Your support not only gives us the ability to start mass production and build the best products we can imagine but allows us to continue to work on new ideas.
story_txt:
Powerful and portable, the b-Mola GO is the first medical-grade air purifier designed for consumer usage.  Unlike traditional air purifiers, b-Mola GO utilizes the most effective NCCO patented technology (Nano Confined Catalytic Oxidation). NCCO is widely used in many hospitals and public areas to provide you with the best quality air.    b-MOLA GO has 3 filtering systems: HEPA filter, Active Oxygen Generator, and NCCO filter. The system can clean 99% of any harmful and unhealthy elements in the air. This is the same structure used in hospital air purification systems.HEPA can clean solid pollution like dust, smoke, mites, and pollen while the Active Oxygen Generator kills bacteria and virus. Lastly, the NCCO filter catalyzes and decomposes of any odor, harmful gases, and VOC.And the NCCO Reactor filter can last 12 years. b-MOLA GO’s portable and internal battery design make it extremely mobile and convenient. Put it in your living room, bedroom, take it to your office, or even leave it in your car to have fresh air whenever you are. 
The Smoke Purification Testing

 
We used PH smoke pellets to generate smoke. One of these small pellets can last over 40 seconds; making the smoke hard to dissipate. b-MOLA can clean the smoke instantly, which proves it has the capability to clean any solid pollutants such as smoke, dust, pollen, mites, or PM2.5.
The VOC Purification Test



 

 

We used acetone[1] to test the ability to purify VOC. After we dropped the acetone in the beaker, it started to volatilize in the box and the VOC concentration indicated a drastic increase. In the end, the data was stable around 170 ppm[2]. When b-MOLA was turned on, almost all the acetone in the box was purified; showcasing the capability of b-MOLA against VOC and other toxic gases.
[1]Acetone (propanone) is the organic compound with the formula (CH3)2CO. It is a colorless, volatile, flammable liquid that is the simplest and smallest ketone.
[2]ppm and ppb are the concentration units. ppm =  parts per million. ppb= parts per billion. 1 ppm = 1000 ppb.

 
 
The Sterilization Test 
 



 

We used two Petri dishes for this testing. One of the Petri dishes was put in the open area while the other was put in a space with the b-MOLA GO. Then we turned on b-MOLA GO and timed what happened.
3 days (72 hours) later, the petri dish in the open area generated visible bacterial colonies, which means an exponential bacterial growth occurred. The petri dish with the b-MOLA GO, however, looked the same as before. It proves b-MOLA GO is effective in killing bacterias and viruses.
 

   To eliminate the solid pollutants in the air such as pollen, dust, and smoke, b-MOLA employs a Medical Grade HEPA filter. The HEPA filter is a highly efficient shield to trap the particles in and only needs to be replaced around once a year.Put a b-MOLA in any room or car and never worry about allergy season again. With a single HEPA filter, it can capture any allergenic pollen, PM2.5, and smoke for 6 months all the way up to 18 months; the average is 12 months. Just place it in any room or space and let b-Mola take care of the rest. NCCO is short for Nano Confined Catalytic Oxidation. Instead of absorbing the chemical pollutants like traditional air purification technology, NCCO sanitizes up to 99.97% of harmful air and smells. Instantly destroy any room odor and air pollutants with b-MOLA with its patented NCCO technology.  Conventional air purifiers, such as active charcoal, can only absorb but do not decompose of the pollutants. As a result, it can only last about 3 months. Once the filter is saturated, the absorbed pollutants will be released back into the air and cause “secondary pollution,” which can be very harmful to your health. In contrast, NCCO decomposes pollutants and can last 12 years without being replaced.NCCO is so effective and cost saving, it is used in many hospitals, banks, metro stations, and other public areas.  The first air purifier equipped with an active oxygen generator, the b-MOLA Go can kill 99.7% of all bacterias and viruses by adsorbing it into the HEPA filter. Unlike traditional UV-C and OZONE air purifier, active oxygen is safe and can be decomposed by NCCO filters; causing no harm to humans.This technology has been used to protect people from infections in hospitals.   b-Mola GO is designed to be compact and mobile. It’s lightweight, leather carrying handle, and a robust internal battery that can last up to 8 hours of continuous use. When it does run out of power, just charge it via outlet or with a portable power bank when you’re on-the-go.  For your daily and long-term use, we built a silent fan in b-MOLA GO. The noise in silent mode is only 34 dB, get uninterrupted sleep while it runs in the background. It even has an auto power off setting to save power and make it eco-friendly.     Ph.D. students from HKUST (Hong Kong University of Science and Technology) invented the NCCO technology to purify the air they were taking in daily. However, seeing an opportunity for commercialization, the original b-MOLA team introduced it to a greater Hong Kong market.It was first implemented in hospitals and medical labs to kill bacterias, viruses, and clean formalin odors in rooms and bathrooms. The effective result and saving cost made the hospital's client very satisfied. After a few years testing, more than 100 hospitals, metro station, and banks used the NCCO tech to purify the air. NCCO tech in banks and metro stations.After much positive feedback and successful experience in public industry, b-MOLA was created. NCCO technology was then implemented in landfills and now into consumer homes currently. b-MOLA's lab in Hong Kong.   The Production Status We had finished the final trial production in the factory. Now it's ready for the mass production. We will start to produce the first  batch of products in the early of this month. We plan to produce all the units in this month and ship it out at Dec. Risks And Challenges Before launching our project on Indiegogo, we have already conducted two pilot productions as well as send our products to friends and professional photographers for testing and reviewing. We have improved the deficiency of the product design based on their feedback and suggestions.Apart from that, we’ve also built out a specific plan for our manufacturing process. So we have confidence in shipping the b-MOLA GO on time. If there are any changes due to materials, suppliers, or unforeseen events, we’ll ensure that we keep each of our supporters fully updated. Now, we had finalized the trial production and are ready to start the mass production, but we need your support. Your support not only gives us the ability to start mass production and build the best products we can imagine but allows us to continue to work on new ideas.

story:
We are here to provide a solution to an ever increasing single-use plastic problem. Our planet is overflowing with plastic bottles, used for a matter of minutes but creating waste for centuries. 

Our filters turn tap water into electrolyte rich water and our bottles carry it everywhere sustainably. 

Water filtration is key to overcoming the growth of bottled water, but our industry has it's own environmental problems. In your standard water filter, you need to throw away your cartridge every 30 days. 

So we created an innovative solution that will not only provide great tasting water but reduce plastic waste. 

We realised how backward it was to have to throw out water filter cartridges every 30 days. So we are leading the way with a totally re-useable cartridge.

 

While some traditional filter brands have recycling schemes in place, the carbon footprint of this journey is circumvented by our refillable filter - avoiding all of these unnecessary steps.

 

 

 

Simple innovations are the best. With 100 million cartridges going to landfill or worse each year, it made total sense to find a way to make cartridges last as long as the pitcher.

Tap water commonly carries chlorine, lead, heavy metals and pesticides among many more. Let our filter take care of these, so your body doesn’t have to. 

Tap water quality can fluctuate between locations based on factors like hardness, differing contaminants and even fluoridation. One filter does not fit all. That is why we have provided two different packs which can filter to your water needs. Some people just want cleaner and softer water, while others want clean water with added minerals for an alkaline pH. 

Take Your Pick!

 

 

Making sure you receive your filters on time is our priority. Our neat refill packs are ideal for letterboxes.

 

To help reduce our carbon footprint, we focused on sourcing companies locally in the UK. The manufacturing, packaging, design and distribution of the V2 is all done within a 50 mile radius of our office in Glasgow. Our filtration media is made in England.

Phox V2 Jug

  •  Overall height: 30 cm 
  •  Overall weight: 1.2 Kg
  •  Diameter of glass base: 12 cm
  •  Reservoir volume: 0.75 L
  •  Glass pitcher volume: 1.5 L
  •  Time of Filtrate: 8 Minutes

Materials

  •  Reservoir: Polypropylene (PP)
  •  Pitcher: Glass
  •  Base: Thermoplastic Elastomer (TPE)

Refillable Cartridge 

  •  Overal height: 8 cm
  •  Diameter:  6.5 cm
  •  Material: Polypropylene (PP)

It has taken us more than 18 months to get here. Through many iterations and prototypes we created a better & more eco-friendly way to hydrate.

 After five concepts and three 3D prints we honed in on the final design.

Water filtration is not new to Phox. We previously created a successful V1 water filtration jug. From this experience we've gained a lot of feedback and we've used it all to design a better, more sustainable product.
