story:
The Windjoule micro wind machine - WIN 5

  • WINDJOULE is a high output device which has been designed to capture the low average wind speeds which are typical in populated areas. (all over the World)
  • The WIN 5 is simple and slow revving causing less visual and environmental impact than a traditional turbine.    
  • It maximises the available local wind resource, taking advantage of the free and sustainable energy contained in the wind which is all around us.
  • The WIN 5 is extremely compact making it possible to cluster machines in small spaces as close as possible to the point of use. ( 15m ht )
  • Future developments include smaller versions which are intended to be mobile for remote temporary deployment and an emergency relief version built into a shipping container. The unique low level and compact nature of the device makes this possible.
  • WINDJOULE products could be manufactured under licence anywhere in the World. Further helping to reduce the overall environmental impact of the energy produced and creating local manufacturing jobs.


Bob  & Windjoule

Bob Morris is like you and me

he rides a bike, he plays music

he’s a football and car nut

He’s a Landscape Designer, he has a family

Bob is also an Inventor

Bob has designed and built WINDJOULE

A machine which works at british average windspeeds

WINDJOULE is revolutionary

a hybrid design that’s been independently tested

We need Bob to get the full size prototype machine made

It’s a great idea and it’s ready to rock

Bob is not a Banker Investment Advisor, Crook

Conman or Government Big Wig

Over the past months Bob has talked to all of the above

You can guess the outcome

Five years of hard graft

scrimping and saving, family pleasures on hold

with little to show except for a great proven idea

and empty pockets of course

This is where YOU come in

Get on board

Let’s help get the job done


Windjoule ( WIN5 ) micro wind power machine 




A Little Tech Detail

Windjoule is a compact low wind speed device which has been specifically designed to produce its rated power output at the UK average mean wind speed of 5m/s.

The revolutionary hybrid design won a UK Government Innovation Award which allowed for wind tunnel testing at Cranfield University. 

The 1/4 scale prototype test revealed a 3 times power advantage over a traditional turbine of the same size at 5 m/s.

The WIN5 uses drag and lift components to maximise the available wind resource.

The articulating blades are automatically orientated by the prevailing wind current to their optimum position of drag, lift, or downwind.

Producing similar power output characteristics to a traditional turbine rated at 15kW at 12m/s, the WIN5 is less than 1/3rd of the size.

In addition WIN5s can be sited close together, which makes it possible to cluster groups of machines in compact spaces close to the existing grid.

All of which will help to reduce the environmental impact and cost of wind energy.



What We Will Use the Funds For 


  • The funds will be used to manufacture and assemble a full-size, fully-functioning Windjoule prototype machine, utilising production quality materials (composites, metals and sailcloth) and high quality components (alternator, gearbox).
  • The funds will support the associated testing and design optimization activities, in order to ensure that the electricity generating capabilities of the prototype are maximised.
  • Also covered is the administrative support work and the forward planning for subsequent phases of Windjoule development, including on-site installation, technical certification, partnership working, design rights protection and commercial development under a global manufacturing licensing model.


Why You Should Back Us


  • Windjoule can be a part of the solution to address the global problem of providing clean energy at a viable cost, to meet an ever-expanding demand.
  • Due to its compact size, Windjoule has a significantly reduced environmental impact, when compared to other energy solutions.
  • Windjoule has the potential for quick deployment in a wide range of locations.
  • The potential for local manufacturing will further reduce the environmental impact of energy production.

story:
The world is changing, and now more than ever we need to be vigilant about the things we touch and the germs we get exposed to doing everyday activities. That’s why we bring you Eco Gloves, the first individually packed eco-friendly gloves that helps protect you against germs and messes on the go.  

 

 

 

 

 

 

Individually Packed for Convenience

Eco Gloves come individually wrapped so they're convenient to take with you anywhere you go. With 24 pairs packed in these convenient sized packets, you can stash them in your pocket, backpack, purse, and even wallet.  
 


 

 

Take them Anywhere, Anytime

You can take them anywhere and it takes less effort to put on and clean up than with hand sanitizer. Unlike other solutions, that are bulky and are a hassle to carry around, or ones that can leak and spill in your pocket, Eco Gloves is small, lightweight, hassle-free and mess-free. 
 

 

Prevent the Spread of Germs 

We know that clean hands save lives and that good hand hygiene is more important now than ever. That's why we created individually packed Eco Gloves so you can take them on the go and protect yourself anywhere you go.
 


 

 

They’re the perfect solution to help you avoid direct contact with shared surfaces such as door handles, gas pumps, ticket counter touchscreens, and shopping carts, by providing a physical barrier between you and the things you touch. 

 

Protect your hands

Eco Gloves provide the physical barrier you need to protect your hands from chemicals and harsh cleaning agent during cleaning tasks, keeping your hands in tip top shape.   
 

 

A Physical Barrier 

While hand sanitizers can clean you hands, Eco Gloves provide a physical barrier between you and the things you touch blocking you from any possible germs. 
 

 

Better than Other Solutions 

Eco Gloves is the first individually packed eco friendly glove on the market. Regular gloves come in very large big boxes making it a hassle to carry.  
 

 

Eco-Friendly & Sustainable 

We are changing the glove industry! Did you know that across child care centers, cleaning businesses, medical facilities and food industries as many as 30 pairs of gloves are used per job per day? Now that can add up! What if there was a more eco-friendly alternative that would give the same results but put less strain on the environment and waste production in the world? Now there is with Eco Gloves.  


 

Regular plastic gloves stay in landfills for thousands of years and are harmful to fish and wildlife if they end up in the ocean. Eco Gloves are made from annually renewable plant-based resources that can break down through composting, reducing environmental pollution. Eco Gloves make it convenient for you to stay clean on the go while being environmentally friendly.

 

Strong, Durable & Unpenetrable

Unlike other eco-friendly products out there, Eco Gloves is made with premium plant-based materials and won’t rip, tear or disintegrate before you start using it. In fact, they look and feel just like plastic, but they won’t take decades to decompose, helping to keep our landfills, seas and the entire planet plastic free.
 

 

Celebrities Using Gloves To Stay Clean 

Nicole Ritchie and Naomi Campbell are examples of celebrities that use gloves to wipe down surfaces that could have germs. Check out this article showing celebrities keeping their hands clean with disposable gloves. 

 

 

Watch the Unboxing and Review of Eco Gloves 

Influencers are raving about Eco Gloves. Why? Watch the video to find out (Formerly known as Handy Glove - old packaging). 
 

 

We want to give you the convenience of having clean hands anytime, anywhere, without sacrificing quality or the planet. Here’s what you can expect with Eco Gloves versus other solutions:    
 

 

Our Eco Gloves are the way of the future because they will decompose in approximately 90 days when placed in an industrial composting environment, helping to keep our landfills, seas and the entire planet free of plastic. Plus, no harmful chemicals are released into the environment during decomposition. The end result is rich soil which can be used for a plethora of uses.     


 

Eco Gloves was founded by a busy mom who was concerned with handling messy things and germy items while caring for her newborn baby. She wanted to take every precaution to minimize the chances of exposure to germs, that's why she created Eco Gloves. All the while, she wanted a product that was eco-friendly and that wouldn’t contribute to the overall plastic waste in the world. What started out as a simple daily need has turned into a proud product she has found that all moms, men and professionals could use. 

 

Creating our initial samples has been a fantastic challenge and journey. We have worked with numerous factories, 3 prototypes, many iterations and customizations to achieve the perfect quality, size, and eco-friendly requirements we initially sought out to accomplish. In the end, we chose a well-established factory that has been in the eco business for over 10 years and has been driven by putting out quality, socially and environmentally responsible products. Together with the factory, we have created a product that we think everyone will truly love.

To meet the minimum quantity requirements and premium standards and specs we envisioned for this product, we need your help. Your contributions will allow us to manufacture these Eco Gloves on a large scale to bring this product to every doorstep and business and help people stay clean, healthy.  All the while giving people an alternative eco-friendly product that will help keep our oceans and planet plastic-waste free.  

 

We want to focus on creating products made from renewable and sustainable resources that don’t contain additives, are GMO FREE, and put less strain on production and the planet. Our goal is to produce products with less reliance on traditional plastic materials and move towards solutions that are fully compostable and biodegradable.

We care deeply for all living things and the Earth. When you buy Eco Gloves you contribute to helping keep people clean and healthy, while keeping the ocean and the planet free of unnecessary waste.

Help us bring convenience and eco-friendly alternatives to support a sustainable and conscious planet.   

 

Help us spread the word that good health starts with clean hands! Eco Gloves is on a mission to help everyone live healthier, cleaner and hassle-free lives while eliminating the reliance on traditional plastics with our eco-friendly 100% compostable and biodegradable products.   

Press & Media - Download our high resolution images here. 

For inquiries, please contact hello@ecogloves.co.

 

Risks & Challenges

We will do our absolute best to get your Eco Gloves and rewards to you by the time stated on our page. However, unforeseen delays may occur in production, packaging and shipping due to circumstances outside of our control. While we have taken these possible concerns into account in our timeline, as with anything in life--we can never be 100% certain, so we please ask for your kind patience and understanding should any delays do occur.

Currently, we foresee deliveries beginning in August/September. As we face this global pandemic our manufacturing facilities are rushing orders of harmful plastic gloves just to meet the need of the Coronavirus/COVID-19 crisis, and eco-friendly products are taking a secondary priority. If we get large enough support from our backers, we can rush the order sooner. We can also reduce the costs dramatically and pass all of those savings on to our backers.

Disclaimer

*We are not making any specific claims that Eco Gloves will cure, treat, or in itself prevent anyone from being infected with COVID-19 (Coronavirus). It is very important to follow proper hand hygiene and utilize any prevention efforts that can protect you and your family.

Nicole Ritchie and Naomi Campbell are examples of celebrities that use gloves to wipe down surfaces that could have germs. Check out this article showing celebrities keeping their hands clean with disposable gloves. 
 


 
Watch the Unboxing and Review of Eco Gloves 
Influencers are raving about Eco Gloves. Why? Watch the video to find out (Formerly known as Handy Glove - old packaging).  

 

We want to give you the convenience of having clean hands anytime, anywhere, without sacrificing quality or the planet. Here’s what you can expect with Eco Gloves versus other solutions:     

 

Our Eco Gloves are the way of the future because they will decompose in approximately 90 days when placed in an industrial composting environment, helping to keep our landfills, seas and the entire planet free of plastic. Plus, no harmful chemicals are released into the environment during decomposition. The end result is rich soil which can be used for a plethora of uses.     
 

Eco Gloves was founded by a busy mom who was concerned with handling messy things and germy items while caring for her newborn baby. She wanted to take every precaution to minimize the chances of exposure to germs, that's why she created Eco Gloves. All the while, she wanted a product that was eco-friendly and that wouldn’t contribute to the overall plastic waste in the world. What started out as a simple daily need has turned into a proud product she has found that all moms, men and professionals could use. 
 

Creating our initial samples has been a fantastic challenge and journey. We have worked with numerous factories, 3 prototypes, many iterations and customizations to achieve the perfect quality, size, and eco-friendly requirements we initially sought out to accomplish. In the end, we chose a well-established factory that has been in the eco business for over 10 years and has been driven by putting out quality, socially and environmentally responsible products. Together with the factory, we have created a product that we think everyone will truly love.
To meet the minimum quantity requirements and premium standards and specs we envisioned for this product, we need your help. Your contributions will allow us to manufacture these Eco Gloves on a large scale to bring this product to every doorstep and business and help people stay clean, healthy.  All the while giving people an alternative eco-friendly product that will help keep our oceans and planet plastic-waste free.  
 

We want to focus on creating products made from renewable and sustainable resources that don’t contain additives, are GMO FREE, and put less strain on production and the planet. Our goal is to produce products with less reliance on traditional plastic materials and move towards solutions that are fully compostable and biodegradable.
We care deeply for all living things and the Earth. When you buy Eco Gloves you contribute to helping keep people clean and healthy, while keeping the ocean and the planet free of unnecessary waste.
Help us bring convenience and eco-friendly alternatives to support a sustainable and conscious planet.   
 

Help us spread the word that good health starts with clean hands! Eco Gloves is on a mission to help everyone live healthier, cleaner and hassle-free lives while eliminating the reliance on traditional plastics with our eco-friendly 100% compostable and biodegradable products.   


Press & Media - Download our high resolution images here. 

For inquiries, please contact hello@ecogloves.co.

 
Risks & Challenges
We will do our absolute best to get your Eco Gloves and rewards to you by the time stated on our page. However, unforeseen delays may occur in production, packaging and shipping due to circumstances outside of our control. While we have taken these possible concerns into account in our timeline, as with anything in life--we can never be 100% certain, so we please ask for your kind patience and understanding should any delays do occur.
Currently, we foresee deliveries beginning in August/September. As we face this global pandemic our manufacturing facilities are rushing orders of harmful plastic gloves just to meet the need of the Coronavirus/COVID-19 crisis, and eco-friendly products are taking a secondary priority. If we get large enough support from our backers, we can rush the order sooner. We can also reduce the costs dramatically and pass all of those savings on to our backers.
Disclaimer
*We are not making any specific claims that Eco Gloves will cure, treat, or in itself prevent anyone from being infected with COVID-19 (Coronavirus). It is very important to follow proper hand hygiene and utilize any prevention efforts that can protect you and your family.

story:
Your contribution will go directly into funding the aerobody of MS XIV, a futuristic solar car built by a team of university students.

 

Help Us Build Our Aerobody

It takes a lot of resources to build a multi-occupant, hyper-efficient, solar-powered electric vehicle. And we need your help to bring the team’s vision into reality!

Our goal is to build a lightweight and aerodynamically efficient aerobody. In Winter 2020, we finalized the design of our aerobody panels and molds. Now, we're looking for your help to make manufacturing them a reality by helping with material and manufacturing service costs!

 

 

 

Who We Are

Hello there and thank you for stopping by! We are Midnight Sun, a student-run design team based out of the University of Waterloo!

Established in 1988, the Midnight Solar Car Team has continued pursuing its mission to design and manufacture innovative solar vehicles that demonstrate the potential of renewable energy for a more sustainable future. In the summer of 2018, we competed at the American Solar Challenge, where Midnight Sun became the first-ever Canadian multi-occupant vehicle team to complete the ~3000km solar car race across the United States. 

 

 

What is Midnight Sun XIV (MS XIV)?

MS XIV is our most ambitious project yet. With a four person capacity, an emphasis on interior design, and better aerodynamics than our previous solar car, MS XIV comes one step closer in our mission to push the boundaries of consumer-centered solar vehicles.

With MS XIV, we’re taking on the challenge of creating a car that is both energy-efficient and practical. We believe creating consumer-oriented solar powered vehicles is an important step in achieving a more sustainable future. Midnight Sun proudly represents our university at both the American Solar Challenge and World Solar Challenge.

 

 

Our Race

We plan on competing with MS XIV at the 2021 American Solar Challenge. The details for the race are in the process of being finalized, but the originally scheduled race for July 2020 was supposed to start in Topeka, Kansas and take us to Boise, Idaho.

 

 

So What's In It For You?

We have various rewards for your as a token of our appreciation! Here's a sneak peek at some of our unique perks!

Midnight Sun Digital Background
Pledge of $10+

 

Midnight Sun Team Stickers (Pack of 3)
Pledge of $25+

 

MS XIV Sunglasses
Pledge of $50+

 

Midnight Sun Shot Glasses
Single Glass (Pledge of $50), Two Glasses (Pledge of $95)

 

MS XIV 3D Model Car (1:30 scale)
Pledge of $500+

...And more perks yet to be unveiled!

 

Risks and challenges

Designing and manufacturing a car from scratch has its challenges. Our diverse team of students bring skills from both inside and outside of the classroom to solve real-world problems. Join us as we work to turn our dreams into reality.

 

 

A Thank You to Our Sponsors 

Midnight Sun is fortunate to have the support of many industry sponsors. We would like show our gratitude and thank them for their support thus far.

 

Want to Learn More About Us?

To see what we're up to, you can check out the Midnight Sun website and follow us on Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn and Twitter! 

We also post team training and learning resources and more on our Youtube Channel. 

 

Thank you and we hope you will join us as we embark on our next chapter!

story:
“If the Bee disappeared off the face of the Earth, man would only have four years left to live.”

-Maurice Maeterlinck, Nobel Prize winner

 

As seen on,

  

 

 

PROJECT BACKGROUND

Our mission is to save the Bees and Trees by planting, recording, and sharing the difference you make while hiking with the FytoStick™.

We aim to be a collective crowd of modern day Johnny Appleseed-like friends of Earth.

Nearly two hundred years later and only one of Johnny Appleseed's trees remain. While all across the country, bee populations and plant life are rapidly decreasing. In a time when there was little available in the way of technology, one man dedicated his life to helping plant seeds for a better future- and accomplished so much with his bare hands. Now, imagine what we can do with a device that makes this process as simple as taking a beautiful hike.

Imagine what you can do with FytoStick™.

FytoStick™ is the world's first hiking stick that plants seeds with a simple downward motion of the hand. Utilizing a secret technology, FytoStick™ burrows a hole in the soil, and simultaneously tucks the seed safely away ready to grow! 

FytoStick™ also comes with an app, MyFyto™ (not yet released), that allows you to track how far you have explored, goals reached, and achievements collected. Plant flowers for the bees or help save the Earth's source of oxygen by planting trees.

 

WHO WE ARE

We are Jake (Owner/Inventor) and Tyler (CEO) of PalmPrint Innovations LLC™, a company dedicated to bringing about a measurable change in society by creating products that affect the environment in a positive way. FytoStick™ is our first official product, and while it takes a considerable amount of time and effort to fully develop, the end result and potential impacts will make it all worthwhile.

Fun Fact: As a distant relative of Mr. Johnny Appleseed himself, Tyler has big shoes to fill.

 

WHAT WE NEED AND WHAT YOU GET 

With $20,000 worth of funding, PalmPrint Innovations LLC™ will be able to do our first production run of FytoStick™. Your donations would cover the cost of manufacturing, packaging, final improvements, and modifications to finish developing the app. Please check out our perks, where in addition to being able to pre-order your very own FytoStick™, you can secure other spectacular items such as lightbulb terrariums, bamboo beehives, and other sweet merch items.

 

THE IMPACT

While countless people do care immensely about the environment, there are not many simple avenues to show this appreciation in a meaningful, yet measurable way. With the FytoStick™, we've created a simple way to have big impacts on our future, one step at a time. We can now literally give more back than we take! It's time for the people to truly display their power!

 

RISK AND CHALLENGES

We are on this mission to create big changes to the way we treat our environment. In a time where big government and corporations have turned their back to the planet, we step forward to face the gauntlet of bringing beneficial results to the land that does everything to us. 

The FytoStick™ and MyFyto™ app have been tested and tweaked for optimal functionality - we still have some development to do in order to achieve perfected performance though. We see no potential problems with production as we move forward to a manufacturing scale. We are prepared to provide backers with full updates along this journey in every step of the way.  Shipping companies and their processes are outside of our immediate control, but we will do everything we can to ensure your orders are shipped on time. We believe that full and total transparency bring the best route when working on a world initiative movement like this- as a contributing team member, you're entitled to updates throughout the process. The largest risk is us not hitting our goal and not being able to move forward with putting the FytoStick™ in your hands- in which case the Earth is the biggest loser. The immediate fate of a better humanity depends on our success in accomplishing these goals with your help.

 

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

Even if you cannot donate at this time, you can still support our mission and campaign by sharing on your social media sites like Facebook or Twitter, or with your family and friends. It doesn’t take much to spread the word, and putting the FytoStick™ in the hands of just one more person can make a larger than life difference.

All those that share using the hashtags #MyFyto , #FytoStick, and #WhereWillYouGrow? on Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter will be entered in for weekly $100 REI gift card drawings. Good luck!

Thank you for your taking the time to read this, and a extra big thank you for your support! It's with a collective social movement- starting with people like you- that we can literally change the world!

Your Friends,

Jake and Tyler - PalmPrint Innovations LLC™
 

 

FAQ

"What about the risk of spreading invasive species?"- Kudos to you for being so alert! This is something we've thoroughly thought through and will minimize this risk through a few different coverage options to ensure the safety net is as large as possible. 1. The terms of agreement in the MyFyto™ app will very clearly state and warn about the users responsibility to plant safely. 2. Users will be able to register which seeds they're planting and the app will not function if that seed isn't naturally part of that area. 3. When ordering seeds through PalmPrint Innovations LLC™, we will not ship seeds to a region those specific seeds don't belong.

"Won't people planting seeds on already existing trails mess up the path?" - Thanks for your due diligence! As it turns out, all sorts of plants have been throwing their seeds all willy-nilly on trails for years! Since the dawn of time seeds have fallen without interference from mammals and the destructive humans! Any seeds planted on regularly trafficked trails will surely be stepped on. So plant alongside the beaten path! Plant your roots!

story:
Never sit in the dark in silence again!  Use the GRENGINE™ to provide you with your in home backup.  It has zero emissions, making it perfectly safe to store and use indoors!

It's completely silent and emission free; the perfect companion for a weekend camping getaway.

You  can use the GRENGINE™ for a variety of light duty corded tools or keep your cordless tool batteries charged up, whether on the jobsite or as DIY project.

Show a late night movie in the woods! Or simply have silent power available for your next outdoor event, whether it's a wedding, a photo shoot, or your niece's 12th birthday extravaganza.

When you take the GRENGINE™ on the road, you'll never be stranded waiting for a tow.  The built in jumpstarter will keep your trip moving along!

Each battery (which weighs only 12 lbs) is the power equivalent of a 12V 100 Amp hour lead acid battery (which typically weighs 85 lbs). This means that with the appropriate adaptor, the GRENGINE™ batteries can be used to power almost anything currently operating on lead acid. We have plans to extend our GRENGINE™ system to include lawn mowers, water pumps, snow blowers, and so much more. 

 

Take power where you need it.  The GRENGINE™ is totally silent and fume free, so use it when and where you want to.  Need emergency backup?  Going camping?  Need power for a trade show presentation?  Because it produces no noise and no fumes, the GRENGINE™ is both safe to use indoors and its use will not be restricted on any outdoor adventure.

As seen in:

  

   

     

 

Meet the GRENGINE™, the little engine that can. Here at Growing Greener Innovations, we look to change the world of portable energy with this silent and emission-free solar generator; the only system in the world capable of replacing the standard gasoline operated generators, which are poisoning the world with millions of tons of Greenhouse Gases and Carbon Monoxide every year.

The GRENGINE’s patent pending system uses stackable and interchangeable batteries to deliver a knockout punch to the gasoline generator. The formula that has made gas generators the long-standing winner in industrial use, has been the ease of topping up fuel, compared with waiting for batteries to recharge.  Until now. With the GRENGINE™ you can switch batteries even easier than refilling a gas tank.

Effective changes are made gradually. Viable and significant improvement takes time, so our mission is to take meaningful steps toward a more sustainable future. We develop and support environmentally conscious technology, with the objective of continually making our planet greener.

The GRENGINE™ is constructed to last more than 2000 cycles.  It is also compartmentalized, allowing us to recycle only the battery when it does see the end of its life, as opposed to trashing the whole unit.  We’ve designed it to be easy to use so that widespread adoption is inevitable; with widespread adoption comes lasting environmental impact.  We can remove millions of tons of greenhouse gases with the GRENGINE™! 

The GRENGINE™ 1000 is perfect to run or charge a variety of tools or toys.  From cellphones to refrigerators and everything in between, the GRENGINE™ will keep you going no matter where you are.

 

 

 

 

Our interchangeable and stackable battery system has changed the game for portable power solutions. Because you can buy and stack as many batteries as you need, you'll always be powered with GRENGINE™.  Charge your backup battery from a wall outlet or a solar panel while you use your GRENGINE™ or stack them up for more watt hours.  Because it is component based, you can recycle only the battery, as opposed to having to replace the whole unit.  We've designed the system for ease of use; simply clip your battery in and go! 

 

With the ability to stack as many batteries as you need, the possibilities are virtually endless.  Stock up on battery packs and your run times become unlimited.  

 

Why GRENGINE™  1000 vs. Solar Generator Competition? 

•Only generator in its class with expandable battery technology for longer usage 

•More cost efficient: 80% less expensive than industry leader when calculated by cost per use 

•Easier to carry: Approximately 1/4 the weight of industry leader 

•Longer Life: Life cycle 5x greater than your industry leader 

•Can use at subzero temperatures, where as industry leader will shut down near freezing 

•Actual watt hours: Industry leader will shut off well before full battery discharge to avoid damage. 

•No maintenance required:  Must frequently recharge industry leading generator, not required with GRENGINE™ 

 

Why GRENGINE™ 1000 vs. Small Gas Generator? 

•More user friendly – no fuel needed, easy to carry and simple operation 

•No maintenance required 

•Completely safe to use and can be used inside – no harmful emissions. 

•Reduced frequency of theft due to inside use and storage 

•Run anywhere at anytime of day or night 

•Versatile! When not used for camping it is easily used for home backup, or construction, or recreation…… 

 

Waaaaait a minute...

Did you notice a John Deere Gator in the video? Did we run that Gator with our Grengine™ batteries? Yup, we did. 

Each Grengine™ battery (which weighs only 12lbs) is the power equivalent of a 12V 100 Amp hour lead acid battery (which typically weighs 85lbs). Which means with the appropriate adaptor, the Grengine™ batteries can be used to power almost anything currently operating on lead acid. We have plans to extend our Grengine™ system to include lawn mowers, water pumps, snow blowers, and so much more. 

Where we're going, we don't need roads! 

 

Every dollar helps!  All of your pledges will be put toward the manufacturing of the GRENGINE™ 1000.  This includes things like final prototype development, final tooling, injection mold finalization, final electronic work, as well as assembly.  We are forever grateful for your contribution! Thank you thank you thank you!!!

What's In It For You?

We have come up with a variety of pledge levels for you!  Here's a break down of what is in each level:

 

Referral Program

We know you love the GRENGINE, that’s why you’ve helped support our campaign. Now we would like to offer something extra back! We are running a referral contest. It’s simple, you help spread the word and when someone you referred makes a contribution to the campaign you get points! The points get you extra rewards.  Easy. 

How do you share the love?

You promote the GRENGINE™ using the Indiegogo share tools while logged into your Indiegogo account.  When you share while logged in, your unique ID will be attached to any resulting contributions or visits. 

You can use the "Create Link" button on our campaign page, as shown below.

Once you've created the link you can copy and paste it directly into any of your social media pages!  

When anyone clicks on your unique link they’re taken to the GRENGINE™ campaign page and when that person ends up supporting us, we’ll credit you!

The campaign’s dashboard will allow us to see which Indiegogo users directed traffic to our campaign and the number (and dollar value) of the contributions that were received as a result!

Take a look at the prizes below!

PS. We will cover the shipping on the goodies you win!

 

Who Is Growing Greener Innovations? We are a small Canadian company that believes that effective changes are made gradually. Viable and significant improvement takes time, so our mission is to take meaningful steps toward a more sustainable future. We develop and support environmentally conscious technology, with the objective of continually making our planet greener. We strive to provide consumers and businesses with innovative products that help solve your everyday challenges in environmentally friendly ways.

Mad Scientist – Connie Stacey

Connie is the owner and president of Growing Greener Innovations.  She has a Bachelor of Arts Degree, Programmer Analyst Diploma, and her PMP designation.  Connie has always wanted to run her own business and create products that were environmentally friendly, so after gaining more than 20 years experience in technology and business, she launched Growing Greener Innovations.  She believes in making her products so easy to use that widespread adoption is inevitable, and therefore, so is the environmental impact.    

Lego Master Builder – Brad Madu

With over 20 years in the industry Brad Madu is proven expert in product development and production management. His designs have resulted in several patents and design awards including a feature in Popular Science's Innovations of the Year Issue in 2013. Brad has also been sought after as a public speaker with recent engagements at the BC Inventors Society and the Royal Roads University Entrepreneur Program.

Employee of the Month – Darcy Paterson

Darcy brings over 15 years of design experience to the Growing Greener team having worked on projects for companies like GM, Chevrolet and FutureShop. His ability to see the big picture while maintaining an acute eye for detail ensures our customers always have the best experience with our brand. 

The General – Jen Amos

Jen brings a wide range of skills to the Growing Greener team.  Originally brought onto the team to help with a grant application, Jen quickly showed us that you can toss just about anything her way and she will find a way to make it a success.  Her main responsibilities include the content, maintenance, and SEO for our website, writing copy for marketing materials, as well as general operations assistance.  Jen’s versatility and industrious nature make her a highly valued team member.

 

 

Shipping Challenges

Although we have been shipping lithium batteries without issue thus far, regulations on shipping these batteries vary and are constantly changing. We are closely monitoring these changes to stay abreast on the matter. If you have any shipping related questions, feel free to email us at info@growinggreener.ca and we will do our best to provide you an answer.

Manufacturer/Supplier Delays

While we are highly confident in our manufacturer, the reality is that sometimes delays can happen. We have discussed the production numbers with our manufacturer and have every belief that the GRENGINE™ will stay on schedule. If any issues arise, we will let our backers know as soon as we do. If you have any questions regarding timelines, please email us at info@growinggreener.ca

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone can contribute financially and we are totally cool with that!  We will be eternally grateful if you could just give us a share!  Let your friends know about us and we will give you a virtual hug! (or a high five, if you're more comfortable with that.)  THANK YOU!!

 

What is your return policy on the GRENGINE™?

We provide a 30 day money back guarantee on products that are undamaged and in the original packaging.We also provided a refund or exchange on any defective products.

What is the warranty on the GRENGINE™?

We provide a one year limited warranty.

What is the expected lifespan of the GRENGINE™?

2000+ Cycles​

Can I use the GRENGINE™ while it's charging?

Yes.  The GRENGINE™ is capable of outputting power while it is being charged.

How long does it take to charge?

When using AC power to charge, the GRENGINE™ will charge in about 6.5 hours.  If using DC power (48W), it’ll take approximately 22 hours to charge.  In optimal conditions, charging it by solar will take about 10 hours.

How long will the GRENGINE™ hold its charge when not in use?

We recommend charging your GRENGINE™ every 3 months if not in use​.

What type of inverter does the GRENGINE™ have?

The GRENGINE™ has a 1000 Watt pure sine wave inverter.

​Is the battery replaceable?

Yes.  The interchangeable and stackable battery system allows you to simply replace your battery if it has exceeded its lifespan.  Simply remove the dead battery for recycling, and purchase a new one, while keeping your original GRENGINE™.

Can I daisy-chain the GRENGINE™?

No need!  The stackable battery system allows you to just stack on as many batteries as you need.  Your GRENGINE™ comes with one battery pack and individual batteries can be purchased separately.

How much does it weigh?

The GRENGINE™ 1000 (with one battery) weighs only 24 pounds.  Each additional battery pack weighs approximately 12 pounds.

 

If you have any other questions regarding anything on this page, please do not hesitate to send us an email at info@growinggreener.ca
story_txt:
Never sit in the dark in silence again!  Use the GRENGINE™ to provide you with your in home backup.  It has zero emissions, making it perfectly safe to store and use indoors!

It's completely silent and emission free; the perfect companion for a weekend camping getaway.

You  can use the GRENGINE™ for a variety of light duty corded tools or keep your cordless tool batteries charged up, whether on the jobsite or as DIY project.

Show a late night movie in the woods! Or simply have silent power available for your next outdoor event, whether it's a wedding, a photo shoot, or your niece's 12th birthday extravaganza.

When you take the GRENGINE™ on the road, you'll never be stranded waiting for a tow.  The built in jumpstarter will keep your trip moving along!

Each battery (which weighs only 12 lbs) is the power equivalent of a 12V 100 Amp hour lead acid battery (which typically weighs 85 lbs). This means that with the appropriate adaptor, the GRENGINE™ batteries can be used to power almost anything currently operating on lead acid. We have plans to extend our GRENGINE™ system to include lawn mowers, water pumps, snow blowers, and so much more. 
 
Take power where you need it.  The GRENGINE™ is totally silent and fume free, so use it when and where you want to.  Need emergency backup?  Going camping?  Need power for a trade show presentation?  Because it produces no noise and no fumes, the GRENGINE™ is both safe to use indoors and its use will not be restricted on any outdoor adventure.


As seen in:
  
   

     
 
Meet the GRENGINE™, the little engine that can. Here at Growing Greener Innovations, we look to change the world of portable energy with this silent and emission-free solar generator; the only system in the world capable of replacing the standard gasoline operated generators, which are poisoning the world with millions of tons of Greenhouse Gases and Carbon Monoxide every year.

The GRENGINE’s patent pending system uses stackable and interchangeable batteries to deliver a knockout punch to the gasoline generator. The formula that has made gas generators the long-standing winner in industrial use, has been the ease of topping up fuel, compared with waiting for batteries to recharge.  Until now. With the GRENGINE™ you can switch batteries even easier than refilling a gas tank.


Effective changes are made gradually. Viable and significant improvement takes time, so our mission is to take meaningful steps toward a more sustainable future. We develop and support environmentally conscious technology, with the objective of continually making our planet greener.
The GRENGINE™ is constructed to last more than 2000 cycles.  It is also compartmentalized, allowing us to recycle only the battery when it does see the end of its life, as opposed to trashing the whole unit.  We’ve designed it to be easy to use so that widespread adoption is inevitable; with widespread adoption comes lasting environmental impact.  We can remove millions of tons of greenhouse gases with the GRENGINE™! 




The GRENGINE™ 1000 is perfect to run or charge a variety of tools or toys.  From cellphones to refrigerators and everything in between, the GRENGINE™ will keep you going no matter where you are.

 
 
 
 

Our interchangeable and stackable battery system has changed the game for portable power solutions. Because you can buy and stack as many batteries as you need, you'll always be powered with GRENGINE™.  Charge your backup battery from a wall outlet or a solar panel while you use your GRENGINE™ or stack them up for more watt hours.  Because it is component based, you can recycle only the battery, as opposed to having to replace the whole unit.  We've designed the system for ease of use; simply clip your battery in and go! 

 
With the ability to stack as many batteries as you need, the possibilities are virtually endless.  Stock up on battery packs and your run times become unlimited.  


 
Why GRENGINE™  1000 vs. Solar Generator Competition? 
•Only generator in its class with expandable battery technology for longer usage 
•More cost efficient: 80% less expensive than industry leader when calculated by cost per use 
•Easier to carry: Approximately 1/4 the weight of industry leader 
•Longer Life: Life cycle 5x greater than your industry leader 
•Can use at subzero temperatures, where as industry leader will shut down near freezing 
•Actual watt hours: Industry leader will shut off well before full battery discharge to avoid damage. 
•No maintenance required:  Must frequently recharge industry leading generator, not required with GRENGINE™ 
 
Why GRENGINE™ 1000 vs. Small Gas Generator? 
•More user friendly – no fuel needed, easy to carry and simple operation 
•No maintenance required 
•Completely safe to use and can be used inside – no harmful emissions. 
•Reduced frequency of theft due to inside use and storage 
•Run anywhere at anytime of day or night 
•Versatile! When not used for camping it is easily used for home backup, or construction, or recreation…… 
 
Waaaaait a minute...
Did you notice a John Deere Gator in the video? Did we run that Gator with our Grengine™ batteries? Yup, we did. 
Each Grengine™ battery (which weighs only 12lbs) is the power equivalent of a 12V 100 Amp hour lead acid battery (which typically weighs 85lbs). Which means with the appropriate adaptor, the Grengine™ batteries can be used to power almost anything currently operating on lead acid. We have plans to extend our Grengine™ system to include lawn mowers, water pumps, snow blowers, and so much more. 
Where we're going, we don't need roads! 
 


Every dollar helps!  All of your pledges will be put toward the manufacturing of the GRENGINE™ 1000.  This includes things like final prototype development, final tooling, injection mold finalization, final electronic work, as well as assembly.  We are forever grateful for your contribution! Thank you thank you thank you!!!
What's In It For You?
We have come up with a variety of pledge levels for you!  Here's a break down of what is in each level:








 
Referral Program
We know you love the GRENGINE, that’s why you’ve helped support our campaign. Now we would like to offer something extra back! We are running a referral contest. It’s simple, you help spread the word and when someone you referred makes a contribution to the campaign you get points! The points get you extra rewards.  Easy. 
How do you share the love?
You promote the GRENGINE™ using the Indiegogo share tools while logged into your Indiegogo account.  When you share while logged in, your unique ID will be attached to any resulting contributions or visits. You can use the "Create Link" button on our campaign page, as shown below.

Once you've created the link you can copy and paste it directly into any of your social media pages!  
When anyone clicks on your unique link they’re taken to the GRENGINE™ campaign page and when that person ends up supporting us, we’ll credit you!
The campaign’s dashboard will allow us to see which Indiegogo users directed traffic to our campaign and the number (and dollar value) of the contributions that were received as a result!
Take a look at the prizes below!

PS. We will cover the shipping on the goodies you win!
 


Who Is Growing Greener Innovations? We are a small Canadian company that believes that effective changes are made gradually. Viable and significant improvement takes time, so our mission is to take meaningful steps toward a more sustainable future. We develop and support environmentally conscious technology, with the objective of continually making our planet greener. We strive to provide consumers and businesses with innovative products that help solve your everyday challenges in environmentally friendly ways.

Mad Scientist – Connie Stacey
Connie is the owner and president of Growing Greener Innovations.  She has a Bachelor of Arts Degree, Programmer Analyst Diploma, and her PMP designation.  Connie has always wanted to run her own business and create products that were environmentally friendly, so after gaining more than 20 years experience in technology and business, she launched Growing Greener Innovations.  She believes in making her products so easy to use that widespread adoption is inevitable, and therefore, so is the environmental impact.    

Lego Master Builder – Brad Madu
With over 20 years in the industry Brad Madu is proven expert in product development and production management. His designs have resulted in several patents and design awards including a feature in Popular Science's Innovations of the Year Issue in 2013. Brad has also been sought after as a public speaker with recent engagements at the BC Inventors Society and the Royal Roads University Entrepreneur Program.

Employee of the Month – Darcy Paterson
Darcy brings over 15 years of design experience to the Growing Greener team having worked on projects for companies like GM, Chevrolet and FutureShop. His ability to see the big picture while maintaining an acute eye for detail ensures our customers always have the best experience with our brand. 

The General – Jen Amos
Jen brings a wide range of skills to the Growing Greener team.  Originally brought onto the team to help with a grant application, Jen quickly showed us that you can toss just about anything her way and she will find a way to make it a success.  Her main responsibilities include the content, maintenance, and SEO for our website, writing copy for marketing materials, as well as general operations assistance.  Jen’s versatility and industrious nature make her a highly valued team member.
 


 


Shipping Challenges
Although we have been shipping lithium batteries without issue thus far, regulations on shipping these batteries vary and are constantly changing. We are closely monitoring these changes to stay abreast on the matter. If you have any shipping related questions, feel free to email us at info@growinggreener.ca and we will do our best to provide you an answer.
Manufacturer/Supplier Delays
While we are highly confident in our manufacturer, the reality is that sometimes delays can happen. We have discussed the production numbers with our manufacturer and have every belief that the GRENGINE™ will stay on schedule. If any issues arise, we will let our backers know as soon as we do. If you have any questions regarding timelines, please email us at info@growinggreener.ca

Other Ways You Can Help
We understand that not everyone can contribute financially and we are totally cool with that!  We will be eternally grateful if you could just give us a share!  Let your friends know about us and we will give you a virtual hug! (or a high five, if you're more comfortable with that.)  THANK YOU!!
 

What is your return policy on the GRENGINE™?
We provide a 30 day money back guarantee on products that are undamaged and in the original packaging.We also provided a refund or exchange on any defective products.
What is the warranty on the GRENGINE™?
We provide a one year limited warranty.
What is the expected lifespan of the GRENGINE™?
2000+ Cycles​
Can I use the GRENGINE™ while it's charging?
Yes.  The GRENGINE™ is capable of outputting power while it is being charged.
How long does it take to charge?
When using AC power to charge, the GRENGINE™ will charge in about 6.5 hours.  If using DC power (48W), it’ll take approximately 22 hours to charge.  In optimal conditions, charging it by solar will take about 10 hours.
How long will the GRENGINE™ hold its charge when not in use?
We recommend charging your GRENGINE™ every 3 months if not in use​.
What type of inverter does the GRENGINE™ have?
The GRENGINE™ has a 1000 Watt pure sine wave inverter.
​Is the battery replaceable?
Yes.  The interchangeable and stackable battery system allows you to simply replace your battery if it has exceeded its lifespan.  Simply remove the dead battery for recycling, and purchase a new one, while keeping your original GRENGINE™.
Can I daisy-chain the GRENGINE™?
No need!  The stackable battery system allows you to just stack on as many batteries as you need.  Your GRENGINE™ comes with one battery pack and individual batteries can be purchased separately.
How much does it weigh?
The GRENGINE™ 1000 (with one battery) weighs only 24 pounds.  Each additional battery pack weighs approximately 12 pounds.
 
If you have any other questions regarding anything on this page, please do not hesitate to send us an email at info@growinggreener.ca

story:
Krishi (ˈkrɪʃiː): "Agriculture"

Tantra (/ˈtʌntrə, ˈtæn-/; Sanskrit: "text, theory, system, method, instrument, technique or practice"

Researching best practices in agriculture, “Krishitantra” addresses difficulties in the current system of farming with indigenously designed instruments and tools to improve farming outcomes.

If you own a hydroponics or aquaponics farm, then you know its pros and cons. It's very easy to grow using these techniques provided the required fundamentals of water is taken care of, the crucial ones being EC and pH.

EC and pH have to be regularly monitored and has to be controlled on a real-time basis.

DOSEiON, a solution designed for the modern farmer comes with sensors that monitor and regulate the EC, pH, and temperature for the crop.  It can't get easier than this, you can use the DOSEiON app from both your android and iOS devices. 

 

 

LED indicates when the sensor values are in normal range, out of range, setting mode and dosing status.

 

If you are a hobby farmer with little or no background in farming, not to worry. DOSEiON is powered by our patented Real-Time Agronomy system, which will provide you agronomy support in Real-Time*.

Get Real-Time Agronomy inputs from our experts on nutrition, pest and crop management. For all Indiegogo backers, the service is complimentary for one year.

NOTE: Real-Time agronomy service is not an automated response, its provided by authorized and reputed agronomists and is purely subject to availability at the point of service request by the user through our app.

story:
UrbaNext E-Bike Wheel - Your favorite bicycle, now electric...

...and just in time for summer.

 

An all-in-one, 60 second solution to convert your traditional bike into an electric bike with a 30 mile range and a 20mph top speed.

 

 

 

 
 

We designed UrbaNext as cost effective way for casual rider to go electric, while giving enough power to excite the eBike enthusiast to upgrade their favorite traditional bike:

  • Any Bike - Most electric bikes look fairly weird, perhaps not your style. UrbaNext let's you convert any bike to fit your taste or riding style. 
  • Affordability - Most electric bikes are expensive. Don't pay for something you already own and love, upgrade your existing bike at a fraction of the cost. 
  • Weight - Most electric bikes weigh anywhere from 65 to 90 pounds. UrbaNext is designed to be light weight, only adding an additional 15 pounds to your bike. 
  • Plug & Play - Most electric bikes are hard to pedal. UrbaNext is designed for the front wheel, not affecting your pedals and easily taken off in seconds if preferred.

Converting your traditional bike into an e-bike is hassle-free.

Install UrbaNext in under a minute, swap out batteries in one simple click and squeeze the throttle to go electric or stay traditional and pedal as normal.

The UrbaNext Electric Wheel requires only a wrench, a screwdriver & one minute until you're pressing the throttle on your new electric bicycle.

UrbaNext will fit 99% of bicycles on the market and is installed in 3 simple steps:

  • Step 1: Swap Out Front Wheel 
  • Step 2: Secure Throttle To Handlebar
  • Step 3: Connect Wheel To Throttle Cable

  

UrbaNext's one-click removable battery is compact, allowing you to charge your new eBike when and where it's convenient for you. 

Easily double your range in seconds by tossing an extra fresh battery in your backpack or bike saddle bag then swap the new for the old in a single click.

  

The choice of riding traditionally, all electric or somewhere in between is up to you. 

Unlike most eBikes that are hard to pedal and designed for electric only riding, UrbaNext allows you to comfortably pedal as you normally would or easily switch between electric modes: 

  • Full-Electric Mode - Sit back, relax and press the throttle down on your new eBike and allow the UrbaNext Electric Wheel do all of the work. 
  • Pedal Assist Mode - Your bike will now sense you pedaling and how fast, activating the any of UrbaNext's 3 levels of assist you've selected. 
  • Traditional Bike Mode - With our front wheel motor your traditional bike it pedals as it normally would, not affecting your chains, gears or pedals like most eBikes.

Better yet, you can restore your bike to it's traditional, non-electric state in seconds by simply swapping back to your original bike wheel.

 

 

UrbaNext is the first and only electric bike wheel with 7 sizes, fitting almost every bicycle.

UrbaNext is available in 7 sizes; 20", 24”, 26”, 27.5”, 29", 650c & 700c that covers 99% of the global bike market.

Unlike most other add-on electric options, UrbaNext also works with both rim and disc brakes and any tire you choose that fits the rim size.

 

The only decision you'll need to make is: 

  • What version of UrbaNext do you prefer and how many batteries would you like?

In advance of our June 2017 shipping date (just in time for summer!), we'll send a survey asking for your bike’s brake type and wheel size, ensuring you'll get the right size...it's that easy.

  

Power meets performance in a compact package with an UrbaNext eBike Wheel.

 

 

UrbaNext comes in two sizes, a 350W electric motor and a 240W electric motor allowing it to be street legal in nearly every state and/or country. 

 

With an UrbaNext electric bike wheel, your choices are easy and boil down to your location and how fast you want to go...

 Powerful 350W Electric Motor - USA Street Legal

  • UrbaNext's most powerful 350W motor has a top speed of 20mph with a max range of 30 miles and is street legal in the United States.

Standard 240W Electric Motor - USA/EU Street Legal

  • Our 240W motor has a top speed of 15mph with a max range of 30 miles and is street legal in the UK, EU, USA, etc.

 

Benefits of the UrbaNext Plug & Play Front Drive Motor:

  • Pedaling - With a font drive motor, it is much easier to pedal while riding your bike traditionally, as it does not interfere with the drive train. 
  • Safer - By mounting the motor on the front wheel of your bike, you eliminate accidental wheelies by pressing the throttle too hard. 
  • Weight - Aviation aluminum maintains lightweight, only adding about 7kg (15lbs) including the motor, battery, spoke, rim and tire.

 

 

UrbaNext is the first ever electric eBike wheel with a 3 level pedal assist system and is easily changed via our mobile app.

 

With pedal assist mode, UrbaNext senses your pedaling, and the motor kicks in to help you along based on how fast you pedal and your selection of the 3 levels of pedal assistance in the UrbaNext app.

 

The more you choose to pedal and the lower the level of assistance selected, the more range you can expect and you can always take a spare battery with you for longer rides.

   

 

The secret to UrbaNext's small size is that it works smarter, not harder by using an algorithm to ensure 100% of motor output is utilized to power your ride.

By using our patent-pending Sinus Algorithm Controlling System to convert electric energy that's stored in the battery to kinetic energy from the motion of your wheel, UrbaNext is able to minimize energy loss, increase output and ultimately extend the riding range of your battery.

 

 

Additionally, the 36V, 3500mAh & 126Wh lithium ion battery pack is rated at 125Wh and meets the International Aviation Transportation Association requirements allowing it onboard flights should you travel.

 

 

The fully-electric bike thumb throttle makes it easy to cruise along at up to 20 MPH with the push of a button and no pedaling required.  

The handlebar thumb throttle is optional and the only part connecting to your bicycle. If you choose to only want a pedal assist only bicycle and not full electric, you have the option to not instal the throttle.

   

  

UrbaNext is intelligently designed so not to affect your bicycles performance by adding a tremendous amount of extra weight.

By using aircraft grade aluminum we can achieve maximum strength and durability while making it the lightest weight eBike option with a total weight of 15lbs which include: motor, battery, spokes, rim & tire.

  

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  

Top Speed: 15mph (25kmh) for UrbaNext Eco, 20mph (33kmh) for UrbaNext Booster  

Motor Power: 240W for UrbaNext Eco, 350W for UrbaNext Booster  

Speed Levels: 3 levels  

Battery: Lithium Ion Battery (Manufacturer TBD - Panasonic or Sanyo or LG) – 36V, 3500mAH, 126WH  

Charge Time: ~1.5Hrs  

Battery Life: 1000 Cycles  

Range: Up to 30miles (50km)  

Supportable Brake Types: Both Rim Brake and Disc Brake  

Supportable Rim SIze: 20/24/26/27.5/29" & 650/700c  

Dropout Size: International Standard 100mm  

Weight: 15lbs (7kg) Max Load: 300lbs (135kg)  

Material: Aviation Aluminium  

Connectivity: Bluetooth Low Energy (4.0)  

App OS: iOS/Android  

Warranty: 1 Year Limited

 

 

 

  

Our founder Eric has 7 years of experience in the traditional Electric Bike Trading and has served customers from all around the world. In that time, he learnt that each customer has their own unique idea of the perfect E-bike design. Most cyclists have their own favorite bikes lying at home. Eric decided to develop a kit that could make full use of customer’s own bikes and electrify them without sacrificing any functionality. An electric wheel saves customers money, saves our business on shipping and handling costs, and saves valuable resources and energy for our planet by cutting down on commuters in cars and other fossil fuel-based transportation.  

The Copenhagen Wheel was a great inspiration for Eric. But the complicated rear-wheel installation and limited compatibility drove him to develop a similar electric wheel that is universal for any bike, more capable, and less difficult to install.  

Eric teamed up with Aberdeen, an experienced industrial designer in the bicycle industry, to officially start the UrbaNext project in 2014. After 2 years of effort and numerous prototypes, We launched our version 1.0 in China.

We named the product iMortor, and it was a good start, but was limited in ability. The wheel could only be controlled via a throttle, and was only available in 26" sizing. The sensors in the wheel were not particularly advanced, and the battery was not as efficient as it could be. Finally, the wheel weighed 18 pounds. We knew we still had work to do, and we wanted to build a version that would be street legal world wide.

We listened to our customers and continued to iterate. Our most significant iteration was that we developed pedal assist functionality across our model range. We developed a more powerful 350W version of our motor. We increased the available sizes from one to six. And even with the added pedal assist functionality, we managed to shave weight and drop to 15 lbs total. We added additional sensors to measure speed and control the wheel, and we developed a new algorithm to increase battery efficiency. The result was our version 2.0, the UrbaNext, and it was ready to go global - so we turned to crowdfunding.

  

Above, you'll find our very first prototype, which was the stepping stone to our final design.  

A more fleshed out and finalized prototype, on which both the iMortor and the UrbaNext is based. The iMortor could only be controlled via a throttle. It was exclusively available in 26" sizing, and it weighed 18 lbs. For UrbaNext, we added an entirely new, 350W motor option. We added and improved sensors for speed, motor braking, and pedal assist functionality. We increased available sizes to 7, and we reduced weight to 15 lbs. We developed our Sinus Algorithm Controlling System to improve battery efficiency, and limited speeds to road legal speeds for global regulations.

 

 

 

 

For a peek behind the scenes, check out the video below of the assembly and testing process of our V1, the iMortor:

 

          

 

 

 

Almost every person to whom we introduced our Smart Wheel idea liked it much more than buying a traditional E-bike. To achieve our mission of getting more people enjoy the fun and convenience of E-bikes while saving resources of the planet, our biggest stumbling block is spreading the word about our product. Crowdfunding is the most effective way of getting the word out.

Safer - By mounting the motor on the front wheel of your bike, you eliminate accidental wheelies by pressing the throttle too hard. 

Weight - Aviation aluminum maintains lightweight, only adding about 7kg (15lbs) including the motor, battery, spoke, rim and tire.
  UrbaNext is the first ever electric eBike wheel with a 3 level pedal assist system and is easily changed via our mobile app. Sometimes you can use a little bit of assistance on that long ride...UrbaNext is here to help.With pedal assist mode, UrbaNext senses your pedaling, and the motor kicks in to help you along based on how fast you pedal and your selection of the 3 levels of pedal assistance in the UrbaNext app. Pedal Assist System (PAS) controlled by iOS or Android Smartphone App.The more you choose to pedal and the lower the level of assistance selected, the more range you can expect and you can always take a spare battery with you for longer rides.    The secret to UrbaNext's small size is that it works smarter, not harder by using an algorithm to ensure 100% of motor output is utilized to power your ride.With the UrbaNext eBike battery and motor working smarter, we can minimize size and increase range.By using our patent-pending Sinus Algorithm Controlling System to convert electric energy that's stored in the battery to kinetic energy from the motion of your wheel, UrbaNext is able to minimize energy loss, increase output and ultimately extend the riding range of your battery.  Additionally, the 36V, 3500mAh & 126Wh lithium ion battery pack is rated at 125Wh and meets the International Aviation Transportation Association requirements allowing it onboard flights should you travel.  The fully-electric bike thumb throttle makes it easy to cruise along at up to 20 MPH with the push of a button and no pedaling required.  The handlebar thumb throttle is optional and the only part connecting to your bicycle. If you choose to only want a pedal assist only bicycle and not full electric, you have the option to not instal the throttle.     UrbaNext is intelligently designed so not to affect your bicycles performance by adding a tremendous amount of extra weight.You'll hardly even notice its there...but you'll be glad it is.By using aircraft grade aluminum we can achieve maximum strength and durability while making it the lightest weight eBike option with a total weight of 15lbs which include: motor, battery, spokes, rim & tire.              Top Speed: 15mph (25kmh) for UrbaNext Eco, 20mph (33kmh) for UrbaNext Booster  Motor Power: 240W for UrbaNext Eco, 350W for UrbaNext Booster  Speed Levels: 3 levels  Battery: Lithium Ion Battery (Manufacturer TBD - Panasonic or Sanyo or LG) – 36V, 3500mAH, 126WH  Charge Time: ~1.5Hrs  Battery Life: 1000 Cycles  Range: Up to 30miles (50km)  Supportable Brake Types: Both Rim Brake and Disc Brake  Supportable Rim SIze: 20/24/26/27.5/29" & 650/700c  Dropout Size: International Standard 100mm  Weight: 15lbs (7kg) Max Load: 300lbs (135kg)  Material: Aviation Aluminium  Connectivity: Bluetooth Low Energy (4.0)  App OS: iOS/Android  Warranty: 1 Year Limited   Early sketches of the UrbaNext  Our founder Eric has 7 years of experience in the traditional Electric Bike Trading and has served customers from all around the world. In that time, he learnt that each customer has their own unique idea of the perfect E-bike design. Most cyclists have their own favorite bikes lying at home. Eric decided to develop a kit that could make full use of customer’s own bikes and electrify them without sacrificing any functionality. An electric wheel saves customers money, saves our business on shipping and handling costs, and saves valuable resources and energy for our planet by cutting down on commuters in cars and other fossil fuel-based transportation.  Motor hubs from our trial production runThe Copenhagen Wheel was a great inspiration for Eric. But the complicated rear-wheel installation and limited compatibility drove him to develop a similar electric wheel that is universal for any bike, more capable, and less difficult to install.  Eric teamed up with Aberdeen, an experienced industrial designer in the bicycle industry, to officially start the UrbaNext project in 2014. After 2 years of effort and numerous prototypes, We launched our version 1.0 in China.We named the product iMortor, and it was a good start, but was limited in ability. The wheel could only be controlled via a throttle, and was only available in 26" sizing. The sensors in the wheel were not particularly advanced, and the battery was not as efficient as it could be. Finally, the wheel weighed 18 pounds. We knew we still had work to do, and we wanted to build a version that would be street legal world wide.CAD drawings of our V2 modelWe listened to our customers and continued to iterate. Our most significant iteration was that we developed pedal assist functionality across our model range. We developed a more powerful 350W version of our motor. We increased the available sizes from one to six. And even with the added pedal assist functionality, we managed to shave weight and drop to 15 lbs total. We added additional sensors to measure speed and control the wheel, and we developed a new algorithm to increase battery efficiency. The result was our version 2.0, the UrbaNext, and it was ready to go global - so we turned to crowdfunding.Completed wheels from our trial production run  Our first prototypeAbove, you'll find our very first prototype, which was the stepping stone to our final design.  A later, fully functional prototypeA more fleshed out and finalized prototype, on which both the iMortor and the UrbaNext is based. The iMortor could only be controlled via a throttle. It was exclusively available in 26" sizing, and it weighed 18 lbs. For UrbaNext, we added an entirely new, 350W motor option. We added and improved sensors for speed, motor braking, and pedal assist functionality. We increased available sizes to 7, and we reduced weight to 15 lbs. We developed our Sinus Algorithm Controlling System to improve battery efficiency, and limited speeds to road legal speeds for global regulations. An image depicting the difference in the electronic controllers for V1 vs V2. We added new sensors and functionalities to the V2, UrbaNext, requiring a more complex controller. A cutaway CAD image of the UrbaNext A CAD image of our battery For a peek behind the scenes, check out the video below of the assembly and testing process of our V1, the iMortor:
 Play

 
Replay with sound


 
Play withsound



00:00


00:00
 
 
 




 
 
 
 

 

 
              Almost every person to whom we introduced our Smart Wheel idea liked it much more than buying a traditional E-bike. To achieve our mission of getting more people enjoy the fun and convenience of E-bikes while saving resources of the planet, our biggest stumbling block is spreading the word about our product. Crowdfunding is the most effective way of getting the word out.

story:
Please note: The video you have just seen is a short compilation of existing inventions to demonstrate that people have already built these types of machines and they do indeed work! Our prototype is not yet built and that is the reason for this campaign. Once we have a working model we have an investor who will fund the mass manufacturing of the Quantum Energy Generator. We are asking for $7610.00 (see budget below) to build the prototype which will take 5 weeks. 

 

About the Inventor

  • I am a career Electronics Engineer, who has been designing electronic controls for electric motors for 26+ years. I hold 9 patents and am knowledgeable in many different types of electric motor design. My father was a mechanical designer, so I have been immersed in the field of electro-mechanical motion from my youth. A large part of my work has been in designing rugged, efficient and manufacturable motors and electronic controls for consumer and industrial products. You may have seen some news out of the U.S. from Honda Motor Company about a new option available on the 2014 Odyssey Van - the world's first built-in cabin vacuum cleaner system! I am the designer of the electronics and motor controls for this product. However, I have always had the eye and the heart of an inventor, and have questioned the established conventions in my field of design. I do not accept the conventional notion that wasted energy has to be a factor in every electrical machine, and so have developed the concept for the home Quantum Energy Generator (QEG) to disprove this theory (also shown by others in the video).

                                                    

I have recently resigned from the position I've held for 26 years with an  internationally known motor manufacturer because I am confident in my ability to bring this technology to people and communities that need it. I am not in this for financial gain. Rather, it has become clear to me that this is my purpose on Earth at this time. James M. Robitaille

 

 About the Invention

  • The words 'quantum field' sound mysterious, but this is just another way to say 'smaller than atoms.' The energy source for the QEG is the same
    force which holds atoms together. In conventional electric current flow, the
    movement of electrons is what provides usable energy. With our machine, we also use conventional electron flow, but in addition, we are making use of the many other smaller particles which have been known by some energy pioneers since the early 1900’s - people like Tesla, Moray, Schauberger, Riech and others.

                

  • In basic terms, our machine reverses the conventions used to build electric motors, i.e., instead of using low voltage/high current construction, which wastes energy, our designs use high voltage/low current construction, which gives us a HUGE surplus of energy. A portion of the surplus energy is fed back to self-power the motor, and the excess energy is collected in capacitors and converted into house current (120 or 240 volt, at 50-200 Amperes, depending on scaling). This is known as over-unity (more output than input) which traditional educational institutions have historically taught us was impossible. It is not at all impossible, and does NOT operate outside the laws of physics.

As previously mentioned - the technology is known, but here is where our plan differs from all the others, and why we believe it will be successful where others have failed:

- We have an investor who will fund large-scale manufacturing of the QEG - once we have a working prototype - guaranteed! The QEG is the cornerstone of our offering, along with research and development into offshoot products, such as generators without moving parts, and continuous improvement and refinement of existing designs.

- The existence of the Fix the World Organization (my wife and daughter are the co-founders) is the solution to get this product into the hands of the people, because we have numbers! Many technical and forward-thinking people are already in place, who have their own world-changing products and ideas, and who are ready to put these systems into use in their homes and businesses. Through our own members, we will be able to prove out the technology and get enough machines into the hands of enough people that when we go public, there will be too many people and too much credibility for any kind of suppression to be effective! We will finally be able to open the door which leads AWAY from dependency on fossil fuels and corrupt corporate energy interests!

- The machines get their input from the quantum field, which is estimated to have in the neighborhood of 200 Megawatts of power available in every cubic foot of space. That is an amazing level of energy density which has always been available to us, but the powers that be (or were) have historically suppressed the people and concepts that have tried to bring it into the mainstream economy. Obviously, big oil, natural gas companies, and all those providing energy-for-profit, stand to lose a lot of market share and stability when these alternate technologies become more widely known.

-  Convenient and clean! We have discovered that it is possible to design and build a scalable motor-generator system that can produce electrical power, without any fuel or emissions, in about the same space as a conventional diesel or gasoline generator of comparative power (wattage) output. What we are talking about is a system which would be similar in overall size (but lighter in weight), to the many available backup generator systems found in industrial and domestic applications as in photo below: 

                                       

Our system uses no fuel, fossil or otherwise, and produces zero by-products, pollutants or emissions of any kind, except a bit of audible noise, which is similar to that produced in any mechanical generator system, and can easily be minimized in the design and packaging.

 

            Prototype - Estimated Budget

                                                      Total: $7610.00

Benefits to humanity

The potential for these systems to alleviate some of the desperation and human suffering in poor countries is immense! For example, the systems can be used to power electric water pumps anywhere that drilling equipment can be brought in to drill water wells for communities with no access to clean water. Electric light (and even satellite internet access) can be provided where people live in darkness and isolation due to lack of access to any source of power, and lack of any means to pay, even if power were available. Governments…or even private benefactors could provide the
equipment, basically one-time, and serve the community for 20-25 years on a
single outlay for the equipment purchase. One of the goals of distributing these systems through the Fix-The-World organization is that we want to give away two machines for each 10 machines that we sell at full price.

This is a labor of love which attempts to recover the blocked efforts of many brilliant inventors in the past century. Let us not allow this suppression - at the expense of humanity - to continue into the 21st century! With your help to get us started, we can reveal it to the people NOW!
