story:
Mother Theresa once said

“I alone cannot change the world, but I can cast a stone across the
waters to create many ripples.”

Tectus™ is this stone and I would like to invite you to join the solution and become one of the many ripples.

By backing a farmer you are doing so much more than you can imagine. You’re providing a struggling small farmer with the necessary products he needs, and his family with food and income. You’re saving countless workers from being laden with toxic chemicals and carcinogenic fungicides. You’re allowing for truly organic and safe foods to be harvested.

By backing a farmer you are doing a genuinely good deed that can create not just a ripple in the lake, but rather a tsunami in the ocean.

Think of what you and your loved ones eat and drink.
This is a global issue that is the foundation of many illnesses and countless deaths. It is an increasing problem, as more and more toxic chemicals are needed due to the plant's increased resistance to pesticides

Salveo is meeting this challenge head on with its new product, Tectus™ — a natural and organic bio-stimulant, foliage fungicide with bactericide properties for food crops and gardens that will replace deadly chemicals and help save lives, while preserving the environment.

Tectus™ has been demonstrated to work on plant fungi including; powdery and downy mildew, Sigatoka Negra, Coffee Leaf Rust, Aspergillus Flavus, Rhizopus sp, Rhizoctonia sp. and Alternaria Alternata. 

Our Goals:

  1. Make a sustainable change in the agro-industry — for the good of all people and our planet
  2. File new patents
  3. Replace toxic foods with healthy, organic food that you can trust
  4. Make In Vitro and In Vivo (lab and field) tests on many food crops
  5. Provide Tectus™ to consumers worldwide thru a distributor model
  6. Improve the environment

All Contributors receive two special digital perks within 24 hours via email.

'Thankful ' download 9 songs and our Grateful Certificate with Thankful' lyrics.

 

'Thankful' was called the best acoustic CD of the year by NPR Miami years ago.

Risks are mitigated.

Some people just can't contribute — but that doesn't  mean you can't help:

  1. Please get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  2. USE  the Indiegogo share tools!
  3. Like our Facebook page
  4. Email this page to your friends and family

story:
Short Summary

This biosensor will consist of two parts: 
1. A sensory Nickel Iron class hydrogenase taken from Magnetospirillum magneticum. This will sense H2 and produce cyclic-di-GMP phosphodiesterase. 
2. A Cyclic-di-GMP riboswitch which controls the transcription of a fluorophore (eGFP) as the reporter. 

During transcription cyclic-di-GMP binds to riboswitch, creating a terminator loop that stops eGFP from being transcribed. In the presence of H2 the NiFe 2c hydrogenase produces cyclic-di-GMP phosphodiesterase, removing the terminator loop from the riboswitch allowing transcription and subsequent translation of eGFP. The riboswitch terminator only forms when cyclic-di-GMP is bound to its aptamer so when combined with the sensory system, hydrogen gas will be detectable and measurable. 

The Impact

The impacts of hydrogen biosensors will be diverse and plentiful. These could potentially include: 

-Use in alternative fuels and as a result aid in the fight against climate change

-Use in laboratory and other workplace scenarios as an alternative detection method for hydrogen leaks, which is a huge safety concern

-Cheap and re-usable alternative to currently used hydrogen sensors, which are usually made out of rare materials such as palladium or platinum

 

What We Need & What You Get

In order to allow our team to compete in the Giant Jamboree Conference in November, we aim to raise funds for at least five students to attend. Currently, it costs $4,000 for one student to attend, including a $1,000 individual registration fee. 

Any financial contribution you can make towards this will be greatly appreciated, and donations above $500 will be recognised as shown. 

At the Conference, sponsors can gain international exposure, since iGEM is the largest synthetic biology gathering globally. Sponsors can also interact with the upcoming high-achieving graduates and their academics. 

All sponsors will receive a post-event summary report and certificate. Our team would be very grateful to receive your support.

There are four tiers of sponsorship available as detailed below:

 

BRONZE TIER SPONSOR: Donations between $500-$999

  • Company logo on all print promotions 
  • Company logo and website link on our iGEM wiki sponsors page 
  • Acknowledgements on our official social media pages

 

SILVER TIER SPONSOR: Donations between $1000-$4999

You will receive everything detailed in the bronze tier as well as 

  • Company logo on front page of our iGEM wiki
  • Company logo on the back of all team T-shirts worn during events
  • Verbal acknowledgement of sponsorship on lead up to the Giant Jamboree conference 

 

GOLD TIER SPONSOR: Donations between $5000-$7499

You will receive everything detailed in the silver tier as well as

  • Company logo on the front of all team T-shirts worn during events
  • Advertised as a major sponsor during press releases, print promotions and conferences 

 

PLATINUM TIER SPONSOR: Donations at $7500+

You will receive everything detailed in the gold tier as well as

  • Personal tour of our lab and research facilities 
  • Framed photograph of our team

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word about our campaign and the powers of synthetic biology! 

Follow our socials to keep up to date with our lab work. 

Facebook: iGEM Macquarie 2019

Instagram: igem_macquarie2019

story:
Ion- An Armband That Gives You Superpowers

Ion is an armband that reads the muscle activity in your forearm and gives you touch-free control of technology with hand gestures and motion. Connect using Bluetooth to take control of your phone, computer, and so much more.

Your Tech, Your Way

Presentations 

Blow your audience away with exclusive presentation features: control a digital pointer and zoom in on your slides, touch-free.

Connect

Take control of your Ion by using gestures and motions to take your radio control experience to the next level.

Find over 100 applications to control music, games, presentations, and more in our exclusive Ion Marketplace. Launching in September 2018. 

Map gestures to your keyboard for customized control

The Ion armband uses exclusive gesture-based movements that are intuitive and easy to master. They’re based on five distinct hand gestures combined with motion. You’ll also feel when the Ion is in sync with you through haptic feedback (with short, medium and long vibrations).

Total Control At Your Fingertips

Step away from your computer and control your digital world with gestures: browse the web, play videos, switch between applications, and more. 

Technical Details

Model: Ion

Item Weight: 9 ounces

Product Dimensions: 4.7 x 2.9 x 4.1 inches

Batteries:2 Lithium ion batteries required. (included)

Colors: Black, White, and Sliver (Choose color later)

Batteries Included? Yes

Battery Cell Type: Lithium Ion

Average Battery Life: 48 hours

 Includes: 1 Standard Micro-USB Cable, 1 USB Bluetooth® Adapter, 10 Ion Sizing Clips. 

Our Team

At Visa Tech, we’re making revolutionary wearable technologies that will fundamentally change the way we interact with computers.

Our industrial designers and engineers work together to explore future wearable form factors. Our manufacturing team takes these scientific breakthroughs and finds ways to manufacture these technologies in-house on a grand scale.

Our researchers are making scientific breakthroughs to reinvent our relationships with computers. The Ion armband is the first input device in the world to use the electrical activity of muscles to control technology.

Join us Today, and take your part in history. Thank you for supporting us on this great journey!
story_txt:
Ion- An Armband That Gives You SuperpowersIon is an armband that reads the muscle activity in your forearm and gives you touch-free control of technology with hand gestures and motion. Connect using Bluetooth to take control of your phone, computer, and so much more.Your Tech, Your WayPresentations Blow your audience away with exclusive presentation features: control a digital pointer and zoom in on your slides, touch-free.ConnectTake control of your Ion by using gestures and motions to take your radio control experience to the next level.Find over 100 applications to control music, games, presentations, and more in our exclusive Ion Marketplace. Launching in September 2018. Map gestures to your keyboard for customized controlThe Ion armband uses exclusive gesture-based movements that are intuitive and easy to master. They’re based on five distinct hand gestures combined with motion. You’ll also feel when the Ion is in sync with you through haptic feedback (with short, medium and long vibrations).Total Control At Your FingertipsStep away from your computer and control your digital world with gestures: browse the web, play videos, switch between applications, and more. 

Technical Details
Model: Ion
Item Weight: 9 ounces
Product Dimensions: 4.7 x 2.9 x 4.1 inches
Batteries:2 Lithium ion batteries required. (included)
Colors: Black, White, and Sliver (Choose color later)
Batteries Included? Yes
Battery Cell Type: Lithium Ion
Average Battery Life: 48 hours
 Includes: 1 Standard Micro-USB Cable, 1 USB Bluetooth® Adapter, 10 Ion Sizing Clips. 

Our Team
At Visa Tech, we’re making revolutionary wearable technologies that will fundamentally change the way we interact with computers.

Our industrial designers and engineers work together to explore future wearable form factors. Our manufacturing team takes these scientific breakthroughs and finds ways to manufacture these technologies in-house on a grand scale.

Our researchers are making scientific breakthroughs to reinvent our relationships with computers. The Ion armband is the first input device in the world to use the electrical activity of muscles to control technology.

Join us Today, and take your part in history. Thank you for supporting us on this great journey!

story:
Short Summary

Viridis Concepts is a start up company which is a U.S. Military Veteran owned and operated. Using existing and our proprietary wind technology we at Viridis Concepts have come up with a way to reduce utility bills by as much as 50% for 78 million home owners, many housing renters, and countless business owners with minimal alterations to the structor of home or business. The only thing is we need your help filing for our first of several patent and trademarks.

  • We are seeking out help to raise $4,000 to pay for our Patent Attorney to file for the Patent Rights to our first Wind Turbine product as well as paying for trademarking the name of our first product.
  • With our first Wind Turbine product we can potentially reduce energy costs for homeowners and business owners by half if not more by capitalizing on renewable energy while the price itself will remain at a low cost and pay for itself within the first year of ownership. 

We have completely thought outside the box with our concepts and have created a brand new market utilizing green, renewable energy that will make a lot of companies mad at us and we are ok with that as our goal is to help homeowners and not the major Utility Companies. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute and we completely understand and respect that, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Please help get the word out that we are gunning for the major utility companies and their outrageous pricing by sharing this campaign.
  • Please remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!
  • Please like our Facebook page at facebook.com/GreenRenewableEnergy
  • Please follow us on Twitter at twitter.com/ViridisConcepts

story:
Summary

The Roof Dynamo is an invention that combines wind and solar in a unique method. It creates electricity in a sustainable manner at a small fraction of the cost of a solar panel array. I filed three provisional patents that allowed me to add new features to the Dynamo. The Non-Provisional Patent (Regular Patent Application) was filed by an international patent attorney with a PHD in Physics. The two prototypes were built by Bart Blunt (Crew Chief at Private Sky Aviation in Florida). It has been a true challenge. The website is www.RoofDynamo.com 

In 2007 I began the research and development of the Roof Dynamo. The purpose of the Dynamo is to provide inexpensive, sustainable electricity and create the green jobs that this world needs. The Dynamo needs $25,000 to install a third prototype on a home in the Pecan Street Project in Austin, Texas. Their website is http://www.pecanstreet.org this master planned community is designed to test and implement new sustainable clean technologies. The money will also allow me to join with IC2 and ATI (Austin Technology Incubator) and utilize the facilities of both organizations to begin engineering and initial prototyping of a large utility scale model (see photo of Malmo, Sweden Tower). Be sure to pass this project along to your friends with the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
UPDATE: Check us out on Inhabitat

What We Do

Rayton Solar has developed a solar panel manufacturing technology that produces solar energy cheaper than fossil fuels right here in the USA. If our manufacturing technology is scaled it will make the USA independent from oil rich countries. All Americans can see huge reductions in their electricity bills, and the environment can see a large reduction in CO2 emissions. A huge win for America, its people, and the Earth.

How We Do it

We have a patent pending solar panel manufacturing technology that utilizes 50x-100x less silicon (the most expensive component of a solar panel) than traditional manufacturing techniques; while increasing our panels’ efficiency by a whopping 25%!!!

This means we can manufacture solar panels 60% cheaper than any current company in the world. Right now the cheapest panels are made in China, but with our technology we can beat them in price. 

For details on our manufacturing process click on the video gallery and listen to the Founder, Andrew Yakub, talk about it. You can also see the video here: http://youtu.be/7ALCRD7wZPw

Also, visit our website at www.raytonsolar.com

(Particle Beam Accelerator)

Use of Funds

The funds from this campaign will go to putting the final touches on our solar panel which can then go through UL certification. Once certified we can begin selling these panels and start the push to improve our lives and the environment. By helping us you are helping secure the future of solar energy. 

(Specialized Particle Accelerator Chamber)

The Impact

Your contributions will help bring the power of energy back to the USA by reducing and potentially eliminating our energy dependence on oil rich countries. US Jobs will be created as our facilities are in the States. With our solar panels in production there will be potentially large savings in your utility bills, and let’s not forget the environmental benefit this technology will have on the world.

Our non-toxic 4 micron thick monocrystalline silicon panels are the only way solar can stay competitive with fossil fuels after the government solar tax incentives run out. So in a sense we are the main beam of light fighting for our country's energy independence, its residents' wallets, and the well being of our Mother Earth.


How You Can Help

There are two main ways you can help:

  • Giving a monetary contribution to the campaign

  • Spreading the word about the campaign by posting our campaign URL (http://igg.me/at/raytonsolar) on your Facebook, Twitter, and other social media accounts along with a statement of support.

    An example you can use - “Please support this awesome campaign! It can help change the world! USA! http://igg.me/at/raytonsolar”

story:
THE SMART CHOICE FOR YOUR HOME HEATING

SOLUS+ is an electric heater, but not as you know it. Sleek, smart but most importantly affordable to run. Designed to simply plug and play, with no installation costs. SOLUS+ is designed to be more cost efficient than conventional electric radiators and smarter than your current home heater. You can now control your heating from the comfort of your phone. Cost efficiency that benefits the environment and your wallet.

SAVE ON YOUR HEATING BILLS

Our unique graphene-based heating technology works by emitting far infrared heat. Infrared technology heats in the same way as the sun. Rather than heating the air around you like traditional heaters, it heats you and the objects in the room directly.  By not relying on convection heat, a 800W SOLUS+ M2 unit can heat a 20sqm space with up to 30% less energy than traditional electric radiators. Read more about infrared heating technology here

The average UK home* spends approximately £655/€745/$845** on their heating each year. By backing SOLUS+ on Indiegogo, you can transform the way you heat your home. By changing to SOLUS+ infrared heating system, not only will you gain a smarter heating system and transparency on your heating costs, you could also reduce your annual heating bills by up to £196/€223/$253 per year (based on average UK home*), leaving you to enjoy the additional savings each year to spend on things that matter to you the most.

*https://www.labc.co.uk/news/what-average-house-size-uk?language_content_entity=en

** https://www.providentpersonalcredit.com/is-winter-coming/

 

 

THE BENEFITS OF THE SOLUS+ SYSTEM

Unlike other heating options, SOLUS+ is a plug and play solution. You no longer need to spend thousands of dollars installing a smarter, more cost-efficient heating system. SOLUS+ has zero installation costs and zero maintenance costs. It’s a plug and play solution,  SOLUS+ which also gives you direct insight into your heating costs, from the moment you plug it in.

YOUR BILLS AT YOUR FINGERTIPS

Did you know each year, on average, 60% of our energy bills go directly to heating our homes? Yet, in most cases, we have no idea how much we’re actually spending on heating on a day by day basis. Our real-time energy monitoring allows you to see exactly how much you’re spending on your heating, in cost terms, right from your phone. It might seem like a small thing, but it’s all about understanding how you’re spending your money and getting smarter with it.

 

 

SOLUS+ IS SMART: CONTROL YOUR HEATING FROM THE COMFORT OF YOUR PHONE

Each SOLUS+ unit comes with a temperature/humidity sensor and an app that gives you the tools to control your home heating and monitor your heating costs. The app comes with a range of smart features, allowing you to manage your heating more effectively, save money and reduce your impact on the environment. Being in control of your heating bill just got a whole lot easier.

Smart Zoning:  When using SOLUS+ as a whole home heating solution, you can control heating and comfort levels on a room by room basis. Why heat the whole home when you could be saving precious energy and money? Smart zoning gives you more control, comfort and cost efficiency.

Integrations: Out of the box, our smart controls will integrate with Google Home and Alexa meaning you can get the most out of your preferred smart home system.  

 

 

DESIGNED WITH YOUR HOME IN MIND

SOLUS+ comes in two sizes; M1 and M2. Designed to heat 15sqm and 20sqm with rated inputs of 450W and 800W respectively, they are crafted from ultra-lightweight tempered glass, with a total thickness of only 10mm. With a total weight of 4.5kg and 9kg respectively, SOLUS+ is both sleek and portable. Available in both black or white. SOLUS+ can be used with included wall mounts or freestanding (Model M1 only and feet sold separately) giving you the flexibility to integrate SOLUS into your home, however, you prefer.

 

 

GRAPHENE-BASED HEATING TECHNOLOGY

At KOLEDA we have years of R&D behind our unique patent pending graphene-based compound that is cost effective and simple to manufacture on an industrial scale. The SOLUS+ is the first commercial application of our patent pending compound.Our graphene-based compound has numerous advantages over other competing products in its class.

You can read all about the research and scientific backing behind the technology within SOLUS+ in our downloadable report.

 

 

 

ZERO INSTALLATION AND MAINTENANCE COSTS

 

The simple design and portability of SOLUS+ mean that it's a system designed to grow with you as your lifestyle and home changes. Homeowners and renters alike, benefit from SOLUS+, by simply plugging directly into a mains socket and then taking SOLUS with them when they move.

ZERO MAINTENANCE

Unlike more complex heating systems such as heat pumps or gas central heating, SOLUS+ requires no ongoing maintenance costs. Saving you time and hassle each year.

The lifecycle of traditional electric space heaters is very short when used continuously. The technology behind  SOLUS+ means that our heating element won’t burn out and will not need to be maintained.

Since SOLUS+ is smart, we keep up with your needs by releasing free software updates on our app to improve the range of functionality and make your smart home system better.

 

 

JOIN THE HEATING REVOLUTION

Here at KOLEDA we believe in doing things differently. Heating is one of our basic needs, but for far too long, heating our homes has been more complex and opaque than it should be.

We believe in changing that and SOLUS+ is the first step in creating a smarter, more transparent and cost-efficient home for everyone. By backing SOLUS+ at 40% off RRP, you will become a part of our incredible community of backers and share ideas for new features, give feedback on our products and help us test the new SOLUS+ app, so together we can build something that will radically change homes around the world.

 

CERTIFICATION & COST EFFICIENCY RESEARCH

We have years of research and development behind SOLUS+. We’re also pleased to announce that we have now received our certifications from TUV Nord to certify that SOLUS conforms to the EN 60335-2-30 and EN 60335-1 standards for home heaters and home appliances. These certifications ensure SOLUS meets the highest European safety standards. Moreover, the SOLUS+ M1 and M2 heaters have an IP44 rating as issued by TUV Nord, meaning that they are protected from water splashes in all directions. This allows our heater to be used safely in bathrooms and kitchens, where resistance to water splashes and moisture is needed. Our heaters also comply with the more recent EU Lot 20 Legislation. 

 

 

 

SAFETY

There is always risk of injury from touching any form of electric heater and SOLUS+ panels are no different. However, a key benefit of SOLUS+ panels, unlike conventional heaters, is that they can be mounted higher up on walls or ceilings – reducing the likelihood of accidentally touching them or falling against them. We always advise this, especially in areas where young children or the elderly are present.

 

 

SOLUS+ PRESS FEATURES

 

WHAT STAGE OF PRODUCTION IS SOLUS+ AT?

 

Here at KOLEDA we have sourced, and have agreements in place, for every single component of SOLUS+. Over the last 12 months, we have built over 120+ versions of the SOLUS+ heater and are now ready to release into production the SOLUS+ models M1 and M2. We have our own manufacturing facility in Europe (Riga, Latvia) that has been built for the sole purpose of producing SOLUS+ units.

The hardware behind our smart heater is in place and the SOLUS + app is currently in development. We are working with top design agencies and focus groups to provide a UX centred around our customer's needs, ensuring that the SOLUS+ app is intuitive and easy to use. As we develop our app further we will invite you to sign up and be one of our first testers, to ensure the product is right for all of our customers.

 

 

WHY DO WE NEED CROWDFUNDING?

Here at KOLEDA we believe in bringing comfort to your world through innovative technology.

We’re also big fans of crowdfunding and we truly believe in the power of bringing innovative technology to all. We’re now at the point where we need your help to make SOLUS+, and a more sustainable future, a reality.

Our team consists of people from varied backgrounds, from technology entrepreneurs to aerospace engineers. Based in Switzerland, with our assembly facility in Latvia, what brings us together is our passion and goal of a sustainable future for our planet.

The money we raise from Indiegogo, will be invested in expanding the warehouse space, stock and automation machinery to improve our production capability across our assembly line and make SOLUS+ available for all.

 

 

INSIDE YOUR SOLUS+ PACK:

Each SOLUS+ comes packed with a humidity & temperature sensor with fully charged batteries that last over 18 months. Each radiator comes with our free SOLUS+ app available on both IOS and Android. We have ensured that the SOLUS+ works in all geographic regions, so no matter where you are in the world SOLUS+ will keep you warm. All SOLUS+ radiators have a 2-year warranty as standard.

 

 

HELP SPREAD THE WORD

If you know friends and family who would benefit from learning more about SOLUS+, we would love your help in spreading the word. Simply use the social share buttons at the top of the page to spread the love or take part in our referral program! 

 

REFERRAL PROGRAM 

We are excited to offer a referral program for anyone who wants to help spread the word of SOLUS+ as easy as possible. The process of this is very simple:

 

1) Get your personal referral link here.

2) Share the link with your friends, family and network.

3) Your friends make a pledge using your link.

4) You earn 13% commission on each pledge.

 

 

MEDIA ENQUIRIES

For press inquiries around SOLUS Kickstarter campaign please don’t hesitate to reach out via email at press@koleda.co. Alternatively, a press resource kit can be downloaded by clicking the link below.

 

 

SOLUS TECHNICAL SPECS

 

 

SOLUS IMAGE GALLERY

The process of this is very simple: 1) Get your personal referral link here.2) Share the link with your friends, family and network.3) Your friends make a pledge using your link.4) You earn 13% commission on each pledge.  MEDIA ENQUIRIESFor press inquiries around SOLUS Kickstarter campaign please don’t hesitate to reach out via email at press@koleda.co. Alternatively, a press resource kit can be downloaded by clicking the link below.  SOLUS TECHNICAL SPECS  SOLUS IMAGE GALLERY

story:
The story behind PiGO

PiGO module is designed to power Raspberry Pi, Arduino and other 5 V modules with rectified and stabilized 5V voltage, and with a current of no more than 2.5A  and  4.5-18V input voltage.

PiGO is designed for the devices that need to be powered permanently, even when the external power is off.

There are no compact modules on the market that can provide the uninterruptible power supply for devices in cars or other locations with no power is available.

PiGO is developed in accordance with the scheme of the uninterruptible power supply. It has a port for connecting the battery to provide autonomous and devices uninterrupted operations.  Additionally, it has two ports to charge smartphones.

Our team has designed and developed small-sized module with very high performance.

Load tests were conducted with smartphones and tablets.

Also the tests were conducted with Raspberry Pi and Arduino.

 

PiGO solution

Modern electronics require a constant and stable power supply. The problem is that it's difficult to maintain in cars or with the help of other unstable sources.

For example, switching on/off the ignition leads to the de-energization of the car, which in turn de-energizes all devices that are connected to the vehicle's power network.

When devices are powered by a solar battery or another unstable power source,
the voltage fluctuations are observed depending on external factors.

Most devices such as the Solar Panel Control System, Wind turbine, smart homes that are built on the basis of Raspberry Pi or Arduino, Banana Pi, Orange Pi, Nano Pi, LattePanda, CHIP, require a stable power supply, which makes the developer to build an autonomous power system.

PiGO is reliable, easy to install and you can get it for the fare price. Provide uninterruptible power supply for devices.

Tthe battery should be Li-Pol, 3.7V. The board has a battery charge / discharge controller.

If you want to become a distributor, please, fill in the form: https://goo.gl/forms/ecbQSD6JzM12qOs03

Payment Instruction: https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles...

Risks and Challenges

As shown in the timeline, we’ve finished the prototyping and testing of PiGO, and the trial production is already done. 

Our goal is to send every item perfectly made and packaged with many loves to you!

We know there are always challenges in hardware development and production. There is a possibility of unforeseen delays and supply chain risk, but our team has great experience in production and delivery management. As hardworking professionals, we are confident that we will deliver a high-quality product to our backers.

story:
300% funded on Indiegogo. Follow the story at subpod.com

 

For every 10 Subpods Pre-Ordered via Indiegogo, we give one to a School or community group.

With 836 Subpods pre-ordered to date, that means we have 83 already allocated! Find out more about the program here.

Pre-Order today and join our growing global community. 

Join the compost underground! Composting is a good news story that you can be a part of every day.

  • Divert waste from landfill
  • Help cool the climate by avoiding methane emissions, a greenhouse gas more than to 18 times more powerful than CO2
  • Turn food waste into soil food to grow food
  • Stay connected to the natural systems that sustain life

We’ve taken the mess, smell and hard work out of composting!

The efficient, low-maintenance and odour-free composting system powered by worms and microbes.

Composting your food waste has never been this simple

Composting made easy

The Subpod® in-garden compost system that works with nature, using worms and microbes to compost organic waste without the odours, vermin, mess and hard work of traditional composting.

Repair soil, grow food

The Subpod® not only disposes of your organic waste, but is also the ‘growth hub’ for your garden. The movement of worms and microbes between your Subpod® and garden bed builds soil fertility and plant health, allowing you to grow nutrient-dense food at home with ease.

Take a seat

Subpod doubles as a sturdy bench seat. So, once you've fed the worms, have a seat in your garden, and reconnect with your herbs and veggies.

Go Underground

Stable & Effective Composting

Going below ground means we're feeding the plants at the root level, where they draw in their nutrients.

Using nothing but worms and microbes, this natural process aerates the soil and adds good bacteria throughout your garden. The unique series of holes beneath the soil allow worms and microbes to freely move to and from the system and the surrounding garden bed.

And the best part is, your herbs and vegetables are being fed in a really natural way, every day - reducing the need for other fertilisers.

 

 

How It Works

Simple Install. Simple Maintenance.

 

Step 1: Install

Embed the Subpod system into the soil of your veggie garden, with the top vents above ground. Ideally within a raised garden bed so that the top can be used as a seat.

 

Step 2: Fill

Fill the Subpod with healthy worms and castings and starter materials. Leave worms for 6 days to settle in.

 

Step 3: Feed & Mix

Feed the Subpod twice a week with food scraps and carbon matter (i.e. leaves, shredded newspaper, dry mulch). Mix the contents with the aerator tool.

 

Step 4: Spread

Once the Subpod has filled up, leave it for 10 days to be processed. Then it's time to take out some of the rich compost soil and spread it across your surrounding gardens.

Geoff Lawton

Permaculture expert, Geoff Lawton of Permaculture Research Institute shows how the Subpod works on his property, Zaytuna Farm.

What's In the Box?

Every Subpod purchase includes:

  • 1 x Subpod
  • 1 x 100% Natural fibre worm blanket to keep your compost covered and worms happy
  • Detailed instruction manual (printed & online)
  • Access to our online community portal, Subpod Grow Hub.
    • An online community hub where you can interact with other Subpod users around the globe, sharing tips, tricks, and your success stories
    • Instructional videos about Subpod and composting - all you need to know to get your garden flourishing!
    • DIY videos for customising your Subpod (i.e. Add a wooden slatted top)
  • Attentive customer support (online & phone)

Perks

One of the great benefits of the Subpod is that you can join the modules together to expand composting capacity. We are offering a number of packages to suit a range of needs, as well as an easy-to-use compost aerator perfectly suited to maintain your Subpod.

Subpod® Single - $109 USD

30L (7.9 gal.) / 15 kgs (34lb) of food waste per week

Perfect for the single household. Harness the power of worms and microbes to compost the organic waste of up to 4-6 people with no odours or mess while feeding the soil at the plant root level.

Subpod® Duo - $212 USD

60L (15.8 gal.) / 30 kgs (68lb) of food waste per week

Double up for extra capacity. Harness the power of worms and microbes to compost up to 60 litres of organic waste per week.

Subpod® Trio - $319 USD

90L (23.7 gal.) / 45Kg (102lb) of food waste per week

Triple your composting volume! Harness the power of worms and microbes to compost up to 90 litres of organic waste per week.

Subpod® Compost Aerator - $19 USD

This compost aerator has been designed to make mixing and aerating your compost easy. With just a few minutes of light work each week, you can thoroughly mix and aerate your compost – and in doing so, create the perfect conditions to encourage rapid decomposition of your organic waste.

Feed The Soil. Feed the World.™ Hemp Tee - $40 USD

We've collaborated with local legends, Afends to create a range of Subpod's own signature branded tees. Spread the word about composting and soil health in style.

Please note: Subpod is a bulky item to ship weighing in at over 10kgs when packed. We have worked hard to keep shipping prices as low as possible for our customers. 

 

20,000 More People Composting By 2020

We have a massive vision to equip and enable 20,000 more people to start composting by the end of this year! That means 10,000 tonnes of food waste is diverted from landfill and 400+ tonnes of fresh food can be produced with that waste! And we're relying on your support to help make our big vision a reality!

We've received pre-orders and wonderful support from over 26 countries throughout this Indiegogo campaign alone, which tells us one thing - the world is eager to make a change to the way we manage our food waste, for the sake of our soil!

Be your own Green Grocer

Convert Waste to Food

You can finally start composting your own waste and growing your own food at your home or workplace with more ease.

As Subpod is embedded right in your growing garden, it helps feed and boost your herbs and vegetables on a daily basis. The worms feed and then transverse out through the soil, excreting natural fertilisers and aerating it, all at the plant root level.

Easy Assembly

Flat Packed Design

The intelligent patented design of Subpod® allows for very simple assembly. In less than 3 minutes, and with no tools or technical know-how, you can be all setup ready to install into your garden. We're making composting easier and more accommodating!

Performance Composting

We've designed an internal divider which slides in to create sections with the Subpod. This allows you to compost your waste more effectively, allowing one side to be filled with new food waste, whilst the other could be harvested, essentially worm-free. The worms will move to where the food is, or away from something that needs to de-gas, such as onions. It would also suit composting a smaller amount of food waste more efficiently, which would be suitable for an individual, a couple, or those producing less waste.

Intelligent Design

Considerate design for effective composting

We're spent many years developing the Subpod design. This system, although quite simple in appearance, has been meticulously tested and continually improved to work as optimally as possible, whilst being affordable and aesthetically pleasing.

You can lock the Subpod if it's in a community garden or shared space, and you can collect the worm tea via a built in drain pipe (BYO hose), which has an internal filter and can be plumbed around your garden.

"When we feed the soil we bring the food vitality and nutrient density right up to the maximum. It's the soil ecosystem we’re stimulating. And the Subpod incubates that into action. It starts that catalyst of event right there in your garden. From your waste stream on your kitchen bench, straight to the garden, back to the food - where you are. You can’t do it more efficiently!"

Geoff Lawton

CEO of Permaculture Research Institute
World renowned Permaculture consultant, designer and teacher

“Nowadays, Sri Lankans are going for organic farming, organic cultivation and organic food. We are fed up with chemical fertilisers. Our soils are degraded and we have to nourish them again. This could be a very good idea for our future generations and the Sri Lankan community”

S. Rajika Amarasinghe, Ph.D.

Department of Soil Science,
Faculty of Agriculture,
University of Ruhuna, Sri Lanka

"Subpod is the perfect onsite waste management strategy for restaurants, schools, offices, homes and gardens. I can't wait to get one into my new home currently under construction."

Martin Anda PhD
BSc (Hons), BE (Mech), MIEAust

Academic Chair of Environmental Engineering School of Engineering & Information Technology, Murdoch University

“Subpods would be ideal for small remote island communities. Communities that live in a village lifestyle and can deal with organic waste internally. This is the way islands can sustain themselves and not rely on imported fertilizers.”

Denise Quintal

Executive Director,
EcoNorfolk Foundation
Adjunct Associate Lecturer,
University of Sydney

What Can I Compost?

Organic waste includes much more than just food scraps. Subpod will allow you to compost any organic matter which would usually be discarded in a green bin, including lawn and garden waste, paper, and even natural fibres such as clothing. That means that favourite old cotton shirt doesn’t have to go to landfill when you wear it out!

Even food scraps that are traditionally excluded from other compost systems can be added, including citrus peel, onions, fish, and meat on the bone (in small quantities). Just remember, it is worms and microbes doing the work, so the smaller each piece of waste is, the faster they will break it down.

Our Key Team

Andrew Hayim De Vries

Inventor & Founder | Director

Saadi Allan

CEO | Director

Peter Howard

Chief Science Officer | Director

Greg Beaver

COO | Director

Phil Johnson

Product Development

Kathryn Roberts

Operations Manager

Ky Haus

Creative Producer

Peter Critch

Project Manager

Recent Commercial Projects

Habitat

Byron Bay

In January 2019 we installed 2 commercial scale compost systems (10 Subpods) at Habitat, a high end live work and play development in Byron Bay's Industrial Estate. The systems are processing the waste up for 20+ tenants, as well as visitors to the space. We'll be installing systems right throughout the rest of the development over the next 6-12 months, processing the waste of 50-100 people.

Spell & The Gypsy

Boutique Fashion Label - Byron Bay, Australia

We designed a bespoke solution for the 50+ staff at Spell's HQ in Byron, which will process all of the waste produced on site, as well as grow herbs and veggies for all the staff to enjoy. The customisation and integration opportunities for Subpod are endless!

"This is a really important step on the journey towards a more sustainable business. And it's really exciting to see how passionate and on-board all of our staff are about composting their food waste."

- Lucy, Spell & The Gypsy

Pilot Projects

Talalla Retreat

Sri Lanka

In July and November 2017, Andrew and the Compost Central team spent time with locals and staff, at the popular Talalla Retreat resort on Sri Lanka's southern-most coastline, developing an ongoing project featuring a waste-management, composting and education facility, worm farms and 10 working prototypes of the Subpod. See the video of the first stage of the project above.

Santos Organics

Byron Bay, Australia

We have 4 Subpod prototype systems planted in the vegetable gardens at Santos Organics warehouse in Byron Bay's Industrial Estate. The systems are clad with slatted wood tops, allowing them to double as seating for customers, amongst the edible garden. Having the systems installed has meant the cafe can repurpose their food waste, as life for the herbs and vegetables, instead of it going to landfill. The Subpods have become an interactive talking point for the cafe, and a significant part of the outdoor area, reconnecting customers with the food they eat.

"We produce over 100 litres of food waste every week. The disposal of it used to be a big problem for us. Now, with the Subpod system, we integrate all of the food waste and the compost into our food gardens."

- Josh, Cafe Manager at Santos Organics

Become an Affiliate

Signup to become an officer affiliate for Subpod. Then make a post, send an email and refer your community and audience to the Subpod Indiegogo page via your unique link. You'll receive 15% of every dollar raised for our campaign, on your behalf.

Thanks so much for your support!

Become an Affiliate

 

 

Disclaimer

All information, imagery and content displayed on this page are ©Copyright Compost Central Pty Ltd. All rights reserved. For more information, visit our website. 'Subpod®' and 'Feed The Soil. Feed The World.™' are registered Trademarks of Compost Central Pty Ltd, a subsidiary of Syntro Biosystems (Holdings) Pty Ltd. The Subpod® design is patented.

The Subpod product render is an accurate representation of our production model taken from the files our manufacturer is using to produce the final product. We have extensively tested Subpod prototypes in a range of conditions. If you're still reading, you're wonderful!

story:
Short Summary

We’ve taken a standard business in Africa, phone charging, and made it profitable, healthy and educational with the power of solar. SolarFi is positioned to lift a generation out of poverty.

We immersed ourselves in Africa and spent two years doing market research to solve pressing problems such as poverty reduction, education, capacity building, technical skills, ENERGY, AND INTERNET. We met with Dr. Kandeh Yumkella, former CEO of UN-Energy, whose job was to reduce poverty through clean energy who educated us on his lessons. 

We brought this idea to VVM (Valley Venture Mentors), one of the top startup accelerators/incubators in America. We finished 4th out of 36 companies in a competitive program in Massachusetts. Even in 2018, over one billion people globally lack access to electricity. In Africa alone, 600 million people have no power. This lack of energy has been a barrier to social and economic development. We were awarded $12,500.

 SolarFi will connect people to solar power and WiFi. Educational programs can be accessed on the SolarFi platform. People spend up to two hours every day just to charge their phone. SolarFi can solve this issue.   It is a basic human need to be connected. 

  • Jerry Shaye was educated at Columbia business school and Dartmouth college. He started his career in the peace corps. I returned to New York where I worked as the Director of International Trade for NY state. I teamed up with Antonio Dixon, who founded SunPowerd, a solar energy company selling solar lanterns and solar generators in Africa, however, most people didn't want just light, they wanted to be able to charge their phones, and around their friends. 

 

  • We put together an all-star team. The SolarFi team comes from Columbia University, Dartmouth, Oxford, and Princeton and is led by Jerry Shaye, former Director of International Trade Development at the New York State Department of Economic Development, Antonio Dixon, founder of SunPowerd, Dr. Ekwow Spio-Garbrah former Ambassador of Ghana to the USA, Inventor Glenn Butler, and Isha Varshney former manager at KPMG.
  • SolarFi allows us to educate people, empower people to run their own micro-franchise model. Most people don't know how to run a business, but franchises have a higher chance of success.  
  • For every $10,000 (every charging station) we can educate 20,000 people, reduce carbon emission exposure, empower four entrepreneurs, social, and environmental benefits.

We were just selected as a top 100 startup change-maker by Harvard, and MIT's hubweek

What We Need & What You Get

 

R&D

  • The proper software is needed for the technology with a team of software, electromagnetic, IoT, and vending experts. $67,000
  • Manufacturing facility with all tooling. $8,000

  • Local Quality Assurance Certifications for health and safety, $4,200 (Desired)

    Materials, $27,976

    Electronics, $39,589 

Implementation:

  • Program manager, $18,000 for 6 months. The PM process requires constant integration of feedback from the target customers in order to come up with a product designed specifically for their needs. They continue to test and making adjustments to ensure optimal functionality, and to make sure that the kids get the right education programs

  • Shipping and customs, $17,000

  • Flights, 3 people, $3,000

We will be able to reduce the cost of manufacturing as we scale and take advantage of economies of scale

Perks: We wanted to reward you, but that comes at a cost of the product, logistics, and shipping of $30,000-$45,000 depending on what perks people select.

Although most of our supporters won't use SolarFi in their home, we wanted to offer some rewards, and of cool, innovative solar products that you can share with your friends and family.

We want to express our gratitude! 

$25 - SolarFi  Community Member - You get listed on our website as a SolarFi Community Member 

$49 - The African Solar lamp - A customized solar lantern hand painted by Bridge2Africa Connection’s Sunday morning girls. 

$99 - Solar Revolution Technology Leader - A color-changing Bluetooth solar speaker lamp + You get listed on our website + A postcard from the SolarFi team in New York, Ghana, and Massachusetts.

$499 - Solar Swag bag (T-shirt, Lantern, color changing Solar beach ball w/remote,  and reusable tote bag. Going to the beach? Bring this tote bag along and you won’t have to worry about a power bank. Your phones and other electronic devices are always juiced up —thanks to this brilliant creation! 

$1,000 - Solar Revolution Change Maker - partially Sponsored charging station one SolarFi for a vendor! SolarFi Tshirt + Skype call with Founders in New York, Boston, and Ghana.  You will be able to run an educational program for 30 minutes a week for 10 weeks. We will send you pictures and updates of your sponsored SolarFi station.

$1,700 - Solar energy networker - Dinner in NYC with a Former board of trustees of New York Power Authority, Mark O’Luck or Dinner in NYC with Forbes Senior Vice President, Achir Kalra. 

$3,000 - The Builder.  A co-sponsored charging station for 3 people. You’re name/face will be branded on the side of the SolarFi box.

$5,000 - The Ambassador - Sponsor 1 SolarFi! You get SolarFi Tshirts +Very special mention on our website + Skype call with Founders in NY, Boston, and Ghana. Change the lives of young entrepreneurs in Ghana! You can be a part of this transformative experience for the girls and their families! Your face branded on the solar machines.  You will be there for the grand opening hosted by Ms. Dawn Sutherland former VP at Xerox Corporation, and Executive Director of bridge to Africa connection https://bridgetoafricaconnection.org/  This SolarFi box will be run by 4 women in Ghana. 

$10,000 - A Full African Experience - Fully sponsors the solar charging station. This SolarFi box will be run by 4 women in Ghana and will be refrigerated.  Included with your generous contribution is a tour of Cape Coast, Ghana hosted by former Ghanian Ambassador to the US, and board member at UNESCO, Dr. Ekwow Spio-Garbrah.  This 5-day complimentary tour can accommodate up to 4 people at his 4-acre beach house off of Cape Coast, Ghana. Sites include the world famous Elmina castle, known as the point of last return when the slaves exited to the Americas.  It was recently visited by President Obama, and America's first lady Melania. Today, it is a UNESCO World Heritage site that attracts tens of thousands of visitors every year.   https://www.cnn.com/2018/07/27/africa/ghana- elmina-castle/index.html

 

The Impact

“SolarFi is a unique idea that can revolutionize commerce, development, energy, allowing for efficiency and sustainability.”

— Dr. Kandeh Yumkella, Former CEO, United Nations Energy, and Co-Chair of Sustainable Energy for all. 

We’ve taken a standard business in Africa, phone charging, and made it profitable, healthy and educational with the power of solar. SolarFi is positioned to lift a generation out of poverty.

SolarFi doesn't just teach people how to fish, instead of giving them a fish, but it also gives them a rod to fish with:

  • We believe in empowerment instead of aid.  With your help, we can empower. 
  • It's sustainable, once a person owns a SolarFi charging station they don't have to keep requesting money as Africa has an abundance of sun.
  • Women in Africa tend to have a lot of babies, the problem that women have running a charging station is that when you are pregnant you can't run your generator powered business
  • A SolarFi entrepreneur will earn 3 x the monthly average

Job Creation

Each SolarFi employs between 2 and 5. SolarFi is a US company, employing, maintenance technicians, field agents, designers, engineers and managers in Africa.

Eco-Friendly 

Every year smoke inhalation causes over 4.3 million deaths worldwide.  This is more than AIDS and Malaria combined.  SolarFi businesses are equipped with eco products, reducing smoke emissions and fire hazard for the safety of the vendors and the residents of African, further improving health and well being for themselves and their community.

Income

SolarFi allows African vendors to reduce energy costs and to work at night, creating additional working time to sell more products and increase revenues. The street vendors in African will now be able to invest in the livelihoods of their families (e.g. pay school fees more consistently), treat common illnesses more often and save money for emergencies for the first time. Our average entrepreneurs earn 3X the monthly average.

Solar Energy

SolarFi provides solar energy, allowing vendors to save on fuel and maintenance expenses in a safer and more hygienic way. This also offers the capability for a fridge and other electronic resources at an affordable price.

Legality

SolarFi delivers a pathway to formalized business through partnerships with the local city council. Franchisees previously worked in legal limbo, uncertain whether their daily inventory would be confiscated by local authorities. With legally recognized SolarFi machines they are freed from this uncertainty and enter the formal economy.

Kwame, and Kofi, 20 years old, Phone charging vendor, Freetown, Sierra Leone

“I’m working every night to pay my fees for University. I understood that life is a challenge, you cannot wake up on the morning and wait for a mango falling from the tree, you have to sweat and use your energy, to get what you want, it's the only way."

Jocelyn, 26 years old, Phone charging, pregnant and mother of one girl, Nairobi, Kenya

“I’m working only in the morning, and my husband doesn’t work, still I succeed to feed all my family, but I struggle and I can’t answer to whole market demand.”

Akua, 23 years old, convenient store, Freetown, Sierra Leone

“I charge over 200 phones a day, but when my generator needs maintenance, I lose over 2 weeks of business at times, and I have no control. At times I have no access to fuel to power the generator”

Risks & Challenges

There are a few risks, however, we have experience with solar in Africa and have developed relationships with leading organizations such as OXFAM, Save the Children, CARE International, World Vision, the UN, and the USAID. 

  • Some of the risks are the technology training
  • We will be partnering with organizations such as the United Nations Development Program and the German development agency on training people how to use solar, install panels, and training local people to be able to maintain the charging stations since they are made in the USA.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • If you can't help, we ask that you share this amongst your contacts, share our links on social media handles, like us on facebook https://www.facebook.com/Solarfibox/
  • Please use the Indiegogo share button so that people know how they can contribute

With your help, we can empower 10,000 women and young entrepreneurs to go from a low-income class to middle class all using clean energy and technology.

story:
ECO EGO YACHT

  Sometimes even one person is able to change the world.  Not so many times ago, people still talked about big push-button phones, burned fuel in their cars, polluted the air with coal-fired power plants until appeared one person who said: "STOP ... enough" and progress went forward...and now in your pocket is ringing not just a phone but an incredible amount of gadgets,  someone decided to install batteries and electric motor in the car and now one of them conquers our space. Someone decided that it would be great if we use the energy of the sun, wind, water, waves and many peoples and countries supported these pioneers to help our common house called Planet Earth.

 I decided to create a company that would start developing self-charging electric water transport. It would be great if people get started to use electricity on the water. Jet skis, boats, yachts, ferries, water trams and all of them it's green, clean and quiet.Just imagine that you could go on a trip not to think about the fact that you need a fuel or socket...

   

 The first step to demonstrate that this is not just a dream but a reality is Eco Ego Yacht.      To be honest with you, I am ready to build World first self-charging Green Tech Energy Yacht under live streaming cameras for all creation process.

 

I have some criteria that must have ECO EGO Yacht:

  • Self-charging
  • Grean Energy
  • Mile Range from 500
  • Autopilot
  • Remote Drive
  • 1 Captain

                           The project is very ambitious

...not every day someone tries to make the first step in changing the industry but if you do not try it will never be done.It's hard but I'm ready for Challenges. Join and then be able to say that you was one of the first who believed that changing the world is possible.

...to make dreams come true

I suggest Pixel Add on board:

  • One Pixel is 1x1 cm                                                                                                                                                                                                
  • All Pixels are located in a highly visible area 
  • You can combine pixels as much as you want
  • Pixel will not be removed throughout the whole life of the yacht
  • Not be allowed pixels containing prohibited, illegal , malware, virus and misleading content
  • Amount of all available pixels is more then 500.000 

All pixels can contain any information, such as name, initials,text, photo, picture, logo, internet address, QR-Code or link to your personal page in social networks and instant messengers. Please kindly respect the content of the pixels to do not offend other participants.

After creation complete...

...at the end of the production process and the passage of all certification processes Eco Ego Yacht will go on its world tour without a single drop of fuel and will be presented at the most significant exhibitions around the world. This is your chance to show your thoughts to millions of people.

                                             Finally

I'm an open person and I'm ready to listen you. And no matter who you are, sponsor, partner or just a man with extensive experience ready to give valuable advice. I'm open to any help that will help realize my dream. I will be very grateful if you make some noise about Eco Ego campaign at social networks, among friends, organizations, etc. don't forget that you can easily use the Indiegogo share tools. 

Today is the 1st of May 2018 probably this day we will write into history not only as Labor Day but also as a day when people of the Planet Earth tried to change the world for the better ...                                                                                      TOGETHER

story:
Take part in the initiatory journey of clean mobility. Half of the way is done, we need you for the last kilometers : to build the solar trailer. 

Participez au voyage initiatique de la mobilité propre. La moitié du chemin est faite, nous avons besoin de vous pour les derniers kilomètres : fabriquer la remorque solaire.

 

Our dream - Notre rêve

To move without polluting, thanks to the energy of the sun! With Alexandra we are two globetrotters who love to take on wildest challenges! We have already traveled around the world by van, motocycle, bicycle, foot, etc and it is by putting our skills, our passions and all our economies end to end, that we have launched this challenge.

Se déplacer sans polluer, grâce à l’énergie du soleil ! Avec Alexandra nous sommes deux globe-trotteurs qui aimons relever les défis les plus fous! Nous avons déjà beaucoup voyagé à travers le monde, en van, moto, vélo, à pied, etc et c’est en mettant bout à bout nos compétences, nos passions et toutes nos économies, que nous nous sommes lancé ce challenge.

 

The project - Le projet

To promote clean mobility and renewable energies by achieving the first round of the world with a vehicle converted into electric and recharged with solar energy.

Promouvoir la mobilité propre et les énergies renouvelables en réalisant le premier tour du monde avec un véhicule converti en électrique et rechargé à l’énergie solaire.

 

The world tour - Le tour du monde

An ultimate endurance test : We will go to the most extreme roads on the planet to test our innovations and make them more reliable.

Un test d’endurance ultime : Nous irons sur les routes les plus extrêmes de la planète pour éprouver nos innovations et les fiabiliser.

  • More than 30000 miles, on all terrains
  • 100% electric and autonomous, but confortable
  • 30 Countries crossed, between the tropics
  • 0g CO2 emission = zero footprint
  • Departure:  end of the year 2018

 

With You ! - Avec Vous !

 Participate personally and physically in the EV world Tour adventure.                          Traveling with us - Learn with us - Evolve with us                                                                      Share and help us fund pioneering innovations that respect our environment. 

Participez personnellement et physiquement à l’aventure EV World Tour.                              Voyager avec nous - Apprenez avec nous - Évoluez avec nous                                                          Partagez et aidez nous à financer des innovations pionnières et respectueuses de notre environnement.

 

Thanks to You  - Grâce à Vous 

Our first prototype "NANO" is finished, and we are looking to finance its solar trailer "EVE" and the communication event that is the world tour.

Notre premier prototype « NANO » est terminé et nous cherchons à financer sa remorque solaire « EVE » ainsi que l’évènement de communication qu’est le tour du monde.


First electric drive - Premier sortie en électrique 

Here is a preview of our first victory, the first drive of the converted electric van in July 2018.

Voici l'aperçu de notre première victoire, la sortie du van converti en électrique en juillet 2018.

 

Project Details - Les détails du projet

 

Our technical objectives - Nos objectifs techniques

Bring innovative solutions in the use of renewable energies and clean mobility.

2 Prototypes, 3 steps :

  1. The conversion of petrol vehicles into electric 
  2. A mobile and autonomous solar generator 
  3. An extreme endurance test

Apporter des solutions d'innovation dans l'utilisation des énergies renouvelables et de la mobilité propre.

2 Prototypes, 3 étapes :

  1. La conversion de véhicules thermiques en électriques 
  2. Un générateur solaire mobile et autonome
  3. Un test d’endurance extrême

 

"NANO" The Adventurer - Le Baroudeur

Its goal : Show that a new life is possible for our petrol vehicles.

Son but : Montrer qu’une nouvelle vie est possible pour nos véhicules thermiques.

 

"EVE" The Solar Trailer - La Remorque Solaire

Its goal : Produce clean and infinite energy, where you need it most !

Son but : Produisez une énergie propre et infinie, là où vous en avez le plus besoin !

 

First achievement - Première réalisation

In order to show the world it was possible we've made this prototype on our own and with our own money.      

Follow a weekly Vlog on the making of the prototypes on YouTube.

Pour montrer au monde que c'était possible nous avons fabriquer ce prototype par nos propres moyens et avec notre propre argent. 

Suivez les vidéos hebdomadaires de la fabrication des prototypes sur YouTube.

 

⚡GO Alex ! ⚡

Trained as Architect, in charge of communication and logistics, she is always willing to put one's hand to the plow.

Her favorite sentence : Better than good, is to do it!

Architecte de formation, responsable communication et logistique sur le projet, elle met volontiers la main à la pâte. 

Sa phrase favorite : Y réfléchir c'est bien, le faire c'est mieux!

 

⚡Go Rémi !⚡

Trained as Mechanical Engineer in charge of R&D and prototypes manufacturing. He is like a child who has never stopped dreaming. 

His favorite sentence : We all have the right to pull out our fingers.

Ingénieur Mécanique de formation, responsable et développement et fabrication prototypes. Il est comme un enfant qui n'a jamais arrêté de rêver.

Sa phrase favorite : On a tous le droit de se sortir les doigts !

 

Our social objectives - Nos objectifs sociaux 

To inspire all generations by becoming embassadors for electric mobility and energy transition.

Inspirer toutes les générations en devenant des ambassadeurs de la mobilité électrique et de la transition énergétique.  

 

Education and sharing - Education et partage  

We want to show to the greatest number and especially the youngest the benefits of renewable energies. Each of our stops around the world will allow us to meet local people and share our experiences and knowledge.

In organizing our trip, we include appointments in schools and universities to raise awarness to our interlocutors and leave them solutions for the futur of their mobility and energy.

Nous voulons montrer au plus grand nombre et surtout au plus jeunes les avantages des énergies renouvelable. Chacun de nos arrêts tout autour du monde nous permettra de rencontrer les populations et d'échanger nos expériences et nos savoirs.

Dans l'organisation de notre trajet, nous incluons des rendez-vous dans des écoles et des universités pour pouvoir sensibiliser nos interlocuteurs et leur laisser des solutions d'avenir pour leur mobilité et leur énergie. 

 

The impacts - Les Impacts 

Impacts of such a project on a national and international scale are immense:

  1. We want to inspire and teach the new generation around the globe, these new technologies, more sober and more respectful of our Earth.
  2. We want to show that driving electric does not represent any limits and to put down the prejudices.
  3. We want to obtain the opening of a regulatory framework in France that will allow the homologation of converted vehicles to electric.
  4. We want to prove that renewable energy can meet all our needs.

Les impacts d’un tel projet à l’échelle nationale et internationale sont immenses :

  1. Nous voulons inspirer et enseigner aux nouvelles génération autour du globe, ces nouvelles technologies, plus sobres et plus respectueuses de notre Terre.
  2. Nous voulons montrer que rouler en électrique ne représente aucunes limites et mettre à bas les préjugés.
  3. Nous voulons obtenir l’ouverture d’un cadre réglementaire en France qui permettra d’homologuer des véhicules convertis à l’électrique.
  4. Nous voulons prouver que les énergies renouvelables peuvent répondre à tous nos besoins.

 

Our financial objectives - Nos objectifs financiers

The EVWT association has a long-terme vision, beyond the event of communication and education around the world. We want that our innovations can serve the greatest number of people. 

L'association EVWT a une vision à long terme, au-delà de l'évènement de communication et d'éducation autour du monde. Nous souhaitons que nos innovations puissent servir au plus grand nombre. 

 

Already funded - Déjà financé

 

Funds to be raised  - Reste à financer

Contacts - Contacts

Social network - Réseaux sociaux : 

  • http://www.evwt.org
  • https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCHOCdckFdBEmTfR1qoW4Atg
  • https://www.facebook.com/evworldtour/
  • https://www.instagram.com/electric_vehicle_world_tour/
  • E-mail :  ev.worldtour@gmail.com

 

UN GRAND MERCI !

A BIG THANK YOU !
story_txt:
Take part in the initiatory journey of clean mobility. Half of the way is done, we need you for the last kilometers : to build the solar trailer. Participez au voyage initiatique de la mobilité propre. La moitié du chemin est faite, nous avons besoin de vous pour les derniers kilomètres : fabriquer la remorque solaire. Our dream - Notre rêveTo move without polluting, thanks to the energy of the sun! With Alexandra we are two globetrotters who love to take on wildest challenges! We have already traveled around the world by van, motocycle, bicycle, foot, etc and it is by putting our skills, our passions and all our economies end to end, that we have launched this challenge.Se déplacer sans polluer, grâce à l’énergie du soleil ! Avec Alexandra nous sommes deux globe-trotteurs qui aimons relever les défis les plus fous! Nous avons déjà beaucoup voyagé à travers le monde, en van, moto, vélo, à pied, etc et c’est en mettant bout à bout nos compétences, nos passions et toutes nos économies, que nous nous sommes lancé ce challenge. The project - Le projetTo promote clean mobility and renewable energies by achieving the first round of the world with a vehicle converted into electric and recharged with solar energy.Promouvoir la mobilité propre et les énergies renouvelables en réalisant le premier tour du monde avec un véhicule converti en électrique et rechargé à l’énergie solaire. The world tour - Le tour du monde
An ultimate endurance test : We will go to the most extreme roads on the planet to test our innovations and make them more reliable.Un test d’endurance ultime : Nous irons sur les routes les plus extrêmes de la planète pour éprouver nos innovations et les fiabiliser.
More than 30000 miles, on all terrains
100% electric and autonomous, but confortable
30 Countries crossed, between the tropics
0g CO2 emission = zero footprint
Departure:  end of the year 2018

story:
About

These are Pale Blue: The world's best USB rechargeable lithium polymer AA and AAA batteries.

Save money and sustain a better world. In America alone, 10 million batteries are thrown away every day. One pack of Pale Blue USB rechargeable LiPo batteries can replace up to 4,000 alkalines. Making the switch can save you $$$$ and keep toxic disposable batteries out of landfills. Ditch disposables!

  • Less waste - One Pale Blue battery can prevent the existence and disposal of 1000 alkalines over its lifetime.
  • Superior Performance - Better voltage stability, current output, stability, than alkalines and old school NiMh rechargeables.
  • Ultra Fast Charging - Charges in one fifth the time of a NiMh rechargeable.
  • Unmatched Convenience - On-board micro-USB charging port (4 end charging cable provided so you can charge 4 batteries at once).
  • Huge Savings Potential - Recharging Pale Blue batteries means not buying disposables and this means savings for you!

10 million battery cells thrown away every day? That really starts to add up. . .

That's enough to go around the planet 4 1/2 times every year. That's a 70 pound bucket every 12 seconds!

We're starting by bringing lithium polymer technology to AA and AAA batteries. It's the same type of battery that powers your cell phone allowing Pale Blue to charge faster and last longer. It's so fast it will charge a AA in under 2 hours and a AAA in under 1 hour. Better yet, a single Pale Blue rechargeable will replace 1000+ alkaline disposables.

Let's build a better world by putting an end to tossing disposable batteries into landfills.

More convenience. Micro USB port means no separate charger so you can power your life anywhere.

Simply plug your Pale Blue in with any micro USB cable or use our included cable to charge four batteries at once. The LED charge indicator will turn green when you are good to go. Power up quickly when you are on the go, at work, home or traveling. Charging times are surprisingly fast.

That way you're always charged to power the devices and toys you love.

Save money. Don't throw away cash with disposable batteries.

If you're spending $1 per single-use, disposable battery then one of our batteries can save you $1,000 over its lifetime.

How is it better than rechargeable batteries I've used before?

With LiPo technology, Pale Blue charges 5x faster than conventional rechargeable batteries.

LiPo provides higher power and more consistent output through its use cycle.

Pale Blue Smart Batteries will last 2x as many charges as NiMh.

With our product, factory, testing certifications, and production process already in place all we need is your help. In return for your support we would like offer you the world's first USB rechargeable lithium polymer battery at a discounted price with FREE shipping to the US/HK and subsidized shipping to the rest of the world. International shipping may be subject to additional VAT or taxes.

 

 

Documentation:

 

Risks and challenges

Size constraints: Getting LiPo cells into AAA and AA batteries along with the safety circuit, micro USB Port, and LED charge indicator lights was the toughest technical part. That’s just a tight space to work within while keeping as much room as possible for the LiPO cell. Luckily, LiPo has a high energy density so the result is excellent energy capacity even when we give up some space for the other features. We also spent significant energy and resources on developing the aesthetics of the product to feel worthy of such a revolutionary product.

Competitiveness: While there are other brands and products popping up, we have worked hard to ensure we are cutting edge and forward-thinking about customers’ needs and user experience. Our team and advisors bring exceptional knowledge that will continue to help us stay ahead of the competition in terms of tech, performance, quality, and reliability.

Cost: LiPo is a better solution, but it is a more expensive material. Many factories will say it’s just too expensive, but our market research shows that consumers do want to invest in new tech solutions for sustainability. We have worked hard to get the cost into a range which is competitive, but the cells will never be as cheap as Alkaline or NiMh. This has been achieved partly through the scale of the industry, LiPo being used in Tesla’s and all our mobile devices has increased supply and improved the production, but demand is also high for LiPo cells in many products because it’s clearly the best solution. There’s a good reason we don’t see NiMh in electric cars.

Development and Certifications: With all the product testing complete, certifications already issued, and samples approved all we need is your support and we will begin volume production immediately following the campaign. Based on our capacity study this production should take a few weeks to complete and then we will begin shipments.

Pricing: Pricing is always important to customers. Our goal is to get these products into customers’ hands and homes so we can keep them from buying more disposables or low-quality rechargeables. To do this quickly, we need to have competitive pricing and have worked hard to optimize the product, supply chain, and operations even at this early stage. The premium price is more than offset by the improved performance and lifetime return on investment, but we do recognize this is an investment for customers who may be used to buying cheap disposable batteries. Pale Blue is a battery designed for performance, drives harder and last longer, that’s the key deliverable. Simply purchasing and using Pale Blue batteries has the immediate impact of displacing disposables and saving the world from wasted resources and energy and within 5-6x charges, they begin saving customers money.
