story:
We are Resinate, and we like to

make things, better.

 

Right now, most of the plastic waste that people are "recycling" goes from the blue bin to a landfill or an incinerator - so it's not really being recycled! With Resinate, when single-use or end-of-life plastics are recycled and sent to a city facility, we take it from there, saving the plastic from a frightful and unproductive death in landfills and incinerators.

We don’t waste fuel to ship plastic scraps across the world, and we don’t waste time or money on unnecessary processes. The result is a method that makes much more sense for the economy, for the customer, and for our planet.

 

The Old Way

From resources to waste.

 
People are realizing that the linear model is inherently wasteful. If we transition to a circular model, we can divert waste back into the process, conserves resources, and reduce pollution.

We plan to use plastic waste to make large, beautiful, useful things, like furniture and construction materials - and we know how to do it - but first, we need to show the world that we can, and save up for the large machines that we need. So before we start making things like furniture and building materials, we’re starting small, with flower pots and keychains to thank our supporters.

History shows that small acts combine to accomplish big things. That means electronic equipment, a larger new workspace, and a few other things that we don’t quite have yet - but we'll get there.

 

The New Way

From resources to waste, then back into resources.

From linear to circular, and from waste to resources. Our project was inspired, in part, by Dave Hakkens' Precious Plastic project. This project was fun, but if we're going to make a big impact on the massive global plastic problem, we need industrial-sized solutions.

 

The Plan

We want to keep plastic waste out of landfills, incinerators, and waterways. We've been thinking for a while about how to locally make an impact on the global plastic problem, and now we need your help.

 

 

So far, we have used this equipment to make simple products, like flower pots and keychains. These are a good start, and we hope you like them, but we also know that plastic waste has great potential. If we can get to the next level of equipment, we can produce important, useful things for the world, and divert thousands of tons of plastic waste from the waste stream. With a new extrusion machine ($6,000), we can create beams and boards that we can use to produce furniture, playground equipment, building materials, and much more. We also need to acquire a small pickup truck ($2,000) in order to move larger amounts of plastic from our partner organizations to our workshop, and some more steel parts ($1,000) for an industrial plastic washing machine. All this will cost us about $9,000.

These upgrades alone would allow us to recycle, process, and remanufacture thousands of tons of additional plastic every year. We're improving upon traditional waste-to-resource methods to make them more efficient and scalable. The process is not easy, but it's simple and uses relatively old technology.

We can turn plastic waste into useful, long-lasting products that regular people actually need. Right now, we're making small objects, but we're building an even bigger workshop to achieve those bigger goals.

 

We plan to

- collect tons of plastic waste from local factories, businesses, and municipal waste management facilities.

- produce useful products such as construction materials and furniture, for businesses and retail sales.

- collaborate with local Phoenix artists to make powerful pieces of art out of recycled plastic to be displayed at colleges, art galleries and festivals with all contributors credited.

- collaborate with local high schools and colleges to offer coursework in sustainable plastics manufacturing.

The Pot

Our first production, designed for this project, is inspired by a sense of responsibility to help strengthen others, the economy, and the planet. When you help us grow this project with a contribution of $20 or more, we will help you grow something useful with a little pot that we handmade with 100% locally recycled plastic using home-built equipment. Along with the pot, we'll send some potting soil and your choice of seeds: peppermint, lemon basil, or rosemary.

 

More Pots

The Keychains

 

The Plastic

We divert from local coffee shops, medical schools, and an Arizona goat dairy that otherwise would have to send it to landfills or incinerators. In addition to building these relationships, these crowdfunding products are allowing us to test the market, test our processes, and prove that we indeed can make something beautiful from something that was considered valueless.

 

Why Remanufacturing?

We understand that this project doesn’t make sense to everyone at first glance. It took a lot of research, listening, and learning with experienced industry professionals and academics to figure out how why this is a problem and how we’re going to make an impact.

A Better Alternative Needed

 

Until we present an alternative, plastic waste will keep going to incinerators and landfills. Here are the major reasons why we need an alternative:

  1. Incinerating (and landfilling) waste materials depletes resources, captures a small amount of energy, and adds pollution to urban and natural environments.
  2. Incinerators always require large amounts of capital investment, yet they create relatively few jobs when compared to recycling.
  3. U.S. incinerators are one of the leading contributors to greenhouse gases such as carbon monoxide, nitrogen oxide, volatile organic compounds, and sulfur dioxide (Source: The Ecology Center - Detroit's Future Without a Trash Incinerator).
  4. When compared to conventional mass incinerators, staged incinerators such as gasification and pyrolysis emit similar levels of toxins (Source: The European Commission's Integrated Pollution Prevention and Control Reference Document on the Best Available Technologies for Waste Incineration).
  5. Recycling and composting are more economically sensible than incineration and landfilling.
  6. Studies have found that communities near incinerators experience the following negative health effects:
    1. Increase in pre-term babies and babies born with spina bifida or heart defects.
    2. Increased cancers, especially larynx, lung, colorectal, liver and stomach cancers, leukemia, and others.
    3. Increased dioxins in the blood of those who work at incinerators.

 

The Opportunity Ahead

Here are the major reasons why recycling will be a better solution:

  1. The U.S. Environmental Protection Agency's U.S. Recycling Economic Information Study reports that recycling industries already provide 1.1 million jobs in the U.S., an amount similar to that of the U.S. auto and machinery manufacturing industries.
  2. According to a 2007 report by the Detroit City Council, a 50 percent recycling rate would result in the creation of more than 1,000 jobs in that city alone.
  3. With a recycling rate of only 34 percent, recycling industries generate an annual payroll of $37 billion and gross over $236 billion in annual revenue (U.S. Recycling Economic Information Study)
  4. Per ton of materials, recycling saves more than seven times the carbon emissions compared to landfilling, and almost 18 times reduction from incineration.
  5. If materials currently burned in incinerators were recycled, they would save 3 to 5 times more energy than incinerators would generate, because recycling saves on the cost of new material extraction and production.

 

It’s not plastic in general that poses a threat – it’s single-use plastic objects that serve minimal utility before ending up, usually, in landfills and incinerators. Landfills spell an eternal loss of utility from a finite resource, and incinerators are notorious for polluting urban and natural environments.

That’s where we come in – right now, we’re diverting plastic directly from institutions that aren’t able to recycle it, providing an alternative route that doesn’t end up in another single-use product which probably won’t be recycled again. We make things that are designed to last and result in a better end-of-life story.

 

Our Values

It's good to be weird. We aim to make great products, but also treat people well, consider our surroundings, and make a positive impact around us.

Why just make things when we can make things better?

Resinate Remanufacturing

The People

 


Garret is a hardworking hustler who also happens to care deeply about building things for the state of Arizona and the future of our economy, its people, and the planet.

Brandon has built model rockets, car engines, and various electronic and mechanical machines since he was a child. He worked for several years as a residential and commercial electrician and has brought all of these skills to the table to make Resinate's efforts possible.

If you know Luke, you know he believes reducing our plastic consumption, increasing recycling, cleaning up our communities, and providing zero-waste lifestyle alternatives. He's currently wrapping up a biological engineering degree at Arizona State University.

We're combining these interests to reduce plastic pollution and revive Arizona's manufacturing sector in a way that truly works better for everyone. Our team of volunteers and affiliate organizations do a lot to keep our environment litter-free, and that's one of the things that keeps us going when things look bleak.

Our business advisor, Lynn Whitman, has over 30 years of professional experience in a variety of positions, including Vice President of a major retail corporation and COO of a promotional marketing consortium. She also served in advisory capacities on boards and committees to all of the major credit bureaus and chaired a division of the National Retail Federation.

Our mentor and financial backer, Ken Snider, is a successful former founder and CEO of a financial services company and has invested in multiple startup companies during his retirement. His $4,000 loan has allowed us to buy the supplies to build our first machines and custom molding equipment.

We're working with an accomplished fabricator, an experienced electrician, and an entire community of volunteer engineers and makers. Our team is supported by consultation from experienced industry professionals, including founders of waste hauling companies, CEOs of manufacturing companies, and experienced manufacturing engineers. The community is already coming together to bring this project to life.

Together we can hack a solution to the world's plastic pollution problem and have fun doing it!

 

Thank you for your support,

Garret Schwartz, Brandon Schwartz, and Luke Ryberg

Co-founders, Resinate LLC

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Please feel free to make some noise about this campaign on social media, in a club or organization, or anywhere people might listen and act upon it.

  • Don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools at the top of this page!

Thank you!

Video Credits:

Justin Lee, Director of Photography/Gaffer, Audio

Nick Sanchez, Editor

Mary Wanjohi, Promotional Representative

Produced and Directed by Garret Schwartz and Alice Nguyen

Photography and Photo Editing: Alice Nguyen
story_txt:
We are Resinate, and we like tomake things, better. Right now, most of the plastic waste that people are "recycling" goes from the blue bin to a landfill or an incinerator - so it's not really being recycled! With Resinate, when single-use or end-of-life plastics are recycled and sent to a city facility, we take it from there, saving the plastic from a frightful and unproductive death in landfills and incinerators.We don’t waste fuel to ship plastic scraps across the world, and we don’t waste time or money on unnecessary processes. The result is a method that makes much more sense for the economy, for the customer, and for our planet. The Old WayFrom resources to waste. People are realizing that the linear model is inherently wasteful. If we transition to a circular model, we can divert waste back into the process, conserves resources, and reduce pollution.We plan to use plastic waste to make large, beautiful, useful things, like furniture and construction materials - and we know how to do it - but first, we need to show the world that we can, and save up for the large machines that we need. So before we start making things like furniture and building materials, we’re starting small, with flower pots and keychains to thank our supporters.History shows that small acts combine to accomplish big things. That means electronic equipment, a larger new workspace, and a few other things that we don’t quite have yet - but we'll get there. The New WayFrom resources to waste, then back into resources.From linear to circular, and from waste to resources. Our project was inspired, in part, by Dave Hakkens' Precious Plastic project. This project was fun, but if we're going to make a big impact on the massive global plastic problem, we need industrial-sized solutions. The PlanWe want to keep plastic waste out of landfills, incinerators, and waterways. We've been thinking for a while about how to locally make an impact on the global plastic problem, and now we need your help. 

 
So far, we have used this equipment to make simple products, like flower pots and keychains. These are a good start, and we hope you like them, but we also know that plastic waste has great potential. If we can get to the next level of equipment, we can produce important, useful things for the world, and divert thousands of tons of plastic waste from the waste stream. With a new extrusion machine ($6,000), we can create beams and boards that we can use to produce furniture, playground equipment, building materials, and much more. We also need to acquire a small pickup truck ($2,000) in order to move larger amounts of plastic from our partner organizations to our workshop, and some more steel parts ($1,000) for an industrial plastic washing machine. All this will cost us about $9,000.
These upgrades alone would allow us to recycle, process, and remanufacture thousands of tons of additional plastic every year. We're improving upon traditional waste-to-resource methods to make them more efficient and scalable. The process is not easy, but it's simple and uses relatively old technology.
We can turn plastic waste into useful, long-lasting products that regular people actually need. Right now, we're making small objects, but we're building an even bigger workshop to achieve those bigger goals.

 
We plan to
- collect tons of plastic waste from local factories, businesses, and municipal waste management facilities.
- produce useful products such as construction materials and furniture, for businesses and retail sales.
- collaborate with local Phoenix artists to make powerful pieces of art out of recycled plastic to be displayed at colleges, art galleries and festivals with all contributors credited.
- collaborate with local high schools and colleges to offer coursework in sustainable plastics manufacturing.

The Pot

Our first production, designed for this project, is inspired by a sense of responsibility to help strengthen others, the economy, and the planet. When you help us grow this project with a contribution of $20 or more, we will help you grow something useful with a little pot that we handmade with 100% locally recycled plastic using home-built equipment. Along with the pot, we'll send some potting soil and your choice of seeds: peppermint, lemon basil, or rosemary.
 
More Pots




The Keychains






 
The Plastic

We divert from local coffee shops, medical schools, and an Arizona goat dairy that otherwise would have to send it to landfills or incinerators. In addition to building these relationships, these crowdfunding products are allowing us to test the market, test our processes, and prove that we indeed can make something beautiful from something that was considered valueless.

 
Why Remanufacturing?
We understand that this project doesn’t make sense to everyone at first glance. It took a lot of research, listening, and learning with experienced industry professionals and academics to figure out how why this is a problem and how we’re going to make an impact.
A Better Alternative Needed
 

Until we present an alternative, plastic waste will keep going to incinerators and landfills. Here are the major reasons why we need an alternative:


Incinerating (and landfilling) waste materials depletes resources, captures a small amount of energy, and adds pollution to urban and natural environments.
Incinerators always require large amounts of capital investment, yet they create relatively few jobs when compared to recycling.
U.S. incinerators are one of the leading contributors to greenhouse gases such as carbon monoxide, nitrogen oxide, volatile organic compounds, and sulfur dioxide (Source: The Ecology Center - Detroit's Future Without a Trash Incinerator).
When compared to conventional mass incinerators, staged incinerators such as gasification and pyrolysis emit similar levels of toxins (Source: The European Commission's Integrated Pollution Prevention and Control Reference Document on the Best Available Technologies for Waste Incineration).

Recycling and composting are more economically sensible than incineration and landfilling.
Studies have found that communities near incinerators experience the following negative health effects:

Increase in pre-term babies and babies born with spina bifida or heart defects.


Increased cancers, especially larynx, lung, colorectal, liver and stomach cancers, leukemia, and others.

Increased dioxins in the blood of those who work at incinerators.



 
The Opportunity Ahead

Here are the major reasons why recycling will be a better solution:

The U.S. Environmental Protection Agency's U.S. Recycling Economic Information Study reports that recycling industries already provide 1.1 million jobs in the U.S., an amount similar to that of the U.S. auto and machinery manufacturing industries.
According to a 2007 report by the Detroit City Council, a 50 percent recycling rate would result in the creation of more than 1,000 jobs in that city alone.
With a recycling rate of only 34 percent, recycling industries generate an annual payroll of $37 billion and gross over $236 billion in annual revenue (U.S. Recycling Economic Information Study)
Per ton of materials, recycling saves more than seven times the carbon emissions compared to landfilling, and almost 18 times reduction from incineration.
If materials currently burned in incinerators were recycled, they would save 3 to 5 times more energy than incinerators would generate, because recycling saves on the cost of new material extraction and production.


 

It’s not plastic in general that poses a threat – it’s single-use plastic objects that serve minimal utility before ending up, usually, in landfills and incinerators. Landfills spell an eternal loss of utility from a finite resource, and incinerators are notorious for polluting urban and natural environments.
That’s where we come in – right now, we’re diverting plastic directly from institutions that aren’t able to recycle it, providing an alternative route that doesn’t end up in another single-use product which probably won’t be recycled again. We make things that are designed to last and result in a better end-of-life story.
 
Our Values 

It's good to be weird. We aim to make great products, but also treat people well, consider our surroundings, and make a positive impact around us.
Why just make things when we can make things better?
Resinate Remanufacturing
The People
 
Garret is a hardworking hustler who also happens to care deeply about building things for the state of Arizona and the future of our economy, its people, and the planet.

Brandon has built model rockets, car engines, and various electronic and mechanical machines since he was a child. He worked for several years as a residential and commercial electrician and has brought all of these skills to the table to make Resinate's efforts possible.

If you know Luke, you know he believes reducing our plastic consumption, increasing recycling, cleaning up our communities, and providing zero-waste lifestyle alternatives. He's currently wrapping up a biological engineering degree at Arizona State University.

We're combining these interests to reduce plastic pollution and revive Arizona's manufacturing sector in a way that truly works better for everyone. Our team of volunteers and affiliate organizations do a lot to keep our environment litter-free, and that's one of the things that keeps us going when things look bleak.

Our business advisor, Lynn Whitman, has over 30 years of professional experience in a variety of positions, including Vice President of a major retail corporation and COO of a promotional marketing consortium. She also served in advisory capacities on boards and committees to all of the major credit bureaus and chaired a division of the National Retail Federation.

Our mentor and financial backer, Ken Snider, is a successful former founder and CEO of a financial services company and has invested in multiple startup companies during his retirement. His $4,000 loan has allowed us to buy the supplies to build our first machines and custom molding equipment.
We're working with an accomplished fabricator, an experienced electrician, and an entire community of volunteer engineers and makers. Our team is supported by consultation from experienced industry professionals, including founders of waste hauling companies, CEOs of manufacturing companies, and experienced manufacturing engineers. The community is already coming together to bring this project to life.

Together we can hack a solution to the world's plastic pollution problem and have fun doing it!
 
Thank you for your support,
Garret Schwartz, Brandon Schwartz, and Luke Ryberg
Co-founders, Resinate LLC
 

Other Ways You Can Help
Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

Please feel free to make some noise about this campaign on social media, in a club or organization, or anywhere people might listen and act upon it.
Don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools at the top of this page!

story:
#1 BV3D: Bryan Vines' review
 

 #2 Just Vlad's review

 

 #3 ModBot's review

 

#4  3D Printing Revolution

 

#5  3D Serial Testeur

 

 #6 GL0ZZ3N Tech Reviews

 

#7 MAT1UK 3D PRINTING 

 

3D printing has started a new trend in the technology world, as more and more people enjoy the fun and convenience 3D printing brings to work and leisure time. But most 3D printing filament easily absorbs moisture from the air. And when the moisture content in the filament increases, the print quality decreases, and can even cause prints to fail!

 

In the past three years, SUNLU team has conducted in-depth research efforts to solve this problem. We finally came up with a powerful solution: Fila Dryer S1.

 SUNLU Team conducted a print quality comparison, printing the same 3D model with the same filament and printer. The model printed before drying showed poor print quality and rough surface, while the same model printed after drying the filament showed much improved print quality and a smooth surface.

Well-designed 

In order to produce a truly outstanding product, every detail of its design must be carefully considered, and our team has created a device that is both beautiful and practical. The stylish design and the integration of drying and printing of Fila Dryer series make it to be an ideal partner for printing supplies in any workshop or studio.

High Performance

Fila Dryer S1 is perfect for consumers, artists, and designers. It is an integrated solution for drying 3D printing filament and keeping it dry while printing, which can improve print quality and increase the fun of 3D printers.

Work Partner

If you own your own 3D printing studio, the FilaDryer S1 will be your "personal assistant," preserving your investment in filament.

 Dustless, neat and remarkable

The appearance of the SUNLU FilaDryer S1 is beautiful from top to bottom. The transparent top lets you see your filament, and prevents dust accumulation.

Hold Two Rolls of 0.5kg Filaments

 Two Filament Outlets

Compatibility of SUNLU FilaDryer S1

The best temperature corresponding to filaments of different materials:

 We provide the standard outlets used in different regions of your choice, including UK, EU, AU, US, JP. We will match you with the standard plug of the corresponding region as per the delivery address you provide.

SUNLU is an innovative team with a passion to succeed. We hope to give loyal supporters and new fans the first opportunity to experience our latest technology and updates, and a faster time to production. 

 If you need to buy in bulk, please contact the following email address.

support@sunlu.com

story:
We all want to Help Save Our Seas, we just need Time. Seventh Sea created a way to Buy Time. Through sustainable, ethically made products that each give one Seventh Sea Savior one day to clean beaches and teach sustainability around the world.

We are building a Marketplace where each item you buy also Buys Time for a Sea Savior to clean on your behalf. We will be a trusted source, where everything meets the Seventh Sea Standard on sustainability & social responsibility, and also cleans beaches. 

1 Item Sold = 1 Sea Savior Cleaning Beaches For 1 Day = 111 LBS of Trash Removed  

A Tee For The Sea is made using the highest quality GOTS Certified Organic Cotton and Dyes. 100% Certified Toxic Chemical and PVC Free. 

Hand made in Los Angeles by artisans paid a living wage, by our sustainable partners, UStrive Manufacturing. 

Our Fall 2021 Line: Hoodies, Sweatpants, & Beanies, just in time for the cooler season. All made to meet the Seventh Sea Standard. 

 

Our Summer 2022 Line: 100% Recycled Bathing SwimSuits. Sustainable, ethically made Board Shorts and Bikinis made from the plastic we’ve removed from the Sea. Along with Our Turkish Towel, made from 100% GOTS Certified Organic Cotton.

Our Seventh Sea Saviors are literally making a ton of difference on the island of Siargao in the Philippines, our flagship location. Here each Sea Savior removes an average 1 metric ton of trash each month. And as part of the Seventh Sea Standard, all of our Sea Saviors make a living wage, and receive full benefits so that they can take pride in what they do, take care of their families, and enjoy their work.

The Seventh Sea Standard is the Social and Environmental Standard to which we hold ourselves and our partners. We believe the future of business is one of environmental and social responsibility and as a people we cannot continue consuming or doing business in a way which has a negative effect on each other and Mother Nature. 

Social Responsibility:

For Social Responsibility Standards we adhere to the guidelines set by Social Accountability International (SA 8000).

The SA8000 Standard is the world’s leading social certification program. The SA8000 Standard and Certification System provide a framework for organizations of all types, in any industry, and in any country to conduct business in a way that is fair and decent for workers and to demonstrate their adherence to the highest social standards. 

Environmental Responsibility: 

Our Clothing Manufacturer, UStrive Manufacturing, is Certified by the Global Organic Textile Standard (GOTS).

GOTS is the worldwide leading textile processing standard for organic fibers, including ecological and social criteria, backed up by independent certification of the entire textile supply chain. GOTS certified final products may include fibre products, yarns, fabrics, clothes, home textiles, mattresses, personal hygiene products, as well as food contact textiles and more. 

               

Our Sustainable Partners: 

Ustrive Manufacturing. Located in Los Angeles, California.

Funds from our Campaign will go toward the following: 

20% - Buy Time for our Seas and our Sea Saviors cleaning beaches every day.

10% - Complete production of our 2021 Product Line. 

20% - Create more ways to Buy Time For Our Seas; New Product Acquisition.

20% - Open our next locations in Bali, Hawaii, The Dominican Republic, and Namibia.

30% - Take Our Message Worldwide, with Our Mass Marketing Campaign. 

Perks:

Each $5 contribution gives a Sea Savior 1 Hour to Clean Beaches.  1 Hr = 13 LBS of Trash Removed. 

Each $50 contribution gives a Sea Savior 1 Day to Clean Beaches. 1 Day = 111 LBS of Trash Removed. 

Each $250 contribution gets you a discount code for 1 free Tee For The Sea (up to 20), and gives a Sea Savior 1 week to Clean Beaches. 5 Days = 555 LBS of trash removed. 

$5 - Give a Seventh Sea Savior 1 Hour. 

          1 Hour = 13 LBS of Trash Removed

$10 - Give a Seventh Sea Savior 2 Hours

          2 Hours = 26 LBS of Trash Removed

$25 - Social Media Shoutout

          5 Hours =  66 LBS of Trash Removed

$50 - Give a Sea Savior 1 Day 

          1 Day = 111 LBS of Trash Removed 

          Social Media Shoutout

$100 - Social Media Shoutout for your Business

          2 Days = 222 LBS of Trash Removed 

          Social Media Shoutout For Your Business

$250 - 1 Free Tee For The Sea Discount Code ($55 Value)

          5 Days Given to Seventh Sea Savior = 555 LBS of Trash Removed

          Social Media Shoutout

$500 - FaceTime with A Sea Savior

          10 Days Given to Seventh Sea Savior = 1111 LBS of Trash Removed

          2 Free Tee For The Sea Discount Codes ($110 Value)

          Social Media Shoutout

$1000 - Website Shoutout For Your Business 

          20 Days Given to Seventh Sea Savior = 1 Metric Ton of Trash Removed

          4 Free Tee For The Sea Discount Codes ($220 Value)

          Social Media Shoutout

$2500 - FaceTime With the Founder (30 minute Zoom Call)

          50 Days Given to Seventh Sea Savior = 2.5 Tons of Trash Removed

          8 Free Tee For The Sea Discount Codes ($440 Value)

          Social Media Shoutout

          Website Shoutout For Your Business 

$5000 - Lunch With the Founder (Must be within the continental US)

          100 Days Given to Seventh Sea Savior = 5 Metric Tons of Trash Removed

          10 Free Tee For The Sea Discount Codes ($550 Value)

          Social Media Shoutout

          Website Shoutout For Your Business 

$10,000 - Surf in California with the Founder (Must be within the continental US)

          200 Days Given to Seventh Sea Savior = 11 Tons of Trash Removed

          15 Free Tee For The Sea Discount Codes ($825 Value)

          Social Media Shoutout

          Website Shoutout For Your Business 

$15,000 - Visit Our Siargao Operations. Includes Business Class Airfare, Hotel Stay, and an Introduction to our Siargao Team 

          300 Days Given to Seventh Sea Savior = 15 Tons of Trash Removed

          20 Free Tee For The Sea Discount Codes ($1,100 Value)

          Social Media Shoutout

          Website Shoutout For Your Business 

Help The People, Save The Sea:

Please contribute to our Campaign, tell your Friends and Family, and we’ll continue to deploy our Sea Saviors, Ocean to Ocean, Sea to Sea, until we reach the Seventh Sea.

story:
We've launched many national and international campaign to give the same opportunities to all supporters in all countries all over the World.

Collaborations, jobs, communities, macro and micro affiliations, earnings of all entities and more.Benefits and progress through our products from the beginning, this is the way for an efficient expansion of our products. 

Campaign in three points:

M.E.S. 

the system, the technology, the expansion, benefits and perspectives of this incredible product.

CROWDIMPROVING

join us, collaborations, opportunities, earnings  and rewards for life.

 1  4  3

the company, prospects, challenges, innovations and future products.

For over a century, electricity has been supplied by static distribution systems. 

Over the years, mobile technologies come into the everyday life. With them, the growing energy need,too.

 Personal devices, work devices,domestic appliances, means of transport. Everything has turned to mobile.

 Now,it's time to evolve and give energy to every woman and man from all over.

Wherever they are.

 Wherever they move.

   Whenever they wish.  

Ladies and gentleman:  

THE FIRST MASS MOBILE ENERGY SYSTEM IN HISTORY: M.E.S.  

Born to feed the energy needs of new generation devices, M.E.S. follows a very simple principle: the CELL, high energy density capsules with high mechanical strength, is distributed in every corner of the planet from COLUMNs. 

From Shanghai to Paris,from Rome to Sydney,from Tokyo to LA.  

Users around the globe can pick up one or more CELLs, use them to charge and power everything, replace them with charged ones and throw them back in any other COLUMN.

 M.E.S. covers its users 24 hours a day, 365 days a year, wherever they are. Not money or care. Nothing is required, only freedom.  

 

 

It took years of research to combine art and the best technology to give it life. The CELL:an elementary unit of the universal whole. Premium materials and its cutting edge technology make the CELL a timeless jewel.

Through it, electricity i trasported and delivered. The best lithium batteries in the world are used for this propuse. Thanks to the partnership of giants in this sector, the accumulators are constantly updated and replaced with the best of latest technologies.

The CELL adapts to every existing device. Its modular structure makes it versatile for any use: from charging an iPod in Johannesburg to power a stove at the Artic Circle. The external structure and the internal security system guarantee a very long life, making this product indestructible. It is resistant to water, fire, ice, scratches, high mechanical stress and much more.

Everything to guarantee perfect use in every possible condition all over the world. 

 

 

  

The COLUMNs guard, clean, regenerate, charge and distribute CELLs. Their conformation allows optimum operation even in the most hostile environments. Within the COLUMNs it is reproduced a perfect microclimate for CELL charge and storage .

There are no buttons or screens, all the operations of withdrawal, exchange and deposit are started using a keyless system. This configuration allows maximum hygiene, as well as minimal maintenance. The COLUMNs are ignifugh and have an advanced anti-vandal safety system. Each of them contains in the control unit, a software for optimizing the distribution of CELLs. This to ensure everywhere a uniform distribution of the service.

You can find them in offices, shops, streets, hospitals, parks and stations. Airports, theaters, schools , universities, busses and gyms. In desert areas, urban areas, beaches, mountains. Where there are no electric distribution lines. Wherever.

They are designed to be visible, efficient and easily installed anywhere. Diffusion, efficiency and versatility are the secret of this this meticulously designed product. 

   

The CARDs are the first generation of adapters. The ultra-thin design confuses these powerful adapters with common credit cards, with practically the same dimensions.

Their shape is designed to be less invasive as possible and above all very comfortable to carry with you. The CARDs are equipped with a RFID microchip that identifies the user to the COLUMN. It's not necessary to take them with you all the time, as they are easily dispensed by the columns. These first three models can be adapted to a multitude of applications, thanks to the wide range of power delivered, expanding the service coverage to all mobile devices of everyday use. 

 

Crowdimproving is a rewarding technique based on the loyalty of supporters and their affiliation. It consists in facilitating campaign supporters, within the system, to give them opportunities and means to improve their lifes through our product. As far as possible, based on their contribution to diffuse the product, they will be able to aspire to collaborations and increasingly prestigious uses within the M.E.S. project.

It is not about guaranteeing earnings, company shares or other financial rewards. It is about giving the right to use, advertise, diffuse the product in an exclusive way to all our supporters.

Undoubtedly, who will benefit from these facilities, can make money at the end of the campaign and over the years, but this is not the point .
Giving the right opportunities to the right people, that's the point.

For this reason we provide to all contributors campaign CODEs, an exclusive for our supporters on crowdfunding platforms.
NO OTHER USER AT THE END OF THE CROWDFUNDING CAMPAIGN WILL HAVE ACCESS TO THESE CODES. NO ONE. ONLY OUR SUPPORTERS.
 

CODEs provided are:

- "EARNINGS ON EACH SUBSCRIPTION, FOR LIFECODE" - CODE 1: 

when users won't actually need the subscription,this code allows them to put it on sale on our platform, which will be bought at the standard price by new users, outside this type of facilitation. Once the transition is over, supporters who has sold their subscription will receive the entire sum paid by the new user, and they could make money from it. All without the slightest effort. The operation can also be repeated whenever they want, as this exclusive persists for life;

- "REMUNERATION FOR EACH NEW USER INVITED, FOR LIFECODE" - CODE 2:

this code allows users to receive rewards for each new user invited. Each compensation will persist for all the duration of the guests subscription, and this right persists for life;

- "PRIORITY ON THE VISION OF CURRICULUM AND RECRUITINGCODE" - CODE 3:

this code give the highest priority on the vision of curriculum and recruitment all over the world, for national and international tasks and collaborations;

- "FACILITATION FOR AFFILIATIONSCODE" - CODE 4:

this code provides benefits on concessions for the management of our plants in public and private areas;

- "HIGHER REWARDS FOR MEDIATIONSCODE" - CODE 5:

this code allows supporters who contribute to the expansion of the system (providing useful contacts, indicating useful places and facilitating external collaborations) to receive rewards on each contract stipulated.

ALL THESE OPERATIONS MAY BE MADE ONLY AFTER THE END OF THE CAMPAIGN CROWDFUNDING AND THE OFFICIAL LAUNCH OF THE PRODUCT. Crowdimproving is not only essential for the rapid diffusion of the product, but it allows us to get in direct contact with all those who share our same vision. Thus obtaining thousands of collaborators all over the world and an immense community. Artists, menager, missionaries. People of every nation, profession and interest, all part of a large family. In fact, campaigns have been launched for humanitarian aid initiatives (to make free MES for over 1 billion and 200 million people who do not have access to electricity) and artistic (for the recruitment of designers, painters, singers, actors, creatives of all kinds for future collaborations and initiatives related to our products: from the design of a product,to promotion ideas, to the songs).

Progressing together by giving people who believe in us the right recognition.

For more, visit our website: www.143pq.com

or contact us:

Product and Service informations: info@143pq.com

Buying support: purchasing@143pq.com

Human Resurces questions: joinus@143pq.com

From the beginning we reward the supporters who have helped us to diffuse our appeal and to enlarge our community during the crowdfunding campaign.

EVERYONE'S HELP WILL BE REQUITED RECEIVING:

an upgrade from BASIC to LIFETIME after the first 10 new supporters invited during the campaign. After the 11th supporter invited they'll receive the 9,9% of their subscription (2$ every new BASIC subscription, 24$ every new LIFETIME subscription) thanks to the "Remuneration for each new user invited, for lifeCODE", when the campaign is over.

REMEMBER: At the end of the campaign, the supporters you have invited must specify your contribution to let them know the service inserting a code we'll provide in a questionnaire in our supporters reserved app, . Through this we will know the exact extent of your contribution.

1 4 3 is an italian company operating in the energy, automotive and consumer electronics sectors, founded by Pasquale Quattromini in 2017.

Its one and only aim is to propose revolutionary products adopting revolutionary methods: From marketing strategies to the stylistic choices of products.

Our goal for M.E.S. it's to bring it to every corner of the Planet as quickly as possible, leading an expansion never seen before.

M.E.S. will be followed by a series of incredible challenges , such as: Renewable energy and free M.E.S. in developing areas, Cryptocurrency in the energy and services sectors (the "pq" currency) , innovations in the Electric car industry and mass transportation and much much more .

No social networking or commercials on TV .

Only great deeds in Reality and the world'll speak for us.

Make the history or not do it at all. 

AVAILABLE IN

America:

United States, Brazil, Mexico, Colombia, Argentina, Canada, Peru, Venezuela, Chile, Ecuador, Guatemala, Cuba, Bolivia  ,Haiti, Dominican Republic, Honduras, Paraguay, Nicaragua El Salvador, Costa Rica ,Panama, Puerto Rico, Uruguay, Jamaica, Trinidad and Tobago, Guyana, Suriname, Guadeloupe, Martinique, Bahamas, Belize, Barbados, French Guiana, Saint Lucia, Curaçao, Aruba, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines,United States Virgin Islands ,Grenada, Antigua and Barbuda, Dominica, Bermuda, Cayman Islands, Greenland, Saint Kitts and Nevis, Sint Maarten, Turks and Caicos Islands, Saint Martin, British Virgin Islands, Caribbean Netherlands, Anguilla, Saint Barthélemy,Saint Pierre and Miquelon and Montserrat.

Europe:

Russia, Turkey,  Germany,   France, U Kingdom, Italy, Spain,  Ukraine, Poland,  Romania,   Netherlands, Belgium, Greece, Czech Re, Portugal, Sweden,  Hungary, Azerbaijan, Belarus, Serbia,  Austria, Switzerland,Bulgaria, Denmark, Finland, Slovakia,  Norway,  Ireland, Croatia,  Bosnia Herze, Georgia, Moldova ,Armenia,  Lithuania,   Albania , Macedonia, Slovenia,  Latvia, Estonia, Cyprus, Montenegro, Luxembourg, Malta, Iceland , Andorra,  Liechtenstein, Monaco and San Marino.

Asia:

China,  India, Indonesia, Pakistan,  Bangladesh, Russia, Japan, Philippines, Vietnam,  Iran, 
Turkey, Thailand,  Myanmar,  South, Korea, Iraq, Saudi, Arabia, Uzbekistan, Malaysia, Nepal,   Afghanistan, Yemen, Taiwan, Sri Lanka , Syria, Kazakhstan, Cambodia, Azerbaijan, U.A.Emirates, Tajikistan, Israel, Hong Kong, Jordan,Laos, Kyrgyzstan, Singapore,  Turkmenistan ,Palestine,  Lebanon, Oman, Kuwait, Georgia, Mongolia, Armenia, Qatar, Bahrain, Timor-Leste, Bhutan,  Macau, Brunei and Maldives.

Africa:

Nigeria, Ethiopia , Egypt, Congo, South Africa, Tanzania, Kenya, Sudan, Algeria, Uganda, Morocco, Mozambique, Ghana, Angola, Ivory Coast, Madagascar, Cameroon, Niger, Burkina Faso, Mali, Malawi, Zambia, Somalia, Senegal, Chad, Zimbabwe, South Sudan, Rwanda ,Tunisia, Guinea, Benin, Burundi,Togo, Eritrea, Sierra Leone, Libya, Central African Republic, Republic of the Congo, Liberia, Mauritania, Namibia, Botswana, Gambia, Equatorial Guinea,  Lesotho, Gabon, Guinea-Bissau, Mauritius, Swaziland, Djibouti, Réunion , Comoros, Cape Verde, Western Sahara, Mayotte, São Tomé and Príncipe, Seychelles and Saint Helena.

Oceania:

Australia, Papua New Guinea, New Zealand, Fiji, Solomon Islands, Vanuatu, New Caledonia, French Polynesia, Samoa, Guam, Kiribati, Tonga, Micronesia, Marshall Islands, Northern Mariana Islands, American Samoa, Palau, Cook Islands, Wallis and Futuna, Tuvalu, Nauru, Norfolk Island, Niue and Tokelau.

 

FAQ

1) WHAT IS M.E.S. AND WHAT IS IT FOR?

M.E.S., the Mobile Energy System, it’s most efficient way to diffuse energy for mobile devices.Phones, computers, means of transport, appliances, devices of all kinds.All everyday technologies are turning to mobile, but each of them has a common limit: Energy.

Waiting stuck for four hours to recharge a laptop, remember to bring along smartphone adapters , chargers, or maybe remember to recharge and carry devices wich power other devices. Thousands of artifices to solve the problem and no solution found.What’s the point of a mobile device without the freedom to use it as such?

Here is M.E.S.,Energy made mobile and ubiquitous.

Energy everywhere, in any quantity, at any time, for everyone, moving with you and for you, without you doing anything.All the energy you need ready to be taken, brought with you, used and left anywhere you want when you want. Wherever you were, you are and you will be.That’s M.E.S.,the first mobile energy distribution system in History.

2) WHY SUBSCRIBE NOW TO M.E.S.?

Subscribing now to the service will guarantee to all our supporters to receive a multitude of benefits for life.

With benefits we don’t intend only a more advantageous price but real opportunities: from affiliations to remunerating simple advices, from let you automatically resell your subscription on our platform to work with us indefinitely. And then priorities on installations, news, events,contest partecipations, tributes and much much more.

All this thank to CODEs we provide during the crowdfunding campaign.

3) WHAT ARE CODES?

The codes are an exclusive 1 4 3 provided only to our supporters.the lucky ones who will receive these codes will be part of a priority band for the M.E.S.project. to them it will be forever reserved numerous homage and benefits within the project M.E.S. and for what cencerns future products.

4) WHAT IS “EARNINGS ON EACH SUBSCRIPTION, FOR LIFECODE”?

This code allaws users to put on sale on our platform the subscriptions.They will be bought automatically at the standard price by a new user, outside this type of facilitation. Once the transition is over, the supporter who has sold his subscription will receive the entire sum paid by the new user, and will make money from it. All without the slightest effort. The operation can also be repeated whenever they want, as this exclusive persists for life;

5) WHAT IS “REMUNERATION FOR EACH NEW USER INVITED, FOR LIFECODE”?

This code allaws users to receive compensation for each new user invited, a percentage of new user subscription fee. Each compensation will be automatically credited to them and will persist for all the duration of the new user’s subscription.

6) WHAT IS “PRIORITY IN THE CURRICULUM VISION AND RECRUITINGCODE”?

This code gives users the highest priority on the consideration of the curriculum sent to us during the request periods.As expanding project, we will collect every type of curriculum for each type of job, offering to everyone who’s believing in us the opportunity of recruitment from all over the world. For national and international tasks and collaborations;

7) WHAT IS “FACILITATION FOR AFFILIATIONCODE”?

This code gives users the priority on the management of the service on equal terms, higher percentages for affiliation concessions and facilitations for the opening of the same.

8) WHAT IS “HIGHER REWARDS FOR MEDIATIONSCODE”?

This code rewards anyone who puts us in touch, guarantees or acts as an intermediary for the opening of a new affiliation. They will be entitled to a percentage of affiliation the business volume that they have helped to create.

9) WHEN WILL THE PRODUCT BE AVAILABLE IN MY COUNTRY?

Our goal is bring M.E.S. in 5 continents in less than 16 month.

Starting from world capitals, expanding it across supporters nations and cities and reaching full coverage of every single Nation in the World.

The timing of diffusion will initially depend on the feedback and support in each nation, the more supporters per nation will believe in our mission, the greater will be its speed of expansion. Expansion that will begin at the end of our campaigns and after the official announcement of the product launch.

One thing’s for sure, we will arrive everywhere.

10) WHAY BUY SOMETHING I CAN HAVE ONLY IN THE FUTURE?

This is a good question. Not just for a great product at a better price, not just to work with us, nor for the advantages, the events, the gifts, the news. Much less for the money, I think.I could list thousands of reasons why all of this can agree, but the only reason I believe that anyone who chooses to support us is to make history with us.Maybe it will be just one of the many projects on a crowdfunding platform or maybe the beginning of something memorable, we’ll see. But trust us, we’ll have a great story to tell our grandchildren one day.

11) WHO GUARANTEES THAT THE PROMISES WILL BE KEPT?

It is in our interest to grow as fast as possible, create jobs, constantly pursue progress and improve everyday life through our products. Our own expansion is based on macro and micro affiliations.No trust, no supporters. No supporters, no branches. No branches, no inscriptions. No inscriptions, nothing at all.It is in our interest to make the most of our relationship with our supporters for mutual progress.We do not earn from our supporters, we earn with our supporters.

12) WHAT HAPPENS AT THE END OF THE CAMPAIGN?

Immediately after the end of the campaign and before the official launch of the product, all our supporters will receive exclusive and subscription codes via email. They will be updated via email and / or SMS on all news, contests, notices, national meetings, etc …In addition to the end of the campaign will be available our first app dedicated to them. A specific app for supporters through which they can take advantage of all their benefits.

13) HOW IMPORTANT IS MY CONTRIBUTION?

Every single supporter is essential and crucial. Each of you has the merit of developing the product in your country. You are the initiators, the protagonists, the direct responsible for this immense expansion.You are the ones who triggered the project development process all over the world. Not only M.E.S. but also renewable energy in developing areas, free services for those without access to energy. Of all the innovations, jobs, families that will benefit from our products. From your products. The progress you have helped bring to the world. Nothing would be possible without you. We hope we can do for you what you have done for us, for the world and for yourselves.

FOR THIS, THANK YOU.

 

 

CAUTION: We do not promise profits or provide financial opportunities. We sell the product to the supporters and the chance to use it in an exclusive way, through these codes and after the product is on the market. We give the possibility, at the end of the campaign and after the official launch, to our supporters to belong to this priority band and to have the possibility to work with us for a faster diffusion of the product.The codes intended for our supporters represent an exclusive of the product MES. They give POSSIBILITY to our supporters to be part of a priority bracket at the end of the campaign.Guaranteeing these rights, they give users the possibility to help us concretely in expanding the product,putting us in touch with all those who believe in our project, all over the world. Through these codes will allow all those who have supported us, to continue actively to spread the product, becoming an integral part of the project. WE DO NOT OFFER INVESTMENT RETURNS OR MONETARY REWARD OF ANY KIND, but to usethe product M.E.S.the product in the exclusive version for supporters. We offer to anyone who believes in this vision to work with us on this ambitious project. This is fundamental for the diffusion of the product, through crowdfunding platforms. We look for collaborators, professionals or simply people who want to lend a hand directly among our supporters. All earnings, assumptions,collaborations, mediations or other, are unrelated to the crowdfunding platform and they will start only after the end of the fundraising campaign.The CODEs we offer do not represent in any way: Contests, coupons, gambling, raffles; financial, money-processing, or credit services; financial intermediaries or cash-equivalent instruments; business marketing services;shares of the business, loans to the company or other forms of financing. THIS IS NOT AN EQUITY CROWDFUNDING CAMPAIGN.

and Tokelau. FAQ1) WHAT IS M.E.S. AND WHAT IS IT FOR?M.E.S., the Mobile Energy System, it’s most efficient way to diffuse energy for mobile devices.Phones, computers, means of transport, appliances, devices of all kinds.All everyday technologies are turning to mobile, but each of them has a common limit: Energy.Waiting stuck for four hours to recharge a laptop, remember to bring along smartphone adapters , chargers, or maybe remember to recharge and carry devices wich power other devices. Thousands of artifices to solve the problem and no solution found.What’s the point of a mobile device without the freedom to use it as such?Here is M.E.S.,Energy made mobile and ubiquitous.Energy everywhere, in any quantity, at any time, for everyone, moving with you and for you, without you doing anything.All the energy you need ready to be taken, brought with you, used and left anywhere you want when you want. Wherever you were, you are and you will be.That’s M.E.S.,the first mobile energy distribution system in History.2) WHY SUBSCRIBE NOW TO M.E.S.?Subscribing now to the service will guarantee to all our supporters to receive a multitude of benefits for life.With benefits we don’t intend only a more advantageous price but real opportunities: from affiliations to remunerating simple advices, from let you automatically resell your subscription on our platform to work with us indefinitely. And then priorities on installations, news, events,contest partecipations, tributes and much much more.All this thank to CODEs we provide during the crowdfunding campaign.3) WHAT ARE CODES?The codes are an exclusive 1 4 3 provided only to our supporters.the lucky ones who will receive these codes will be part of a priority band for the M.E.S.project. to them it will be forever reserved numerous homage and benefits within the project M.E.S. and for what cencerns future products.4) WHAT IS “EARNINGS ON EACH SUBSCRIPTION, FOR LIFECODE”?This code allaws users to put on sale on our platform the subscriptions.They will be bought automatically at the standard price by a new user, outside this type of facilitation. Once the transition is over, the supporter who has sold his subscription will receive the entire sum paid by the new user, and will make money from it. All without the slightest effort. The operation can also be repeated whenever they want, as this exclusive persists for life;5) WHAT IS “REMUNERATION FOR EACH NEW USER INVITED, FOR LIFECODE”?This code allaws users to receive compensation for each new user invited, a percentage of new user subscription fee. Each compensation will be automatically credited to them and will persist for all the duration of the new user’s subscription.6) WHAT IS “PRIORITY IN THE CURRICULUM VISION AND RECRUITINGCODE”?This code gives users the highest priority on the consideration of the curriculum sent to us during the request periods.As expanding project, we will collect every type of curriculum for each type of job, offering to everyone who’s believing in us the opportunity of recruitment from all over the world. For national and international tasks and collaborations;7) WHAT IS “FACILITATION FOR AFFILIATIONCODE”?This code gives users the priority on the management of the service on equal terms, higher percentages for affiliation concessions and facilitations for the opening of the same.8) WHAT IS “HIGHER REWARDS FOR MEDIATIONSCODE”?This code rewards anyone who puts us in touch, guarantees or acts as an intermediary for the opening of a new affiliation. They will be entitled to a percentage of affiliation the business volume that they have helped to create.9) WHEN WILL THE PRODUCT BE AVAILABLE IN MY COUNTRY?Our goal is bring M.E.S. in 5 continents in less than 16 month.Starting from world capitals, expanding it across supporters nations and cities and reaching full coverage of every single Nation in the World.The timing of diffusion will initially depend on the feedback and support in each nation, the more supporters per nation will believe in our mission, the greater will be its speed of expansion. Expansion that will begin at the end of our campaigns and after the official announcement of the product launch.One thing’s for sure, we will arrive everywhere.10) WHAY BUY SOMETHING I CAN HAVE ONLY IN THE FUTURE?This is a good question. Not just for a great product at a better price, not just to work with us, nor for the advantages, the events, the gifts, the news. Much less for the money, I think.I could list thousands of reasons why all of this can agree, but the only reason I believe that anyone who chooses to support us is to make history with us.Maybe it will be just one of the many projects on a crowdfunding platform or maybe the beginning of something memorable, we’ll see. But trust us, we’ll have a great story to tell our grandchildren one day.11) WHO GUARANTEES THAT THE PROMISES WILL BE KEPT?It is in our interest to grow as fast as possible, create jobs, constantly pursue progress and improve everyday life through our products. Our own expansion is based on macro and micro affiliations.No trust, no supporters. No supporters, no branches. No branches, no inscriptions. No inscriptions, nothing at all.It is in our interest to make the most of our relationship with our supporters for mutual progress.We do not earn from our supporters, we earn with our supporters.12) WHAT HAPPENS AT THE END OF THE CAMPAIGN?Immediately after the end of the campaign and before the official launch of the product, all our supporters will receive exclusive and subscription codes via email. They will be updated via email and / or SMS on all news, contests, notices, national meetings, etc …In addition to the end of the campaign will be available our first app dedicated to them. A specific app for supporters through which they can take advantage of all their benefits.13) HOW IMPORTANT IS MY CONTRIBUTION?Every single supporter is essential and crucial. Each of you has the merit of developing the product in your country. You are the initiators, the protagonists, the direct responsible for this immense expansion.You are the ones who triggered the project development process all over the world. Not only M.E.S. but also renewable energy in developing areas, free services for those without access to energy. Of all the innovations, jobs, families that will benefit from our products. From your products. The progress you have helped bring to the world. Nothing would be possible without you. We hope we can do for you what you have done for us, for the world and for yourselves.FOR THIS, THANK YOU.  CAUTION: We do not promise profits or provide financial opportunities. We sell the product to the supporters and the chance to use it in an exclusive way, through these codes and after the product is on the market. We give the possibility, at the end of the campaign and after the official launch, to our supporters to belong to this priority band and to have the possibility to work with us for a faster diffusion of the product.The codes intended for our supporters represent an exclusive of the product MES. They give POSSIBILITY to our supporters to be part of a priority bracket at the end of the campaign.Guaranteeing these rights, they give users the possibility to help us concretely in expanding the product,putting us in touch with all those who believe in our project, all over the world. Through these codes will allow all those who have supported us, to continue actively to spread the product, becoming an integral part of the project. WE DO NOT OFFER INVESTMENT RETURNS OR MONETARY REWARD OF ANY KIND, but to usethe product M.E.S.the product in the exclusive version for supporters. We offer to anyone who believes in this vision to work with us on this ambitious project. This is fundamental for the diffusion of the product, through crowdfunding platforms. We look for collaborators, professionals or simply people who want to lend a hand directly among our supporters. All earnings, assumptions,collaborations, mediations or other, are unrelated to the crowdfunding platform and they will start only after the end of the fundraising campaign.The CODEs we offer do not represent in any way: Contests, coupons, gambling, raffles; financial, money-processing, or credit services; financial intermediaries or cash-equivalent instruments; business marketing services;shares of the business, loans to the company or other forms of financing. THIS IS NOT AN EQUITY CROWDFUNDING CAMPAIGN.

story:
Pendy Cleaner is the newest, state-of-the-art device to help to make cleaning easier. Pendy is a small device designed to clean just about anything you want with ultrasounds. Simply place the device in the water with the objects to be cleaned and leave it running for a few minutes to clean everything.  

Doing clean can many times be a burden, as wash-only clothes and garments need special care. And what happens when travelers are on a trip and no washing machine is available?

Behold Pendy, a game-changing portable washer to help clean your clothes, or just about anything you want, protects delicates from damage, saves 60 times energy, and gets laundry done easier with less hassles. 

A hands-free device, when submerged in water, emits ultrasonic waves. With a 70W generator, 60,000 ultrasonic vibrations per second will clean just about anything!

And, you never have to lift another finger to physically  ‘clean.’ Just turn the device on, and let it do all the work in a basin of water-no scrubbing, scouring, or buffing. 

Use it to clean laundry, fruits, vegetables, accessories, or anything else in your house.

Advanced ultrasonic technology with hydro-electric motors cleans dirt, debris and chemicals at the microscopic level. Remove tough stains from clothes and effectively sanitize fruits/vegetables from chemicals and pesticides.

 

 

Compared with traditional washing machines, this ultrasonic washing device disinfects better while also being eco-friendly. 

Pendy is our fifth generation and the latest one. You don't need to set your the time, Just choose the type of object that you want to clean, you can clean it immediately. 60 times less water and energy consumption 4-15 minutes to accomplish.

15 minutes to accomplish your laundry. Easy and energy efficient. You don't have to pay for any dry cleaning services, or line up in a hotel for a self-service coin machine or even overload your luggage with extensive garments. 

Note:  The maximum power is 70W. Press and hold the first mode, then press the last mode cycle to adjust the power according to the water wave vibration frequency. 

Unpack suitcase, do laundry and return suitcase to closet for the next time trip: those post-trip tips no longer apply. Pendy helps you stay tidy and comfortable during traveling. No hassles returning with loads of dreaded clothes. 

You can set one of the 4 different modes ,just press the touch button to choose what you wish to clean.

Take it with you anywhere.Perfect for travel when you need to wash dirty clothes in a hotel room.  Also ideal for the kitchen to remove pesticides and chemicals from  fruits and vegetables. Pendy generates modulated ultrasonic waves that travel through the water to clean at the microscopic level.

Four steps to get it work, really that simple... 

We will ship different plug depending on the country of the buyer. 

The factory is already in trial production, ensuring that it can be shipped.

story:
Short Summary

We are the Pirool Energy team, a couple of guys who are passionate about using technology to benefit lives in tangible ways. We started this project for our Master's thesis project at TU Delft in the Netherlands, focusing on producing biofuel from pine needles in the Himalayan mountains of northern India, where jobs are scarce, women have few opportunities, and families struggle to stay together. We want to provide income opportunities for locals, especially women, and allow people to stay and build community in the mountains. Join us in impacting lives there!

What We Need

We are asking for a total of $17,500 (US), and this will spur us on toward commercialization of our charcoal production enterprise. We have been investing in this project since 2014, and now the biggest hurdle is refining our production process and technology to make the business viable, and to demonstrate our product to the market.

The first portion of the money raised ($9,500) will go to cover expenses from the Pilot Project we carried out in May of last year, which gave such promising results, but left a lot unfinished. Specifically, the money will go to payback our partner Students4Sustainability who supported us in the project.

The second portion of the money ($8,000) will fuel our research and development, namely in refining our production process and demonstrating our product to potential customers. We have explored the market substantially already, but now we need to go an show our product and win customers over.

The Impact

Imagine with us a life where you have minimal options for income in the place you call home. You have grown up here, your roots are here, your family is here, but it is becoming more and more difficult to pay for basic needs because there simply isn't work to find.

As the sole bread winner of your family, you are faced with two options: move to the city in search for work, or try to make do in the mountains. The cities are unknown, distant, disconnected from your community, overcrowded, and unsanitary, but might over a meager job. The mountains have  few schools, poor roads and amenities, and dwindling job prospects, but they are home. So what do you do?

Millions of rural Indians take the leap of faith, and migrate to cities to support their families back at home in underpaying jobs. Those who stay struggle for income and employment opportunities in their hometowns, or families splitting up to survive.  We want to provide economic opportunities in mountain villages, while conserving the environment and preserving the natural beauty.

Challenges

As said above, there are hurdles to get past. We need to refine our product and production process to make the business viable. There is promise, but it will take work and your support to get to the point of sustainable charcoal production. Also, we need to work to convince customers that we have a good product. As with anything, proving a new product isn't easy, and we need to go to the customers with our refined product to show them it's value.

Thankfully, we are in a good spot to handle these obstacles. We are collaborating with pioneers in the field of biofuels, and we are being coached by entrepreneurs who know the region deeply. We already are leveraging our contacts to showcase to some of the most prestigious hotels in India. But we need your help.

How You Can Be a Part & What you Get

Join us! Any contribution you can make will push this venture forward. Check out the perks we have put together, to say thanks for being willing to partner with us. We are even featuring some of the finest products from the Kumaon region from some of our awesome partners there. Have a look!

And if you can't give, we get it. But we still need you to get the word out - pass this on to your friends, family, coworkers, and random strangers! We appreciate your willingness. Thank you so much for your help!!

A Note on Perks

We are very excited to bring these perks to you. Our partners source some of the finest materials from Kumaon, the exact region we are also working, and we know you will enjoy them as well. However, due to logistics, the final products are coming from various locations, and thus in order to keep shipping costs reasonable, we are not offering all perks in all countries. However, if there is a particular perk you may want or would like to suggest we offer, let us know, and we will do what we can. Lastly, please give 2-4 weeks (10-20 business days) after the campaign has ended for fulfillment of the perks. Thanks for your support!!
