story:
Thank you to all who has backed RIVER in our pre-order campaign.

 

Purchase RIVER Now!

Backers Update: RIVER is Shipping to the U.S. & Canada

Our very first production batch is ready. We can't wait to get RIVER in your hands!  International orders are on track to begin shipping by the end of September. 

Click Here to View Latest Updates > 

 

 

The Reviews Are In:

          

     

 

What Makes RIVER Different? 

RIVER is a new generation of smart, clean, mobile power.

Recharge with Car Jack, Solar Power, or Wall Socket. Mega Capacity, Lightweight, and Portable. Holds Charge 1 Year.

 

Take a Road Trip with RIVER:

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Simultaneously Charge Up To 11 Devices

500W Total AC/DC Output. Most Comprehensive Array of Output Ports. Ever. 

 

 

Incredible Technology. Affordable Price.

Our mighty small device packs a big punch. Its striking, sleek design supplies tons of power wherever you go.
 

Official Unboxing Video: 

Skip ahead to 2:06 to watch River charge multiple devices at once!

With Every RIVER Pre-Order You Get:

Accessories:

 

Pre-Order Breakdown:

  • River Mobile Power Station (Black or White) 
    + US, Canada versions ship with 110V AC Outlets
    + UK, Australia, EU versions ship with 220-230V 50Hz AC Output & Universal Plug
  • Element-Proof Protective Case (Water Resistant)
  • 50W Solar Charger (Turns RIVER into Solar Generator)

 

FREE Hand-Delivery to Backers in SF, LA, & NYC

Be the First to Experience RIVER and Get FREE Hand-Delivery with Setup from Enjoy!

  1. Pre-order RIVER today
  2. Backers with shipping addresses in San Francisco, Los Angeles, & New York City will receive an email from EcoFlow
  3. Schedule your free hand-delivery from Enjoy
  4. An Enjoy Expert will hand-deliver your RIVER, help you get set up, and show you some tips and tricks

 

 

Outperforms Every Other Portable Power Station

 

 

Advanced Technical Specifications

 

 

 

General

 

Inputs

 

Outputs

 

Internal

 

In Production & On-Track to Deliver

MONEY-BACK GUARANTEE
Arrives in the month indicated on the perk you claim on Indiegogo. 

Sizzle Reel: RIVER in the Factory

Who knew battery production could be so sexy? Skip to 0:30 to see RIVER.

 
 

 

Our Vision

We are dedicated to social responsibility, harnessing our powerful new technology to foster inclusion and to raise standards of living in areas of the world where power shortages stunt growth and development. 

Whether you are at a campsite outside Denver or in a  village outside of Delhi, EcoFlow is bringing you the mobile power station you need to power a free life. 

May the power be with you!

 

Shipping

 

Where We Ship

We're able to ship worldwide to the United States, Canada, European Union, Australia, the United Kingdom, Japan, South Korea, Singapore, and Hong Kong. VAT and GST is included. If you live ioutside of the US & Canada, your RIVER will ship in September with Universal Plugs instead of the US-Standard plugs.

When We Start Shipping

The first units will leave our warehouses starting June 2017. We can't use air freight, so allow up to 30 days for shipping. US & Canada backers can expect to receive your RIVER starting in July 2017. Other backers can expect the International version of RIVER to arrive starting in September 2017. 

Why Pre-Order Now

You'll be providing valuable feedback that will help shake up the decades-old generator industry. By pre-ordering today, you're helping make the world a better place and a little less reliant on messy gas generators. 

 

 

Frequently Asked Questions

General

What is RIVER? RIVER is a portable charging station, back-up generator, and emergency battery. It can be used both indoors and outdoors, and can be recharged via solar charger, car charger or wall charger. (The latter two are included in the purchase of RIVER)
Who created it? We're EcoFlow Tech, and RIVER is our first product. RIVER was designed entirely in-house by our team.
What are the 11 different ports? River is equipped with 4 USB ports (2 Quick-Charge 2.0), 2 USB Type-C, 2 DC 6mm outputs, 2 AC outputs, and 1 12V Car Port.
What colors do you offer? White & Black. 
Which option is best for me? We recommend selecting the "RIVER + Case + Solar Charger" Perk to get RIVER and the 50W Solar Charger, and the Protective Case. This will get you everything you need!
   

 

Technical

What is the uniqueness of the technology? The battery management system. It's a "smart" system, that allows RIVER to 1) automatically adjust the power output to the Wattage your device needs, 2) regulate temperature so devices don't shut down by starting a fan if too hot, and informing you if it's too cold, and 3) connect individually to each of the 11 output ports so if one were to short circuit or max-out the other 10 would continue charging.
How do I charge my RIVER? RIVER has one smart DC input port that can automatically adapt to any power source from 10V-22V without an extra adapter. This input is located on the back right-hand side of RIVER. RIVER can be charged via wall charger, car charger, or solar charger. It takes approximately 6 hours to recharge RIVER by AC wall charger, however in only 4 hours, RIVER will be 70% of the way there!
Can RIVER power my devices while it's charging? Yes, RIVER has state-of-the-art flow-through charging. It can output power while being charged.
How do I store RIVER? For optimal battery health, store RIVER at room temperature in a dry environment out of direct elements. RIVER will hold its charge for over a year.
What is the battery life? The battery has a shelf life of 1 year (about 3-4x anything else on the market) this means you can leave in your basement and charge it once a year and it will still keep positive charge.
How does it work? RIVER is incredibly easy to use. There is an on/off switch in the front, below the screen. To turn RIVER on, press the button for 2 seconds until it beeps. In the back, there is another button to turn on AC power. This is because AC power is quite inefficient, so we regulate its use separately. Hold the button down for 3 seconds in order to turn the AC power on.
How much does it weigh? 11 pounds (5 kilograms)
How many devices can it charge at once? 11 devices
What does auto-sensing mean? RIVER has an intelligent battery management system. When a device is plugged into RIVER, it will sense the device, automatically turn on, and output the exact wattage your device needs. If RIVER senses nothing is plugged in, it will first turn idle, then turn itself off.

 

Safety & Regulation

What is the recommended temperature range? 32-95° F / 0-32° C is optimal for storage. RIVER can operate at up to 140° F / 45° C
Is it waterproof? While RIVER isn't waterproof, the Protective Case is water resistant up to IP63 standards (rain, dust, sand, etc.). Do not submerge your RIVER under water.
What certifications do you have? RIVER has FCC, CE, UN38.3, and RoHS certifications. RIVER's chargers also have UL certifications.
How durable is it? RIVER is very durable and rugged. However, we don't suggest tossing it around, since it's a battery.

 

Shipping

When does shipping begin? The first units will be shipped by June. US & Canada Backers can expect to receive units in July & August. UK, EU, Australia, Japan, South Korea, Hong Kong, and Singapore will ship by September.
Where does it ship? We ship to US, Canada, UK, EU, Australia, Japan, Singapore, South Korea, and Hong Kong. Shipping is free to the US $50 elsewhere.
When is my country's plug version ready? RIVER will ship with the US-standard 110V AC plugs. Adapters will work just fine. 220-240V 50HZ AC Output Units with Universal Plugs and will be available in September. We'll be evaluating other countries on a case-by-case basis. Send us an email or comment!

 

Customer Service

What is the warranty? For US purchases, EcoFlow warrants RIVER to be free of manufacturing defects. EcoFlow will pay for repair or replacement of parts and labor for 18 months from the date you receive RIVER. Specific terms are shipped with RIVER.
What is your pre-order refund policy? If you change your mind or change addresses, we'll do our best to accommodate. We won't able to refund Indiegogo orders once they've shipped to you.
What's your return policy? Don't return your RIVER Mobile Power Station to the store. You'll be able to contact EcoFlow directly with any questions, problems, or concerns you might have. Specific terms are shipped with RIVER.
If I have other questions, who should I contact?

Press: press@ecoflowtech.com

Sales: sales@ecoflowtech.com

Investment Inquiries: hello@ecoflowtech.com

General Inquiries: hello@ecoflowtech.com
story_txt:
Thank you to all who has backed RIVER in our pre-order campaign. Purchase RIVER Now!Backers Update: RIVER is Shipping to the U.S. & CanadaOur very first production batch is ready. We can't wait to get RIVER in your hands!  International orders are on track to begin shipping by the end of September. Click Here to View Latest Updates >   The Reviews Are In:                What Makes RIVER Different? RIVER is a new generation of smart, clean, mobile power.Recharge with Car Jack, Solar Power, or Wall Socket. Mega Capacity, Lightweight, and Portable. Holds Charge 1 Year. Take a Road Trip with RIVER:

 
      Simultaneously Charge Up To 11 Devices500W Total AC/DC Output. Most Comprehensive Array of Output Ports. Ever.   Incredible Technology. Affordable Price.Our mighty small device packs a big punch. Its striking, sleek design supplies tons of power wherever you go. Official Unboxing Video: Skip ahead to 2:06 to watch River charge multiple devices at once!With Every RIVER Pre-Order You Get:Accessories: Pre-Order Breakdown:
River Mobile Power Station (Black or White) + US, Canada versions ship with 110V AC Outlets+ UK, Australia, EU versions ship with 220-230V 50Hz AC Output & Universal Plug
Element-Proof Protective Case (Water Resistant)
50W Solar Charger (Turns RIVER into Solar Generator)
 FREE Hand-Delivery to Backers in SF, LA, & NYCBe the First to Experience RIVER and Get FREE Hand-Delivery with Setup from Enjoy!
Pre-order RIVER today
Backers with shipping addresses in San Francisco, Los Angeles, & New York City will receive an email from EcoFlow
Schedule your free hand-delivery from Enjoy
An Enjoy Expert will hand-deliver your RIVER, help you get set up, and show you some tips and tricks
  Outperforms Every Other Portable Power Station  Advanced Technical Specifications   General Inputs Outputs Internal In Production & On-Track to DeliverMONEY-BACK GUARANTEEArrives in the month indicated on the perk you claim on Indiegogo. Sizzle Reel: RIVER in the FactoryWho knew battery production could be so sexy? Skip to 0:30 to see RIVER.  
 Our VisionWe are dedicated to social responsibility, harnessing our powerful new technology to foster inclusion and to raise standards of living in areas of the world where power shortages stunt growth and development. Whether you are at a campsite outside Denver or in a  village outside of Delhi, EcoFlow is bringing you the mobile power station you need to power a free life. May the power be with you! Shipping Where We ShipWe're able to ship worldwide to the United States, Canada, European Union, Australia, the United Kingdom, Japan, South Korea, Singapore, and Hong Kong. VAT and GST is included. If you live ioutside of the US & Canada, your RIVER will ship in September with Universal Plugs instead of the US-Standard plugs.When We Start ShippingThe first units will leave our warehouses starting June 2017. We can't use air freight, so allow up to 30 days for shipping. US & Canada backers can expect to receive your RIVER starting in July 2017. Other backers can expect the International version of RIVER to arrive starting in September 2017. Why Pre-Order NowYou'll be providing valuable feedback that will help shake up the decades-old generator industry. By pre-ordering today, you're helping make the world a better place and a little less reliant on messy gas generators.   Frequently Asked QuestionsGeneral

What is RIVER?
RIVER is a portable charging station, back-up generator, and emergency battery. It can be used both indoors and outdoors, and can be recharged via solar charger, car charger or wall charger. (The latter two are included in the purchase of RIVER)


Who created it?
We're EcoFlow Tech, and RIVER is our first product. RIVER was designed entirely in-house by our team.


What are the 11 different ports?
River is equipped with 4 USB ports (2 Quick-Charge 2.0), 2 USB Type-C, 2 DC 6mm outputs, 2 AC outputs, and 1 12V Car Port.


What colors do you offer?
White & Black. 


Which option is best for me?
We recommend selecting the "RIVER + Case + Solar Charger" Perk to get RIVER and the 50W Solar Charger, and the Protective Case. This will get you everything you need!


 
 

 Technical

What is the uniqueness of the technology?
The battery management system. It's a "smart" system, that allows RIVER to 1) automatically adjust the power output to the Wattage your device needs, 2) regulate temperature so devices don't shut down by starting a fan if too hot, and informing you if it's too cold, and 3) connect individually to each of the 11 output ports so if one were to short circuit or max-out the other 10 would continue charging.


How do I charge my RIVER?
RIVER has one smart DC input port that can automatically adapt to any power source from 10V-22V without an extra adapter. This input is located on the back right-hand side of RIVER. RIVER can be charged via wall charger, car charger, or solar charger. It takes approximately 6 hours to recharge RIVER by AC wall charger, however in only 4 hours, RIVER will be 70% of the way there!


Can RIVER power my devices while it's charging?
Yes, RIVER has state-of-the-art flow-through charging. It can output power while being charged.


How do I store RIVER?
For optimal battery health, store RIVER at room temperature in a dry environment out of direct elements. RIVER will hold its charge for over a year.


What is the battery life?
The battery has a shelf life of 1 year (about 3-4x anything else on the market) this means you can leave in your basement and charge it once a year and it will still keep positive charge.


How does it work?
RIVER is incredibly easy to use. There is an on/off switch in the front, below the screen. To turn RIVER on, press the button for 2 seconds until it beeps. In the back, there is another button to turn on AC power. This is because AC power is quite inefficient, so we regulate its use separately. Hold the button down for 3 seconds in order to turn the AC power on.


How much does it weigh?
11 pounds (5 kilograms)


How many devices can it charge at once?
11 devices


What does auto-sensing mean?
RIVER has an intelligent battery management system. When a device is plugged into RIVER, it will sense the device, automatically turn on, and output the exact wattage your device needs. If RIVER senses nothing is plugged in, it will first turn idle, then turn itself off.

 Safety & Regulation

What is the recommended temperature range?
32-95° F / 0-32° C is optimal for storage. RIVER can operate at up to 140° F / 45° C


Is it waterproof?
While RIVER isn't waterproof, the Protective Case is water resistant up to IP63 standards (rain, dust, sand, etc.). Do not submerge your RIVER under water.


What certifications do you have?
RIVER has FCC, CE, UN38.3, and RoHS certifications. RIVER's chargers also have UL certifications.


How durable is it?
RIVER is very durable and rugged. However, we don't suggest tossing it around, since it's a battery.

 Shipping

When does shipping begin?
The first units will be shipped by June. US & Canada Backers can expect to receive units in July & August. UK, EU, Australia, Japan, South Korea, Hong Kong, and Singapore will ship by September.


Where does it ship?
We ship to US, Canada, UK, EU, Australia, Japan, Singapore, South Korea, and Hong Kong. Shipping is free to the US $50 elsewhere.


When is my country's plug version ready?
RIVER will ship with the US-standard 110V AC plugs. Adapters will work just fine. 220-240V 50HZ AC Output Units with Universal Plugs and will be available in September. We'll be evaluating other countries on a case-by-case basis. Send us an email or comment!

 Customer Service

What is the warranty?
For US purchases, EcoFlow warrants RIVER to be free of manufacturing defects. EcoFlow will pay for repair or replacement of parts and labor for 18 months from the date you receive RIVER. Specific terms are shipped with RIVER.


What is your pre-order refund policy?
If you change your mind or change addresses, we'll do our best to accommodate. We won't able to refund Indiegogo orders once they've shipped to you.


What's your return policy?
Don't return your RIVER Mobile Power Station to the store. You'll be able to contact EcoFlow directly with any questions, problems, or concerns you might have. Specific terms are shipped with RIVER.


If I have other questions, who should I contact?

Press: press@ecoflowtech.com
Sales: sales@ecoflowtech.com
Investment Inquiries: hello@ecoflowtech.com
General Inquiries: hello@ecoflowtech.com

story:
Our Story

The Organic Harvester came about when we started to think about the amount of food waste that makes its way into landfill each year. This landfill not only costs the environment with the amount of methane it produces, but also in the gasses produced carting it.

Some quick numbers:

  • Of all food purchased by Australians, 20% is thrown away, thats 1 out of every 5 grocery bags simply thrown in the bin.
  • Every year each Australian household loses over $1000 in food waste, thats enough to pay for half of most households annual electricity bill.
  • Thats total weight of food thrown out by households each year, making it a total of a whopping 4,000,000 tonnes of food waste Nationally.
  • Garbage bin analysis of Victorian households found that almost half of all waste discarded by households was perishable food waste.
  • It takes almost half a million garbage trucks to transport all our food waste, increasing landfill and creating additional costs for our councils.
  • The total cost of Australias food waste equates to a staggering $8 Billion annually, enough to write every Australian a cheque for $321 each year.

How your pre-order helps

Your pre-order will provide us with the final funds needed to bring the harvester to life. Following years of design planning and ideas we are now ready to produce our innovation on a large scale, making it available to households all over the world!

story:
These Power Banks have limited power capacity. Enough power for 1-2 charges only.  So You look for something stronger - A Portable Power Station. 

But, you feel like you have to be a weightlifter to use those.

 

 

After all, the other brand weighs 16lbs! Producing 400Wh of power.

Have you tried lifting 16lbs? It's not that heavy... until you have to hold onto it for longer than 2 minutes at a time. So, is it still portable? Why would you still get one?

 

 

Maybe because it's still better than those toxic, loud and super heavy electric generators, and that's why they call themselves "portable" because they're a bit lighter.

 

 

Don't you deserve the option to use your "portable" power stations whenever and wherever you go? To do all the things that it promises while allowing you to just enjoy the moment? Not be such a hassle to load around? Limiting your ability to take it to more places because it's so heavy? We believe that being portable should mean just that, portable - lightweight and easy to carry around, wherever you go.

 

 

So, we present to you our solution of portability

 

Good Things Comes In Two.

 

Which translates to:

But, don't take our words for it. Here's a statement from a photographer in LA who's always shooting outdoors and needed a product like ours to supply him powers - 

You know what we rather be doing instead of that?

You do have friends, right? Just checking.

 

We made the EV450 ultra portable with Li-Polymer battery cells from ATL. Go ahead, look them up. Here's a link to their site: https://www.atlbattery.com - They're the 4th largest Li-ion battery cell manufacturers in the world; largest supplier for Li-Polymer cells. And we're the only power station company that they're supplying their Li-Polymer battery cells too. That says quite a bit about us. It can work from -10°C, below freezing, to 50°C. While being stored, it can withstand -20°C to 60°C. Talk about durability.

 

 

Who was the EV450 designed for?

People who's always on the move, that require power supply constantly. People who are adventurous, always exploring and camping out. People who likes living off the grid for a few days but still requiring the right amount of power for cooking, light entertainment, and staying connected to their devices. People who likes working anywhere.

People just like you and me, that doesn't want something so heavy to carry around, but not something with so little power either. 

We designed the EV450 just to do what it needs to do:

Supply you with enough power to last for days/weeks at a time and keep it portable for your outdoor adventures.

No fancy LED screens to bog you down with extra features you don't need. This only adds on weight and more supply cost for you. The only thing we focused on was giving you the best Li-Polymer battery cells to produce the most portable and highest energy capacity power station on the market. This simply means:

You can't find any other power stations on the market LIGHTER than ours, that produces MORE POWER than ours, and COST LESS than ours. Go ahead, try. 

We're proud of accomplishing this.

What if your car battery dies before you get to your destination on your road trip? 

 

But, what if you want something a bit lighter and don't need as much power, but still enough for remote work or day-trips? We have a solution for you as well.

 

The EV200 Portable Power Station gives me 2-3 charges on my laptop and my phone at the same time for me to work remotely.

Having the Type-C port also comes in handy as that's the future we're headed towards... right? Here are some of the things it powers.

 

 

 

 

Our EV200 is made from LG Chem, the 2nd largest Li-ion battery manufacturers in the world! Here's a link to their site - http://www.lgchem.com/global/main - working conditions ranges from -10°C, below freezing, to 50°C. While being stored, it can withstand -20°C to 60°C.

 

Your order includes FREE SHIPPING - ANYWHERE in the world.

 

 

 

Other Reviews

 

Patrick likes to indulge in all kinds of outdoor activities, like going camping this past weekend to Pyramid Lake. Here's a photo of him with a nice catch.

 

Check out this Review Video by TECHMAGNET

 

 

Both of our EnerVision Series are rechargeable by solar panels. No carbon footprint. Suns out, funs out.

Charges in about 10-15 hours for EV450, and 5-6 hours for EV200, depending on weather conditions.

 

Both of our EV Series also has a pure sine wave inverter.

Having a pure sine wave inverter allows for electronics like microwaves and motors to run faster, quieter and cooler. They help reduce audible and electrical noise in fans, fluorescent lights, audio amplifiers, TV, almost anything you use in a home or office space. A pure sine wave inverter isn't necessary for power output, but we wanted to build the best product, not just another product.

 

 

Our EnerVision Series aren't just for outdoor adventurers. 

We serve a bigger community out there, supplying power to whoever needs it. Below are some of the other applications that uses our products.

Whatever your needs, EnerVision will be there to supply you power,

while being extra portable.

 

 

 

 

The Impact Of Your Contribution 

We understand that there are countless Li-ion battery power stations currently floating around in the market. We also understand that some of them are great products and come from top brands. What we have, however, is the LIGHTEST Portable Li-ion Battery Power Stations with the most energy output to date. The main difference between our products and theirs is that we can actually call ours portable and know you'll experience the difference once you hold it in your hands.

We have partnered up with 2 of the top Li-ion battery manufacturers in the world to make sure our products is the safest out there for you to use. This is just the beginning of our journey to giving back after being in this industry for over a decade and seeing a huge concern for the safety of those people around us using such a product and the impact it had on the environment.  

OUR COMMITMENT

We are committed to donating up to 10% of our net profit to charity and non-profit organizations that helps communities with deficient energy sources and people in need overall. We are also supplying them with our own products to use in times of distress. We have already partnered up with two local non-profit communities in our state and plan to expand that as we grow our company and our vision.

House of Hope is a Christian therapeutic school, home, and counseling center for hurting and troubled girls, ages 12-17 and their families. 

 

Baptists on Mission specializes in helping victims of natural disasters. They also do a number of other activities for the communities all across the States including some internationally. We are partnering up with them to supply our Portable Power Stations for natural disaster relief victims who might be in need of electricity or power supplies. 

 

We will be continuing to add to our list of partners and other activities to help those around us, the people in need, and the environmental changes we wish to see.

Help us today by backing us. Your contributions will help deliver the most Portable Power Stations anyone can experience and serve a greater cause as well.

 

Risks & Challenges

We know there are many risks and challenges involve in these type of campaigns and crowdfunding. We have done all the hard work to make sure everything is ready for production and delivery to be made on time. Our products are fully functional. We have partnered up with the best of the best in Li-ion manufacturers and shipping partners to reduce any concerns you might have, as well as reduce any errors that might cause a delay in shipment. We have done all there is to do to make sure our products gets to you as quickly as possible so that you can start enjoying what portability really feels like. Also, your contribution includes FREE shipping! Check out these photos from CES 2019 and our battery pack & BMS manufacturing lines. 

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We know there are many people that are unable to back us because of one reason or another, but for those who are still interested in helping us realize our mission, you can do any or all of the below to make our campaign more successful. 

  • Spread the word about our campaign to your friends on social media
  • Use the Indiegogo sharing tools for your convenient 
  • Post about us and link it to our campaign page
  • Email everyone you know that might want or need our products
  • Donate to us

Whatever you decide to do, we wholeheartedly thank you. We can't do this without you.

Let EnerVision provide you with enough power to keep enjoying those wonderful moments.

story:
A Message from the Founders:

Read all about the Windimager in BizWest at:
http://bizwest.com/boulder-firms-mission-watch-the-wind/?utm_source=interna


The Problem

The wind, by nature, is unpredictable. It can change in a blink of an eye, having the potential to be both inconvenient and destructive.

Think about it. Why are we unable to track the sources of air pollution? Why do you sit on the tarmac for long periods of time or even experience rough landings when flying? Why do wind farmers struggle to consistently produce energy? Why does the direction of forest fires change unpredictably? To put it simply, it’s because of the wind. However, all of these things could be avoided if we could “see” the wind.


Meet the Solution: Windy 

Over the last three years we have been working with NASA to develop a long-range Laser sensor, Windimager™, that can not only “see” the wind but can measure wind speed and direction out to 16 km (10 miles). Windimager™, or Windy, solves the problems of Wind Energy inefficiency by continuously measuring the winds and providing both long-term and instant information to operators, enabling them to select reliable wind farm sites, optimize turbine placement and pointing, and warn of a dangerous gust when it is still 20 minutes away. That kind of forewarning gives operators time to fold the turbine blades, preventing damage.

Windy has a full hemispherical scanner, meaning she can look at any point that can be seen from horizon to horizon. That allows her to scan the largest wind farms every two minutes. She can easily be moved around in the back of a pickup truck, she runs off of a small propane generator, and she can be up and running in just a few minutes.


Why We Need Her

With the help of Windy’s technology, we can control the otherwise uncontrollable effects of wind. “Seeing” the wind can give us a handle on its next moves so that we can prepare for what is coming next. Below are some of the major benefits that Windy gives to being able to “see” the wind.

*For more information on what Windy can do, visit our website at www.windimager.com.


How She Works

Similar to how a radar gun can measure speed by emitting radar waves reflected between a car and the gun, Windy can measure wind speed. Laser light reflects off of small, invisible particles that are suspended in and move with the air. Windy detects the reflected Laser light off of these particles. Since these small particles move with the wind, the sensor calculates wind speed and direction.This type of Laser Sensor is called Lidar (Light Detection and Ranging).


Why She Needs You

It’s been an exciting three years in which we’ve successfully created a way to measure and predict wind speed and direction. The down side is: NASA now owns the first WindImager. 

                                   

Now that we have the attention of NASA, major airports and Wind Farm owners around the world they’d love for us to demonstrate our system. The problem is, we now have no system. With your help we can build a second Windy and get her to wind farms, airports, into the hands of firefighters, meteorologists, and scientists.

*The graphic below represents the allocation of the funds raised from this campaign.


Publications

You can find articles about Windimager in the following publications. Check out the article in BizWest at:

<a href="http://bizwest.com/boulder-firms-mission-watch-the-wind/?utm_source=interna">http://bizwest.com/boulder-firms-mission-watch-the-wind/?utm_source=interna</a>


Please Join Us

Help us in our effort to combat pollution, to make wind energy a practical energy source, to make air travel safer, and to keep firefighters safe.

Doing good isn’t without its perks.

QUESTIONS: Post your comments and we'll get back to you quickly.

UPDATES: Check our progress at www.windimager.com.

GET THE WORD OUT: Even if you can’t donate, you can be of help and pass the word along by sharing, commenting, or liking us on Facebook, by tweeting, or by emailing our website link to friends.

                          


Who We Are

Pictured from left to right are Steve Vetorino, Rich Higgins, Russ Sibell, and Allen Tracy.

The Windimager™ team has a combined century’s worth of experience designing Laser systems.

STEVE has a degree in Physics and has decades of experience in designing laser systems. In fact, he led the team that developed the first commercially available wind Lidar system. If that didn’t get your attention, you should know he’s the one to thank for those shake flashlights—patents and all. 

RICH has a Master’s Degree in Physics, specializing in solar cell technology, and has been designing high tech hardware and software systems ever since.  He holds multiple patents in the fields of transportation and telecommunications.

RUSS has a dual degree in Physics and Chemistry and was part of the team that designed the original Airborne Laser System. It’s a high-power laser that shoots down missiles from an airplane.

ALLEN has a Master’s Degree in Electrical Engineering, specializing in Laser Optics. He was the Project Manager and Technical Lead in the development of a powerful yellow Laser that’s used in Astronomy and sits in the Gemini Observatory on Mauna Kea, Hawaii.
story_txt: A Message from the Founders:Read all about the Windimager in BizWest at: http://bizwest.com/boulder-firms-mission-watch-the-wind/?utm_source=interna The Problem The wind, by nature, is unpredictable. It can change in a blink of an eye, having the potential to be both inconvenient and destructive. Think about it. Why are we unable to track the sources of air pollution? Why do you sit on the tarmac for long periods of time or even experience rough landings when flying? Why do wind farmers struggle to consistently produce energy? Why does the direction of forest fires change unpredictably? To put it simply, it’s because of the wind. However, all of these things could be avoided if we could “see” the wind. Meet the Solution: Windy  Over the last three years we have been working with NASA to develop a long-range Laser sensor, Windimager™, that can not only “see” the wind but can measure wind speed and direction out to 16 km (10 miles). Windimager™, or Windy, solves the problems of Wind Energy inefficiency by continuously measuring the winds and providing both long-term and instant information to operators, enabling them to select reliable wind farm sites, optimize turbine placement and pointing, and warn of a dangerous gust when it is still 20 minutes away. That kind of forewarning gives operators time to fold the turbine blades, preventing damage. Windy has a full hemispherical scanner, meaning she can look at any point that can be seen from horizon to horizon. That allows her to scan the largest wind farms every two minutes. She can easily be moved around in the back of a pickup truck, she runs off of a small propane generator, and she can be up and running in just a few minutes. Why We Need Her With the help of Windy’s technology, we can control the otherwise uncontrollable effects of wind. “Seeing” the wind can give us a handle on its next moves so that we can prepare for what is coming next. Below are some of the major benefits that Windy gives to being able to “see” the wind. *For more information on what Windy can do, visit our website at www.windimager.com. The problem is, we now have no system. story:
The challenge

Germany alone produces over 4.5 million tons of plastic waste each year. What can be a valuable natural resource with the right technology currently mostly lies waste, often with little effectiveness and not very useful as a substitute fuel. It is then also sold as a form of recycling. But it’s a burden on the environment.

The solution is here, now let’s implement it

NPC offers a patented plastic-oil recycling technology which converts plastic waste into a versatile liquid energy source. And this extremely efficiently: 1,000 kg of plastic waste become 850 litres of oil! Compared to straight burning of plastic waste the energy efficiency is four times as high, reducing significant amounts of CO2. 
The process has already been tested on an industrial scale and the first industrial pilot system was put into service in 2005. We continued to advance the technology. The technology derived from the old pilot system now allows for economic use. The first system was already planned in 2009. However, it could not be built lacking the required capital. Potential investors from the environmental and industrial sector want to see an operational technology for the pilot system.
After all, a system that is also economically feasible is going to cost in the range of a two-digit millionsum. Aid monies, even for a pilot system, are only available with sufficient capital resources, With our crowdfunding campaigns we want to facilitate the final breakthrough and contribute to environmental protection.

Feasibility first: Our new pilot system

To be able to use the plastic-oil recycling technology in a big and scalable way, we need a new pilot system. A three-reactor system which can carry out the entire process: from storing the input material, sorting and shredding, to liquefaction, all the way to storing the output material. The industrial size system has already been designed in detail and state approved. Once the planned pilot system has supplied further proof the advanced technology is also economical, it will quickly be implemented worldwide. 

 

And the oceans will also benefit. After all, other technologies for cleaning the oceans, such as “oneworldoneocean”, will also be able to properly clean up the material fished out of the ocean (primarily plastic waste) in an ecologically sensible manner. After all, once it has been fished out of the ocean it needs to be landfilled somewhere, or (with low energy efficiency) burnt.

 

Partial victories

NPC is not a start-up but a corporation which has been successively pushing on its innovative recycling technology project through its affiliated company. The first phase from 2009 to 2015 was marked by developing the project and the approval procedure related to the Syntrol technology pyrolysis process itself. This was based on the results available from the first two-reactor pilot system which we already started building in 2005. The planned project itself was for an optimised 3 reactor system effectively offering ecological and - unlike the two reactor system- economic operation. Project planning has been completed and state approval was issued in 2013. In 2015 we tried to obtain the lacking capital through environmentally oriented private and public large-scale investors. We also attended venture capital congresses in the USA to get investors into the project. We were able to enter into first talks with prospects, which also included noted investors. But additional talks (committing to support us immediately) require an industrial size three-reactor pilot system - both in the USA as well as worldwide. We were unable to realise an initial offer to build a system in Texas since implementing it to US standards is so expensive; investors decided to wait for the pilot system to be demonstrated in Germany. 

 

The other benefit of a pilot system in Germany financed through crowdfunding is that it will result in a group of well-heeled investors acquiring the exclusive right, making it difficult for third parties to then also implement the technology atlow cost. This is also in the interest of NPC and its financiers.

Next steps

The second phase, which is starting now, is characterised by financing a pilot system for this recycling technology. The fully designed 3-reactor system along with the state approval are an excellent start. After this phase, NPC will be able to start worldwide planning and sale of the recycling technology and its production plant. So the goal of economic success with an ecologically recognised, beneficial recycling technology is within reach. Only an economically successful technology allows the ecologically based idea to contribute to reducing plastic waste worldwide.

 

 

DEUTSCHE VERSION

Allein in Deutschland fallen jährlich mehr als 4,5 Millionen Tonnen Kunststoffabfall an. Mit der richtigen Technik ein wertvoller Rohstoff, der derzeit großteils brach liegt. Derzeit - noch - wird er mit sehr geringem Wirkungsgrad und ökologisch wenig sinnvoll als Ersatzbrennstoff entsorgt. Verkauft wird uns dies auch als eine Art von Recycling. Es belastet jedoch die Umwelt.

Kunststoffe und die Umwelt

Kunststoffe sind aus unserem Alltag nicht wegzudenken. Ein Großteil landet als Plastikmüll in unseren Ozeanen, wo es zu kleinen Partikeln zerfällt und von den Meerestieren aufgenommen wird. Über die Nahrungskette gelangt es in den menschlichen Organismus. Mit schädlichen Auswirkungen auf Zellen und Erbgut. Auch weil sich im Plastikmüll viele schädliche Stoffe wie z.B. Weichmacher befinden. Geschätzte drei Viertel des Meeresmülls bestehen aus Plastik.

>>Wir machen zusammen mit Ihnen unsere Erde sauberer<<

Die Lösung ist da, jetzt geht’s ans Umsetzen

NPC verfügt über eine patentierte Plastik-Öl-Recycling-Technologie, mit der die Kunststoff-Abfälle wieder zu dem vielseitig einsetzbaren, flüssigen Rohstoff –Öl-   umgewandelt werden. Und zwar hocheffizient: aus 1.000 Kilo Plastikmüll werden 850 Liter Öl! Im Vergleich zum direkten Verbrennen von Plastikmüll liegt der energetische Wirkungsgrad vier mal höher und spart damit erheblich CO2 ein.

Das Verfahren ist bereits im Industriemaßstab erprobt. Um diese Technologie in der Recycling Industrie duchzusetzen bedarf es einer Pilotanlage nach aktuellem Stand der Technik. Diese Pilotanlage beweist dann den wirtschaftlichen und ökologischen Nutzen. Nur so kann sich diese Technologie schnell in der Breite durchsetzen und ihren Umweltnutzen weltweit entfalten.

Denn eine auch wirtschaftlich sinnvolle Anlage liegt im deutlichen zweistelligen Millionenbereich. Fördergelder, auch für eine Pilotanlage gibt es auch nur, wenn genügend Eigenkapital vorhanden ist. Mit unserer Crowdfunding Kampagne wollen wir der Technologie zum endgültigen Durchbruch verhelfen und somit unseren Beitrag zum aktiven Umweltschutz leisten.

 

Was passiert mit dem Geld bei Erfolg?

Machbarkeit first: Unsere neue Pilotanlage

Um die Plastik-Öl-Recyling-Technologie zukünftig im großen, skalierbaren Stile einsetzen zu können, bedarf es einer neuen Pilotanlage. Einer Drei-Reaktor-Anlage, mit der der gesamte Prozess durchgeführt werden kann: von der Lagerung des Inputmaterials, der Sortierung und des Schredders über die Verflüssigung bis zur Lagerung des Outputmaterials. Die Anlage im industriellen Maßstab ist bis bereits ins letzte Detail geplant und staatlich genehmigt. Sobald mit der geplanten Pilotanlage der zusätzliche Beweis erbracht wurde, dass auch die weiterentwickelte Technologie wirtschaftlich arbeitet, wird es weltweit eine zügige Umsetzung geben.

Davon werden auch die Meere profitieren. Denn andere Technologien, die sich mit dem Säubern der Meere beschäftigen, wie „oneworldoneocean“ können künftig das aus dem Meer herausgefischte Material (überwiegend Plastikmüll) ebenfalls fachgerecht und ökologisch sinnvoll entsorgen. Denn aus dem Meer herausgeholt muss es ja irgendwo deponiert oder eben (mit geringem energetischem Wirkungsgrad) verbrannt werden.

 

Warum sollte man dieses Projekt unterstützen?

Innovative Projekte brauchen innovative Investment-Formen

Mit dem Crowdfunding werden zweckgebundene Mittel von einer zumeist großen Zahl von Geldgebern eingeworben. Die Crowd/Masse finanziert also das Projekt, oder – wie in unserem Falle: eine Phase des Projekts. Für seinen individuell festzulegenden Beitrag erhält der Crowdfunder eine Gegenleistung, einen geldwerten Vorteil und darüber hinaus einen ideellen, altruistischen Gegenwert. Das ist die Idee dieser Finanzierungsform, die seit etwa zehn Jahren immer mehr an Bedeutung gewinnt, im herkömmlichen Business ebenso wie im Kultur- und Ökologiebereich. Viele konventionellere Anlageformen haben an Attraktivität für die Geldgeber verloren. Nicht nur aus enttäuschten Renditeerwartungen, sondern aus einem Unbehagen an fehlender kommunikativer Transparenz oder wegen zu hoher Einstiegssummen für eine neue Technologie. Das Internet macht mit seinen Plattformen eine interaktive Kommunikation zwischen Geber und Nehmer möglich.

Warum Crowdfunding für NPC?

NPC ist jetzt in eine Phase eingetreten, in der sie für Crowdfunder attraktiv wird. Weil das Projekt nach einer mehrjährigen Pilotphase der Forschung und Entwicklung kurz davor ist, das Ziel zu verwirklichen, welches sich die Initiatoren im Jahre 2009 auf die Fahnen geschrieben haben: einen sichtbaren Beitrag zur Wiederverwertung von Plastikmüll zu leisten. Ökologie und Ökonomie ziehen hier am selben Strang: Nur in dem Maße, in dem NPC ökonomisch erfolgreich in den weltweiten Vertrieb ihrer Technologie und Produktionsanlagen geht, wird es ihr gelingen, einen ökologisch wertvollen Beitrag zur Verringerung des Plastikmülls zu leisten. Die Crowdfunder von NPC werden doppelt profitieren: Ökonomisch, indem sie sich bei Interesse später z.B. an der Umsetzung von Anlagen in Deutschland zu Vorzugskonditionen beteiligen können; persönlich, indem sie mit ihrer finanziellen Unterstützung einen Beitrag zur Verbesserung und dem Erhalt der Lebensbedingungen leisten.

 

Transparenz

Crowdfunding ist definiert durch Transparenz. Das Finanzierungsziel ist konkret und greifbar ebenso wie das Mittel der Finanzierung und die Gegenleistung. Kein Renditeversprechen,  sondern eine klare Definition des Mehrwerts, der für den Unterstützer im Falle eines erfolgreichen Crowdfundings verbunden sein wird. Ist das Finanzierungsziel erreicht und das Projekt umgesetzt, hat der Unterstützer die Chance zu interessanten Konditionen in das Projekt mit überschaubaren Mitteln einzusteigen. In einer solchen Phase werden „normale“ Anleger nicht mehr aufgenommen, weil die zu erwartende Performance des Unternehmens viele größere Investoren anlockt, deren Verwaltung grundsätzlich einfacher ist.

 

Wo kann man mehr über das Projekt erfahren?

http://new-plastic-cycle.com

story:
Imagine a desktop 3D printer that can print faster than average, featuring multiple functions such as auto leveling, laser engraving and bicolor printing using simple add-ons. Plus build quality with premium materials, sleek and ergonomic design.

Now stop imagining. LOTMAXX SC-10 SHARK is a reality. 

 

Establishing ourselves in 2018, LOTMAXX is a cutting-edge technology company specializing in 3D printing. Gathered with more than 100 professionals, experienced developers and engineers from 3D printing, tablet computer and machine manufacturing industries, we've harnessed the great capability of design, research and production of 3D printing.

 

Packing the Aeolus Heat Dissipation system (AHDS) and S Move System (SMS), LOTMAXX SC-10 SHARK has effectively boosted the print speed and successfully saved up to 30% average print time. 

*Source: stats from LOTMAXX lab.  

 

LOTMAXX SC-10 SHARK comes with optional automatic bed leveling feature. The ultra-precise technology allows for 0.1mm accuracy. While the unleveled bed might cause nozzle clogging, scratch marks and poor adhesion, the auto leveling is one of the most important benefits that LOTMAXX SC-10 SHARK can offer to the quality of your prints. 

 

Note: LOTMAXX procures 3D touch & BL touch from suppliers.

 

LOTMAXX SC-10 SHARK supports an optional 1.6 W laser engraving and allows you to engrave with a wide variety of materials like wood, plastic, leather, PVC, paper and resin. The interchangeable module is extremely easy to apply on.

 

While most of the 3D printers come with just one nozzle, LOTMAXX SC-10 SHARK offers optional dual color print head tier. 

 

 

LOTMAXX SC-10 SHARK can pick up the disconnection and continue with the previous printing. A tap on the touch screen will just make it right.

 

 

The built-in filament sensor detects the filament outage quickly and stops the device wasting materials and models. Once you feed the machine new filaments, LOTMAXX SC-10 SHARK will resume the print from where it left off. 

 

SHARK’s heated bed can heat up quickly to 100°C. It’s well built and customized to meet the demands of temperature for a wide variety of filaments.  

 

 

Shark's motherboard speeds up the gcode files loading and supports OctoPrint, long file name and automatic leveling algorithm, optimizing printing with ease.

 

SHARK offers free slicer software for 3D printing and laser engraving, fit for beginners and advanced users who want to print without hassle. Supporting Windows & Mac.

 

As for now, LOTMAXX has a powerful team with more than 100 talented and professionals. More than 70% of them are from the 3D printing, consumer electronics and machinery manufacturing industry.

story:
Summary

Manyfolds is a new eco-friendly cardboard furniture system that is not only practical but a whole lot of fun!

  • As a Manyfolds customer you will be able to
    • select from hundreds of different cardboard furniture designs
    • customize the selected products (dimensional sizes)
    • choose from a variety of carton qualities & colors
  • The products will be produced centrally (Phase 1) and sent to your home in a convenient package size.
  • In a later stage (Phase 2) you will be able to produce the selected products yourself with the upcoming Manyfolds Anywhere machine in a local store near you (see picture)
  • Just fold it up quickly, combine it with other furniture elements and accessories – enjoy and use your new eco-friendly furniture items!
  • AND: You can contribute your own cardboard furniture design to the Manyfolds online marketplace. Every time a customer buys your design pattern, you will get a fair share of the revenue generated – just like in an app store business model.

Phase 1

Phase 2

 

A unique folding/pattern design system

The Manyfolds furniture assembly will be very easy. In fact, it will be breeze. That’s why we invested some time in developing easy to understand folding and setup instructions that will be printed on the cardboard.

 

Design possibilities: Unlimited

Manyfolds' open design philosophy puts virtually no limits on creativity. Renowned international artists and the art gallery famosis.com like to work with Manyfolds on many levels.
A whole new dimension of art is possible, limited editions, event & brand design, individual hotel series and so much more. A synthesis of design, function & identity like never before.

 

Use of Blockchain technology

Manyfolds is new and can practically start "greenfield". That's why future-oriented technologies are used right from the start. One of them is Blockchain technology to make Manyfolds safe, fast and affordable:

  • Transparent, secure copyright rights management for the cardboard furniture designers
  • Secure order processing from the customer to the machine
  • Optional payment via Bitcoin (Bitpay); other crypto currencies are being evaluated
  • Safe maintenance management of the Manyfolds machines
  • Highly automated supply of consumables
  • Optimized and automated logistics to minimize the environmental footprint

 

Why this idea

During his many years as an innovation & IT consultant Frank Thomsen held a large number of design thinking workshops, that included the preparation of paper- and cardboard-based workshop material – from the cardboard-smartphone to whole Point-of-Sale mockup designs.

During a preparation for one of the design thinking workshops, Frank thought: What if these preparations could be as automated and standardized as possible, so there would be a device, that prints the patterns on a standard-sized cardboard in one process, makes dents in the cardboard for better bending and then cuts them in the right places? Frank tried a few things in a CAD software, did some research and calculations, and finally designed and protected the Manyfolds machine that became the centerpiece of a completely new cardboard furniture business model.

 

Talking about the environment

The main driver for founding this company and to develop this new cardboard furniture system is our belief that we should find solutions and opportunities that truly add value to people AND the environment. The consumables used at Manyfolds are light, almost completely biodegradable and the products are only manufactured if the individual customer actually needs them.

 

A well prepared project – that needs your contribution

Since half a year a zillion preparations were made to make this idea a reality. We developed the Manyfolds platform concept, developed a air-tight business plan, secured domains, the name and the core technology, tested out different furniture designs, talked to many potential accessories providers, furniture designers, machine & software developers, CAD providers, carton/cardboard manufacturers & many, many more.

The good news: Manyfolds is not only technically possible, it definitely could have a huge impact on the furniture market and be very successful.

But we can’t do it alone. We need your help to make Manyfolds a reality.

By helping us in this concept stage, you will enable the following next steps:

  • Moving into a bigger home base for Manyfolds:
    Well, it’s actually that simple. We need some space we can work in.
  • Machine developments: We are already in close talks with some German machine builders (yes, that will be "Quality Made in Germany"!) that will not only provide the main engineering but also the realization of the machine itself
  • Software developments: The Manyfolds machine needs a standardized print/dent/cut data input to produce the furniture. This data will come out of a software that still has to be developed. It’s not rocket science, but it has to be done properly.
  • Shop development: Preparation and opening of our Manyfolds online shop, so that we can establish our general market reach.
  • PLUS: A successful campaign will help us A LOT to get additional “big” funding --> for going the next steps (production of more machines, international business, etc.)

Within this phase we will let you participate in the “making of Manyfolds”. We will establish our own YouTube Channel where you can see the progress we will make during the company build up + we will show you the ever evolving world of sustainable products & accessories.

 

What we need & what you get

To make our vision a reality – eco-friendly cardboard furniture in hundreds of shapes & sizes through a new standard technology and via a new cardboard furniture marketplace – will not come cheap. We aim to raise €100,000 through our crowdfunding campaign. With this initial funding we will be able to setup the company and get public funding on a greater scale.

We believe it can be done, because we thoroughly researched the needed human resources (expertise), the prices for machine development and machine manufacturing, the software development costs and many, many more details. And we calculated in real world scenarios, incl. market-entry costs and a realistic earnings ramp-up.

You can be part of this eco-friendly furniture solution.

Manyfolds will literally change the world for the better: Less used material, much less weight and therefore less transport-related pollution; a better “fit-to-need”, real recyclability. And be assured: The Manyfolds products will be a whole lot of fun, because they will be as unique, as you can imagine.

Start backing Manyfolds by ordering one of our perks. In this first Indiegogo Campaign you will find many interesting ways to enable us to start this exciting venture.

The Impact

Manyfolds could be one important piece of the big picture, to actually have less environmental impact on this beautiful earth. Just figure this: Every year approx. over 120 million tons[1] of new furniture is produced worldwide – and more than half of that number is getting dumped again, the majority without being recycled. The whole range of plastics, metals, glue, paint, etc. is left out there.

So by supporting Manyfolds, you will be an active part of reducing material usage and reducing waste. At the same time you can be part of a new furniture design paradigm, that will astound your collogues and friends alike. People will "think" furniture differently, when Manyfolds is introduced to the world market.

 

Risks & Challenges

Manyfolds is a new, partially disruptive concept in the furniture and furniture accessories industry. There are no direct competitors who have the same business model as Manyfolds. This has resulted in intensive research. Apart from the patent protection, the necessary processes, technologies and markets for this project already exist. They are merely recombined by Manyfolds. BUT: This combination is what Manyfolds is all about!

As with any company, the potential risks have to be anticipated and appropriate solutions have to be planned:

  • Machine development could take longer than expected
    Solution: Thorough planning, precise specification, working with SCRUM processes, sprint planning
  • Market reach could be smaller than expected
    Solution: Intensive PR and social media coverage, working with Indiegogo campaign boosting tools, establishing a Manyfolds YouTube Channel
  • Appearance of imitators
    Solution: Very early cooperation with the major suppliers of cardboard furniture and pattern designers to minimize this source of imitators. Use of legal protection options. Early development of international partnerships, optional introduction of a franchise model, early cooperation with the most important carton / corrugated board manufacturers
  • Staffing the company could take longer
    Solution: There are many, very talented people who like to take on new challenges. These people will be activated, e.g. at universities, design schools & engineering colleges. In addition, job advertisements are launched via the usual media, even in regions far from Munich. There will also be a cooperation with the employment office.

Other Ways You Can Help

Spread the word, spread the word, spread the word!

Helping spread the word on social media or telling colleagues or friends about our campaign would not only be great but awesome! If you have any suggestions of ways you think you can help, please don't hesitate to reach out to us by email (hello@manyfolds.com) or social media. We would love to hear from you and will answer your inquiries as soon as possible.

 

[1] Worldwide furniture revenue: 361 Billion Euro (in 2012, see: https://www.ceps.eu/system/files/Final%20report_en.pdf), estimated 3 Kg furniture weight per 1 Euro, that makes approx. 120,333,000 metric tons

story:
Gives You Uninterrupted Power All Day Everyday

Camping, hiking, fishing, when you enjoy the stunning nature, nothing could be better if you can get cold drinks and limitless power just like in your cozy home.

It is why we designed Ares, the world's most advanced power station ever, which gives you uninterrupted power all day every day.

Ares provides 12 outputs, include 4x 1,000W high power AC outputs, 3x 120W DC outputs, 4x Rapid-charging USB ports, and a 60W PD output. It can power at least 12 devices at the same time.

✅ LFP battery, durable for 10 Years! LIFETIME WARRANTY for IGG backers!

✅ Unique UPS Feature: Power supply from the built-in battery within 0.01 seconds!

✅ Extremely Safe: High Thermal Stability and Excellent Safety.

✅ Overwhelming 1,183Wh Capacity. Power 12 devices at the same time!

✅ SOLAR GENERATOR, 0 FOSSIL FUEL CONSUMPTION, 0 EMISSIONS.

Suaoki Ares (G1000) in Pepcom Holiday Spectacular New York 9/19

 

0 FOSSIL FUEL CONSUMPTION, 0 EMISSIONS.

The power station can work all the time under the supporting of solar energy without creating any wastes.

 

Ares is built to power any devices in your life. Bring Ares to a party or your room to get uninterrupted power for everyone.

Charge and recharge at the same time

The UPS feature makes ARES even more extraordinary. When ARES detects a power failure, it automatically switches from commercial power supply to inverter power supply from the built-in storage battery within 0.01 seconds.

Independent charging and discharging circuit modules allow you to power or charge your devices while simultaneously recharging the Ares.

 

4x 1,000W(2,000W Max) AC Outputs

There are 4 AC outputs rated power up to 1,000W, peak power 2,000W (5S), they can carry multiple household equipment at the same time, such as CPAP, TV, computer, refrigerator, LED lights, etc.

 

 

 

 

The Astronautic High Density batteries, provides larger capacity with smaller size.

 

The LFP lithium iron phosphate battery (LifePO4) has high thermal stability and excellent safety. It is durable for up to 10 years with the 3,500 times cycle life.

112x 14S8P 26,650 Cells

 

The remaining battery power, frequency, charge/discharge status, and error code are displayed on the LCD in an easy to understand way.

The USB-C port supports the fastest 60W PD output, you can charge the 13" MacBook Pro to 80% in 80 minutes and you can fully charge your Ares in 8 hours.

 

The 18W USB ports enable 3x faster charging for all your smart devices, You can charge your iPhone Xs Max to 85% in just 45 minutes.

 

The cigarette lighter socket provides convenient DC output in the car when you're traveling.

 

When using a competitor product, you have a bulky adapter, which converts electricity from alternating current (AC) to direct current (DC). Charging your product requires you to carry a cable with a big brick converter on it and recharges your product very slowly. However, we’ve found a way to charge ARES directly with AC, with only a simple cable and no brick converter. 

 

Solar Charging Input up to 15V-40V(150W Max). Ares is great for camping, hiking, emergencies, or wherever your adventures may take you.

Solar Panel Specs

Camping power, RV Trip, Emergency, Medical Power, BEST MATE EVER!

 

For families who rely on medical devices such like a CPAP machine or a medical fridge, a power outage could be a disaster. But with Ares, you’re always well prepared for the unexpected.

 

A Sturdy Handle Made Of Aluminum Alloy

 

A Cooling Fan That Can Reduce The Heat Inside The Power Supply

 

Accessories Storage Box Integrated With The Main Unit

AC Adapter Built Into The Main Unit Without Storage Or Transportation

 

 

 

At Suaoki, we always strive to bring you the best products and gadgets that bring convenience and comfort to your life, and at the same time keeping the carbon footprint of our products at its minimum. At the center of our core values lies our motto and slogan - More Power, Less Footprint! It profoundly influences all of our decisions, including the design and production of our products. Furthermore, we believe in a smart future and have always strived towards making smart gadgets for smarter choices, so that you spend less time on the products and more time on the things that really matter in life. Making sure that our products are contributing to the more significant cause of green planet earth is a vital goal that keeps us motivated and running.

G100 - A compact 100Wh Portable Power Station that delivers efficient and long-lasting power to your portable mobile devices with its AC, DC, and USB outlets. Clean and smart energy supply.

G500 - Engineered for power needs on your outdoor adventures, this lightweight and portable 500Wh power supply can run all your mobile devices, including lights, fans, refrigerators, laptops, and even CPAP.

Ares - Massive power for Massive uses! Portable design with a sizeable 1000Wh battery that suffices all your power demands when you are Off-Grid. Clean and versatile power for laptops, speakers, refrigerators, power tools, and more.

story:
Get the first worldwide IoT LiFi lamp! 

  • Special Price for Indiegogo only at 699 € taxes included 
  • Public offering price will then start at 899 € taxes included!

MyLiFi® has already won 2 CES awards innovation under the categories "tech for a better world" and "Smart Cities". 

  • MyLiFi® has been designed for your home.
  • Designer by Pierre Garner EliumStudio.
  • Aluminium fabric.
  • MyLiFi ® is a high quality LED lighting, with dimming and modification of temperature color (from warm to neutral to cold atmosphere).
  • It will allow you to get a fast connection at 23mb/s, secure and without radiowaves even when the light is switched off!

WHAT IS LIFI TECHNOLOGY? 

Co- Invented by Suat TOPSU in 2005, LiFi technology for “Light Fidelity” is a new method to connect wirelessly mobile devices and other connected devices using LED lights.Oledcomm used a Li-Fi-enabled lightbulb to transmit data at speeds as fast as 23 megabit per second (Mbps). Laboratory tests have shown theoretical speeds of 224 Gigabit per second (Gbps), meaning a high-definition film could be downloaded within seconds.

 

MyLiFi® REVOLUTION Internet by Light!

  • Access, throught MyLiFi® APP, secured by a personal password, to all of your MyLiFi® feature. Manage your group of light, users and digital detox moments in a few clic.
  • The app allows you to control all the lights in a room or area at once, instantly. 
  • The Routines feature allows you to set light and LiFi schedules to support your daily activities, from the moment you wake up until you go to bed at night. 

With MyLiFi®, set up the rules and teach your children a healthy relation to the Internet. It is good sometimes to switch off and enjoy some time together away from any distraction. Thanks to the silver: button and our web panel control, simply customize the connection planning. Manage your connection hours and access control. The LiFi works even when the lamp is switched off!

MyLiFi® your Light Therapist: 

  •  Wake up with the sun light: a simulated sunrise will begging at the hour you choose, transitioning from a dim glow to 200 lux at full brightness (think gentle bedside lamp). 
  •  Fall asleep at sunset: relax and drift off to sleep with dimming sunset.
  • Create your light ambiance 
  • Schedule your daily and weekly routine by using the application, 
  • Customize your own light ambiance program by choosing your dimming and color temperature.

PRESS 

Engadget: MyLiFi lamp delivers secure internet via LEDs

PC WorldCES 2018: 13 Futuristic Pieces Of Tech We Saw At CES Unveiled

HeiseMyLiFi: Schicke Datenübertragungs-Schreibtischlampe für Aluhüte (und gegen überlastete WLANs)

Stuffi: Oledcomm annonce une lampe dotée d’une connexion internet sécurisée et ultra-rapide

01 NetOledcomm: MyLifi, la lampe qui fait passer internet dans la lumière

Journal du GeekCES 2018 : MyLiFi est une lampe qui propose Internet sans fil, sans ondes radio, à la vitesse de la lumière

Expert ReviewsMyLifi: The smart lamp that connects to the internet by light

France InfoLe pitch start-up. Une lampe pour se connecter à Internet par la lumière

 

FEATURES

  • Controlled through a web application,
  • Smartphone accessible,
  • Password access control. 
  • Lightning Characteristics Light source : 
  • Nominal power : 13W 
  • Lumen : 800 lm 
  • Color temperature : 2200K (warm white) to 6500K (cold white) 
  •  LED life time : 50,000 h Warm Glow 
  • Dimming Programmable lighting wake up and sleep Customizable ambiance (colour temp. and dimming) 
  • Mechanical Characteristics Indoor use Ingress protection : IP20 Pivoting head Balance arm Main 
  • Material : white-painted aluminium 
  •  Colours for the wire : red (standard), yellow and blue (on demand), white and black. 
  • Weight : 4,4kg (without packaging) 
  • Communication Characteristics LiFi connection between MyLiFi and your computer LiFi (IEEE 802.15.7r1)
  • Data rate downlink : 13Mbps LiFi (IEEE 802.15.7r1) data rate uplink : 10Mbps
  • Light OFF mode (connection without visible light)
  • PoE connection between MyLiFi and your network Power over Ethernet (IEEE 802.3af) and (IEEE 802.3at)
  • Remote Light control through a web pr mobile application
  • Electrical Characteristics Power over Ethernet (IEEE 802.3af)
  • Ethernet cable lenght : 2m - with male RJ45 connector
  • Compatible with PCL modules and PoE injectors
  • Accessories included 1 LiFi dongle for computer (Windows and MacBook) with USB A and USB C
  • Additional Accessories PoE injector 15W (110 or 220VAC, 50 or 60Hz)
  • Certifications & Warranty CE, UL and Energy Star under process 
  •  2 years warranty

story:
As winter approaches in Canada many farms slow right down, so our food sovereignty become more dependent on  external resources, like importing food on trucks, changing our diets, or stock  pilling resources. Sadly, some do not have access to healthy food/medicine in remote communities...
 


So we have developed a  micro-scaled growing environment built to yield food crops:

- off-grid
- year round
- in cooler climates

This greenhouse uses green energy, is easily movable every year & able to capture fresh rain water. Its all inspired by anishnabee 13 MOONS teachings, will comes with required seeds and a calendar letting you know when to plant & harvest...

 

 

 

 



We have the architecture plans, we have the land, we have the building experience, we have the gardening expertise. Now all we need is a few bucks so we can build a prototype over the winter.
We will use the money first for:
wood : 250$
Metal piping with jack 200$
Mirrors - 100$
Uv panels - 500$
Tape sealing - 50$

total = 1000$

------------

If we meet our funding mark, or received free materials, eventually we are looking for a small wind turbine(500$), solar panels(1200$) & batteries to store energy(400$). Totaling 2100$

story:
Solar power is the future and at GoSun, we're making it more easy, fun and accessible than ever. Since 2013, our breakthrough solar ovens have reached more than 15,000 happy customers in +60 countries, in large part thanks to the Kickstarter community. (Thanks, everyone!)

Listening to feedback from our community, our goal was to make a stove portable and durable enough to take anywhere, with the power to boil water, at a price point accessible to all. 

 

 


    

 

 
  • Cooks Most Meals In 20-30 Minutes
  • 14oz /420ml Capacity
  • Stays Hot for Hours

    

  • 13.5oz / 400ml Capacity
  • Make Tea and Coffee in 30 Minutes, Reach a Rolling Boil in 45 

Just adjust the Go's base and set vertically to boil. A removable cap detaches from the tray handle to keep the heat in. Perfect for tea, coffee, dehydrated foods and sterilizing water.

   

 

  • 2lbs / .9kg
  • Shock Absorbing EVA Foam Exterior

Zipping up into a durable compression molded EVA foam clamshell, the Go was designed to absorb impacts. Completely submersible and saltwater tolerant, the Go is ready for adventure on land and sea.

   

 

 

Cooks In Clouds: GoSun's patented solar cooking technology absorbs a broad spectrum of radiation, including ultraviolet light, which can penetrate clouds when visible light can not. This means as long as you have a bit of sun, you're in business. 

No Weather Too Cold: GoSun's Vacuum Tube is a near-perfect insulator, keeping the cold out and the heat in. 

Always Cool To Touch: No fire hazard here. Perfect for cooking on boats or during a fire ban. 

 

 

 

 

Our Secret: Outer Space Trapped Inside a Tube

First, sunlight from both direct and diffused sources (ie clouds) is reflected by the Go's compound-parabolic reflectors onto a double-walled tube with a vacuum pulled inside. This tube then converts the light into heat and traps it inside of the vacuum layer, providing extraordinary insulation, keeping the heat in and the cold out. Cool right? 

   

 

 

Unparalleled Efficiency

GoSun's solar vacuum tubes are far more efficient than most solar panels at turning sunlight into usable heat. (It's ok, solar panels are still awesome.) This is thanks to the power of the tube's selective absorbing surface which leverages aluminum-nitride to absorb +80% of the radiation it hits.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Universal Action Mount - Stay on the Go

  

Connect your GoSun Go to anything using an integrated, universal three-finger mount. Mounting accessories purchased separately enable attachment to: bike, boat, tripod, rail/pole, pack, limb, etc.

 

Silicone Pans - Back and Serve like a Pro

Four re-usable, non-stick silicone pans custom built for your GoSun (two fit at a time). Appetizers are served while another meal is loaded, sweet in one, savory the other. Sauce or dough won’t mix with other foods and your clean-up got even easier.

 

GoSun Dial - Orient Toward the Sun

You don’t have to stare at the sun or worry about alignment with this analog accessory. The glare provides a reflective view of the sky and a shadow double confirms that your GoSun is pointed at the almighty power source.

  

 

 

 

 

 

 GoSun’s Go is in a Product Category of its own. Part camp stove, part oven, part kettle, fully equipped and rugged

  • Power Source: Solar - Batteries Not Required 
  • Estimated Power Output: 50+ Watts 
  • Materials: EVA, Aluminum, Stainless Steel, Borosilicate Glass, Silicone & ABS Plastic
  • Closed Overall Dimensions: 14.17" long (36 cm), 3.37" wide (8.57 cm), 7" tall (17.78 cm) 
  • Open Overall Dimensions: 14.17" long (36 cm), 9.84" wide (25 cm), 7" tall (17.78 cm) 
  • Oven Inside Dimension: 1.72" diameter (4.38 cm), 11.5" long (29.21 cm)-- 400 mL (13.5 fl oz)
  • Cooking Tray Dimension: 1.65" diameter (4.18 cm), 11" long (27.94 cm) Handle 2.56" diameter (6.5 cm), 0.69" long (1.75 cm)-- 370 mL (12.5 fl oz)  
  • Weight: 2.15 lbs (0.975 kg)
  • Cooking Time: as fast as 10 minutes, as long as two hours, variable depending on size of meal and weather conditions 
  • One-Year Warranty for Parts and Labor 
  • Package includes: GoSun Go, Cleaning Brush, User Manual, Registration Card, Cook Booklet

 

 

 

 

Timeline: 

  • Sept. 2013 GoSun Sport launched on Kickstarter - extra reward of the GoSun Mini was hand-made in Cincinnati garage 
  • Sept. 2014 Over 1,000 GoSun Mini’s delivered, but could not meet demand 
  • April 2015 GoSun Grill launched on Kickstarter 
  • June 2016 - Aug. 2017 Design and market testing of the GoSun Go
  • Sept. 2017 Final design and testing  
  • Oct. 10th 2017 GoSun Go launched on Kickstarter 
  • Nov. 21st 2017 Kickstarter campaign ends 
  • Nov. 22nd 2017 GoSun Go launched on Indiegogo InDemand
  • Dec. 2017 Tooling begins and sample production 
  • Jan - Mar 2018 GoSun Go production 
  • April 2018 Estimated first round delivery
  • August - September 2018 second round Delivery 

 


 

                                                                    

 

Beyond powering fun in the sun, GoSun is committed to making an impact with its solar cooking technology. 

Dirty cooking is a global problem affecting more than 3 billion people, wasting significant amounts of time and money, often to the detriment of endangered forests and the lungs of women and children. By introducing culturally adapted solar cooking technology into emerging markets as a social enterprise, GoSun aims to make a substantial impact in the lives of millions.

 

 

 

Solar energy is not just the future; it's already here. With electric cars becoming the mode of transit for the future (1) and solar electric going an unprecedented rate (2), GoSun is leading the charge to bring all things solar into homes backyards and villages around the world.
