story: I'm Ryan.  I'm your neighbor, and I believe we have to take steps as individuals and communities to help fight climate change.  Together, little steps add up to big ones.  Thanks for helping us share the word.
story_txt: I'm Ryan.  I'm your neighbor, and I believe we have to take steps as individuals and communities to help fight climate change.  Together, little steps add up to big ones.  Thanks for helping us share the word.

story:
Open Tech for Global Reforestation


We are the Dronecoria team, and we believe technology can help to fight the climate crisis.

One of the most effective ways to mitigate climate change and restore the health of our ecosystems is reforestation. To speed up this process we invented Dronecoria; an open source set of tools for large scale, low cost reforestation.
 

 

The system includes everything necessary from automated seed processing to drone-powered replanting. After five years of work and successful pilot projects, we need your help to complete the technology and share it with the world!


What's Special About Our Technology?

 

  • 10x cost reduction vs. by-hand planting methods.
     
  • Faster & less destructive to the environment that other methods.
     
  • Lowest cost reforestation drone available, a fraction of the cost of similar drones.
     
  • Full spectrum reforestation system enabling production of seed balls at scale.
     
  • All the technologies are open source download our files and build them yourself.


Drones are important, but they can't make forests on their own. We need to give seeds the best chance to grow into trees. By coating seeds in a special mix of nutrients, we can protect them from extreme weather, wildlife, and dryness.  

The Seed Computer and Seed Ball Machine allow us to produce and test the best coatings for each seed, and share this information with everybody. Unlike other drone reforestation technologies who keep this part secret, we are sharing the information and machines so anyone can make thousands of seed balls in minutes!

 

 

What We Need


This campaign will allow us to finalise seed experimentation to find the best seed ball formula, create a seed coating machine, and improve the world most accessible seed sowing drone.

We need to raise €12,000 to complete and share the technology.

The money will be distributed within the team to cover materials like electronics, coating materials, labour of the collaborators, and build the new machines to complete the system.

Once we reached our base goal, further funds will be used to start sowing seeds, aiming to plant 30,000 trees in Catalunya, near Tarragona, in an area devastated by a wildfire.

If we push past this goal of €40,000 we can use additional funds to build and send drones tor reforestation organisations in Australia, Brazil, Madagascar, Kenya, Thailand and Paraguay!
 

What You Get (The Perks)


We want everyone to get involved in reforestation, but we are not so interested in selling merchandise. This is because it distracts from our core goals and fuels many of the consumptive patterns that cause climate change--which we want help to stop!

So the perks for this campaign are either files you can download to make yourself to create seedballs and scale reforestation, or things we are making to send to you. All these files are open source so you can eventually download them for free. However, these perks give you early access to the files, and give the opportunity to support us in developing the Dronecoria project further.

The files you receive will be like these below. Files to cut, or 3D print, guides and videos, everything necessary to replicate our technology, with machines like a laser cutter or 3D printer,  can cut each piece of wood and assemble your own!


 

 

 

The Impact


By supporting our project you help:

  • Sowing seeds that will turn into new forests.
  • Pulling CO2 out of the atmosphere.
  • Protect biodiversity and restore ecosystems.
  • Spread the technology and empower communities all around the world to reforest, massively scaling the rate of restoration.



Risks & Challenges

This technology is what we believe the world needs to increase the efficiency of reforestation. There are half a dozen of startups around the world investigating  the same idea, all of us are working hard to show data about the success rate of the trees and bushes to proof that the method is working and scalable.

In fact, restoring degraded ecosystems with viable reforestation and durable trees is one of the biggest challenges that environmental organisations face.

Each ecosystem is different, and maybe rainier places might be better suited for the technology to work than drier ones. Adapting the seed balls to the different ecosystems around the world is a big task that we are trying to solve.

There are inherited scientific risks in the way we designed the experiments. If we can not achieve to control the climatic conditions inside the food computer well, this could affect the results and give erroneous results about the best recipe of the seedballs.

But all of these risks are nothing compared with the risk of not achieving the goals of emission reductions and carbon fixation. The climate crisis that we are facing requires the society to work together in order to assure the survival on this planet, and we believe open source is the best way to do this.

The real risk is not trying.

 

Other Ways You Can Help!

Business

We are experts in Tech&Nature, but projects also need economic sustainability to survive. We are looking for skilled business people - ideally based in Spain- that are passionate about Open Source business models and would like to join the team, help us to build the best-business-plan-ever that we (and other reforestation organizations) can use to make the operations self-sustaining.


Code

Web: We would like to create a worldwide map to grow a community that brings together drone makers, seed providers, land owners, and forest managers to use our technology to create large scale ecosystem restoration projects.

GIS: How to find the best place to drop a seed? This is what we want to learn from 3D models of the terrain. Can you code a solution?


Reforestation Projects

Whether you are a consolidated environmental organization or want to create a new one, we would like to help you to scale the area of your reforestations.


Seed providers

Large scale aerial based restoration needs a huge quantity of seeds, we need a global ecosystem of seed providers to supply the increasing demand that these projects will have.


Science

There exist multiple variables in seedball based restoration: coating recipes, species, and ecosystems around the world, a scientific community of investigators should work performing these experiments to share their results to the organizations that will deploy the reforestations.
 

Land Owners

It is tricky and time consuming to find land owners that are able to offer their land for reforestation. We would like to create a database of land ready-to-plant and focus on capturing CO2 and improving biodiversity!


You!

We need people that believe in us like you, that can help us to spread the campaign around the world and connect us to the right people.

All the technologies are open source download our files and build them yourself.

Drones are important, but they can't make forests on their own. We need to give seeds the best chance to grow into trees. By coating seeds in a special mix of nutrients, we can protect them from extreme weather, wildlife, and dryness.  The Seed Computer and Seed Ball Machine allow us to produce and test the best coatings for each seed, and share this information with everybody. Unlike other drone reforestation technologies who keep this part secret, we are sharing the information and machines so anyone can make thousands of seed balls in minutes!  What We NeedThis campaign will allow us to finalise seed experimentation to find the best seed ball formula, create a seed coating machine, and improve the world most accessible seed sowing drone.We need to raise €12,000 to complete and share the technology.The money will be distributed within the team to cover materials like electronics, coating materials, labour of the collaborators, and build the new machines to complete the system.Once we reached our base goal, further funds will be used to start sowing seeds, aiming to plant 30,000 trees in Catalunya, near Tarragona, in an area devastated by a wildfire.If we push past this goal of €40,000 we can use additional funds to build and send drones tor reforestation organisations in Australia, Brazil, Madagascar, Kenya, Thailand and Paraguay! What You Get (The Perks)We want everyone to get involved in reforestation, but we are not so interested in selling merchandise. This is because it distracts from our core goals and fuels many of the consumptive patterns that cause climate change--which we want help to stop!So the perks for this campaign are either files you can download to make yourself to create seedballs and scale reforestation, or things we are making to send to you. All these files are open source so you can eventually download them for free. However, these perks give you early access to the files, and give the opportunity to support us in developing the Dronecoria project further.The files you receive will be like these below. Files to cut, or 3D print, guides and videos, everything necessary to replicate our technology, with machines like a laser cutter or 3D printer,  can cut each piece of wood and assemble your own!   The ImpactBy supporting our project you help:
Sowing seeds that will turn into new forests.
Pulling CO2 out of the atmosphere.
Protect biodiversity and restore ecosystems.
Spread the technology and empower communities all around the world to reforest, massively scaling the rate of restoration.



Risks & ChallengesThis technology is what we believe the world needs to increase the efficiency of reforestation. There are half a dozen of startups around the world investigating  the same idea, all of us are working hard to show data about the success rate of the trees and bushes to proof that the method is working and scalable.In fact, restoring degraded ecosystems with viable reforestation and durable trees is one of the biggest challenges that environmental organisations face.Each ecosystem is different, and maybe rainier places might be better suited for the technology to work than drier ones. Adapting the seed balls to the different ecosystems around the world is a big task that we are trying to solve.There are inherited scientific risks in the way we designed the experiments. If we can not achieve to control the climatic conditions inside the food computer well, this could affect the results and give erroneous results about the best recipe of the seedballs.But all of these risks are nothing compared with the risk of not achieving the goals of emission reductions and carbon fixation. The climate crisis that we are facing requires the society to work together in order to assure the survival on this planet, and we believe open source is the best way to do this.The real risk is not trying. Other Ways You Can Help!BusinessWe are experts in Tech&Nature, but projects also need economic sustainability to survive. We are looking for skilled business people - ideally based in Spain- that are passionate about Open Source business models and would like to join the team, help us to build the best-business-plan-ever that we (and other reforestation organizations) can use to make the operations self-sustaining.
CodeWeb: We would like to create a worldwide map to grow a community that brings together drone makers, seed providers, land owners, and forest managers to use our technology to create large scale ecosystem restoration projects.GIS: How to find the best place to drop a seed? This is what we want to learn from 3D models of the terrain. Can you code a solution?
Reforestation ProjectsWhether you are a consolidated environmental organization or want to create a new one, we would like to help you to scale the area of your reforestations.
Seed providersLarge scale aerial based restoration needs a huge quantity of seeds, we need a global ecosystem of seed providers to supply the increasing demand that these projects will have.
ScienceThere exist multiple variables in seedball based restoration: coating recipes, species, and ecosystems around the world, a scientific community of investigators should work performing these experiments to share their results to the organizations that will deploy the reforestations. Land OwnersIt is tricky and time consuming to find land owners that are able to offer their land for reforestation. We would like to create a database of land ready-to-plant and focus on capturing CO2 and improving biodiversity!
You!We need people that believe in us like you, that can help us to spread the campaign around the world and connect us to the right people.

story:
Pre-Order Now! Get your bracelet here.

 

 

What is Negative?

Negative is a bracelet made with atmospheric carbon dioxide. Each bracelet is a symbol—and a literal example—of how we can solve the climate crisis.

 Made from Atmospheric Carbon: Each bracelet contains carbon dioxide captured and converted into solid form.
 

 Supports Climate Solutions: Negative helps accelerate the technology that we need to tackle the climate crisis.
 

 Sets the Standard for Carbon Products: Each Negative bracelet pays to directly capture enough carbon dioxide to make it carbon-negative.

Take Climate Solutions Into Your Own Hands

Even the best of us can’t end all of our carbon emissions. And that sucks. Because the consequences of the climate crisis are all around us.

We created Negative to make it easy for you to take climate solutions into your own hands. By backing our campaign, you will:

  • Help us become a major customer of direct air capture (DAC), a technology that reverses climate change.
     
  • Pay to remove carbon emissions from the atmosphere, making your bracelet carbon-negative.
     
  • Show investors, corporations, and politicians that we want all products to go Negative.

Oh, and you’ll get this crazy bracelet we made out of thin air.

Wear a Bracelet Made From Thin Air (and other stuff, too)

Negative is a bracelet made with captured atmospheric carbon emissions. This stuff would be heating up our planet. Now it’s tied up your wrist.

The bracelet’s beads are where the magic happens. Each bead is a blend of atmospheric carbon and naturally-sourced clay. Natural fibers hold the beads together, and the whole thing is secured on your wrist with a magnetic clasp.

These atmospheric ingredients didn’t exist outside the lab until recently, so we’re still learning what’s possible. Our ultimate goal is to make a bracelet that is 100% atmospheric carbon (Air Diamonds, anyone?!), and this bracelet is a first step in that direction.

Support Cutting-Edge Climate Technology 

To create Negative, we teamed up with two of the world’s leading climate technology startups: Climeworks and Carbon Upcycling Technologies.

Carbon on Your Wrist: The carbon contained in each Negative bracelet is provided by Carbon Upcycling Technologies (CUT). This team of scientists and engineers invented a way to store concentrated CO2 in solid materials. CUT is a finalist in the Carbon XPRIZE, a global competition to transform CO2 into usable products.

Carbon in the Bank: To make Negative live up to its name, we needed to do more than put carbon in the bracelet. To reverse the CO2 emitted during manufacturing and shipping each bracelet, we’ve turned to Climeworks. This insanely cool company created the world’s first commercial-scale carbon removal technology. Their innovative machines can capture CO2 from ambient air and then it’s pumped underground and turned into stone. This locks up the carbon for good.

We think these two companies—and others like them—are doing the most important engineering research in the world. If they can solve this problem affordably and at scale, this technology will literally save our planet (and, you know, all of us who live here).

Unfortunately, this technology receives a shockingly small amount of investment. We aim to change that! By backing our campaign, you’ll help us become a major buyer of Direct Air Capture (DAC) carbon. And you’ll help us demonstrate that there is a huge level of consumer demand for products that go negative.

Set the Standard for Carbon Products

In the coming months and years, we expect many companies to tout their “climate-friendly” products. (For better or worse, you can put carbon in pretty much anything!)

Ultimately, we think this is a good thing for climate technology. But there is a significant risk that carbon content becomes the new greenwashing.

So we want Negative to set a standard for anyone making climate claims about their products. We will pay for direct air capture (DAC) to physically capture and store more CO2 than our product emits. If a little bracelet company can do it, Fortune 500 companies can, too.

We envision a future where every product we buy is carbon-negative. By supporting our campaign, you’ll help us set the bar high. 

Choose Your Style and Size

We feel great about wearing our Negative bracelets, and we know you will too! After experimenting with different materials and styles, we settled on three types of Negative bracelet:

Negative 2X Black: Our entry-level bracelet is made of natural clay, atmospheric carbon, natural fiber, and a magnetic clasp. Your pledge will also pay to directly capture 2X (200%) of all CO2 emitted during manufacturing and shipping, making your bracelet carbon-negative. (Just imagine if all products did this!)

Negative 5X Silver: Our premium bracelet adds a sterling silver bead that will start conversations about climate solutions. Your pledge will also pay to directly capture 5X (500%) of the CO2 emitted during manufacturing and shipping.

Negative 10X Gold: This limited edition bracelet adds a stunning 18k gold bead that will catch everyone's eye. At this reward level, your pledge will pay to directly capture 10X (1,000%) the CO2 emitted during manufacturing and shipping.

Like any jewelry product, it’s important to get the right fit. After the campaign, we’ll send a survey to get your sizing preferences. Sizes will range from fitting a 5.5” wrist (child size) to an 8.5” wrist.

Our Production Timeline

We have already lined up the team and materials necessary to create your Negative bracelet. This timeline shows the remaining steps to get Negative onto your wrist:

 

Meet the Team

Who the &*$# decides to make jewelry out of carbon emissions?

This guy.

Tito is obsessed with climate solutions. He quit his job in the biotech industry to start AirMiners, the world’s largest community of carbon sequestration professionals. At the time, virtually no one was talking about direct air capture (DAC). But today, the community has grown to more than 300 scientists, engineers, and entrepreneurs who are hellbent on solving the climate crisis.

Miraculously, the technology these pioneers created actually works. But the one thing they lacked was customers. So Tito decided to start making consumer products out of carbon emissions. He figured that if people could hold a piece of the solution, reversing climate change would suddenly feel possible.

Tito’s first product was a batch of planters...the kind you can put on your desk. They were made from a mix of concrete and captured CO2.

People went bananas. The Air Planter sold out in under an hour.

Unfortunately, the planters were financially and environmentally expensive. So Tito set out to make something equally inspiring with a much lighter carbon footprint. And the Negative bracelet was born.

Like all great entrepreneurs, Tito doesn’t work alone. The Negative team now includes two professional jewelers, a mechanical engineer, a visual designer, a product marketer, and a global network of materials specialists. We’re also lining up craft jewelry-makers to create our bracelets sustainably at scale.

Join Our Campaign

We believe that everyone has their own part to play in creating climate solutions.

For Climeworks and Carbon Upcycling Technologies, it’s inventing the technology.

For the Negative team, it’s making the solution feel real by putting it in your hands.

Now we need your help. To support direct air capture. To show that consumers demand carbon-negative products. To set the bar high. And to make a bracelet out of thin air!

Please back our campaign by clicking the green “SUPPORT THIS CAMPAIGN” button up top. We are so grateful for any support you can give. Let’s go Negative!

Help Us Spread the Word

After you’ve backed our campaign, help us spread the word by sharing our campaign page with your friends on Facebook and Twitter!

Are you a reporter, blogger, or vlogger? To request an interview, press kit, or additional info, email us at hi@gonegative.co. 

Thank You!

We had the privilege of working with some incredible organizations on this campaign. Many donated or heavily discounted their services to support our work:

Climeworks

Carbon Upcycling Technologies

Video team: Richard and Ready at Friends 'n Allies 

Photography: Eric Louis Hanes Photography 

Design: Kate at kateeickelberg.com and Justas at Hardmades 

Modeling: Brian at KadModels, Steven at GoEngineer 

Maker space: Circuit Launch 

Restaurant scene: Revival Kitchen 

Studio space: Roast n Post 

Airplane scene: Oakland Aviation Museum 

Talent: Elena Chavez, Timothy Huls, Baily Hopkins, Maxwell Tomaszewski, Pancho Morris

Risks and challenges

Making use of carbon dioxide is a new and important process. The riskiest part of this project is working with these new materials to get them to function excellently and look beautiful.

We've prototyped our bracelets with carbon materials and have learned a lot along the way about functionality and aesthetics. We've also already shipped a first product, our cement planters which are already in people's hands. Our terrific team includes talents in mechanical engineering, design for manufacturing, and experience manufacturing and shipping products around the world.

story:
Who we are? What we are doing?

Our background is key delivery of Yacht Design & Production. 

We are in the place that, where the art meeting with the industry!

But we have decided to make something better as much as we can for nature and people!


  • We did not just design a wind turbine! We have designed also a decoration item on your roof, on your garden or hotel.


 For slow wind normal condutions and large sized power plants.


 For slow wind normal condutions.



For slow wind high power gain.       
  • Anyone who want to make energy saving or produce free energy from wind beautiful and Nosie free then, it is just right thing what you looking at! The wind Turbine “Turbulence” is not just beautiful baby, it is functioning very efficiently. 




What We Need & What You Get

We have passed of phase one (design and development) and in the middle of the phase two (Product Development) already. To make molds and different models need around 75 000 € we have two model of our wind turbine, which is;



- “Turbulence – CW Alone” and “Turbulence CW Focus”. Both Turbine is very efficient. Starts the wind speed as low as one meter/second. But the “Turbulence CW Focus” is works on the slow wind speeds as wind focusing and accelerating on to the vertical axis wind turbine in the center of the wind collecting and focusing wings. That makes the “Turbulence CW Focus” slow wind rated wind turbine. “Turbulence CW Focus” gets the wind from larger are and produce the energy at the center where the vertical axis wind turbine is.

- “Turbulence – CW Alone” works a bit lower efficiency than the “Turbulence CW Focus”. Because it doesn’t use wind collecting wings to focus from larger area. But lower cost, simpler and easy fix model!  “Turbulence – CW Alone”  also having larger sizes that outfits are made out steel frame construction.

  • The wind turbines slow wind rated as low as 1 meter / second
  • It is not noisy
  • It is embedded with lubricant free ceramic bearing that makes it lifetime maintenance free.
  • Direct driven permanent magnet alternator boost the efficiency.
  • The intelligent alternator always sensing the torque that, releasing the load that as most efficiency range.
  • Intelligent way of producing electricity with coil phase shifting technique before the power regulator.
  • Epoxy Composite wings that makes very long life and stronger part as much as 25 years.

We will deliver the turbine model you choose with the all parts needed with an easy mounting diagram and operating manual for start and use.

If we even does not reach our goal in here, we will not give up! We will give the value of what we have promised that how much you gave us..

The Impact

  • Our project is many way better than the propeller kind of wind turbine.
  • It does not make noise as HAWT turbines.
  • It can operate at the slower wind speed than the HAWT turbine.
  • Any wind direction is welcome, is does not matter.
  • It is delivering more than % 40 power at the annual period comparing with the same power rated HAWT Turbines.
  • It is not a bird killer as the HAWT turbine that, makes ours more environment friendly.
  • It is not an idea any more. It is developed!
  • It is only need your support and trust.

story:
Why do you NEED this?

1. Refrigerator- just plug it in and you won't need to buy ice in a power outage

2. Radio- get weather updates                      3. Coffee pot

4. Crock-pot or microwave                            5. Run a light or lights

6. Zero maintenance                                        7. Charge your cell phone or tablet

It's Light Weight, Portable, Clean, Compact (keep it under the bed or in a closet), Quiet, And Requires Zero Maintenance.

This generator uses no gas, oil, sun, batteries, wind, diesel fuel, it only uses rare earth magnets to generate power. This means once you get your unit take it out of the box and it is ready to go.

We have a 3 year warranty on our product for your peace of mind, who else can say that?


Short Summary

Tim Slavings, the inventor of the U-Plug Green portable generator, has been involved in the energy and electronics industries for more than forty years. He has handled electronic equipment contracts for airports and other secured locations throughout the country.

In the energy industry, he has developed more efficient wind and solar energy systems that he marketed through one of his previous companies. He has been developing the concept, plans, designs and prototypes of the U-Plug Green generator for the last twenty years.

We successfully tested and demonstrated a prototype of the U-Plug for two years. The current production model went through independent testing in February and March, 2015 at an energy power testing facility in the State of Missouri. We are bringing this generator to the public market to help offset the use of fossil fuels, and to help clean the air for everyone.  Our generator will save people money, and provide power in any natural disaster, and is also the perfect system for homes to be totally off-grid.This generator is only 24 inches tall, 6 inches in diameter,  produces 115 volts at 17.3 amps of power, and weighs only 20 pounds. That is truly a powerful generator in a compact size.

When you contribute to our campaign you will be helping to save our natural resources, while cleaning our air, saving our precious water, and making the world a better place for everyone.

How it works

We developed a simplified planetary gear system with multiple shafts that have our magnets in them. Each magnet can pick up over 2500 pounds each. There are several magnets per shaft, and when they are in the proper position they begin to spin. This will cause a push pull type of effect that has  worked quite well for over 2 1/2 years. Then we surround the unit with the field coils to generate the power.

We cannot give to much more info without divulging our secrets, so we have kept this explanation as simple as it is.

The U-Plug Green system will generate between 17.25 amps and 19.25 amps. and is controlled by 2 circuit boards located at the top of the unit. We have set the unit at 2000 watts maximum for reliability. 

The circuit boards control the speed, amperage, and the output wattage so that the coils are not damaged. Other safety devices inside the unit are provided in case water gets inside, and to protect it from overheating.

Maximum operating temp, Fahrenheit,  is 125 degrees and so far we have found that the unit will operate at -60 degrees with no problems.

When you purchase our product it comes with a 3 year warranty.


Timeline of progress

What We Need & What You Get

We are seeking $250,000 for building space, raw materials, and additional workers. We know that this only begins our journey together.  We also know that the U-Plug Green Generator will attract additional interest and additional funding once you begin to envision how the generator will help you, your friends and family.  A generator that can sit inside your home, at your camp site, or work site, while making virtually no noise, is a generator you will love to own.  In turn, your friends and family will love to own one for themselves, and will help us sell many more units.

Should as few as 1500 people choose to buy their own unit from this campaign, we will have raised all the funds necessary to complete our factory, order the raw materials, train the workers, and begin production, without seeking outside funding. From those 1500 people, we would raise $2,242,500, allowing us to reach full production more quickly than we have anticipated.  We would then be able to make decisions that impact the way we can produce more units. 

Should you as a contributor purchase one of these units and then purchase a grid-tie unit from the internet, you would be able to use your generator to make your electric meter run backwards. Yes, it will go backwards at times, and the power company will have to pay you for your power. As you can see, your unit will pay for itself many times and in many ways, as you use your U-Plug Green generator.

  


We have special pricing of $1,495.00 on the U-Plug Green generator for those who order during this campaign only.  After this campaign, the price will be $1,795.00 each. That is an instant savings of $300.00 for everyone who orders now.

There are also dealership pricing packages for those who want to help us and grow your business at the same time.


Our 10 pack or more generator packages allow our subscribers to become distributors.  As distributors, we will work with you to help you be successful in retailing the U-Plug Green generators. In accordance with that goal, there will be semi-annual reviews to evaluate the performance of our distributors, making recommendations and changes as needed.

Should we not reach our goal, we will continue to build 1 unit for one person, one household, one business, one community at a time.  We believe in those who see this as a necessary product which is needed and wanted worldwide, so every dollar we receive will go to bring this generator to each of you.  Every person that contributes to this campaign will receive a gift certificate for $100.00 off the MSRP, simply email us your address and we will send you one for future use.




The Impact

You, as one of our contributors, will have peace of mind knowing you have a generator which can provide clean power in all situations you will encounter.  You will also be on the forefront of green energy production, which will lead to cleaner air and water for our world.  You will feel comfortable and confident that you will be helping to reduce dangerous and harmful pollutants.  



Risks & Challenges

We have been working on the U-Plug Green generator for several years.  The result, as you can see in the videos, are generators ready for mass production.  We have achieved a continuous running, portable generator where all others have failed.  However, this is not perpetual motion; the generator will eventually slow down and stop producing electricity in about 20 years when there is to much magnetic loss. 

We have assembled a team of business professionals for every stage of our project, including accountants, attorneys, risk management advisors, electrical technicians, machinists, state business managers, and skilled laborers. 

     

Other Ways You Can Help

Be sure to tell your friends about this clean new generator, we are grateful for your help. You can spread the word on Facebook or anywhere you may go.

Thank you,
Tim Slavings
U-Plug Products L.L.C.
story_txt:
Why do you NEED this?

1. Refrigerator- just plug it in and you won't need to buy
ice in a power outage
2. Radio- get weather updates                      3. Coffee pot
4. Crock-pot or microwave                            5. Run a light or lights
6. Zero maintenance                                        7. Charge your cell phone or tablet
It's Light Weight, Portable, Clean, Compact (keep it under the bed or in a
closet), Quiet, And Requires Zero Maintenance.


This generator uses no gas, oil, sun, batteries, wind, diesel fuel, it 
only uses rare earth magnets to generate power. This means once you get 
your unit take it out of the box and it is ready to go. 
We have a 3 year warranty on our product for your peace of mind, who else can say that?
Short Summary 
Tim Slavings, the inventor of the U-Plug Green portable
generator, has been involved in the energy and electronics industries for more
than forty years. He has handled electronic equipment contracts for airports
and other secured locations throughout the country.
In the energy industry, he has developed more
efficient wind and solar energy systems that he marketed through one of his
previous companies. He has been developing the concept,
plans, designs and prototypes of the U-Plug Green generator for the last twenty
years.

We successfully tested and demonstrated a prototype
of the U-Plug for two years. The current production model went through
independent testing in February and March, 2015 at an energy power testing facility in the State of Missouri. 
We are bringing this generator to the public market
to help offset the use of fossil fuels, and to help clean the air for
everyone.  Our generator will save people
money, and provide power in any natural disaster, and is also the 
perfect
system for homes to be totally off-grid.This generator is only 24 inches
 tall, 6 inches in diameter,  produces 115 volts at 17.3 amps of power, 
and weighs only 20 pounds. That is truly a powerful generator in a 
compact size.When you contribute to our campaign you will be
helping to save our natural resources, while cleaning our air, saving our
precious water, and making the world a better place for everyone.


How it works 

We developed a simplified planetary gear system with multiple shafts that have our magnets in them. Each magnet can pick up over 2500 pounds each. There are several magnets per shaft, and when they are in the proper position they begin to spin. This will cause a push pull type of effect that has  worked quite well for over 2 1/2 years. Then we surround the unit with the field coils to generate the power.
We cannot give to much more info without divulging our secrets, so we have kept this explanation as simple as it is.
The U-Plug Green system will generate between 17.25 amps and 19.25 amps. and is controlled by 2 circuit boards located at the top of the unit. We have set the unit at 2000 watts maximum for reliability.  
The circuit boards control the speed, amperage, and the output wattage so that the coils are not damaged. Other safety devices inside the unit are provided in case water gets inside, and to protect it from overheating.
Maximum operating temp, Fahrenheit,  is 125 degrees and so far we have found that the unit will operate at -60 degrees with no problems.
When you purchase our product it comes with a 3 year warranty.

Timeline of progress



What We Need & What You Get

We are seeking $250,000 for building space,
raw materials, and additional workers. We know that this only begins our journey
together.  We also know that the U-Plug Green Generator will attract additional interest and additional funding once
you begin to envision how the generator will help you, your friends and
family.  A generator that can sit inside
your home, at your camp site, or work site, while making virtually no noise,
is a generator you will love to own.  In
turn, your friends and family will love to own one for themselves, and will
help us sell many more units.
Should as few as 1500 people choose to buy their own
unit from this campaign, we will have raised all the funds necessary to
complete our factory, order the raw materials, train the workers, and begin
production, without seeking outside funding. From those 1500 people, we would
raise $2,242,500, allowing us to reach full production more quickly than we
have anticipated.  We would then be able
to make decisions that impact the way we can produce more units.  
Should you as a contributor purchase one of these
units and then purchase a grid-tie unit from the internet, you would be able to
use your generator to make your electric meter run backwards. Yes, it will go
backwards at times, and the power company will have to pay you for your power.
As you can see, your unit will pay for itself many times and in many ways, as
you use your U-Plug Green generator.
   
We have special pricing of $1,495.00 on the U-Plug
Green generator for those who order during this campaign only.  After this campaign, the price will be
$1,795.00 each. That is an instant savings of $300.00 for everyone who orders
now.
There are also dealership pricing packages for those
who want to help us and grow your business at the same time. 



Our 10 pack or more generator packages allow our subscribers
to become distributors.  As distributors,
we will work with you to help you be successful in retailing the U-Plug
Green generators. In accordance with that goal, there will be semi-annual reviews to
evaluate the performance of our distributors, making recommendations and
changes as needed.

Should we not reach our goal, we will continue to
build 1 unit for one person, one household, one business, one community at a
time.  We believe in those who see this as
a necessary product which is needed and wanted worldwide, so every dollar we
receive will go to bring this generator to each of you. 
Every person that contributes to this campaign will receive a gift certificate for $100.00 off the MSRP, simply email us your address and we will send you one for future use.

The Impact
You, as one of our contributors, will have peace
of mind knowing you have a generator which can provide clean power in all
situations you will encounter.  You will
also be on the forefront of green energy production, which will lead to cleaner
air and water for our world.  You will
feel comfortable and confident that you will be helping to reduce dangerous and
harmful pollutants.

We have been working on the U-Plug Green generator for
several years.  The result, as you can
see in the videos, are generators ready for mass production.  We have achieved a continuous running,
portable generator where all others have failed.  However, this is not perpetual motion; the
generator will eventually slow down and stop producing electricity in about 20 years when there is to much magnetic loss.  
We have assembled a team of business professionals
for every stage of our project, including accountants, attorneys, risk management advisors, electrical
technicians, machinists, state business managers, and skilled laborers.

story:
Green technologies are largely unattainable to the most needy communities in most parts of Africa where income levels are often less than a dollar a day. Solar and wind power devices are imported and expensive and it is difficult to find parts locally to repair them when they fall into disrepair. Few research universities in French-speaking African countries have provided engineering students with the opportunities to develop their skill sets on the development of local solutions to these problems.

Our solution is to work with mechanical and electrical engineering students and recent graduates to develop a contextual and entrepreneurial fix at a local level that will also be applicable to larger contexts in displaced or refugee communities. We organize practical workshops that build on existing theoretical knowledge in engineering to build practical solutions to energy needs in rural villages. The workshops place the emphasis on the development of renewable energy models that use of locally available materials to keep solutions adapted to the local economies. The end product will be wind turbines and other renewable energy devices entirely sourced from locally sourced recycled wood, metal, plastic and electronic waste.

Your contribution will help to pay for the following steps:

-Payment of transport and fees for data collection exercises to conduct energy assessment in target villages
-Rental of bus to transport energy assessment teams to target villages
-Payment of craftsmen to build prototype models
-Payment of local artisans to build final working models
=Tool kits, parts for devices
-Assistant and manager fees

The first two workshops are already under way using my personal funds. We need additional support as soon as possible to allow us to launch a second round of workshops for other groups.

story:
Overview
The SSMO is a Simple Surface Mount fixture that mounts directly to a standard Octagon box.

It is designed to be:

  • Simple to install.  A simple installation and the job is complete.
  • Rugged.  The aluminum construction and polycarbonate lens resist impacts.
  • Long lasting.  It will last 50,000 hrs (5.7yrs) continuously.  It can withstand temperatures of -60°C to +100°C
     

Specifications
 

  • Only 8W
  • ~790lm   (Equivalent to a 75-Watt incandescent)
  • 120V
  • Warm White    3K/80CRI (3000 Kelvin Temperature , 80 CRI)
  • Cool White      4K/80CRI (4000 Kelvin Temperature , 80 CRI)
  • Daylight           5K/70CRI (5000 Kelvin Temperature , 70 CRI)
  • White powder-coated housing
  • Dimmable with standard wall dimmers. (Triac )



The principles of Blackstar Lighting have been involved in lighting for 15+ years.  Designing lighting, and specifically LED lighting is what we do.

This is Blackstar Lighting's initial product.  Our goal is to create a varied portfolio of products in the near future.  A number of products have already been designed.

Can't contribute?  We understand.  Everything isn't for everybody,  but that doesn't mean that you can't help:

Pass this along to someone that may be interested.
Spread the word about our campaign to your friends on social media.
Use the Indiegogo sharing tools.
Post about us and link to our campaign page.
Email everyone you know that might want or need our products.

Share this with friends and family.  You can share this with enemies as well.  We don't mind.

story:
Short Summary

Our project aims to create a hydrogen biosensor to assist with the creation of hydrogen using synthetic biology. 

What We Need

In order for our team to compete in the Giant Jamboree conference in November, we aim to raise funds for 5+ students to attend. Currently, it costs $4000 for one student to attend, including a $900 registration fee. Any financial contributions you can make towards achieving this goal will be greatly appreciated and donations will be recognised.

The Impact

Hydrogen fuel is a ‘zero emission’ fuel capable of providing motive power to vehicles, such as cars, boats, aircrafts, and rockets, as well as electrical power to devices, such as those involved in manufacture. The production of hydrogen fuel requires pure hydrogen, and since this is not naturally available in large quantities, it must be acquired via techniques that are very energy intensive, mostly by burning fossil fuels. As such, the environmental costs involved in hydrogen fuel production negate a large portion of the environmental benefits seen in hydrogen fuel use.

story:
We are the first channel for environmentalists enabling us to watch, discover solutions and support those who are making a difference.

This is the first time feature films, VR, games, live events and digital content will be brought together to inform, engage and inspire a community that cares about solutions and a sustainable future. 

We are delivering environmentally-focused content in a new and impactful way. 

Earth Protect TV wants to empower you to have an impact from the comfort of your home.

With your support, you can impact the issues you care about just by joining our community and watching award-winning media. We help you find causes you believe in by connecting you to films and programming you love, creating an environmentally conscious future.

Through Apple TV, Earth Protect TV will deliver previously hard to find films and media to users who seek stories about our remarkable planet and our impact on our environment. The technology powering our platform was built by the team who created Red Bull TV and promises to be a powerful tool for delivering content and activating an audience.

As a team, we have years of experience managing environmental causes, developing digital media and technology. We bring knowledge and experience to ensuring the success of Earth Protect TV.

Your contribution to this campaign will enable us to complete the build of our technology platform, grow our team for outreach and marketing and support filmmakers and content creators who are committed to impactful change.

Who We Are

Grant Barbeito - CEO Earth Protect TV

Grant Barbeito brings experience as a director, producer and creative leader and is a founder of EPTV. He is the co-director/producer of TOUCH THE WALL, one of the most successful documentary films of 2016. His skills include assembling world-class teams to accomplish big goals. Grant has a deep passion for sustainability and finding solutions that protect the planet. 

Technology Built to Protect The Planet

Earth Protect TV is currently being built by the same team that built Red Bull TV. We will have a dedicated CDN for our users and it promises to have an elegant and original interface for our customers. Features will include Geo Tagging, VR, and Live Events to deliver a unique and easy experience. 

To find out more about us please visit www.earthprotect.tv ​

Questions? We’ve got answers.

When do we launch? 

Our launch is scheduled for the Fall of 2018 on Apple TV, with plans to broaden our reach to additional platforms in our second year. Earth Protect TV will run on a PC and Mac, Xbox One, PS4, Amazon Fire TV (and Amazon Fire TV Stick), Android phones and tablets, Windows Phones, iOS devices, internet-enabled TVs and Blu-ray players, and streaming players Roku.

Who is Earth Protect TV built for?

Earth Protect TV is for anyone seeking entertainment with a purpose. Our unique model supports the work of nonprofits worldwide while assembling previously hard to access media. We focus on the innovative solutions that will lead us to a healthier future and have made it easy to be part of the solution.

How is Earth Protect TV different than any other media platform?

Prior to Earth Protect TV, the vast archive of environmental films and content has never been available on one channel. If your interest is nature documentaries, we have them. If your focus is on issues of social and economic justice, we have that content as well. If you seek a game about nature to engage your child, we provide that. In addition, ours is not a pure for-profit business model. Each time you watch our content, we make a sizable donation to a content-associated nonprofit working to protect what we love and all depend on: our earth and all that lives here. You can also use our platform to make donations directly to one of our nonprofit partners, if you like.

What difference does Earth Protect TV aim to make in the world?

People concerned about climate change, energy, food, fuel, the natural world, politics and water, as well as how to create a better future for our children and grandchildren now have a place to join the community, watch critically acclaimed media, learn and support the work of organizations making a daily difference.

How much will downloads cost?

Each film will be $10-20 depending on the source of the content. We will be competitively priced but are dedicated to supporting the work of filmmakers and content creators, ensuring that these stories continue being told.

Will you have events that I can attend?

Yes! We will regularly gather filmmakers, environmentalists, social movement leaders and scientists for screenings, discussions and other events. We look forward to seeing you there! We plan on having dinners, live music and awareness events as well.

Where does your content come from?

We’re gathering award-winning films from festivals, distributors and some of the finest storytellers of our time. We will feature films, TV series, VR films and games curated with care from our nonprofit partners and leaders around the world. Distribution has made it virtually impossible for consumers to find films dedicated to the environment and we are changing this model by ensuring that media with a message gets the attention it deserves.

Sounds great! Why do you need my help?

IndieGoGo is an effective way for us to gain public support and we believe in growing in an organic way. The time has come for a channel where people can make a difference. Earth Protect TV stands for something different, something brave, something that will give a voice to the films and people who are fighting for a better planet.

story:
http://www.institutotesla.org/
http://www.facebook.com/NikolaTeslaInstitute
http://www.scribd.com/NikolaTeslaInstitute


The Nikola Tesla Institute, founded in 2012 in Brasília, Brasil is
a non-profit scientific organization with a goal of popularization of new energy research. The private research laboratory is located near the lake Paranoa in the capital of Brazil.
We need help from ALL OVER THE WORLD to evolve the research of innovative technologies for the new millennium.

THE SCIENCE SECTION OF THE ORGANIZATION IS FOCUSING DEVELOPMENT IN THE FOUR VITAL AREAS OF CIVILIZATION DEVELOPMENT:
     

To support the Institute, please write at: boris@institutotesla.org

We are looking into private funding (no government, no business)
to support the OPEN SOURCE replication of various experiments of
NIKOLA TESLA.

We are seeking donations through indiegogo
for our laboratory and testing ground
The funds will be spent on equipment purchases
namely a 200kW generator, High Voltgage transformer
and high power measurement devices.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Partners of the Nikola Tesla Institute:

The Tesla Science Foundation in Philadelphia, US.
http://www.teslascience.net/

Center for Cosmology Studies "Nikola Tesla", Belgrade, Serbia
http://teslainstitut.rs/

The Institute of new cosmology and the science of time, Serbia
http://n01a.org/

The Noosphere Forum
http://www.noosphereforum.org

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

My name is Boris Petrovic.
Throughout the previous 10 years I have researched the vision of Nikola Tesla, and have been engaged in laboratory work with Tesla devices for 4 years in Belgrade, Serbia.
As a researcher in the Nikola Tesla Institute in Brasilia
I currently represent the Tesla Science Foundation in Brazil
and have been an associate of the Serbian Tesla Society.

In my laboratories I have focused on researching
Tesla's wireless Energy transfer and usage of
Tesla's devices in modification of the human biofield
or the biofield of the planet Earth.

I have recently moved to Brazil to continue my reserach
as I have evidence that this part of South America
has the potential to become the COSMIC powerplant of the planet
due to it's very specific location in relation to the
Earth's electromagnetic field.

Apart from the envisioned work in the laboratory in Brasilia,
the Nikola Tesla Institute is in the process
of establishing a testing field, 250km north of the city, near
the National Park Chapada dos Veadeiros. For this we are purchasing
a 20ha piece of land, at the altitude of 1300m, in an area where
an old hydro electric plant was built but is unused to this day,
and can be used for the purposes of tapping into the vast cosmic
energy resources.

The president of the institute is Celso Nicoli,
a retired colonel of the Brazilian armed forces,
graduated from the Military Institute of Engineering (IME)
in Telecommunications Engineering with a post-graduation in
Nuclear Engineering the field of Plasma Physics.

As a researcher of the Brazilian Military Institute
Celso has an experience of 15 years in the area of development of scalar wave antennas in telecommunications applications in general and use in radar systems.

 

The team:

Celso Nicoli, a retired colonel of the Brazilian armed forces, graduated from the Military Institute of Engineering (IME) in Telecommunications Engineering with a post-graduation in the same institution in Nuclear Engineering as a M.Sc. in the field of Plasma Physics.

Researcher of the Brazilian Military Institute of Research and Development (IPD - Instituto de Pesquisas e Desenvolvimento do Exército) with an experience of 15 years in the area of development of scalar wave antennas in telecommunications applications in general and use in radar systems.

Celso is practicing Siddha yoga since 1982.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Boris Petrovic is a Whole Earth System Scientist and Noospheric Philosopher. engineer of tele automation systems, and a researcher into Tesla’s “World system”, Earth’s magnetosphere, ionosphere, and magnetic reconnection. Boris is an associate of The Serbian “Nikola Tesla” Society in Belgrade, the Tesla Science Foundation in Philadelphia, and founding member of the Noosphere Forum.
 
Boris worked in a number of embedded tech and automation systems startups as a software engineer and architect. As a founding member of the Google Lunar X Prize Team Synergy Moon, he is involved in private space exploration, focusing on outer-space settlement.
 
Through cooperation with the International Scientific Research Institute for Cosmic Anthropo-Ecology in Novosibirsk and the Foundation of the Law of Time in Oregon he works on the study of cosmic consciousness, access to intensified consciousness and altered states, including non-linear time and telepathy.
 
Boris’ research of Tesla’s wireless energy transfer, in his Belgrade laboratory, uncovers the potential energy field of “instantaneous locality” that underlies our reality, and facilitates communication with Earth’s cosmic neighborhood.
 
Currently, he is involved in ecological and cultural projects in biosphere design and self-sustainable communities, promoting the integrated model of self-sustainable habitat in Portugal — the Tamera Solar Village and working in Brasilia through the Brazilian Ecovillage Movement focusing on new models of living systems and long-term survival of the human species and civilization.
story_txt:
http://www.institutotesla.org/http://www.facebook.com/NikolaTeslaInstitutehttp://www.scribd.com/NikolaTeslaInstitute
The Nikola Tesla Institute, founded in 2012 in Brasília, Brasil is a non-profit scientific organization with a goal of popularization of new energy research. The private research laboratory is located near the lake Paranoa in the capital of Brazil.We need help from ALL OVER THE WORLD to evolve the research of innovative technologies for the new millennium.
THE SCIENCE SECTION OF THE ORGANIZATION IS FOCUSING DEVELOPMENT IN THE FOUR VITAL AREAS OF CIVILIZATION DEVELOPMENT:      To support the Institute, please write at: boris@institutotesla.org
We are looking into private funding (no government, no business) to support the OPEN SOURCE replication of various experiments of NIKOLA TESLA.
We are seeking donations through indiegogo for our laboratory and testing groundThe funds will be spent on equipment purchases namely a 200kW generator, High Voltgage transformerand high power measurement devices. 
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Partners of the Nikola Tesla Institute:  The Tesla Science Foundation in Philadelphia, US. http://www.teslascience.net/  Center for Cosmology Studies "Nikola Tesla", Belgrade, Serbiahttp://teslainstitut.rs/  The Institute of new cosmology and the science of time, Serbia http://n01a.org/ The Noosphere Forumhttp://www.noosphereforum.org 
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------
My name is Boris Petrovic. Throughout the previous 10 years I have researched the vision of Nikola Tesla, and have been engaged in laboratory work with Tesla devices for 4 years in Belgrade, Serbia.As a researcher in the Nikola Tesla Institute in BrasiliaI currently represent the Tesla Science Foundation in Brazil and have been an associate of the Serbian Tesla Society. In my laboratories I have focused on researching Tesla's wireless Energy transfer and usage of Tesla's devices in modification of the human biofieldor the biofield of the planet Earth.I have recently moved to Brazil to continue my reserach as I have evidence that this part of South America has the potential to become the COSMIC powerplant of the planet due to it's very specific location in relation to the Earth's electromagnetic field. Apart from the envisioned work in the laboratory in Brasilia, the Nikola Tesla Institute is in the process of establishing a testing field, 250km north of the city, near the National Park Chapada dos Veadeiros. For this we are purchasing a 20ha piece of land, at the altitude of 1300m, in an area where an old hydro electric plant was built but is unused to this day, and can be used for the purposes of tapping into the vast cosmic energy resources. The president of the institute is Celso Nicoli, a retired colonel of the Brazilian armed forces, graduated from the Military Institute of Engineering (IME) in Telecommunications Engineering with a post-graduation in Nuclear Engineering the field of Plasma Physics.As a researcher of the Brazilian Military Institute Celso has an experience of 15 years in the area of development of scalar wave antennas in telecommunications applications in general and use in radar systems. 

 
The team: 
Celso Nicoli, a retired colonel of the Brazilian armed forces, graduated from the Military Institute of Engineering (IME) in Telecommunications Engineering with a post-graduation in the same institution in Nuclear Engineering as a M.Sc. in the field of Plasma Physics.
Researcher of the Brazilian Military Institute of Research and Development (IPD - Instituto de Pesquisas e Desenvolvimento do Exército) with an experience of 15 years in the area of development of scalar wave antennas in telecommunications applications in general and use in radar systems.
Celso is practicing Siddha yoga since 1982.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Boris Petrovic is a Whole Earth System Scientist and Noospheric Philosopher. engineer of tele automation systems, and a researcher into Tesla’s “World system”, Earth’s magnetosphere, ionosphere, and magnetic reconnection. Boris is an associate of  The Serbian “Nikola Tesla” Society in Belgrade, the  Tesla Science Foundation in Philadelphia, and founding member of the  Noosphere Forum.   Boris worked in a number of embedded tech and automation systems startups as a software engineer and architect. As a founding member of the Google Lunar X Prize Team  Synergy Moon, he is involved in private space exploration, focusing on outer-space settlement.   Through cooperation with the International Scientific Research Institute for Cosmic Anthropo-Ecology in Novosibirsk and the  Foundation of the Law of Time in Oregon he works on the study of cosmic consciousness, access to intensified consciousness and altered states, including non-linear time and telepathy.   Boris’ research of  Tesla’s wireless energy transfer, in his Belgrade laboratory, uncovers the potential energy field of  “instantaneous locality” that underlies our reality, and facilitates communication with Earth’s cosmic neighborhood.   Currently, he is involved in  ecological and cultural projects in biosphere design and  self-sustainable communities, promoting the integrated model of self-sustainable habitat in Portugal — the  Tamera Solar Village and working in Brasilia through the  Brazilian Ecovillage Movement focusing on new models of living systems and long-term survival of the human species and civilization.

story:
As Seen In:

 

The LightSaver Max

Introducing the LightSaver Max, the most powerful and portable solar solution. An integrated 15,600 mAh battery means you can use the Max anytime or anywhere, day or night. Your devices can charge even when the panel is closed, away from sunlight, or indoors, so use it whenever it's convenient for you!

The LightSaver Max uses amorphous silicon technology, which allows the panel to collect sunlight, even in shade or when partially blocked. The Max is very lightweight and the panel rolls up around the battery, making it slim and easy to transport. 

The LightSaver Max project was developed to solve a problem. There are a multitude of solar chargers on the market, but there isn’t an all-in-one solar charger that packs the punch of the Max. The Max was developed and created by solar experts who are dedicated to the highest quality and attention to detail. The Max takes advantage of PowerFilm’s years of expertise creating industry leading thin film solar panels. PowerFilm products are all made in the USA!

The Max was designed to deliver the highest quality solar energy to consumers in the most simple and effective way possible.

 

Features and Benefits

The LightSaver Max is perfect on the go. Only one and a half pounds and slimmer than a water bottle, you can just throw it in your bag and carry it with you.

Our solar technology is also durable and long lasting. If individual cells are damaged, it won't destroy the whole unit, and will have very minimal effect on the overall power or charge time of the Max.

Other solar technology will only provide power in full sunlight. Not to fear - the LightSaver Max works even if it's cloudy or you're in a shaded location.

Conveniently charge up indoors or with the solar panel stowed, which means you don't have to adjust your lifestyle or location just to power up!

Use either of the 2 available USB ports or both simultaneously to charge your devices.

 

Use Cases

The LightSaver Max is useful in so many different scenarios. The solar cells can be collecting sunlight while you are on the move or staying still. Because of the integrated battery, the power you collected can be used later, even if it's indoors or at night!

Consider using the Max for any of these activities and more!

  • Camping
  • Hiking
  • Backpacking
  • Skiing
  • Fishing
  • RV Travel
  • Field Photography
  • Festivals
  • Road Trips
  • Military
  • Prolonged electronic use away from home

 

About Amorphous Silicon Technology

Most solar panels use other solar technologies, such as mono crystalline. Mono crystalline is highly fragile and if one cell is damaged, the entire panel is rendered useless and will need to be replaced. 

A solar product made with the amorphous silicon (a-Si) technology continues to work, with impact to the usability relative to the breadth of cell damage. Damage to one cell will have minimal impact. Check out this video where we fill our solar panel with bullet holes!

A mono crystalline panel will shut down completely when any cell within the panel is covered by an object. Those panels requires full sun coverage to operate, while PowerFilm's panels continue to absorb solar energy.  

In addition to these advantages, a-Si is thin, lightweight, relatively inexpensive, and more environmentally friendly because it does not contain toxic heavy metals such as cadmium or lead like some other solar technologies.
 

How Max Stands Up to the Competition

 

There are many mobile charging options out there, but the majority fall short.

Most solar panels lack an integrated battery. This means you have to leave your device plugged in and under direct sunlight to be charged. Not only could excessive sun exposure heat and harm your device, but achieving the perfect angle relative to the sun is incredibly tedious.

Many solar companies rely on outsourced mono or poly crystalline solar panels that aren't tested before leaving factories. These panels are bulky and will continue to perform under their advertised specifications.

One competitive solar charger relies on organic solar technology, which carries incredible degradation making the panel less and less efficient as time passes. Not only that, but organic solar technology only captures energy from the sun at 1-3% efficiency.

The Max solves the issue of internal power, shading performance and was designed with efficiency in mind by solar experts. Each step of the process was carefully monitored to ensure the most efficient energy transfer possible. Weighing in at only 1.5 pounds, the Max is far and away the best complete solar solution.

 

Specifications

 

 

Perks

All-In Bundle

PowerFilm has created other great solar products that we want to make available to our supporters during this campaign. If you choose to support our All-In Bundle level, you will receive one LightSaver Max, one original LightSaver and one Pocket LightSaver.

Pocket
Our pocket-sized solar panel has most of the same great features of the Max at an even more portable size. The LightSaver Pocket weighs only 3.5 ounces and stows to 4.5" x  1.5". With one 5V USB port, the Pocket can charge most USB powered devices with the exception of tablets. The LightSaver Pocket also has an integrated battery for charging your devices anywhere, anytime.

Original LightSaver
Our original LightSaver is a little smaller than the Max and a little simpler, with a single 5V USB port. The LightSaver will charge all USB powered devices, including tablets (you will not be able to charge your laptop with this product). The original LightSaver weighs in at just 4.9 oz and stows to 1.5" x 7.75".

 

 

Development/Timeline

 *May 2017

 

 

Why We're Crowdfunding

These funds will be used to alleviate high upfront production costs and enable us to deliver the LightSaver Max as soon as possible. We will have tooling costs, and will need a large production run to get unit prices down, so getting preorders on Indiegogo is the ideal solution for making this happen.

We also hope to learn a lot through the process about interest in our product, reactions to it and suggestions for it. By the time we deliver, we will have a product that will please the masses.

 

About the Team

PowerFilm has been developing and manufacturing its unique flexible solar module technology for nearly three decades, making it one of the few, and maybe the oldest, surviving solar manufacturers in the United States. Powerfilm modules have been used for applications ranging from solar tents for the Army, solar bikinis and even powering electronics on a solar yacht to Venus.

President Frank Jeffrey is one of two founders of PowerFilm, Inc. Frank has been involved in the solar community for over 30 years. With a history of successful business contracts, Jeffrey is excited to take the tested and proven thin-film technology to consumers via the LightSaver Max.

Ryan Jeffrey, PowerFilm’s Product Development Manager has led the charge in bringing the LightSaver line to fruition. Ryan has been with PowerFilm for 10 years and has been an integral part of the company’s product diversification efforts.

 

Risks and Challenges

This is a prototype and therefore tweaks continue to be done. We haven't had the funding to have a larger quantity of prototypes made for testing or reviews. 

Other solar panels do not have the advantage of an integrated battery and we consider this one of our most important features. However, it does present a challenge in getting all these parts to play well together.

Another challenge is maximizing the power available from the 12V output. Careful thermal management is critical in a densely packed system like the LightSaver Max, and we have very conservative thermal safeties in place in the system which requires very careful design in the high power 12V output to maximize the amount of time it can run at the full 60W.

 

FAQ

How long does it take to charge this device?
One full day of good sun or about 2.5 hours from 12-volt input (car charger or wall charger). 4 - 12 hours if using USB.

What devices can I charge?
Any USB devices (GoPro, cameras, flashlights, cell phones, tablets, Bluetooth speakers), small laptops and some larger laptops (depending on power draw) from 12-volt output.

Are there any devices I can't charge using the Max?
Anything with either an instantaneous or continuous draw of over 60 watts. Certain power adapters have extremely noisy (electrical noise) draws that can produce brief draws over 60 watts even if they are rated under 60-watts. Devices like these can still charge, but they will cycle on and off intermittently due to current spikes.

Can I repair or replace cells?
Batteries are not replaceable. Solar cells are essentially non-replaceable, but due to their durability and the minor impact on power when damaged, the panel will continue functioning for a long time despite broken cells.

Can multiple LightSaver Max units be daisy chained together?
No. Based on the all inclusive design, you could take one of our rollables or folders and plug that into the 12 volt input for additional solar charging/power. 

Why does your technology cost more than other products I've seen?
Each product is manufactured for its purpose vs. other technologies that are produced with economies of scale, often in other countries that use low-cost labor, have government subsidies to back their production and minimal quality standards. With products of similar manufacturing quality, we are competitive in pricing. All of our products are made in the USA!

What, if any, warranty exists on this product?
PowerFilm, Inc. warrants that this PowerFilm® Solar product is free from defects in materials and workmanship that impact performance for a period of two (2) years. The duration of the Limited Warranty is from the date of initial purchase. The warranty does not apply to any defect, failure or damage caused by improper use, unauthorized modifications, neglect, improper testing, attempt to repair, inadequate maintenance, or damage from accident, fire, abuse or other hazard. PowerFilm`s sole obligation and liability for products failing to comply with this warranty shall be, at PowerFilm's choice, either to repair the products or replace the defective product with a new or re-manufactured equivalent at no charge, provided that the warranty procedures have been followed.

story:
What is a KaliPAK?

KaliPAK is THE BEST complete, ultra-powerful Solar Power system in a built-to-go, carry-on travel case. KaliPAK is all the power you need when there's no power around.

KaliPAK has been featured on Fast Company, Outside Mag, TreeHugger and others!


What can I use KaliPAK for?

KaliPAK provides the best complete off-the-grid power solution for:


If you’ve ever survived a natural disaster like Hurricane Sandy or Oklahoma City's Tornado, you know that the worry and hardships don’t end when the weather clears. It’s not uncommon to be knocked off the energy grid for days or even weeks, before line crews can restore power.  Batteries will get you through a few hours, but then what?

Thanks to its high-efficient patent-pending solar panels KaliPAK, is a total noise-free, fuel-free, fume-free, and hassle-free alternative to fueled power generators. KaliPAK is designed to collect solar energy, store power derived from its solar panel or from any wall outlet or car lighter-socket and later when needed, charge or run portable devices for an off-the-grid power solution.

KaliPAK is popular with outdoor enthusiasts who don’t want to give up essential electrical devices and connectivity as well as rescue teams, energy tactical units, field engineers or environmental missions operating in places where electrical infrastructure is non-existent.

What can I do with KaliPAK?

KaliPAK’s ultra-powerful Lithium Ion battery, packs ample punch to simultaneously charge up to four mobile devices, such as phones, cameras or laptops while at the same time provide up to 60 hours of continuous power for portable area lighting. Simply put, KaliPAK is engineered to easily handle any portable electrical device that can be charged or powered via a USB port or from a car-lighter socket.

Numbers below relate to a fully-charged KaliPAK 601:




KaliPAK – Innovative, user-friendly design

Our design team gets quite picky when it comes to user experience, so KaliPAK is designed to be simple-to-use, for easy, plug-and-play power.


What makes KaliPAK unique?

  • Delivers the best energy/weight ratio (600Wh/13 lb., 400Wh/10 lb.) available today, at half the weight of similar products,
  • Includes a durable, weather resistant, foldaway solar panel with flexing frame for keeping the panel efficiently angled at the sun
  • Quickly converts from carry-on travel case to weather resistant backpack for easy hiking

Other key KaliPAK features:

  • 4X USB ports for charging up to four devices, such as phones, cameras or laptops simultaneously
  • Best-of-breed, high capacity, long life, Lithium-Ion cell
  • Remote system monitoring and control via smartphone App.
  • Supports simultaneous charge/discharge capability
  • Smart-compartment design for carrying personal gear and supplies
  • CE, FCC, ROHS safety certified


Charge KaliPAK’s battery pack in a single sunny day.

check out how it works!


KaliAPP - Manages KaliPAK thru your smartphone

Built-in Bluetooth technology gives you full control of KaliPAK from your iPhone or Android smartphone thru KaliAPP, our free downloadable app. KaliAPP makes it easy to remote monitor and control the energy levels of your KaliPAK, optimize energy conversion from its solar panel or if necessary activate an emergency beacon.



KaliPAK – Three systems to meet your power needs




KaliPAK’s WeatherProof RainCoat

KaliPAK’s WeatherProof RainCoat




See what’s under
the hood 


KaliPAK’s wide range of accessories

All KaliPAK systems come with the essential Power Kit set of
must-have accessories. And as a special bonus the KaliPAK 601 is also bundled with
our innovative Weatherproof Raincoat.
Power Kits include:

1 X KaliPAK AC/DC Wall-Charger
1 X 3W/5W Led bulb
1 X Car-Lighter Adapter






Also available:



KaliLED 10W Flood LED Projector
Waterproof 10,000mAh Powerbank
1 X KaliPAK DC/DC Car-Charger
Weatherproof Raincoat (comes bundled in the 601 Perks)
Check the Kalisaya website for more cool and essential accessories!



From charging smartphones to powering portable medical emergency defibrillators, KaliPAK's are field-tested indispensable.




Kalisaya's social responsibility:
2041 - THE ANTARCTICA INITIATIVE




Kalisaya has selected 2041.com headed by Robert Swan, as the
non-profit organization to receive KaliPAK donations. Kalisaya and 2041 have announced a joint
effort to promote the preservation of Antarctica by encouraging recycling,
renewable energy and sustainability initiatives to combat the effects of
climate change.
2041 was founded by polar explorer, environmental leader and
public speaker Robert Swan, OBE, who is the first person in history to walk to
both the North and South Poles.





Kalisaya builds on Swan's dedication by informing, engaging
and inspiring the next generation of leaders to take responsibility, to be
sustainable, and to know that now is the time for action in policy development,
business generation and future technologies.
Kalisaya will donate customized KaliPAK systems to Robert Swan’s
Antarctica Energy Challenge 2016. These units will undergo special enhancements
in order to provide
autonomous, solar-based energy under prolonged low temperature conditions.
Additionally,
a percentage of each KaliPAK sold here on Indiegogo will be donated to 2041.com
and the important pursuits of Robert Swan.


What perks are available for contributing?



Your
contribution is greatly appreciated! Your support will help us bring to market
a wide-range of KaliPAK solutions designed for the off-the-grid energy needs of
communities and individuals or just so you'll be able to keep the fun going.
So take
a look at what’s available……






















Important Shipping Information
Shipping is
free within the United States, Canada and Israel.
Shipping to Other Countries
International shipping is available to the following countries for a
modest handling charge: Argentina, Australia, Brazil, EU countries (including Switzerland &
Norway), Hong Kong, India, Japan, Korea, Mexico, New Zealand, Singapore, South
Africa and Taiwan.

If we currently do not ship to your country, please contact us, as we are adding
new countries all the time. 
International Handling Charges


$19 per Dri-fit Shirt
$19 per KaliPAK Rain Coat
$19 per MiniPAK Power Bank
$49 per any KaliPAK System
$199 per 5X KaliPAK 401 or 601 Bundle
$199 per 10+1 Power Champion Bundle




Handing charges are calculated based on
the quantity and types of Perks ordered. Please add your total handling costs (in
US dollars) in the additional gift area during checkout before payment is
entered. In case you forget, you can always go back and add the missing handling
charge to the relevant Shipping Perk.
Import Duties & Taxes
Orders that are shipped to countries outside of the
USA, Canada and Israel may be subject to import taxes, value-added taxes,
customs duties or miscellaneous fees levied by the destination country. These
charges are always the sole responsibility of the recipient upon receipt of the
international shipment. As customs fees and import duties do vary widely from
country to country; you should contact your local customs office for further
information.
