story:
Enter Mistbox. Mistbox maximizes energy savings with no changes to your daily habits and no sacrificing your personal comfort. The result is proven savings, and you don't have to change a thing. Simply install, track and save - it's that easy. With Mistbox, you can go green and save green... the best of both worlds!


Independent study by Intertek

Mistbox commissioned Intertek, the largest tester of consumer goods in the world, to quantify Mistbox’s impact. Tests were performed in the same way SEER ratings are certified. Identical temperature and humidity conditions were used (with and without Mistbox) on a 3-Ton, 13 SEER Carrier system. Conditions were set and data was captured by an automated computer system. Results are below:

 

 

 

 


Also there is no cancellation fee should you ever cancel your service. We're doing our best to make your decision a no brainer!


Mistbox is a universally compatible, connected device that attaches to your existing AC unit in minutes. It uses evaporative cooling to pre-cool the intake air, which makes your AC more efficient. 

How Mistbox Works Cartoon


The resulting efficiency boost means savings of 20-38% on your cooling bills.  Savings are due to two factors, 1) decreased power consumption while the AC is running, and 2) increased capacity in hot conditions which brings really long cycles back down into normal time ranges.

 


Worried about installation? Don't be. Mistbox attaches to your AC unit in minutes. In just a few steps, you can hook up Mistbox and start saving money. You don't need any special tools, either. A simple screwdriver will do the trick. 


 


Many customers ask us about water treatment. Mistbox has developed a custom water treatment system to ensure the fine misting can not damage the AC unit. The patent pending method kills bacteria on contact and treats metal surfaces to make algae or mold growth an impossibility. The method also neutralizes dissolved solids (hardness) in the water so they cannot tightly adhere to the condenser fins. The Mistbox filters have been designed to work with municipal water anywhere in the continental US. 

Take a closer look at our water treatment filter and see for yourself. 

The Best Of The Best

Since water treatment is such an important topic, Mistbox enlisted top water treatment expert Owen Boyd to help us get it right. Owen entered the world of environmental remediation in 1988 and developed a patented technology for the removal of carbon dioxide from combined cycle power plants. He later commercialized this technology for Dow Chemical. Owen's journey in water treatment started in 1992, and he has brought several new technologies to market: 

  • Developed chelating mercury removal resin to reduce mercury emissions from incinerators and coal burning power plants.
  • Developed a mercury removal system for dental waste discharge, which is used internationally by thousands of dental clinics.
  • In partnership with LeHigh University, developed a regenerable arsenic removable media that is used in many U.S. municipal systems and thousands of U.S. homes.
  • Developed patent pending system for removal of solids from high TDS water. 
  • Developed a patent pending process linking ozone with quantum catalyst technology for disinfection of water used in medical applications. 

Needless to say, he knows his stuff. He was also awarded a Technology Innovator Award from the EPA in 1996, among many other accolades and recognition. So you can feel confident that the Mistbox water treatment system is the best of the best.

 

 

 

 

 


We want world peace. And clean air. Neither are easy tasks to undertake, but we decided to focus on clean air. Mistbox started its journey in 2013, with a hairy, audacious goal: take expensive evaporative cooling technology that has been around commercially for decades, and cultivate this into technology that is both impactful and affordable for homeowners (and the planet!). There were lots of unknowns along the way, but we were guided by our passion and overwhelming desire to make a difference.

The result is a solution that requires little-to-no effort, while delivering even greater savings than many of the category leaders in our space. It’s a win for consumers. It’s a win for the planet. We are proud to be the engineers, designers, developers and dreamers behind it. Meet Mistbox.

 
And our team of awesome advisors:

 

 

 


Below are some photos of our prototyping stage, as well as some recent pictures of our tools and plastics off them.

 

 

 

 


 

 

Case study

  • https://www.fpl.com/save/pdf/heating-cooling-guide.pdf

Intertek study

  • http://tinyurl.com/mistboxstudy

Environmental impact

  • http://www.huffingtonpost.ca/2011/08/23/car-population_n_934291.html
  • http://eetd.lbl.gov/sites/all/files/lbnl-1003671_0.pdf

Many connected devices only save energy when their owners are involved. Take a smart learning thermostat for example. You have to continually train it until it knows your preferences and can optimize for savings. That's fine and good, but what happens if you teach it bad habits or don't take the time to teach it at all? Don't we all want to save energy, even if we aren't so efficient ourselves? Enter Mistbox. Mistbox maximizes energy savings with no changes to your daily habits and no sacrificing your personal comfort. The result is proven savings, and you don't have to change a thing. story:
LOLISTRAW is made from LOLIWARE’s patent-pending, seaweed-based material technology and is 100% PLASTIC-FREE, Hypercompostable, marine-degradable, and non-GMO.

Seaweed is a renewable resource that does not require land resources and actually absorbs CO2, which is why a seaweed-based product has an environmental advantage. Many bioplastics are made from GMO crops like corn.

 Our goal is to replace the 500 million plastic straws that are used and discarded every day in the United States alone.

8MM tons of single-use plastics, including plastic straws, enter our oceans each year.

LOLISTRAW is a sustainable (and FUN!) alternative to plastic straws that cannot be captured by recycling waste streams.

make action GIFs like this at MakeaGif

 

 From STRAW TO SOIL in 60 days or less.

LOLISTRAW creates new value after it is used in 3 key ways –– by transforming into plant fuel through composting, machine fuel through anaerobic digestion, or human fuel through eating :P

We have designed LOLISTRAW to have the same functionality expected of a plastic straw.LOLISTRAW will last for up to 24 hrs in a beverage and will have a shelf life of up to 24 months.

PRE-ORDER $25+ in LOLISTRAWS and you’ll get to vote on your favorite to decide the very first flavor launch of #thestrawofthefuture

CITRUS | bright lemon squeeze

VANILLA DUST | fragrant sweetness

ROSE QUARTZ | powered by flowers

HELIOTROPE | +embedded with sun energy

SPARKLING OCEAN | dedicated to our mission of creating sparkling oceans again

CARBON | activated with coconut charcoal for detox

AIR | disappears like air | 1:1 hypercompostable replacement for plastic straws

 

LOLIWARE on Shark Tank! 

 

 

LOLIWARE has coined the term "Hypercompostable" to convey that all of our products, including LOLISTRAW, will break down at the same rate as food waste in compost or in the natural environment, such as a waterway.

Our goal is to replace plastic straws used at high-waste venues, such as stadiums, fast casual restaurants, and of course – coffee shops!

Partner with us to say goodbye plastic straws and hello to LOLISTRAW! 

We have our team of experts ready to go! Founders Leigh Ann and Chelsea are industrial designers, we have two senior food scientists, a process engineer, operations advisors, and sustainability experts supporting our endeavor.

 

Risks and challenges

Manufacturing – This product is unique from a production perspective, so while we anticipate challenges, we have the right team in place to troubleshoot and problem solve along the way. Our team includes scientists, engineers, as well as operations experts and industry advisors.

Shipping in Summer 2018 – We plan to iterate, review samples and do quality control in March/April 2018 and place the manufacturing order by May 2018. We estimate shipping will begin in August 2018 …. Just in time for the dog days of summer! We don't anticipate any issues with this timeline. However, if by chance anything unexpected happens, we promise to keep you informed, both during the campaign and afterward.

ABOUT LOLIWARE

LOLIWARE is the world’s first edible bioplastics company dedicated to replacing plastic with hypercompostable, edible materials derived from seaweed.

With the launch of LOLIWARE’S new innovation: LOLISTRAW, the world’s first hypercompostable, edible drinking straw, the company is poised to compete with Bio-based plastics that break down in the organics bin alongside food waste in 60 days or less.

“Single-use plastics should never be ‘built to last,’ they should be ‘designed to disappear’.” – Chelsea Briganti, LOLIWARE Co-Founder

Chelsea Briganti and Leigh Ann Tucker set out to change the world of sustainable product design when they co-founded LOLIWARE in 2014. Prior to launching LOLIWARE, the duo designed breakthrough innovations for global CPG companies. This experience led them to question the concept that all products should be ‘built to last’ and the status quo of manufacturing single-use items to last well beyond their useful life. As a result, LOLIWARE has developed sustainable solutions which are leading product design for single-use disposable items away from the ‘built to last’ philosophy and towards a new philosophy of ‘designed to disappear’.

“Our world needs a radically new approach to our daily consumption of single-use plastics which too often go to landfill or pollute oceans. Our solutions transform disposables into ‘'plant fuel' through composting, or ‘human fuel’ through consumption." – Leigh Ann Tucker, LOLIWARE Co-Founder

LOLIWARE has been featured in publications including Entrepreneur Magazine, WIRED, Popular Science, NYT, National Geographic, Wall Street Journal, FastCo., & Oprah. In 2015, TIME magazine nominated LOLIWARE as one of the best scientific inventions of the year.

The company’s investors include Closed Loop Ventures, Mark Cuban Companies (after appearing on ABC’s Shark Tank), and the New York State Innovation Venture Fund. Furthermore, the company has partnerships with IDEO, The Ellen MacArthur Foundation, The Last Plastic Straw, Plastic Pollution Coalition & The Lonely Whale Foundation.

The team recently announced their plan to replace one billion plastic disposables by 2020. LOLISTRAW, the #zerowastestraw of the future, will be a critical solution as the world seeks interventions to address the rapidly accelerating global plastic crisis.

LOLIWARE believes products should be DESIGNED TO DISAPPEAR if they are to exist at all & aspires to reintroduce sustainability as fun-forward & ripe with experiential possibilities.

Furthermore, the company has partnerships with IDEO, The Ellen MacArthur Foundation, The Last Plastic Straw, Plastic Pollution Coalition & The Lonely Whale Foundation.The team recently announced their plan to replace one billion plastic disposables by 2020. LOLISTRAW, the #zerowastestraw of the future, will be a critical solution as the world seeks interventions to address the rapidly accelerating global plastic crisis.LOLIWARE believes products should be DESIGNED TO DISAPPEAR if they are to exist at all & aspires to reintroduce sustainability as fun-forward & ripe with experiential possibilities.

story:
About

 

Patented Energy tech you can get excited about: 24 hour power, potable water, zero carbon emissions.

When the Department of Energy announced that they would require 30% of all US energy production to come from a renewable resource by 2025, Lawrence Lansing and Lawrence Lansing, Jr. got to thinking: just what could they do to reach this goal? 

It all comes down to The Hydrogen Solution, the ultimate solution to clean energy. 

A patented process that can produce power round-the-clock, emit zero carbon at current municipal energy rates, and also offer potable water and wastewater treatment, plants that run on the Hydrogen Solution are scaleable and portable, replacing oil, coal, and natural gas with ease. 

Energy Independence Initiative is proud to lead the way, providing cost-effective power to areas that are currently coming up short (at a rate of just 8 cents per kilowatt based on plant life expectancy of 30 years sans finance costs).

 

The Plant

The current operating pilot plant large enough to run the ranch where it is located. It’s been in operation for three years.

Power and water are not dependent on each other and those elements can be adjusted independently as community needs dictate. Every function within the plant is robotically controlled by the control module . Where possible these functions can be monitored remotely.

Adequate storage of both water and hydrogen have been designed into the system to anticipate most emergencies and normal maintenance. The solar arrays are adjusted in size to meet local sun and weather conditions.

EII’s plants are economically designed to last thirty years with an estimated physical life of 30 to 50 years. It should expected that a plant can furnish power for $0.08 to $0.11 per kilowatt and provide potable water at a fare of $0.01 per liter.

 

Portable Plant

EII has developed a small portable power plant that fits within a standard shipping container. Major elements for water purification, hydrogen production and storage, and power generation are pre-wired and pre-plumbed ready for shipping. At a rural location the shipping container would be placed on a level pad with portable water tanks. The solar array would be assembled on site. The only connections needed to provide a remote village with water and power is a water line from the tanks and power cable from the solar array.

The portable unit is designed to be placed in villages in undeveloped regions of the world that have no access to power and water.

Each container unit is designed to meet the needs of a specific village; for only  $1.30 per month per person people will have power and potable water. 

Our larger units, which are on-grid and supply additional power and water to an existing system, are priced on a kilowatt basis, generally $0.08 to $0.11 per kilowatt and $0.03 per gallon of potable water. We work on a $0.02 net profit margin on the power and about $0.005 for the water. This system requires a power purchase agreement with an agency or government entity.

 

Making It Happen

In order to bring Energy Independence Initiative and the Hydrogen Solution to life, we need your help. Our goal through this campaign is to raise a minimum of two hundred fifty thousand US dollars ($250,000). To say thanks to all our contributors, we are offering some exciting rewards, including 3D-printed models of the pilot plant and merchandise branded with the Energy Independence Initiative logo.

 

Third-World Communities Need Our Help

There are still far too many third-world communities that have little or no access to sufficient power infrastructure. This sort of lack reverberates throughout all areas of life, and we know that we can do better. In addition, as we make this technology more efficient and become more comfortable scaling it up, we know that it can meet exponentially more of our world's power needs everywhere. By supporting the Energy Independence Initiative, you are supporting our efforts to build a better world and chart a course to a better future (powered on science, engineering, and innovation!).

 

Other Ways You Can Help

In addition to making a monetary contribution, go ahead and show your support for the Energy Independence Initiative and the Hydron Solution by sharing a link to our campaign on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and any other social media platforms you use. Get the word out! We appreciate all your support, both monetary and non-monetary.

Thank you!

 

Risks and challenges

There are no two ways about this: the Energy Independence Initiative is ambitious. We know that we are going to face immense challenges as we work to make this idea happen, not the least of which will be push-back from oil, coal, and natural gas corporations. We are prepared to fight this fight through and do whatever it takes to make the Hydrogen Solution viable.

By supporting the Energy Independence Initiative, you are supporting our efforts to build a better world and chart a course to a better future (powered on science, engineering, and innovation!). Other Ways You Can HelpIn addition to making a monetary contribution, go ahead and show your support for the Energy Independence Initiative and the Hydron Solution by sharing a link to our campaign on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and any other social media platforms you use. Get the word out! We appreciate all your support, both monetary and non-monetary.Thank you! Risks and challengesThere are no two ways about this: the Energy Independence Initiative is ambitious. We know that we are going to face immense challenges as we work to make this idea happen, not the least of which will be push-back from oil, coal, and natural gas corporations. We are prepared to fight this fight through and do whatever it takes to make the Hydrogen Solution viable.

story:
Meet the iGEM Amsterdam 2020 team!

 

All great research projects start with a problem, and biotech faces a big one! Biotechnological systems that use modified microbes for production often work well in the lab, but fare poorly in the real world. Why? Production levels dwindle because microbial populations evolve to conserve resources for their own growth and do not favour energy expenditure on unnecessary product  synthesis. This results in systems that are not scalable to industrial standards with production rates that decrease over time.

We have a solution!

 

 

This years team is a diverse group of masters students with a variety of skills and interests, spanning bioinformatics, biomedical research, programming, science, writing and more. We’re self-motivated students who want to contribute to science. Together, we form an  interdisciplinary team, working towards one goal: making biotechnological processes more sustainable! We will work in the Molecular Microbial Physiology lab at the University of  Amsterdam (UvA) and in close connection with the Faculty of Science from the Vrije University Amsterdam (VU) and the Demonstrator Lab in Amsterdam.

The goal of our project is to design microorganisms to produce a variety of valuable compounds in a sustainable way, such as biofuels out of CO2. Nowadays, the production of compounds by microorganisms is often not suitable for a large  scale. This is due to the fact that highly producing microorganisms will eventually be outcompeted by faster-growing, but less productive, individuals. While the production of compounds from these microbes can be environmentally friendly and sometimes even CO2 negative, the problem of unstable production withholds companies from using them on a large scale. They then prefer using environmentally unsustainable methods of producing these compounds (i.e. based on fossil fuels). Our solution could have an enormous impact on the biotech sector and could provide a new tool in combating CO2 emissions. With this goal in mind, each team member will strive towards realizing this project to their best efforts.

 

Our solution:

We are identifying points in microbial metabolic networks that can be used to couple production to microbial growth. This means that microbes are encouraged to keep producing products of interest because it is necessary for their own growth.

To accomplish this, we are modifying the existing FRUITS algorithm, which identifies opportunities for growth-coupled production within the metabolic network of an organism. Traditionally, this algorithm has been limited to metabolic products that are already part of the network, but with our introduction of “Forbidden FRUITS” we will expand this tool to allow for the production of non-native products, those that are not naturally made by a host microbe, and are therefore ‘forbidden’. This means that we are expanding the variety of what we can produce, independent of which microbe is producing it. Salicylic acid made by E. coli? We are on it.

 

 

Why we need your help & What you get

 

The expenses of our wet and dry lab research will be covered entirely by fundraising and sponsorship. We cannot do this alone and hope you will help us make our project a reality. Your support will contribute to the efforts made in science and academia to move towards a more sustainable future.

Reagents and other wet-lab resources can be very expensive, especially those used in genetic engineering. We are being supported by our universities to cover the competition's registration fees and use their facilities; however, we still need your help to bring our project to life as some expenses remain uncovered. The money collected from this campaign will be distributed to cover the following:

 

  • Wet-lab reagents and other supplies needed to carry out experiments.
  • Administrative costs for fundraising strategies.

 

As you might have noticed, we need to keep as much of our collected funds as we can. For this reason, as a form of expressing our gratitude if you decide to help us, we are offering you some non-material yet awesome perks with which we expect to bring you, and maybe those around you, closer to our project and some of which could give you some exposure as a selfless supporter of science and sustainability.

After all, if you support us you will become a very important part of this project too.

 

The Impact

 

With the growing world population, resources are getting scarcer by the day and pollution is becoming a large problem. In order to be able to keep up with the growing economies and welfare, new production methods have to be found. Microorganisms can play an important role in the production of compounds while consuming waste such as CO2. Since 1970, more and more attention is given to the field of microbial engineering for production purposes. Especially in the production of compounds such as biofuels and pharmaceuticals, microorganisms already have their share. However, a major problem with this approach is to sustain microorganisms in an industrial environment. Faster-growing, but less productive, individuals eventually win over the efficiently producing microbes. A solution to this problem is to couple product formation to microbial growth: highly producing organisms will also become the fastest-growing ones.

 

We're following the footsteps of inspiring past teams!

 

iGEM 2015: [Photo]synthetic Romance:

The team focused on providing an alternative to oil by developing a biobased fuel, substituting the unsustainable use of oil with renewable energy produced by coupled organisms. They engineered relationships between bacteria to turn CO2 into useful carbon products.

Results :

  • Models and simulations to engineer a rationally-designed, proof-of-principle consortium in which a phototroph fixates CO2 to drive, in a genetically stable way, product formation by a chemotroph.
  • An emulsion-based droplet protocol that can be used to continuously select for the co-culture with the most efficient metabolic relationship.

 

iGEM 2017: Photosynthetic Magic:

CO2 has the potential to be a resource instead of a pollutant. The iGEM Amsterdam 2017 team focussed on converting CO2 to Fumerate using cyanobacteria. This team aimed to stably produce, export and detect fumarate under conditions imitating industrial settings. They were guided by metabolic modelling and tailored to address public concerns and regulatory demands.

Results:

  • First synthetic photoautotrophic organism capable of converting CO2 directly to fumerate, day and night.
  • A family of fumarate biosensors capable of quantifying its concentration from 1 up to 20 mM with different dynamic ranges.

 

Risks & Challenges

 

As we all know, the COVID-19 pandemic has had an impact all around the world. The development of projects became unpredictable, ours was not the exception. Luckily, we have already been able to adapt to some of the limitations that regulations have imposed.

Our project is special because we can still work on it while we are not able to have full access to the labs in our universities. Right now we are focusing in the development of our algorithm, doing literature research and setting up fundraising campaigns. This means we've been spending most of the time programming and researching from each of our homes.

Since  every future plan holds some uncertainty during these times, we are aware that the time to test our results in the lab might not match our expectations. However, this does not mean that we will not be putting our greatest efforts into making it work and bringing it to life. Even if we have to wait to be allowed to go to the lab we'll be there, with your support, ready to go.

Also, it is true that in science the expected results are not guaranteed. The success of an experiment cannot be predicted, but even then, "negative" results are also valuable since they provide information that can serve as a reference point to future researchers. In that sense, failure is just an opportunity to  acquire new insights and move forward with  more information. That is why, despite the challenges, we keep working on our project knowing that in the end we will be making a contribution to science.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

You believe in our project but you cannot support us with a donation?

You can still help us reach our goal!

Please share this campaign within your social circle and encourage them to support us or share our project. We need to reach as many people as possible to increase our chances to meet our goal.

You can share our campaign using Indiegogo share tools but you could also share our social network profiles.

  • We are on Facebook
  • We are on Instagram
  • You can also share our YouTube video

If you share any of these on your social networks please tag us, we would love to thank you for your support.

story:
The Problem

Globally, food scraps make up 8 percent of total greenhouse gas emissions according to the U.N. Food and Agriculture Organization(1). If it were a country, food scraps would produce the third most emissions behind only the United States and China. We throw away a lot! Upwards of 40% of the food we grow never makes it to a mouth(2). States like Connecticut recognize this disturbing trend and have enacted legislation to curb it, but more than 350,000 tons of compostable material is still burned every year(3).

Our Solution

Reducing food “waste” is one of the most important things we can do to slow climate change and revitalize the soil we depend on for our food. For five years, we at Blue Earth Compost have been tackling this issue by collecting food scraps from homes, apartments, schools, restaurants, hotels, and grocery stores and hauling it to compost and anaerobic digestion facilities in Connecticut. In that time, we’ve diverted over 4.4 million pounds of food scraps. That’s environmentally equivalent to mitigating the emissions of 114,285 gallons of gasoline or keeping 1,120 tons of CO2 out of the atmosphere(4).

We take pride in what we have accomplished so far, but we know that we can take it to another level. We have a plan and you can be a part of it by contributing to our crowdfunding campaign. By doing so you can also get discounted rates on our service as well as swag and finished compost!

The Project

In February 2019, we’ll be putting our first custom-made food scrap collection dump truck on the road. This truck will be the first of it’s kind in Connecticut. This is a really big deal and pretty great for a company that started in a garage! We’ll double the amount of food scraps we can collect and it will position Blue Earth Compost as an industry leader. It also means that we can do more for our Hartford community by providing good paying jobs. Presently, half of our workforce are “second-chance” employees and we are committed to offering these opportunities to those who need them most.

The costs associated with the new dump truck are unprecedented investments for our business. To this point, we’ve financed all of our needs in house, but we recognize we’ll need an extra push to get us to where we want to be as a business. When you participate in this funding campaign you help to “push” with us as we grow together.

The Connecticut Department of Economic and Community Development (DECD) believes in our business and has helped us to finance the truck. We need your support to help fund the additional costs associated with running the truck so that we quickly meet the capacity and capability of our new wheels.

According to a study by Project Drawdown, ending food “waste” would reduce CO2 emissions nearly as much over the next three decades as onshore wind turbines (5). Please help us fulfill our mission of making a tangible impact on the Hartford community, the United States, and the world we live in through composting.

Our Residential Service

At Blue Earth Compost, we know it feels wrong to throw food in the trash. Once you start composting, you won’t be able to imagine another way. We provide you with the best trash can ever - no waste, no mess, cleaned and relined with compostable bags by us as part of the service.

Blue Earth Compost members receive a 4-gallon pail, lined with a compostable bag, that we pick up once a week or twice a month. During every collection, we exchange your full pail with a clean, relined pail - no clean up required. We handle the messy part and you receive finished compost back three times a year: spring, summer, and fall. Don't want the compost back? We'll make sure it finds a good home.

Service Territory

Residential - We service: Hartford, West Hartford, East Hartford, Manchester, South Windsor, Windsor, Bloomfield, Canton, Simsbury, Avon, Farmington, Wethersfield, New Britain, Middletown, Glastonbury, and Newington.

Commercial - If you have questions about our Commercial Service, please check out our website and please be in touch!

 

Risks & Challenges

Blue Earth Compost has been slowly growing our business over the past five years. We've worked out most the kinks of providing the best quality service we can. However, this campaign will represent a sizable increase in our customer base and as such it might take us a little while to catch up with new demand. Because of this perks may be delivered later than expected and we'll be working as expediently as possible to get them to you.

In addition, adding new residential service territories is challenging and has to be done with in consideration with customer density. Some contributors from new towns may have to wait a little extra time for their route to begin.

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute to the campaign you can still help by sharing it with your network. Please consider using social media, telling friends and family, and attaching a message to your passenger pigeon for your pen pal.

CITATIONS

(1)https://www.washingtonpost.com/news/theworldpos...

(2)https://www.nrdc.org/resources/wasted-how-ameri...

(3)https://www.ct.gov/deep/Lib/deep/reduce_reuse_r...

(4)https://www.epa.gov/energy/greenhouse-gas-equiv...

(5)https://www.drawdown.org/solutions/food/reduced...

story:
Wie kan ons helpen?

Meesterproefkandidaten 5 Havo:
‘Wij hebben een missie. Een Sustainable TukTuk bouwen!’
Vier eindexamenleerlingen havo van het Da Vinci College Kagerstraat in Leiden dromen er ’s nachts van. Ze willen een duurzame TukTuk bouwen in het kader van hun meesterproef voor het vak Onderzoek & Ontwerpen. Er is al veel uitgezocht en er is een opdrachtgever gevonden. Nu zijn ze op zoek naar een geschikte TukTuk die omgebouwd mag worden!
De allereerste technasium leerlingen van het Da Vinci College Kagerstraat werken Joeri, Hugo, Sebastiaan en Emiel dit schooljaar met passie aan hun meesterproef. Hun missie is het bouwen van de Sustainable Tuktuk. De meesterproef is het schoolexamen van het vak ‘Onderzoeken & Ontwerpen’ en vormt de eindfase van het laatste project voor de examenleerlingen van het Technasium. Voor de meesterproef krijgt het team begeleiding door experts vanuit de TU Delft. De opdrachtgever van het team is New Electric, een bedrijf dat elektrische motoren inbouwt in oude dieselvoertuigen. Daarmee won het de DAM-Prijs; de prijs voor de duurzaamste mkb'er van Amsterdam.
‘Met onze Sustainable TukTuk willen wij de wereld een beetje beter maken! Schoner, vriendelijker en rustiger’ vertelt Emiel. ‘Gewone Tuktuks stinken en maken veel lawaai. Tuktuks die voor 100% elektrisch rijden zijn een stuk voordeliger in gebruik. Bovendien zijn ze bijna geruisloos en zien er daarnaast ook nog eens top uit. Je kunt ze fantastisch inzetten als milieuvriendelijke reclamekarretjes!'.
De jongens zijn nu een paar maanden bezig met het project.
‘Eerst zijn we op onderzoek uitgegaan en op werkbezoek geweest bij de Tuktuk Factory in Diemen’ vertelt Joeri. ‘Gewapend met een aantal van onze onderzoeksvragen: ‘Hoe maken we de TukTuk zo energiezuinig mogelijk? Hoe vervangen we de verbrandingsmotor en bouwen we een elektromotor in? En hoe meten we nou eigenlijk de opbrengst van onze sustainable TukTuk? Zo konden we een start maken met ons onderzoek en in kaart brengen welke problemen en risico’s we kunnen verwachten.’
‘Nu willen we echt heel graag aan de slag met het ombouwen van een benzine-TukTuk naar een elektrische variant. Om dit plan optimaal te kunnen realiseren zijn we nu actief op zoek naar een echte TukTuk. Daarmee kunnen we een prototype bouwen van een milieuvriendelijke, duurzame TukTuk met een elektromotor!
Een goede sponsor is ook heel welkom natuurlijk. Met cash kunnen we dan zelf een tweedehandsje aanschaffen.’
 

Voor vragen kunt u mailen naar: teamdavincikager@gmail.com

Hoe vervangen we de verbrandingsmotor en bouwen we een elektromotor in? En hoe meten we nou eigenlijk de opbrengst van onze sustainable TukTuk? Zo konden we een start maken met ons onderzoek en in kaart brengen welke problemen en risico’s we kunnen verwachten.’‘Nu willen we echt heel graag aan de slag met het ombouwen van een benzine-TukTuk naar een elektrische variant. Om dit plan optimaal te kunnen realiseren zijn we nu actief op zoek naar een echte TukTuk. Daarmee kunnen we een prototype bouwen van een milieuvriendelijke, duurzame TukTuk met een elektromotor!Een goede sponsor is ook heel welkom natuurlijk. Met cash kunnen we dan zelf een tweedehandsje aanschaffen.’ Voor vragen kunt u mailen naar: teamdavincikager@gmail.com

story:
--

Mini Heater + Detachable Hand Warmer: Stay Warm with Rone Anytime Anywhere.

Introducing Rone Mini Heater: an innovative mini heater that comes with a detachable & reusable hand warmer which you can bring it anywhere with you. With an aesthetic design, Rone will keep you warm and happy at all times.

Rone can keep your hands warm all the time during winter for over 100 minutes; You can reuse it however many times you want. When heated to the highest temperature, the hand warmer will maintain 122°F/55°C.

 

Minimum noise level: no need to turn up your volumn. Rone Mini Heater produces less than 56.9dB. 

So you can keep focusing on your work

Or keep sleeping like a baby

Not just keeping one side of your body warm but your entire body. Find your perfect warmth level with Rone, your true personal heater

 

Three color to be chose: Millennial Pink; Charcoal Gray;Creamy White.

 

In addition, with our own testing laboratory, we can use 3D printing technology to generate products for product testing, and constantly improve the details of the product, including product appearance, heat-resistant materials, hand warmers materials and product noise. 

We are committed to providing customers with excellent products. What’s more, we constantly collect customers’ feedback, and optimize our products for a better version. We hope that RONE HEATER will offer a different product experience in the cold winter.

 

Please share our campaign with your family and friends, you could all get free gifts when we reach the following Stretch Goals. You could get the smart bracelet wristband ,when we reach the $100K. You can know the time without your mobile phone when you exercise. Thanks so much for your support!

Are there other methods to heat up the hand warmer?

Principle: Heat Conduction

Method: Boiling the hand warmer in water.

The outer case of the hand warmer can withstand up to120℃.

 
Is the wax used flammable or explosive?

The wax used in Rone Heater is non-toxic, fire-resistant and non- explosive. Hence, we can assure you that it is safe.

 
In what condition does the power automatically turns off?

If the temperature of the PTC case reaches 60℃, the power of the heater will be automatically turned off.

 
How far can we put things behind the heater?

The safety distance is at least 20 centimeters.

 
Does the Rone Heater instantly shuts down when turned off?

When turned off, the Heating Plate will be the first to turn off, followed by the fan. This helps in protecting the heater and prolongs its life.

 
Does the outermost layer of the heater also heats up?

Since there is an insulating layer between the inner parts and the outermost layer of the heater, you will not feel hot upon touching it.

 
When will the product be shipped?

The estimated shipping time for Roan Heater is by December. The first wave of delivery will be placed in the start of December 2018.

 
Some cautionary measures when using the Rone Heater.

A. The place in which the hand warmer is placed for heating becomes hot during operation. So, please keep your children and pets away from the heater to avoid touching it.

B. Please do not use microwave ovens in heating the hand warmer.

C. When using the appliance for the first time, kindly check if the voltage and current meet the requirements of the product. Please remember that the current of the socket is over 5V.

story:
You can find the Media kit and Press Release here. 

 

 
AirZen is an indoor device that improves your quality of life by monitoring and adjusting your personal space air quality and fragrance. Our complex air purifying technology allows you to remove air pollutants, allergens, germs, dust, smoke and unpleasant smells from your environment. With AirZen you will always have a clear mind and the ability to breathe easily.

 

AirZen personal air humidifier for your home and office is the best solution to clear the air in your environment and improve your quality of life. Our warm and cool mist humidifier will make your dreams of a more pleasant environment come true and create a healthy breathing space. AirZen humidifier works within a radius that is just enough to turn your personal space into a favourable microclimate.

AirZen personal air humidifier for your home and office is the best solution to clear the air in your environment and improve your quality of life. Our warm and cool mist humidifier will make your dreams of a more pleasant environment come true and create a healthy breathing space. AirZen humidifier works within a radius that is just enough to turn your personal space into a favourable microclimate.

Air purification is one of the fundamental ways that help us to stay positive all day long. In answer to the growing concern about a comfortable and healthy environment in a world full of airborne toxins and pollutants, we have designed a device that incorporates all of the functions necessary to achieve a clean air environment in everyday use. AirZen HEPA filter air purifier is ideal for users with respiratory conditions, allergy sufferers and people living in contaminated urban areas with growing environmental problems.

AirZen is also an aroma diffuser for essential oils. It has a specifically designed slot for organic essential oils. This allows you to experience personal aromatherapy without interfering with other peoples’ breathing space.

During non-working hours, the ionization mode can be turned on to improve the quality of the environment either manually or automatically.  This freshens the air and significantly reduces airborne pollutants as small as 1 micron, such as allergens, pollen, mould, smoke, pet odours, lingering smells, dust, and other airborne irritants.

Multifunctional AirZendevice 5 in 1 is controlled via a mobile application on your phone. Choose the most desirable option from the provided presets and AirZen will begin its work. A variety of fragrances is available in our app shop section. You can check your air quality by tracking such parameters as: CO2 level, temperature and humidity. AirZen is a technologically advanced air and weather station. However you like your environment, with AirZen, you’re in control!

 

Essential oils are recommended for recreational use, and enhance both mood and clarity of mind. Our 6-Pack collection includes 10ml Eucalyptus, Lavender, Lemon grass, Orange, Peppermint, Tea tree, and more! The oil diffuser is the real deal for your personal environment and social gatherings, providing a calming mood and pleasant memories. You can learn more here about our  essential aroma oils.

 

There are 3 filters in the AirZen: the sponge filter, carbon filter and HEPA. Using filters that meets HEPA standards, the device will begin destroying allergens, bacteria, bad odours, toxic gases and viruses, alleviating asthma, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD), and poor air quality for everyone. Carbon filtration also helps to reduce odours further and absorbs volatile airborne pollutants.

We recommend changing the filter regularly. When using the device for 2-8 hours a day, the filter will last from 3 to 6 months, depending on the severity of the pollution of the room. The mobile application will inform you when the filter needs to be changed.

Our mission is to help people to live healthy life and to be happy. We are working in the field of climate equipment and want each single product to have high standards of quality. 

Risks and Challenges

The day-to-day world needs motivation to enable all of our dreams, ideas and insights into clean-air solutions to come true. Our creative team is ready and waiting to shoulder the enormous demands and to fulfil all our obligations during the production and order stages. We understand all the natural risks and technical difficulties, issues in the supply chain and the challenges that feedback brings.
AirZen has been preparing for a long time and we are now ready to make a great impression! You can relax and stay positive and well informed as we’ll do our best to satisfy all your needs. Design, custom, application, hardware – It’s easy when you have the passion and love for our product that we do! AirZen is the art and you are the creators!

story:
The Indiegogo InDemand campaign ended, but you haven't missed out. HomeBiogas 2.0 is still available for purchase!

We're so happy to see a passionate community of hundreds of biogas pioneer from all over the world! Thank you to our Indiegogo InDemand backers!

 

 

 

 

Got 30 seconds? Here's how the HomeBiogas 2.0 appliance can benefit you:

 

New to Biogas? Great! Learning how to make your own renewable energy from food waste is a fascinating and truly rewarding journey. We designed HomeBiogas 2.0 to be super simple and easy to use.  Just toss in your organic waste, and the bacteria will do the rest. Here are the basics of how it works:

 

Leftover food or food scraps may not be suitable for eating, but they still have calories that can be used to create energy. So don't throw them out! Put food waste or animal manure into the appliance. The bacteria in the digester will break down the organic matter and convert it into biogas and fertilizer. The gas bag holds 700 liters of biogas at all times, ready for all your cooking needs. It is a 100% off-the-grid and natural process, similar to what happens in your own stomach.

WATCH: The fascinating process in 10 seconds!

 

 

 

 

COOKING WITH YOUR FOOD WASTE

Feed your food waste to HomeBiogas 2.0 and get up to 3 hours of cooking gas daily. It looks, smells, and burns just like any traditional gas would, the only difference is that this gas is made from recycling in your own backyard!

 

HIGH-QUALITY LIQUID FERTILIZER

The other outcome is all high-quality liquid fertilizer. No mess or work needed. The fertilizer flows from the user-friendly pouring sleeve straight into your fertilizer can. You will be proud to nourish your plants and food garden with a natural product, free from harmful chemicals and additives! 

 

TEACH THE YOUNG GENERATION TO RECYCLE

HomeBiogas 2.0 enables households to embrace recycling and teach sustainable practices to the young generation. Education and leading by example are the most effective ways of creating new and positive habits. Imagine children growing up knowing that food scraps are not waste, they are valuable!   

 

Choose a location in your backyard for HomeBiogas 2.0. It can be up to 20 meters from the kitchen. Then assemble it by connecting a few parts and filling up the digester with water. Assembly is super easy and should only take an hour! After assembly, activate the appliance the old-fashioned way, using animal manure, or using a bacteria kit. Activation only needs to be done one time, and once activation is done, you will be able to feed HomeBiogas 2.0 with your food scraps and produce free, renewable energy on a daily basis!

 

 

 Composting is certainly a good step in the right direction, but with HomeBiogas, you can get more out of your waste. Unsure about why HomeBiogas is the future of waste composting? Let us show you:

 

 

 

 

 Appliance Features:

 

 

     

HomeBiogas 2.0 is a powerful tool that can help mitigate climate change! It is an off-the-grid appliance, meaning that it does not depend on the use of any non-renewable power source. There are several ways in which HomeBiogas 2.0 reduces greenhouse gas emissions.

DIVERTS WASTE FROM LANDFILLS

Local waste management with HomeBiogas 2.0 diverts food scraps from becoming landfill waste. When food goes to the landfill, the nutrients in the food never return to the soil. Rather, the wasted food rots and produces methane gas which is released into the atmosphere and contributes to global warming. When you use HomeBiogas 2.0 you will be recycling your food scraps in your own backyard and recycling the methane your food produces.

   

REDUCES DEPENDENCE ON FOSSIL FUELS

When you choose to cook on biogas that was made from your food waste, you are reducing the demand for fossil fuels, which are non-renewable resources. Mining, processing and transporting fossil fuels take a lot of energy and resources, which is harmful to the environment and is a leading contributor to climate change.

 

SLOWS DOWN DEFORESTATION

Nearly 3 billion people around the world burn wood for daily cooking and heating. Burning wood releases emissions that are contributors to global climate change: carbon dioxide, methane and black carbon. Wood harvesting also contributes to loss of biodiversity and forest degradation. The use of biogas slows down this detrimental deforestation and gives an alternative to cooking on wood or charcoal.

 

 

 

 

 HomeBiogas 2.0 is our second model, the first one, HomeBiogas 1.0, was a huge success! Since its retail sales began in 2016, HomeBiogas 1.0 is used in 76 countries worldwide! Although our customers come from diverse cultures, they share similar goals of wanting to reduce food waste and generate renewable energy.

 

HomeBiogas is a socially oriented company that cares about spreading biogas technology to all. During the campaign, you can get involved too! We’ve partnered with local organizations in Puerto Rico and in Kenya so that we can provide clean energy to the families who need it. Your donation will go straight to the purchase of a HomeBiogas 2.0 appliance for either of these causes. In return, we’ll match your donation through funding shipment of the system, leading local training, and providing continued maintenance. You’ll receive periodic updates about the impact the HomeBiogas 2.0 appliance is making. You can select the $50 Donation Pledge, or to donate more click here, and make a pledge without a reward.

 

 

HomeBiogas convierte tus desechos de comida en gas y fertilizante líquido diariamente. ¿Cómo funciona? Es un sistema muy fácil de armar, activar y mantener. Se introducen los desechos orgánicos al sistema, las bacterias en el tanque biodigestor comerán los desechos, con eso crearán 3 horas de gas para cocinar y lo que sobra se convertirá en un fertlizante limpio, verde y sano.

Otros Beneficios:

 Precios y envío

El precio final del sistema, luego de la campaña de Indiegogo, será US$790 (no incluye la cocina de biogás). Aprovecha la oportunidad de la campaña para llevarte el sistema a a US$520 (37% de descuento) e incluye una cocina de biogás El envío aproximado: marzo 2018. Contacto: info@homebiogas.com

 

 The Bio Toilet connects to the existing HomeBiogas 2.0 appliance to create cooking gas and fertilizer from human waste. The Bio Toilet is a low flush toilet (uses only 1.2 liters of water per flush), that does not require running water and can utilize grey water. The Bio Toilet is perfect for those wishing to live off-the-grid, and is a solution for underserved communities that do not have access to latrines. Just like HomeBiogas 2.0, the toilet will arrive in a small box, and has a simple do-it-yourself assembly. Multiple toilets have already been put into use, being tested both at the HomeBiogas headquarters and in the field. In 2018 it will be available as an accessory to HomeBiogas 2.0. Contact info@homebiogas.com to get more information.

 

Some pictures from the field:

We are 16 environmental enthusiasts who share core values and dream of make a meaningful change for the planet. We are passionate that backyard biogas production is the way of the future and an answer to so many global issues. In the years to come, we will continue educating and pushing for our vision to enable biogas for all!  Thank you for supporting us and helping our dream become a reality!

 

The Creation Process

In January 2017, we set out to improve the HomeBiogas appliance. We took all the feedback we got from existing customers using HomeBiogas 1.0 and worked to sharpen features and improve user experience. It was also very important for us to lower the production cost, so that we could get biogas technology to the people who need it the very most- those who still don't have a readily available, safe or affordable cooking source. We married the science of biodigestion with a new and improved design, and in May 2017, we arrived at HomeBiogas 2.0. Our manufacturing partners are ready to go. All we need is your support so we can deliver this renewable energy generator to your door!

 

See HomeBiogas 2.0 in Action

HomeBiogas 2.0 has been well tested, as you can see in our Kickstarter Live recording. We are now in the process of working with suppliers to manufacture the components of the appliance. Once we recieve all the components, we will be able to jump-start the production line and deliver straight to your door!

 
 
 

 

 

 

 

International Backers & Shipping

We will ship HomeBiogas 2.0 worldwide, however, we are unable to ship to the following countries: India, China, Saudi Arabia, United Arab Emirates, Indonesia, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Libya, Myanmar/Burma, North Korea, Somalia, Pakistan, Sudan, Syria, Jordan, Egypt, Oman Yemen Algeria, Bahrain, Comoros, Djibouti, Morocco, Qatar, Tunisia, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Tajikistan, Turkmenistan and Uzbekistan. Please note that you may be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to your region. 

Shipping Costs:

  • USA & Europe- $99.00
  • Australia- $149.00
  • Mexico, Colombia, Brazil, Chile- $149.00
  • Israel- $70.00
  • All other countries- $189.00

HomeBiogas is proud to subsidize a percentage of shipping cost to give you, the consumer, the lowest possible shipping price. The estimated delivery is March 2018.

Warranty

We stand firmly behind our product. Each HomeBiogas 2.0 includes a 24-month warranty. Click here for more information.

FAQ

  • Why HomeBiogas 2.0?

After successfully selling our first HomeBiogas 1.0 appliance to customers in over 75 countries, it was time to get to work to create something even better (and cheaper!). The new HomeBiogas 2.0 appliance provides double the capacity of our last system at a fraction of the cost. It’s more lightweight, more durable, and more powerful. HomeBiogas 2.0 is the next step in bringing biogas to backyards around the world.

  • How safe is the HomeBiogas system?

We have taken many steps to validate the quality and the safety of our system, including having the unit audited for safety by a qualified safety engineer who is a biogas expert. Additionally, we have a European CE certificate for safety.

HomeBiogas is not only safe, it is safer than LPG and propane! In order to remain in a liquefied state in storage, LPG must be kept under high-pressure conditions. This poses a greater risk of explosion when in the vicinity of an ignition source. HomeBiogas, on the other hand, purposefully stores the gas in a soft case, at a low pressure, which prevents explosion.

  • How is HomeBiogas 2.0 installed?

HomeBiogas 2.0 is shipped to you in a small box. Unlike other biogas digesters, you do not need a technician to install the system. It is a do-it-yourself kit, that comes with all the necessary tools and detailed instructions. The appliance can be assembled in about 1 hour!

  • What types of waste can you put into HomeBiogas 2.0?

The HomeBiogas 2.0 appliance thrives on food leftovers and animal manure. An equal amount of water should be added with the waste.

Avoid feeding large quantities of citrus fruit skin or chicken droppings since it can reduce the effectiveness of the digestion.

  • Does it smell?

No. Unlike compost heaps, HomeBiogas 2.0 does not smell. The breakdown of the organic material happens submerged below water. Additionally, there is a lid that seals the inlet tightly.

 

If you have questions at any time, during or after the campaign has closed, you can always reach us at info@homebiogas.com or chat with us here!
story_txt:

Wood harvesting also contributes to loss of biodiversity and forest degradation. The use of biogas slows down this detrimental deforestation and gives an alternative to cooking on wood or charcoal.     HomeBiogas 2.0 is our second model, the first one, HomeBiogas 1.0, was a huge success! Since its retail sales began in 2016, HomeBiogas 1.0 is used in 76 countries worldwide! Although our customers come from diverse cultures, they share similar goals of wanting to reduce food waste and generate renewable energy. HomeBiogas is a socially oriented company that cares about spreading biogas technology to all. During the campaign, you can get involved too! We’ve partnered with local organizations in Puerto Rico and in Kenya so that we can provide clean energy to the families who need it. Your donation will go straight to the purchase of a HomeBiogas 2.0 appliance for either of these causes. In return, we’ll match your donation through funding shipment of the system, leading local training, and providing continued maintenance. You’ll receive periodic updates about the impact the HomeBiogas 2.0 appliance is making. You can select the $50 Donation Pledge, or to donate more click here, and make a pledge without a reward.   HomeBiogas convierte tus desechos de comida en gas y fertilizante líquido diariamente. ¿Cómo funciona? Es un sistema muy fácil de armar, activar y mantener. Se introducen los desechos orgánicos al sistema, las bacterias en el tanque biodigestor comerán los desechos, con eso crearán 3 horas de gas para cocinar y lo que sobra se convertirá en un fertlizante limpio, verde y sano.Otros Beneficios:   Precios y envíoEl precio final del sistema, luego de la campaña de Indiegogo, será US$790 (no incluye la cocina de biogás). Aprovecha la oportunidad de la campaña para llevarte el sistema a a US$520 (37% de descuento) e incluye una cocina de biogás El envío aproximado: marzo 2018. Contacto: info@homebiogas.com  The Bio Toilet connects to the existing HomeBiogas 2.0 appliance to create cooking gas and fertilizer from human waste. The Bio Toilet is a low flush toilet (uses only 1.2 liters of water per flush), that does not require running water and can utilize grey water. The Bio Toilet is perfect for those wishing to live off-the-grid, and is a solution for underserved communities that do not have access to latrines. Just like HomeBiogas 2.0, the toilet will arrive in a small box, and has a simple do-it-yourself assembly. Multiple toilets have already been put into use, being tested both at the HomeBiogas headquarters and in the field. In 2018 it will be available as an accessory to HomeBiogas 2.0. Contact info@homebiogas.com to get more information. Some pictures from the field: 
 
We are 16 environmental enthusiasts who share core values and dream of make a meaningful change for the planet. We are passionate that backyard biogas production is the way of the future and an answer to so many global issues. In the years to come, we will continue educating and pushing for our vision to enable biogas for all!  Thank you for supporting us and helping our dream become a reality! The Creation ProcessIn January 2017, we set out to improve the HomeBiogas appliance. We took all the feedback we got from existing customers using HomeBiogas 1.0 and worked to sharpen features and improve user experience. It was also very important for us to lower the production cost, so that we could get biogas technology to the people who need it the very most- those who still don't have a readily available, safe or affordable cooking source. We married the science of biodigestion with a new and improved design, and in May 2017, we arrived at HomeBiogas 2.0. Our manufacturing partners are ready to go. All we need is your support so we can deliver this renewable energy generator to your door! See HomeBiogas 2.0 in ActionHomeBiogas 2.0 has been well tested, as you can see in our Kickstarter Live recording. We are now in the process of working with suppliers to manufacture the components of the appliance. Once we recieve all the components, we will be able to jump-start the production line and deliver straight to your door!        International Backers & ShippingWe will ship HomeBiogas 2.0 worldwide, however, we are unable to ship to the following countries: India, China, Saudi Arabia, United Arab Emirates, Indonesia, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Libya, Myanmar/Burma, North Korea, Somalia, Pakistan, Sudan, Syria, Jordan, Egypt, Oman Yemen Algeria, Bahrain, Comoros, Djibouti, Morocco, Qatar, Tunisia, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Tajikistan, Turkmenistan and Uzbekistan. Please note that you may be responsible for duties, fees and taxes applicable to your region. Shipping Costs:
USA & Europe- $99.00
Australia- $149.00
Mexico, Colombia, Brazil, Chile- $149.00
Israel- $70.00
All other countries- $189.00
HomeBiogas is proud to subsidize a percentage of shipping cost to give you, the consumer, the lowest possible shipping price. The estimated delivery is March 2018.WarrantyWe stand firmly behind our product. Each HomeBiogas 2.0 includes a 24-month warranty. Click here for more information.FAQWhy HomeBiogas 2.0?After successfully selling our first HomeBiogas 1.0 appliance to customers in over 75 countries, it was time to get to work to create something even better (and cheaper!). The new HomeBiogas 2.0 appliance provides double the capacity of our last system at a fraction of the cost. It’s more lightweight, more durable, and more powerful. HomeBiogas 2.0 is the next step in bringing biogas to backyards around the world.How safe is the HomeBiogas system?We have taken many steps to validate the quality and the safety of our system, including having the unit audited for safety by a qualified safety engineer who is a biogas expert. Additionally, we have a European CE certificate for safety.HomeBiogas is not only safe, it is safer than LPG and propane! In order to remain in a liquefied state in storage, LPG must be kept under high-pressure conditions. This poses a greater risk of explosion when in the vicinity of an ignition source. HomeBiogas, on the other hand, purposefully stores the gas in a soft case, at a low pressure, which prevents explosion.How is HomeBiogas 2.0 installed?HomeBiogas 2.0 is shipped to you in a small box. Unlike other biogas digesters, you do not need a technician to install the system. It is a do-it-yourself kit, that comes with all the necessary tools and detailed instructions. The appliance can be assembled in about 1 hour!What types of waste can you put into HomeBiogas 2.0?The HomeBiogas 2.0 appliance thrives on food leftovers and animal manure. An equal amount of water should be added with the waste.Avoid feeding large quantities of citrus fruit skin or chicken droppings since it can reduce the effectiveness of the digestion.Does it smell?No. Unlike compost heaps, HomeBiogas 2.0 does not smell. The breakdown of the organic material happens submerged below water. Additionally, there is a lid that seals the inlet tightly. If you have questions at any time, during or after the campaign has closed, you can always reach us at info@homebiogas.com or chat with us here!

story:
PowerPlant frees you from being tied to mains electricity.  That feeling you get when your devices are drained of power and you're nowhere near a wall socket? Gone. PowerPlant is your personal power assistant. With the ability to power devices up to 95 Watts you'll be amazed at what you can power…and where.   

No one likes a dead battery, and with PowerPlant you no longer have one. We have undergone extensive lab testing and real-life research to ensure you have the power your need on the move. We ran some experiments at our York Headquarters to test the charging capacity.

Ok, so who does need a PowerPlant? The short answer is everyone.

There's the obvious need for anyone with a device to have one, but we're sure that we'll continue to hear of the inventive ways and places you lot plan to use your PowerPlant!

TSA Approved for airline travel

It's not a widely known fact that many airlines place restrictions on Power banks on planes - not only in the hold (typically banned altogether) but also in the cabin. Powerplan is TSA approved, meaning you can take it on the plane with you (although we always recommend you check with the airline just in case).  

  • Do you have to pay import tax?
  • Do you need to give us your telephone number and tax information?

Please note that whilst we endeavour to ensure that import taxes and duties are kept to a minimum for territories outside of our warehouse locations, local import taxes and duties may be required to be paid. Damson Global (parent company of Nuuq PowerPlant) has no control over local customs offices and, as such, cannot be held responsible should you be charged import taxes and duties in addition to your purchase and shipping price.

It is always best to check the position in your country beforehand.

We have been careful to assess our shipping prices by country. However, please note that some countries, like South American countries, Russia & Israel do have high shipping costs for tracking enabled courier delivery. Some countries will require a telephone number and tax information. It will be your responsibility to provide us with this information if it required and we suggest you check with your local customs office. 

Please note, PO Boxes are only accepted in certain countries, we advise checking with us before shipping if you intend to use a PO Box.  

Remember that even if you purchase now, you will not receive your PowerPlant until November. The nature of crowdfunding projects, the discounted prices involved (which includes subsidised shipping in many cases) and the associated fees and costs means we are unable to offer refunds.

If, for any reason, you have reservations about backing this project we suggest you wait until it is available through our online retailers or contact our team, who can discuss with you any questions you might have.

We cannot refund your order after you have confirmed it. Attempting a chargeback through your credit card company in order to receive a refund should not be attempted, as it is fraud.

  • Universal plug for 2 & 3 pin plugs (ideal for USA, UK, Europe and Australia)
  • Output 19v/1.58A 5v 2.4A
  • Output: AC 100 - 240v/95W (max)
  • Modified Sine Wave Inverter
  • Replaceable 20100mAh lithium-Ion battery
  • 2 x 2.4A 5v fastcharge USB ports
  • 1 x USB-C
  • 1 x 19 Volt fast charge charging port
  • LCD display with battery charge, temperature, AC, DC and In/Out display
  • IP4 Splash-proof water resistance

 

 

NUUQ  - from the people who created Damson Audio.

We had so many creative and innovative ideas that didn’t really fit under the serious audio umbrella. We needed a playground.

NUUQ was created to bring these innovations and ideas to life, blowing everyone away in the process. 

We have a number of really exciting projects coming over the next few months. Watch this space: NUUQ VR headset, LiveStage and much more are heading your way. 

PowerPlant has been tested in numerous conditions, both in the lab and – something a lot of companies forget about - real world application. PowerPlant will be manufactured to the highest level of quality. PowerPlant will not ship until it has passed all relevant safety tests and we are working with an assembly partner who shares our passion for quality to ensure that the product you receive is as safe as it can be.  

Q: What is the mAh of PowerPlant

A: The base product ships with a replaceable 20100 mAh battery. Additional 20100 mAh batteries are available as extras. 

Q: What do you mean by universal plug?

A: We mean that it works with US/UK/EU/AU without the need for an adapter. 

Q: What voltage is supported? 

A: We support everything from 240 volts down making PowerPlant compatible with almost all countries power requirements

Q: Can you really power a TV? 

A: Yep, we tried it. Check out the video on our You Tube channel, the ultimate portable TV!

Q: What is your shipping cost?

A: We have adopted a flat rate shipping charge depending on perk, from $25 - $35

Q: How do I know this will ever ship?

A: Because the people behind Nuuq have already run 5 successful campaigns. 

Q: What's the maximum amount of additional batteries I could get? 

A: Really depends on how you're carrying them, but effectively it's limitless

All that's left to say is Thank you! We at Damson Global (NUUQ's parent company) sincerely appreciate your continued support of our projects and for backing us.
